NO, ,

(KHYA DGE DKON MCHOG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1798

LOR MDO SMAD MDZOD DGE SMAD BSE TSANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO

MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG MA KHYA DGE

'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN PA CHOS LDAN GYI SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG
NAS

GDAN SA BKOD, RTZE DBUS 'JAM DBYANGS BSHES GNYEN LAS RAB

TU BYUNG, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS
BSDUS GRVA

@155 DANG, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL, DBU MA RIGS TSOGS, PHAR PHYIN

DON BDUN CU, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA, MDZOD 'GREL CHEN MO BCAS

LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD CING MKHAS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS RGYAS,

GUNG THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING DBANG
LUNG

KHRID GSUM MANG DU ZHUS, KUN MKHYEN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS

MED RGYA MTSO LAS LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG, SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO, LEGS

BSHAD GSER PHRENG, RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON SOGS ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI
MAN

NGAG MANG DU GSAN, SMAD PHYOGS SU SNGA PHYIR LAN DU MAR BYON NAS

GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI 'DOD MOS LTAR CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN
BSKOR,

GZHI BYES KUN TU DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM GYI CHOS RGYUN MANG DU
SPEL,

RANG DGON CHAS PA KONG BU NANG DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS BSAM 'GRUB

GLING DU SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS SO, DE LTAR BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN YAR LDAN DU BSKYANGS NAS DGUNG LO BDUN CU'I NANG

NAS DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO,,

(KHYA DGE 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN PA CHOS LDAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1760 LOR MDO SMAD 'BRING BA'I RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I ME MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1797 LOR MA PHAM GA-YU
MTSOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA PAR CHAS PA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS

LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG BCAS LA BYANG BAR BSLABS, RGYA MKHAR

BLA MA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE
TSUL

@156 BSGRUBS, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS
NAS MDO SNGAGS

KYI GZHUNG LA SBYANGS PAR MDZAD, GUR YAG DKA' BCU BA LAS SUM

RTAGS DANG, SGRA RIG PA, SNYAN NGAG SOGS SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PAR

MKHYEN, MTSAN SGROGS MKHAN PO BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS LAS BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS, DGUNG LO SUM CU PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO BYA LO

STE SPYI LO 1789 LOR KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG POS KHYA DGE

DPON SLOB KYI SPRUL SKUR THUGS THAG BCAD CING GDAN SAR BKOD,

THO YON CHOS RJE 'JAM DBYANGS DGE 'DUN GYIS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA'I

NGOR MDO SMAD DU LAN GNYIS BYON, BKA' 'GYUR BA RAB RGYAS LAS

BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG GSAN, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR DBUS SU

BYON TE GRVA SA KHAG LA MANG 'GYED DANG, GTZANG KHUL GYI DGON
SDE KHAG

LA MCHOD 'BUL MDZAD, PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA MJAL ZHING CHOS

'BREL ZHUS, DE NAS SA SKYA GONG 'OG DANG, GNYA' NANG 'PHEL

RGYAS GLING, MI LA'I SGRUB KHANG, BAL YUL DU SLOB DPON DBYIG

GNYEN GYI SKU GDUNG, MCHOD RTEN BYA RUNG KHA SHOR, BYA RGOD
PHUNG

PO'I RI, SLOB DPON KLU SGRUB KYI SGRUB KHANG RNAMS SU MCHOD 'BUL

THUGS SMON NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PAR MA PHA MA

GA-YU MTSOR SKU GSHEGS,,

(KHYA DGE BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1742

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL SHUL RNYING BA'I KHROD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG

@157 BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1784 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG KHYA DGE DPON SLOB BLO GROS RGYA MTSO'I SPRUL SKU YIN TSUL
SOGS KYI

GSUNG BYON YANG DPON SLOB DE NYID KYIS SPRUL SKU GDAN DRANGS MI
CHOG

GSUNGS YOD STABS GDAN SAR MA BKOD, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL

GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE THUGS 'DZIN SHIN TU BZANG BAS GUNG TSIGS

MANG JA MA 'TSOGS GONG DU SHOG GU MDA' TSAD BCO BRGYAD RE STAR

CHAGS SU 'DZIN THUB, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO LAS PHAR

PHYIN SKABS DANG PO NAS BRGYAD PA'I BAR YONGS RDZOGS DANG, DBU

MA LUNG RIGS GTER MDZOD YONGS RDZOGS, MDZOD GNAS DANG PO

NAS BRGYAD PA'I BAR YONGS RDZOGS BCAS GSAN ZHING RGYUGS PHUL, DE

NAS GTZOS RGYA MKHAR SGAR DANG AURGE GRVA TSANG GI KHRI LA
BZHUGS SHING MDO

SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN SPEL, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DUS
'KHOR

DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA PHEBS NAS 'CHAD NYAN YUN RING DU MDZAD,
KHRI

ZUR NAS CHER MA 'GYANGS PAR DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS STENG DGONGS PA

CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
DUS

'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS LNGA PA YIN NO,,

(KHYA DGE BLO GROS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE LO

1664 LOR KAN SU'U ZHING CHEN GYI CO NE'U KHYA DGE YUL DU GDUNG
RUS

KHYUNG PO LAS MCHED PA'I YAB KLU 'BUM YAGS DANG, YUM LHA MO

'TSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I
LCAGS

@158 PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1740 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BDUN
PAR

YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS TE SLOB DPON DON YOD
'BYUNG

GNAS KYI DRUNG DU SMON LAM SNA LNGA DANG 'JAM DPAL MTSAN BRJOD

BCAS BLOR SBYANGS BYAS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR GONG MA LUNG

RIGS RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM
PA

MNOS, DE NAS LO 'GA' SONG RJES CO NE'I CHOS RJE DANG KHU BO SHES

RAB DON YOD BCAS DANG MNYAM DU DBUS SU PHEBS, 'BRAS SPUNGS

SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS, GUNG THANG SKU THOG DANG PO KHRI
CHEN DGE

'DUN PHUN TSOGS DANG 'DZIN GRVA GCIG YIN, TSAD MA DANG PHAR

PHYIN, 'DUL BA DANG LAM RIM BCAS DPON SLOB DON GRUB RGYA MTSO'I

DRUNG NAS SBYANGS TE GSANG PHUR DKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD PAS
'JAM

DBYANGS KA BA THOB, DE NAS KHRI BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG, BKA'

'GYUR BA SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO, CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS, RDO
RJE

'CHANG GTZANG PA NGAG DBANG SBYIN PA, MKHAN CHEN SKYO MO LUNG
PA,

RGYAL

PO, DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG DON GRUB, TSIS KHANG DGE BSHES

POR

GSAN, PHA BONG KHA BA MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN LAS DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA MNOS, KHYAD PAR DU KUN MKHYEN 'JAM BZHAD

DAM DBAL SHUL NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS RTZA BA'I BLA MAR BSTEN
PAS,

KHONG NYID DANG THANG SAG PA DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO, GRUB DBANG
'JAM

@159 DPAL RGYA MTSO, MKHAR RDO BZOD PA RGYA MTSO BZHI LA SRAS
KYI THU BO

BZHIR GRAGS, YANG KHONG NYID DANG DPON SLOB GRAGS PA BSHAD
SGRUB,

STAG TSANG DPON SLOB RNAMS LA DPON SLOB RNAM GSUM ZER, DE NAS

PHA YUL DU PHEBS TE RANG DGON KHYA DGE LEGS BSHAD GLING DU 'DU
KHANG

SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, BYA KHYUNG DGON DU

BCA' BZHAG NAS DGON LUNG DGON DANG, CHU BZANG, GSER

KHOG SKU 'BUM BCAS SU ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, DGUNG LO MTHON

POR PHEBS DUS RI KHROD 'GRIMS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI RNAM THAR

'DUG

'DAS

BA LEGS

@162 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI BLON PO
YIN, BAN

BON GNYIS KYI BAR LA CHOS KYI RTZOD GLENG BYUNG SKABS KHONG GIS
BON GYI KHA

NGAN LA GTAN TSIGS CHUNG BA DANG, BAN CHOS KHUNGS BTZAN LA GTAN

TSIGS RGYA CHE BAS PHYIN CHAD BOD DU BAN CHOS TE SANGS RGYAS
CHOS LUGS

BYA'O ZHES KHA 'CHAMS NAS RGYAL KHAMS KUN LA DRIL BSGRAGS SO,
KHONG

NI GTZUG LAG RIG GNAS LA MKHAS PA DANG, LHAG PAR DU RTZIS RIG

LA SHIN TU MKHAS PAS RTZIS PA CHEN PO ZHES ZHU'O,,

BTZAN PO DRUG GI YA GYAL YIN NO, ,

(KHYUNG PO SPUNG SAD ZU TZE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DRUG PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SKU TSE'I STOD DU GTZANG RJE MAR MUN GYI BLON PO
YIN,

RJES SU RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI CHAB SRID DAR RGYAS SU
'GRO BA

DANG BSTUN NAS GTZANG RJE MAR MUN BKRONGS SHING, GTZANG BOD KYI

'BANGS MI KHYIM TSANG KHRI PHRAG GNYIS TZAM RGYAL PO GNAM RI
SRONG BTZAN

GYI PHYAG TU PHUL, RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYIS KYANG

TZE LA BYA

@163 GNYIS LDAN GYI BLON CHEN ZHIG YIN, DE NAS RGYAL PO SRONG
BTZAN SGAM

PO'I BLON PO MDZAD CING MTHA' BZHI RGYAL PHRAN DBANG DU BSDU BA
DANG,

RGYAL KHRIMS GTAN DU PHAB BA BCAS MDZAD RJES CHE'O, RGYAL PO
SRONG

BTZAN SGAM POS KYANG "BLON PO'I NANG NA, KHYUNG PO SPUNG SAD ZU

LAS GLO BA NYE BA SNGON CHAD MA BYUNG NGO, ZU TZE 'DZANGS SHE NA

NA

ZHES GSUNGS SO, ,'ON KYANG SKU TSE'I MJUG TU RGYAL PO SRONG
BTZAN

TSAR

GCOD LONG MA BYUNG BAR RANG NYID LCEBS SO, ,

CAN GYI LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN,

(KHYUNG PO RTZE BA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

BAN

BON GNYIS KYI BAR LA CHOS KYI RTZOD PA BYUNG SKABS KHONG GIS BON
CHOS KYI

KHA 'DZIN DANG SHAGS 'DEBS PA MDZAD NAS RTZOD PA LAS BON CHOS

KHUNGS NGAN ZHING GTAN TSIGS CHUNG BA DANG, BAN CHOS TE SANGS

RGYAS CHOS LUGS NI KHUNGS BTZAN LA GTAN TSIGS RGYA CHE BAS PHYIN
CHAD

BOD DU BON CHOS DOR NAS BAN CHOS TE SANGS RGYAS CHOS LUGS BYA'O

NAMS

'PHEL DANG, YUM SGROL MA 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, SE

RA RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN (1469-1544) GYI GCUNG PO

SGOR ZHUGS TE MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS

THAR

GSUNG

RGYUN// BCAS POD CHUNG GCIG BZHUGS SO,,

(KHYUNG CHANG YE SHES BLA MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1115

STE SPYI LO 1176 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG BYA 'DUL LAS RAB TU

RGYA DMAR LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, PA TSAB LO TZ'A BA LAS DBU MA
DANG,

BZAD PA DBANG RDOR LAS SPYOD PHYOGS, RGYA DMAR LAS TSAD MA,

SE STON LAS PHAR PHYIN, PHUG PA BA LAS RVA LI DANG 'PHAGS SKOR,

JO BSOD LAS BDE MCHOG DANG KRO KRi YA, LHO BA LAS KHA RAG SKOR,

@166 NAD PA DANG RVA LO LAS DUS 'KHOR DANG NAG 'JIGS, GNAM 'PHAR

BA LAS BKA' GDAMS, 'KHON PHU BA LCAM SRING LAS LAM 'BRAS,

RNGOG LAS DGYES RDOR RNAMS LEGS PAR GSAN, 'BRI SGOM GLING KHA

BA LAS GTUM MO DANG, SGYU LUS, RMI LAM GYI KHRID RNAMS GSAN,

DE NAS RJE RAS CHUNG PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS ZHAG DGU BCU THAM
PA

LA SNYAN BRGYUD TSANG BAR GNANG, TSOGS 'KHOR YANG DGU BTANG,

DE NAS RJE RAS CHUNG PA'I BKA' LTAR GNAS NGES MED DBEN PA'I RI

KHROD 'GRIMS NAS SGRUB BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA YANG NAS YANG DU DAR
BAR

MDZAD DO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI MA GCIG AONG JO DANG,

DGE SDINGS PA, MAR STON TSUL KHRIMS 'BYUNG GNAS BCAS YIN,

(KHYUNG RO BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1782

LOR STOD KYI RGYAL RONG TSA KHO MCHOG RTZER YAB DKA' THUB DANG,

KLU SMAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I
ME MO

LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1847 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI BYIS PA'I DUS
KYI

MING LA DKA' THUB 'BUM ZHES BTAGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR BLA

MA BLO GROS LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG SUM RTAGS DAG GSUM SOGS
LA

SBYANGS NAS MKHAS PAR MKHYEN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BON DANG, BAR

DU RNYING MA, MTHAR DGE LUGS PA'I CHOS RNAMS LA RIM GYIS SBYANGS

PA MDZAD, DE NAS RNYING MA'I DGON PA TSANG GNAS SU ZHUGS NAS

RNYING MA'I CHOS SKOR LA THOS BSAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM

@167 PAR BON LOG STO BU DON GRUB KYIS SDE DPON BAR LA PHRA MA
BCUG PA'I

RKYEN GYIS DPON PO T'A RO RDO RJE RGYAL GYIS YAB YUM KHRIMS LA
SBYAR BAS

RE ZHIG MI GZHAN GYI GA-YOG TU BZHUGS DGOS PA BYUNG, DGUNG LO

BCU DRUG PAR YAB DANG LHAN CIG TU TRE HOR DANG, CHAB MDO, SPO

YUL, KONG PO, DVAGS PO, SPUR TA, KLU KHA DA GRU BRGYUD

BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG MJAL ZHING, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN

PAR DBUS LHA LDAN DU PHYAG PHEBS, DE NAS SE RA DGON DU BYON TE

LHUN GRUB 'PHROD LAM CHES MTSAN LA BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB CES GSOL

ZHING SER SMAD THOS BSAM GLING DU ZHUGS, MKHAN ZUR BLO BZANG

THUGS RJE LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG, BAR MA RAB BYUNG, DGE TSUL

BCAS KYI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU MNOS TE MTSAN LA BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN ZHES GSOL, GUNG THANG CHOS KHRI GRAGS PA MKHAS GRUB DANG
RGYAL

RONG BZOD PA LDUN GRUB BCAS LA BSTEN NAS BSDUS GZHUNG, DBU

MA, PHAR PHYIN, MNGON PA MDZOD, 'DUL BA, TSAD

MA RNAM 'GREL BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, YAB

YUM GNYIS KYANG RAB TU BYUNG ZHING GRONG CHOG SOGS SU PHEBS TE
PHYAG TU

'BYOR BA'I RGYU RDZAS RNAMS KHONG GI SLOB YON DU GNANG, DGUNG LO

NYER GCIG PAR RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO SOGS LAS BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS SHING BKA' CHOS MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO SO GSUM

PAR GLING BSRE'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD CING DKA' BCU PA'I MTSAN BTAGS

BZHES, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PAR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA
SKOR

@168 MDZAD CING LHA RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS AANG GSUM PA BZHES, DE

NAS DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS GSANG SNGAGS
KYI GZHUNG

DANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN BCAS LA BYANG CHUB PAR MDZAD CING SNGAGS
KYI DAM

BCA' LEGS PAR THON NAS SNGAGS RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES,

DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PAR RGYUD PA'I DGE BSKOS MDZAD, TSE SMON GLING
PHO

BRANG GSAR RGYAG MDZAD PAR KHONG GIS RAB GNAS RGYAS PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA PAR DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD KYI BLA MA DBU MDZAD
KYI KHRI LA

BZHUGS, DGUNG LO ZHE DGU PAR SMAD RGYUD KYI MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA
BZHUGS

NAS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO GANG GI THAD NAS KYANG MI DMAN PA

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA DRUG PAR BYANG RTZE'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS MDO
SNGAGS

CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GNYIS PAR RAB
BYUNG

BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1843 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER
KHRI

LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO LNGA'I RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING SKU
GSUNG

THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM PA RAB
BYUNG

BCU PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1844 LOR RGYAL BA MKHAS
GRUB RGYA

MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN DU DBANG BKUR ZHING MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS RGYUN
MANG

DU PHUL MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE DRUG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I MTSAN GZHAN

LA BYANG RTZE BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB CES ZHU'O, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN
GSER

KHRI 'DZIN PA'I KHRI RABS BDUN CU DON BZHI PA YIN NO,,

(KHRAG 'THUNG RGYAL PO,)

@169 KHONG NI SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(KHRI BKRA SHIS LDE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I CHU PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1312 LOR
GUNG

THANG KHAB GONG DU YAB CHOS SKYONG LDE DANG, YUM KUN DGA' 'BUM

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING MO
SBRUL LO STE

SPYI LO 1365 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS THOG MAR DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN LA BSTEN NAS DPE YIG LUNG GSUM LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD, DE

NAS WANG KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I SRAS MO BSOD NAMS 'BUM KHAB TU

BZHES TE RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1338 LOR
RIGS

SRAS KHRI PHUN TSOGS LDE SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO DGU PA
RAB

BYUNG DRUG PA'I CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1352 LOR MANG YUL
GUNG THANG

GI CHAB SRID BSKYANGS NAS YAB KYI DGONGS RDZOGS SU STON PA
SH'AKYA SENG

GE'I SKU BRNYAN DANG, YUM GYI CHED DU SGROL MA'I SKU BRNYAN
GNYIS KA

MI TSAD LAS MTHO ZHING GA-YU RNYING KHYAD PAR CAN SOGS RIN PO
CHE'I 'PHRA

TSOM GYIS MDZES PAR BRGYAN PA BZHENGS SHING, BSTAN 'GYUR YANG

GSER GYI YANG ZHUN GYIS BZHENGS TE RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I CHU MO
YOS LO STE

SPYI LO 1363 LOR LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO SOGS KYIS ZHUS DAG
DANG

RAB GNAS LEGS PAR MDZAD DO, GZHAN YANG RDZONG DKAR GYI LCAGS

RI PHYI MA DANG, LCAGS RI CHEN PO'I LCAGS SKOR, STAG TSANG DPE'U

CHEN GYI LCAGS KHANG LCAGS RI'I 'OG SA 'OG NAS RGYANG RING POR
'THO@170 PA'I GSANG SGO DPE'U, RDZONG GI DBUS DANG, CHOS SDE'I NANG
DU

KHRON CHU BZANG PO BTON PA DANG, RDO KYONG CHEN PO SOGS NYE BAR
SPYOD

PA'I RIGS BCAS ZHIB TSAGS MDZAD, KHONG NI MANG YUL GUNG THANG

GI RGYAL RABS BCU GSUM PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI BKRA SHIS BRTZEGS PA DPAL,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU GTZANG

GI GROM PA LHA RTZE'I BRAG DMAR PHO BRANG DU YAB MNGA' BDAG DPAL

'KHOR BTZAN DANG YUM MCHIMS BZA' BTZUN NE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, BOD LUGS CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 992 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG GI YAB MNGA' BDAG DPAL 'KHOR BTZAN BKRONGS RJES MNGA'

BDAG YUM BRTAN PHYOGS KYIS GA-YO RU LA SOGS PA'I MNGA' KHONGS

RNAMS 'PHROGS PAS KHONG NYANG STOD DU PHEBS TE RGYAL MKHAR RTZE
BZUNG

NAS CHAB SRID BSKYANGS, BTZUN MO COG RO BZA' MGON DPAL KHAB

TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS DPAL LDE DANG, 'OD LDE, SKYID LDE BCAS

SMAD KYI LDE GSUM DU GRAGS PA RIM BZHIN SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG
GRANGS

BDUN CU LHAG TZAM BZHUGS PA DANG, KHONG GI 'DAS LO NI MANG THOS

KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I //BSTAN RTZIS GSAL BA'I NYIN
BYED// LTAR

BKOD PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI RGYA NAG PA,)

KHONG NI KLU 'BUM NGAG DBANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG MI GCIG

YIN PAS DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

@171 (KHRI RGYAL 'BUM LDE MGON,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1253
LOR

GUNG THANG DU YAB BTZUN PA LDE DANG, YUM NYI MA 'BUM GNYIS KYI
SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI
LO 1280

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DGU PAR ZHANG PO 'GRO MGON CHOS

RGYAL 'PHAGS PA LAS SKABS SU BABS PA'I DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG
DU

ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR ME RDO THANG DU RGYAL PO'I KHAB
BKRA

SHIS KHYUNG RDZONG DKAR PO BTZUN MO'I SLAS KHANG LCAGS RI DANG
BCAS PA,

BKRA SHIS SGO MANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS BZHENGS PA DANG, LHAG

PAR DU BTZAN RDZONG BCU PHRAG KHA SHAS BSKRUN DE //GUNG THANG
BTZAN PO'I

GDUNG RABS// BRIS MA LAS "GU GE PU RONG KHA GNON DU, DKAR DUM

GNAM GYI KHYUNG RDZONG BRTZIGS, PHYI 'BROG MEN ZHANG KHA GNON
DU, BYA

RTZI RNAM RGYAL THAR PO DANG, MTSO DBAR NYE BA'I GLO STOD DU, NI
RI

GA-YA' RDZONG DKAR PO BRTZIGS, GLO BO MTSO BZHI'I KHA GNON DU,

GTZANG RONG BYA PHO'I ZE BA BRTZIGS, TA MANG SE MON KHA GNON DU,

GLO SMAD MU KHUN SRIN RDZONG BRTZIGS, DOL PO MON GYI KHA GNON
DU,

DOL PO'I YI GE DRUG MA BRTZIGS, LA STOD BYANG GI KHA GNON DU, LA

RU'I GAD RDZONG DKAR PO BRTZIGS, LA STOD LHO YI KHA GNON DU,
KHUN

TSO GAD RDZONG DKAR PO BRTZIGS, SKYID RONG SGO BZHI GNAS 'JIM

GE RDZONG, GLANG MKHAR GSAL BA'I YANG RTZE BRTZIGS, RGYA BAL

@172 KYI KHA GNON DU, BAL PO RDZONG GI RDZONG DMAR BRTZIGS, SNYI
SHONG

RONG GI KHA GNON LA, BONG TSEGS GNAM GYI KA BA BRTZIGS, NUB

RI MTHA' 'KHOB KHA GNON DU, DROD KYI BRAG RDZONG NAG PO BRTZIGS,

PHYAG PA YA BZHI'I BTZAN SA RU, CHU DKAR RDZONG CHUNG 'DZUM SHOR

BRTZIGS," ZHES GSUNGS, KHONG NI MANG YUL GUNG THANG GI RGYAL

KYANG 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA ZHIG YIN, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR NANG

(KHRI RGYAL BSOD NAMS LDE,)

MKHA' 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I

SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1404 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS
THOG

MAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BO DONG LO TZ'A BA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN

DANG, RJE SENG GE BZANG PO, LO TZ'A BA NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA,

RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO GROS BCAS LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG

MNGA'

@173 DRUG GI GRANGS DANG LDAN PA LEGS PAR BSKRUN, LO TZA BA
GRAGS PA

RGYAL MTSAN CHOS DPON DU BSKOS, CHOS RJE SENG GE BZANG PO'I
BZHUGS

GNAS BSAM GTAN GLING DANG, RJE BTZUN RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO

GROS KYI BZHUGS GNAS SKYID GRONG ME TOG MDANGS CAN SOGS BZHENGS

PAR MTHUN RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR, GU GE NAS MNGA' BDAG MA CHEN

MO CHOS SKYONG RGYAL MO KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS BSOD NAMS
RGYAL

MTSAN DANG LHA DBANG RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, DGUNG

LO SUM CU SO BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG

NI MANG YUL GUNG THANG GI RGYAL RABS BCO LNGA PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI SGRA DPUNG BTZAN,)

RGYAL PO KHRI BTZAN NAM DANG, YUM SMAN SA KHRI DKAR GNYIS KYI
SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG MU HA LA RGYAL
GYIS MDZAD,

BTZUN MO SMAN BZA' KLU STENGS KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS KHRI
THOG RJE

BTZAN SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG SO GANGS DKAR RTZE LA BTAB,

KHONG NI 'OG GI BTZAN LNGA LAS BTZAN GSUM PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI CHEN DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1648

LOR MDO SMAD RMA CHU 'GRAM NGOt GCA' KHOG TA RI'I RTZE RGYAL GYI
'DABS

SU LDONG SHUL CHEN BCO BRGYAD KYI NANG TSAN RTZE DBUS BYAMS SHUL
GYI

RIGS LAS 'PHROS PA, YAB 'BUM PHYUG DANG YUM RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO

@174 GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I
SHING PHO

'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1724 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR

DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI CHOS GRVAR
ZHUGS TE

BSDUS RA DANG PHAR PHYIN, 'DUL BA DANG RNAM 'GREL BCAS LA
SBYANGS,

DE NAS SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG
PA'I GZHUNG

LUGS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS TE MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHEN POR GYUR PA BYA BRAL DGE 'DUN
PHUN

TSOGS ZHES SNYAN GRAGS DBYAR GYI RNGA GSANG LDIR BA BZHIN DU
BYUNG,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BZHI BAR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI STENG DU BYON
TE KHRI

GTONG SGO DANG 'DZIN THEBS SOGS CHA GANG THAD NAS KYANG YAR
RGYAS SU

'GRO BAR MTHUN RKYEN GANG LEGS BSGRUBS NAS, RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS

PA'I SNGAR GYI DNGUL GDUNG DE GSER GDUNG DU BSGYUR BAS DGA' LDAN

'GRO

MGON ZHANG GA-YU BRAG PA CHEN PO'I GDAN SA TSAL GUNG THANG GI
GTZUG

LAG KHANG RTEN DANG BCAS PA NYAMS RGUD CHE BA'ANG PHYI NANG
(TSAL YANG

GSOS RGYA CHEN PO MDZAD, KHONG GI SKU SMAD DU BOD LA DUS 'KHRUGS

MANG BAR BYUNG YANG GZHUNG GI LAS DON PA KUN GYIS YANG BLO PHUGS

GTOD SAR GYUR TE, LHA SA'I KHRI THOG KHANG GI KHONG GI BZHUGS
GNAS

CHER

@175 GDAN SA GUNG THANG DU BZHUGS TE, MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS 'KHOR
MTHA'

YAS PA BSKOR STABS, DE NAS BZUNG STE SKU PHRENG THAMS CAD LA

GI SLOB

MA GRAGS CHE BA NI MCHOG SPRUL PAD DKAR 'DZIN PA DANG, KHRI CHEN

SGO MANG DPON SLOB BLO BZANG DAM CHOS, RGYAL SRAS SPRUL SKU YE
SHES

GRAGS PA, GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG DON YOD DON GRUB, AA KA

BZANG DON GRUB BCAS YIN LA, GSUNG RTZOM NI BCA' YIG SOGS

MANG DU MCHIS SO,,

MGO'I GRONG DU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1756

SRANG MANG POS BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, TSOGS MCHOD LA

DU PHEBS TE BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU KUN MKHYEN SKU PHRENG

'GREL

@177 LOR GTZANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO

GZHUNG NAS BZUNG GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM DPYIS

DU BYUNG BA

LAS SNE THAMS CAD RIM GYIS GRUB STE DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG PA
RAB

BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1900 LOR DGA'

GSER KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO BDUN GYI RING DU CHOS KYI 'KHOR

BSKOR, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS BKA' SHAG SRID GZHUNG GI SRID
SKYONG RGYAL

TSAB TU BSKO BZHAG MDZAD PAS KHRI PA DANG, SRID SKYONG, RGYAL
TSAB

GSUM GYI GO GNAS GCIG CAR DU THUGS 'GAN BZHES, LO DE'I HOR

ZLA DRUG PAR DBYIN JI BTZAN 'DZUL DMAG LHA SAR 'BYOR TE DMAG

DPON RUNG HA'O HPHANG? GIS DBYIN BOD CHINGS YIG BZHAG RGYU'I RE
'DUN

BTON PA LTAR BOD SDOD AAM BAN YU'U THAD DANG SRID SKYONG RGYAL
TSAB

SA'I CHINGS YIG" CES PA'I DON TSAN BCU DER MOS MTHUN MING RTAGS

MTSOR GUS 'BUL ZHUS, DE LTAR LO NGO DRUG GI RING DU BOD KYI CHAB

@178 SRID BSKYANGS SO, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI 'DZIN PA'I
KHRI RABS

BRGYAD CU GYA DRUG PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI GNYAN GZUGS BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BZHI PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO LHA THO THO RI GNYAN BTZAN DANG, YUM GNO BZA' MANG MO
RJE

JI DGOS GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI
KHU'I MANG

SGRA LEGS PAS MDZAD, BTZUN MO 'BRO BZA' DUNG PYANG BZHER KHAB

TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS 'BRONG GNYAN LDE'U SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI
BANG

SO DON MKHAR MDA' RU BRTZIGS, DE YANG PHUL MED SA PHUNG BRDAL

BA 'DRA'O, ,//LEGS BSHAD RIN PO CHE'I GTER MDZOD// LAS KHONG GI
"SKU GSHEN ZHANG ZHUNG TSA LA RGYUNG" GIS MDZAD PA GSUNGS SO,,

(KHRI THOG RJE BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS GSUM PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO KHRI SGRA DPUNG BTZAN DANG, YUM SMAN BZA' KLU STENGS
GNYIS

KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG LA GCUNG PO RGUNG MTHA' DANG,
SNUBS

MTHA', 'BRING SNYA, SNYA 'BRING BCAS BZHI YOD KYANG TSANG MA
THANG

MTSAMS SU PHAB, THANG MTSAMS ZHES PA NI RGYAL PO LAS DMA' BA

DANG, 'BANGS LAS MTHO BA ZHIG GI THOB THANG YIN, KHONG GI SKU

BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG MU HA LA RGYAL GYIS MDZAD, BTZUN MO RU YONG
BZA'

STONG RGYAL MTSO ZHES PA KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS LHA THO THO
RI GNYAN

BTZAN SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG SO GANGS DKAR RTZE LA BTAB,

@179 KHONG NI 'OG GI BTZAN LNGA LAS BTZAN BZHI PA YIN NO, ,

(KHRI DOR SNANG BTZUN MONG GI BU,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS LNGA PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS KYI MDZANGS BLON DU
GYUR

TE, DE YANG //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// LAS "BRE PHUL
SRANG

BCOS 'BRU MAR TSAD KYIS BCAL, DGA' GNYIS TSONG BYAS MTHUN

GNYIS LA LUNG SDEBS, DE GONG BOD NA TSONG DANG BRE SRANG MED,

DE PHYIR MDZANGS MI BDUN GYI GSUM PAR GRAGS" ZHES GSUNGS SO,,

(KHRI LDE 'BUM,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1268
LOR

GUNG THANG KHAB GONG DU YAB KHRI RGYAL 'BUM LDE MGON DANG, YUM
SE

MA 'BUM SKYONG RGYAL MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING
'DAS LO MI

GSAL, KHONG SNYING STOBS DANG BLO GROS PHUN SUM TSOGS PAS GUNG

THANG GI RGYAL SRID KYANG YUN RING TZAM BSKYANGS SHING, YAB KYI
DGONGS

RDZOGS SU SANGS RGYAS SH'AKYA SENG GE'I SKU BRNYAN DGUNG LO BCU
GNYIS PA'I

TSAD DANG LDAN PA ZHIG BZHENGS PA DANG LO ZLA DUS KYI MCHOD PA'I
RGYUN

YANG BTZUGS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU THAM PA RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I ME MO

LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1307 LOR HOR GYI RGYAL PO'I BKA' LUNG LTAR
TA'I

TUR PHEBS TE AOL JA DU RGYAL POS "KHYED RANG BOD LA DBANG BSGYUR

BA'I RIGS RGYUD CHEN PO YIN 'DUG PAS GNAM GYI SHED MONG STER
BA'I

'OS SU SNANG ZHES BOD SHING SGO BTZUGS PA'I RGYAL PO DU DBEN SHA
GSUM@180 GYI BDAG PO MNGA' RIS TSO BCU GSUM GYI MNGA' THANG LA DBANG
BSGYUR

BA'I MNGA' BDAG GI MING DANG, RIN PO CHE LAS GRUB PA'I THAM KA

GLING BDUN MA, THAM GA-YOG THAM SHU BCAS RGYAL THABS MI 'GYUR

GA-YUNG DRUNG RIN PO CHES SPRAS PA'I GSER YIG MAR 'BOD PA'I 'JA'

SA THO STA CHE RTAGS GNANG SKYES KHYAD PAR 'PHAGS PA BCAS TSEGS
MED

PAR THOB "CES //GUNG THANG BTZAN PO'I GDUNG RABS// BRIS MA'I
NANG DU

GSAL, DE NAS BOD DU BDE BAR 'KHRO ZHING TSA BO CHOS SKYONG LDE
LA

MANG YUL GUNG THANG GI CHAB SRID BSKYANGS SU BCUG NAS LOGS SU

BZHUGS SO,,

(KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES AAG TSOM CAN,)

KHONG NI BOD LUGS SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 698 LOR PHO BRANG
TSAL

DU YAB RGYAL PO 'DUS SRONG MANG PO RJE RLUNG NAM 'PHRUL GYI
RGYAL PO DANG,

YUM MCHIMS BZA' BTZAN MO RTOG GE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, BOD

LUGS SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 755 LOR 'BAL LDONG TZAB SOGS
KYIS

BKRONGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS SU AA YES 'BRO BZA' KHRI
MA

LOD KYIS RGYAL SRID ROGS SKYOR MDZAD NAS BSKYANGS PAR GRAGS, DE

NAS NAR SON TE CHAB SRID BZUNG ZHING YUL KHAMS BDE BAR MDZAD DAM

PA'I LHA CHOS SPEL NAS BRAG DMAR MGRIN BZANG LA SOGS PA'I LHA
KHANG

LNGA BZHENGS, LDEG REN PA MNON SNANG GRAGS DANG, KHE RGAD MDO

NAS ZHI BDER BKOD, KHU MANG PO RJE LHA ZUNG DANG, DBAS KHRI NAS
ZHI BDER BKOD, KHU MANG PO RJE LHA ZUNG DANG, DABS KHRI

@181 GZIGS ZHANG NYEN SOGS KYIS BLON PO MDZAD, 'JANG MO KHRI
BTZUN

DANG, SNA NAM BZA' MANG MO RJE BZHI STENG, GYIM SHING KONG JO

BCAS KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS 'JANG TSA LHA DBON DANG KHRI
SRONG

LDE'U BTZAN SPUN MCHED RNAMS SKU 'KHRUNGS, THANG BOD BAR GYI
'BREL

BA JE ZAB TU BTANG NAS KHRI LIN ZHES PA'I SA CHAR RDO RING
BTZUGS NAS

BKA' GTZIGS KYI MDO YI GER BKOD DO, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GNYIS

PAR BLON PO 'BAL LDONG TZAB SOGS KYIS BKRONGS SO, //CHOS 'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// LAS "DE YI BANG SO MU RA RI LA BRTZIGS,
GRAL

NI 'PHRUL GYI RGYAL PO'I GA-YON NA YOD, MING NI LHA RI GTZUG NAM
BYA BA

LAGS" ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS

DANG NANG DON GNAD BSDUS RNAMS TUN HONG NAS THON PA'I GTER YIG

GZHIR BZUNG NAS BKOD PA YIN NO,,

(KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING YON,)

KHONG NI BOD LUGS SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 764 LOR YAB

RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DANG, YUL TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG
SGRON

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, BOD LUGS SHING PHO RTA LO STE
SPYI LO 814

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE GCIG PA BOD LUGS

SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 804 LOR MI 'JIGS GDONG LNGA'I
KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS LO NGO BCU GCIG GI RING DU BOD KYI RGYAL SRID
BSKYANGS TE

SKAR CHUNG GTZUG LAG KHANG GI RDO RING DANG, DBUR STOD ZHVA LHA
KHANG

GI RDO RING, KONG PO DE MO'I RDO BRKOS YI GE, KHAMS KYI BYAMS
MDUN

@182 BRAG BRKOS YI GE 'PHYONGS RGYAS BANG SO'I RDO RING SOGS
BTZUGS PA

DANG, YAB MES KYI LHA KHANG ZHIG GSO DANG, SKAR CHUNG GTZUG LAG

KHANG GSAR DU BZHENGS PA DANG, DAM PA'I CHOS BOD YIG TU BSGYUR

ZHING MING DU BTAGS PA RNAMS DKAR CHAG TU BRIS TE GTAN LA PHAB

PA'I SKOR //SGRA SBYOR BAM GNYIS// LAS GSAL BA DANG, RGYA BOD
GNYIS

KYI MDZA' MTHUN YANG SNGAR LAS JE BZANG DU BTANG BA BCAS PHYAG
RJES

BLA NA MED PA ZHIG BZHAG MDZAD DO, BTZUN MO 'BRO BZA' KHRI MO
LEGS

DANG, MCHIMS RGYAL BZA' LEGS MO BTZAN, COG RO BZA'

BTZAN RGYAL GSUM KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS LNGA TZAM 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

BANG SO NI 'PHRUL RGYAL SPYI MDUN DU BRTZIGS PA DANG, BANG SO'I
MING

LA RGYAL CHEN 'PHRUL GYI RI BO ZHES GRAGS SO,,

(KHRI SPE BTZAN PO,)

KHONG NI GDAGS KHRI BTZAN PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(KHRI SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE)

KHONG NI GTZOS BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN

PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(KHRI PHUN TSOGS LDE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1338 LOR

GUNG THANG KHAB GONG DU YAB KHRI BKRA SHIS LDE DANG, YUM BSOD
NAMS

@183 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I
LCAGS PHO

KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1370 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS THOG MAR DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS LA BSTEN NAS DPE YIG LUNG GSUM LA SBYANGS

PA MDZAD, DE NAS YAB KYI DGONGS RDZOGS SU DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I

SKU BRNYAN MI TSAD BSKRUN PA SOGS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I MDZAD
'PHRIN

GYIS MANG YUL GUNG THANG GI CHAB SRID BSKYANGS, SA SKYA PA DANG
SKU GNYEN

YIN STABS SRID 'PHEL 'DUN MA GCIG PA'I BCA' YIG MNA'

BSGRIGS KYANG MDZAD, BYANG PA T'A DBEN GYI SRAS MO NAM MKHA'

'KHRUNGS,

RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRONGS SO, KHONG NI MANG YUL GUNG THANG GI
RGYAL RABS

BCU BZHI PA YIN NO,,

LOR TSAL GUNG THANG DU YAB TSE RING DON GRUB DANG, YUM TSE RING

SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I
CHU

MDZAD DE GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA GSAN BZHES MDZAD, 'BUL

@184 SDUD SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG KLU 'BUM SHES RAB
RGYA MTSO GNYIS

LAS THA SNYAD RIG GNAS GSAN BZHES MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG

PAR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD CING LHA RAMS
PA'I DAM

BCA' GNANG, PHA BONG KHA BYAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN DANG STAG BRAG

NGAG DBANG GSUNG RAB GNYIS LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS SKOR MANG DU

SDONG GSAR BZHENGS KYI PHYAG LAS GNANG, DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PAR
RGYAL

BA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO'I MTSAN ZHABS MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA GCIG

PAR RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BCU BZHI PA BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO'I
YONGS 'DZIN

KHRI

KA

NAM BZA' AA RJE PHO LEGS, TSE SPONG BZA' LHUN GYI BU MO, LHA
LUNG

THANG

BZHENGS

PA DANG, BOD YUL GYI SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA LA BKUR STI DANG RIM

@187 YUM SNA NAM BZA' MANG MO RJE BZHI STENG GNYIS KYI SRAS SU
SKU 'KHRUNGS,

LO BCO LNGA PA BOD LUGS ME PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 756 LOR MI
'JIGS

GDONG LNGA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO BZHI BCU ZHE GCIG RING DU
RGYAL

SRID BSKYANGS TE BOD KYI CHAB SRID MTHA' BZHIR BKYED DE 'DZAM
GLING

SUM GNYIS SA YI DKYIL 'KHOR DBANG DU BZUNG BAR GRAGS, SLOB

DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS DANG MKHAN PO ZHI BA 'TSO SOGS BOD DU

GDAN 'DREN ZHUS TE, BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS BZHENGS

NAS SAD MI BDUN RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB SGRA
BSGYUR

MDZAD CING SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DAR BAR MDZAD, LHAG PAR DU

GSO RIG GI BSTAN PA NYIN MO LTAR MDZAD NAS 'GRO BA'I NAD KYI
SDUG

BSNGAL 'JOMS PAR MDZAD, KHONG GIS MCHIMS BZANG LHA MO BTZAN

DANG, MKHAR CHEN BZA' MTSO RGYAL, 'BRO BZA' KHRI RGYAL MO

BTZAN, TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG SGRON, PHO YONG BZA' RGYAL MO

BTZUN BCAS KHAB TU BZHES SHING RIGS SRAS MU KHRI BTZAN PO SOGS
SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BLON PO GRAGS CHE BA NI SNANG BZHER ZLA BTZAN
DANG,

MCHIMS RGYAL GZIGS SHU TING, BLON SKYES BZANG RGYAL KONG, ZHANG

STONG BTZAN, SBRANG RGYAL SGRA LEGS GZIGS, DABS BTZAN BZHER

MDO LOD, BLON KHRI SGRA STAG TSAB, STAG SGRA KLU KHONG, 'GOS
KHRI

BZANG YAB LHAG GNYER STAG BTZAN GDONG GZIGS, MA ZHANG GROM

PA SKYES BCAS YIN NO, DE LTAR CHAB SRID KYI LAS DBANG GRUB STE

@188 DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU
GSHEGS SO,

//DEB THER KUN GSAL ME LONG// LAS LKOG MDA' BRGYAB STE BKRONGS

ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG BANG SO MU RA RI LA BRTZIGS SHING MDUN DU RDO
RING

YI GE CAN ZHIG BTZUGS SO,,

(KHRIMS KHANG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1424

LOR YAR KLUNG BTZAN THANG GI KHYAMS KHANG GSAR DU YAB BSOD NAMS

'OD ZER DANG, YUM DPAL LDAN 'DZOMS PA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS NI ROG YIN, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I CHU PHO

STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1482 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG CHUNG DUS KYI
MING LA

DPAL 'BYOR RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BZHI LNGA LA YI GE'I
'BRI

KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR RONG STON SMRA BA'I SENG

GES MKHAN PO DANG, DVAGS PO BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS SLOB DPON,

BKA' BZHI PA SHES RAB DPAL LDAN GYIS DUS BSGO MDZAD NAS RAB TU

BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA SH'AKYA RIN CHEN ZHES GSOL, SLOB DPON NGAG

DBANG LAS RNAM 'GREL DANG PHAR PHYIN GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM

PAR RTZES THANG GI CHOS GRVAR PHAR PHYIN DANG TSAD MA'I BSHAD PA
GSAR

BA'I DGA' STON SPEL BAS 'DUS PA THAMS CAD NGO MTSAR GYI GNAS LA

BKOD, TSUL DES WANG GRAGS PA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI THUGS 'PHROG STE

SLOB GNYER GYI MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR RTZES
THANG

GI TSOGS SU BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA DANG, DBU MA RIGS TSOGS, RIN

@189 CHEN PHRENG BA, BSHES SPRING, SPYOD 'JUG DBU MA RTZA 'JUG

MNGON PA GONG 'OG PHUNG PO LNGA'I RAB BYED, TSAD MA SDE BDUN
RNAMS

GSUNGS PAS MKHAS PA THAMS CAD MGU BAR BSKYED, KHONG GI YAB

CHEN LAS DPAL 'KHOR LO CHEN PO'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI DBANG ZHUS TE

GSANG MTSAN LA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE ZHES GSOL, RNGOG BYANG CHUB
DPAL

BA LAS RNGOG DKYIL BDUN SOGS DANG, DMAR STON RGYAL MTSAN 'OD

ZER LAS GSANG SNGAGS, SNAR THANG MKHAN CHEN BSOD NAMS MCHOG

GRUB LAS SA SDE LNGA'I LUNG, MKHAN CHEN RGYAL BA LAS RDO RJE
PHRENG BA

BCAS GSAN, DE NAS MTSUR PHUR PHEBS TE 'JAM DBYANGS DON

GRUB 'OD ZER LAS KARMA BKA' BRGYUD KYI CHOS DANG, 'GOS LO GZHON

NU DPAL LAS PHAR PHYIN DANG BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG DRUG SGRA SA RIS,

DUS 'KHOR BCAS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PA MKHAN CHEN DON

GRUB DPAL BAS MKHAN PO DANG, LAS KYI SLOB DPON 'GOS LO GZHON

NU DPAL, GSANG STON CHEN PO DPAL 'BYOR BAS MDZAD CING DGE

'DUN NYI SHU'I TSOGS KYI DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DE NAS RTZES

THANG DANG, BSAM GTAN GLING, PHO BRANG 'UM BU BLA MKHAR, RGYAL

BZANG, BSAM YAS MCHIMS PHU, KHRIMS KHANG GLING, BRAG

LHA KLU PHUG SOGS LA PHEBS NAS SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS SHING SGRUB PAR

MDZAD, RTOGS PA'I YON TAN BRNYES SHING YI DAM CHEN PO'I ZHAL

GZIGS, RTZES THANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU RI MO SHING RTZI DANG
BSAM

YAS KHRIMS KHANG GLING GI ZHIG GSOS BCAS MDZAD, BLA MA RNAMS LA
DUS@190 LTAR ZHABS TOG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MDZAD, BSTAN 'GRO'I DON
CHEN

LEGS PAR GRUB NAS DGUNG LO LNGA BCU RTZA DGU PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG GIS SLOB MA GRANGS KYIS MI LANGS PA

BSKYANGS SHING GSUNG RTZOM YANG PO TI BCU GNYIS BZHUGS SO,
BSGYUR

RTZOM NI BSTAN 'GYUR LAS //SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTOD PA BCU BA//
DANG,

//SNYING PO RDO RJE'I TSIG//, //'PHAGS MA SGROL MA DRAG MO'I
SGRUB THABS//,

//LHA MO RE MA TI DMAG ZOR GYI MAN NGAG//, //DPAL LDAN LHA MO

DUD SOL MA'I RJES GNANG BA'I CHO GA// BCAS CHOS TSAN NYER BZHI

BZHUGS SO,,

(KHRE DMAR YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO

1794 LOR KA RGYA'I BIS RGYAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA
PA'I

SHING PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1874 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG BIS
THANG YE

SHES DAR RGYAS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, B'A YAN STOD THA'I DGON DU
PHEBS

NAS 'DON CHOS BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I

CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS
PA

DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, DE NAS GRVA SAR PHEBS TE MTSAN BTAGS

BZHES, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE SOGS LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, DE

NAS MDO SMAD RANG YUL DU PHEBS SHING, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE

BDUN PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1840 LOR

BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO LNGA'I RING
DU GDAN

@191 SA BSKYANGS SHING CHOS SRID GANG THAD NAS LEGS LAM CHE,
KHRI ZUR

NAS RJE GSER KHANG BA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD, KHONG LUGS GNYIS KYI MKHYEN RGYA CHE ZHING THUGS BSKYED
BZANG

BA BCAS BYA KHYUNG DGON DU BZHUGS NA PHAN THOGS CHE YANG SGRUB
PA LA

GZHOL 'DUN CHE BA SOGS GANG CI'I RKYEN GYIS RGYA RGYA'I DGON
DANG KA

MDO GDONG DMAR SNA SOGS SU BZHUGS NAS NYAMS BZHES BSKYANGS,

RGYUD PA'I 'DUS SPYIS ZHUS NGOR GSANG 'DUS DANG BDE MCHOG GI
DBANG

GNANG, GZHAN YANG LAM RIN CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG DANG BDE LAM

GYI NYAMS KHRID SOGS CHOS BKA' 'GA' RE GNANG, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU

GYA GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BYA

KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS DRUG CU RE GNYIS PA YIN
NO,,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BAR DO'I 'PHRANG SGROL GYI 'GREL BA//
DANG,

//SKU GSUM LAM KHYER TSIGS BCAD MA//, //RIM GNYIS KYI SDOM//,

SBYAR BYANG MED PA YANG MANG TZAM YOD CES RJE BDE YANGS RIN PO
CHES

GSUNGS ZHES BYA TSANG BA'I GDAN RABS SU BKOD 'DUG,

(KHRE TZE DGE BSHES BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS

YUL NI PHYAG RDO THANG GI KHRE TZE SDE BA YIN, KHONG SKU 'BUM
DPAL LDAN

BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE 'DZIN GRVA MAS RIM GYIS
GZHUNG

BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA LEGS PAR MTHAR PHYIN TE CHO 'PHRUL
SMON

LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MING BTAGS 'DZIN, CHE SHOS NGAG DBANG

@192 BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I MDUN NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS
BSGRUBS,

BLA MA GZHUNG LAS PA YANG LO KHA SHAS MDZAD, DE NAS CHE SHOS BLO
BZANG

BYANG CHUB BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD CING CHE SHOS
SGAR

BAR BZHUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO
1858

LOR DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI

PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1859 LOR SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI
KHRI LA

BZHUGS SHING CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI SGO NAS 'CHAD NYAN GYI ZHABS
'DEGS

LEGS PAR MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS 'DU BYAS KYI DGE CHOS THUGS DAM

ZHAL 'DON GYI RIM PA LA 'BAD MUS SU ZHI BAR GSHEGS SO, KHONG NI

SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DBON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS BCU DRUG PA DANG,
RGYUD

PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI RABS BZHI BCU THAM PA YIN NO,,

(KHRO PHU RGYAL TSA,)

KHONG NI RGYAL TSA RIN CHEN MGON DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(KHRO PHU LO TZ'A BA BYAMS PA DPAL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1173
LOR

GTZANG YUL SHAB SMAD DU YAB JO 'PHAN DANG, YUM SREG MO GSAL

BYED GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING
MO BYA

LO STE SPYI LO 1225 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR YI
GE'I 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR RGYAL TSA RIN CHEN
MGON

DANG, KUN LDAN RAS PA GNYIS KYIS MKHAN SLOB MDZAD NAS DGE

@193 TSUL BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR DGE BSHES GTZANG PA LAS

TSAD MA RNAM NGES SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR GTZANG

DKAR PA LAS DBU MA DANG, BYAMS CHOS SOGS GSAN, ZHANG DGE

BA LAS LO TZ'A BSLABS PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR, RTZE STON KUN BZANG
LAS

RDOR DBYINGS LA SOGS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR LNGA BRGYA LHAG GI PHYAG
LEN

DANG MAN NGAG BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA LA BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,

RGYAL TSA RIN CHEN MGON DANG KUN LDAN RAS PA GNYIS LAS GDAMS
NGAG

MI 'DRA BA BRGYA DANG SUM CU RTZA DRUG DANG, BKA' BABS BCU GSUM

BCAS PA MTHA' DAG GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR BAL YUL DU

BYON, KHA CHE PAn CHEN BUDDHA SHR'I LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GDAMS
NGAG MANG

DU GSAN, SNGON RJES SU MI TRA DZO GE DANG, SH'AKYA SHR'I BHA DRA
SOGS

KHRO PHUR SPYAN DRANGS, KHONG GIS KHRO PHUR GZHUNG CHEN MO'I
'CHAD NYAN

GYI SROL GTOD, DGA' LDAN GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG BYAMS CHEN

GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA'I MI'I KHRU BRGYAD CU PA'I SKU TSAD
BZHENGS,

DGON LAG GZHAN BSKRUN PA (KHRO RU DGON PA) SOGS RLABS CHEN GYI

'PHRIN LAS MTHAR PHYIN NAS, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR KHRO PHU'I
GNYAN

MKHAR GYI BRAG SENG GE RDZONG DU SGRUB PA MDZAD NAS BZHUGS SO,
KHONG

GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI BLA CHEN BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG DANG,

MKHAN CHEN BYANG CHUB DPAL, YANG RTZE BA RIN CHEN SENG GE SANGS

RGYAS ZHIG CHEN, BYAMS PA SGRUB BRGYUD BSTAN 'DZIN, SNGO TSA
GRAGS

PA DPAL, GNYOS LO RTZE BA, BLA MA RDO RJE DBANG, RAS MA

@194 SENG RGYAL, RONG PA RGA LO BCAS SO,,

(KHRO BO DPAL LDAN,)

KHONG NI THANG STONG RGYAL PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O,,

(KHROM BZHER JO SRAS RIN CHEN SENG GE)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1163 LOR

YUL 'CHUMS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG

LO STE SPYI LO 1220 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS

NAS MKHAS GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING DBANG DANG GDAMS

NGAG MANG DU ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR SKYO STON BYANG CHUB
RIN

CHEN LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA RIN CHEN SENG GE ZHES GSOL,

'DUL BA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS SKOR MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU

DGU PAR KA BA DAR SENG DANG, DPAL CHEN RDOR GZHON, GLAN

TSUL KHRIMS BYANG CHUB BCAS LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA ZHUS
SHING

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS

PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1200 LOR KAM KAM GYI GDAN SAR PHEBS
SHING

SPANGS THANG STOD KYI GDAN SA DANG SBRAGS MA MDZAD NAS LO NGO
NYI SHU THAM

PA'I RING DU DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, BSTAN 'DZIN

GYI SKYES BU MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD CING BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN
PA DAR

ZHING RGYAS PA MDZAD DO, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR

@195 GRUB STE DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA BRGYAD PAR DGONGS PA CHOS
DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS, KHONG NI KAM KAM GYI GDAN RABS GSUM PA YIN NO,,

(KHROM BZHER DBON PO RIN CHEN GZHON NU,)

LOR

SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1327
LOR SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR KAM KAM DU RAB TU BYUNG,

DGUNG LO NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS PAR GRO SAR BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, SLOB
DPON

BSON NAMS RIN CHEN DANG BYA YUL PA'I SANGS RGYAS JO BO DBANG
PHYUG

GZHON NU LA SOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN TE

MKHAS SHING GRUB PAR GYUR, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG

LNGA PA'I ME PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1286 LOR KAM KAM GYI GDAN
SAR PHEBS

SHING LO NGO BZHI BCU THAM PA'I RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS TE
BSTAN

'DZIN GYI SKYES BU MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD PA DANG, BSHAD SGRUB

GNYIS KYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA MDZAD CING, DGUNG LO BDUN

CU DON GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI

KAM KAM GYI GDAN RABS DRUG PA YIN NO,,

(KHROM BZHER REN CHEN SENG GE)

1100 LOR YUL 'CHUMS SU SNGAGS BRGYUD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1170 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

@196 KHONG GI RTEN SNGAGS PA SKYA BOR BZHUGS, SNA NAM JO DPAL
DANG LHA

BTZUN BYANG CHUB 'OD KYI SLOB MA DBYIG THANG STON PA ZHES PA MDO
LUNG NA

BZHUGS PA ZHIG DANG, SLOB DPON KAM PA DANG, SHA RA BA YON

TAN GRAGS, BYA YUL BA GZHON NU 'OD RNAMS LA BSTEN NAS MDO

SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD,

LHAG PAR DU BYA YUL BA CHEN PO LAS GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD RDZOGS

PAR ZHUS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN

THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG GNYIS

KHANG

GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD CING DGE 'DUN NYIS BRGYA LHAG TZAM 'DUS NAS

TSOGS PA YUN RING DU BSKYANGS, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

(KHROM BZHER RIN CHEN SENG GE)

LOR

SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO

DPAL BA DANG SLOB DPON RIN CHEN GZHON NU GNYIS LAS RAB TU BYUNG

BDUN

PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1401 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
GIS

MCHIMS BLO BZANG GRAGS PA LAS BKA' GDAMS KYI GDAM PA RNAMS

GRAGS PAS KYANG ZHABS LA GTUGS, MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG GRAGS

@198 PA'I GCUNG PO CHE BA SNYAN GRAGS BZANG POS NYE GNAS CHEN
PO'I GO SAR

BZHUGS NAS BSTAN PA'I ZHABS TOG DU MA MDZAD CING, KHYAD PAR

DU DKAR PHUGS LA SO NAM MDZAD NAS NANG DU GNAS BRTAN LHA KHANG

DANG, MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I PHYI'I RTEN BKRA SHIS SGO
MANG

GI MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO DANG, PHYI'I LCAGS RI CHEN MO GYANG RIM PA

BCU BZHI YOD PA DE YANG BZHENGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,KHONG NI DPAL

SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS BCU GSUM PA YIN,,

(MKHAN CHEN GRAGS DON PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1377 LOR

GAN RTZAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS NI GRO LA MTSO BZHI YOD PA'I
'BROG

MTSO YIN, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I ME MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1467
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU DUS NAS RAB TU BYUNG STE SKU SHIN TU

BTZUN PAR GYUR, MKHAN CHEN GRUB PA SHES RAB LAS BKA' GDAMS

KYI CHOS SKOR YONGS RDZOGS LEGS PAR GSAN, (GDAN SA GONG MA

KHRI GZHOL MDZAD NAS 'DI BA KHRI LA MA PHEBS BAR GDAN SA LO NGO
BZHI

TZAM STONG,) RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1452
LOR

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS, LO NGO SUM CU'I RING DU GDAN SA
BSKYANGS

TE 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG NI

'PHAGS PA'I GNAS BRTAN CHEN PO ZHIG GI SPRUL PAR GRAGS SHING
MKHAS

GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI SLOB MA'ANG MANG DU BYON NO, KHONG NI DPAL
SNAR

THANG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS BCU DRUG PA YIN,

@199 (MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA SHES RAB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1259 LOR
SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1325
LOR SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG GIS MCHIMS NAM MKHA' GRAGS PA DANG 'DUL 'DZIN

GRAGS PA BRTZON 'GRUS SOGS SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS BKA'

GDAMS KYI GZHUNG LUGS MAN NGAG THAMS CAD MTHAR PHYIN PA GSAN

NAS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, SNAR THANG GI GDAN SA LO NGO BCU
GCIG RING DU BSKYANGS SO, KHONG GI GDUNG RTEN NI GDAN SA GONG

MA'I NUB NA BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN

RABS BCU GCIG PA YIN,,

(MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA SHES RAB (PHYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1424

LOR SNAR THANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS GNYAN YIN, 'DAS

LO MI GSAL, KHONG GIS MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA DON GRUB KYI MDUN

NAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA MNOS, RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB DANG, RAB

'BYAMS PA SMON LAM DPAL BA, MKHAS PA DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG

SOGS BLA ZUR DU BSTEN CING SDE SNOD KYI YON TAN YONGS SU RDZOGS
PAR

GSAN, DE NAS SNAR THANG KHRON SPUG GRVA TSANG GI 'CHAD MNYAN
YANG

MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM BZHES PA STE, RAB BYUNG

BRGYAD PA'I ME PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1486 LOR GDAN SA'I KHRI LA
PHEBS,

RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS 'GRO DON RGYA CHER
MDZAD@200 KHONG NI DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN RAB NYI SHU PA YIN,
KHONG

GI RJES NAS LO NGO CHIG BRGYA DRUG CU LHAG GI RING DU CHOS SDE
'DI NYID

RIM GYIS NYAMS RGUD DU SONG NAS, SER KHYIM PAR 'GYUR SKAD DANG,

DE RJES PAn CHEN SKU PHRENG BZHI BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL
MTSAN DGUNG

GRAGS BRGYAD CU LHAG TZAM LA PHEBS DUS RGYAL BA LNGA BA CHEN PO
DANG,

GU SHRI BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL, SDE SRID BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN

BCAS KYIS SNAR THANG KHUL DE BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I CHOS GZHIS SU
PHUL BA

NAS BZUNG CHOS SDE 'DI YANG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I KHONGS SU CHOD,

PAn CHEN SKU PHRENG LNGA PA BLO BZANG YE SHES KYI SKABS SU SNAR
THANG CHOS

SDER DAG THER MDZAD NAS BTZAD DGON DU BSGYUR CING DGE 'DUN

RNAMS LA CHOS PHOGS KYANG GTAN 'KHEL MDZAD CING, DUS DE NAS

BZUNG SNAR THANG GI MKHAN PO YANG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO RANG NAS
MNGAGS

GTONG DGOS PA'I LAM SROL CHAGS SO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN GRUB PA SHES RAB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1357 LOR
SNAR

THANG GI NYE 'KHOR RONG GU ZHES BYA BAR DBANG GI RIGS SU SKU
'KHRUNGS,

RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1423 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

DGUNG LO BDUN PA'I STENG NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN,

DGUNG LO BCU PA'I STENG NAS MKHAN CHEN KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN LAS

RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN LA GRUB PA SHES RAB CES GSOL, DGUNG

LO NYI SHU PAR BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, MKHAN CHEN KUN DGA'

@201 RGYAL MTSAN DANG, SLOB DPON GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO, CHOS RJE
YON

TAN 'OD, SLOB DPON SKAL BA BZANG PO SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU MA LA

BSTEN NAS MDO DANG, RGYUD SDE, MAN NGAG GI SKOR RNAMS LEGS

PAR GSAN CING THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU MKHAN CHEN

KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN LAS BKA' GDAMS KYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS MTHAR

PHYIN PAR GSAN SBYANGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR SNAR THANG

GI GDAN SAR PHEBS, 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI SGO NAS MKHAS PA

RNAMS KYI THUGS YID TSIMS PAR MDZAD CING SKYE BO RNAMS LA'ANG
THAR

BA'I SA BON BTAB PAR MDZAD, KHONG LA GONG MA MING RGYAL RABS

NAS GNANG BA'I SPU MA DMAR PO'I KA 'PHAN RGYA YIG CAN DANG, SGO

'PHAN BCAS YOD, GDAN SA LO NGO BCU'I RING DU BSKYANGS TE RJE

NYID DBON PO BSOD NAMS MCHOG GRUB LA GDAN SA BSKO BZHAG MDZAD

NAS LO LNGA'I BAR DU ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS
CHE

BA NI DPAL YID BZANG RTZE BA DANG, RJE SHES RAB SENG GE RJE DGE

'DUN GRUB BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //SPYOD 'JUG GI
tIKKA//

SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,KHONG NI DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN

RABS BCU BZHI PA YIN, ,

(MKHAN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1350

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI
LO

1425 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN RGYAL

@202 MTSAN LA SOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS
MDO

SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD,

DE NAS GSANG PHU DANG RTZES THANG GNYIS KAR DKA' BZHIS GTZO BYAS

PA'I SDE SNOD MTHA' DAG LA MKHYEN PA RGYAS SHING SO SOR THAR
BA'I SDOM PA

LA YANG GCES SPRAS SU MDZAD, BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS PHUN SUM TSOGS

PA DANG LDAN ZHING 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS MGON PA LAS DUS KYI 'KHOR
LO

GSAN TE MKHAS PAR GYUR, DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSKYED PA'I RIM PA

LA MNGON PAR RTOGS PA TSIGS BCAD MA CIG KYANG MDZAD DO, TSOGS

CHEN MO BA'I MKHAN CHEN SANGS RGYAS BLO GROS LAS YAN LAG DRUG GI
MAN

NGAG GSAN ZHING SLOB MA LA YANG KHRID KYI RIM PAS PHAN GDAGS PAR

MDZAD DE, DGUNG LO BDUN CU RTZA DRUG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS

SU 'THIMS SO, ,KHONG GI SLOB MA MCHOG TU GYUR PA NI SH'AKYA
SHR'I YIN, ,

(MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1679

LOR MDO SMAD KYI REB KONG GI YUL DU YAB TSE THAR SKYABS DANG YUM
LHA

MO RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I

SHING MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1765 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BCU
PAR

RONG BO DNGOS GRUB LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, MTSAN DGE 'DUN

DON GRUB TU GSOL, DE NAS RONG BO DGON DU ZHUGS NAS BSDUS

GRVA DANG LAM RIM BCAS LA SPYANGS PAR MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, DE

NAS DAR ZHING GI KHRIR BZHUGS TE MTSAN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOR GSOL,

@203 DGUNG LO NYER LNGA'I BAR GZHUNG LUGS MANG DU GSAN SBYANGS
MDZAD NAS

MDO SMAD KYI DGON SDE KHAG TU PHAR PHYIN GYI GRVA SKOR MDZAD,
DGUNG LO

NYER DGU BAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG
DU

ZHUGS, DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR LHA SA'I SMON LAM CHEN MOR GZHUNG

BKA' POD LNGA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG PAS RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN

RTAGS BLANGS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU BAR SDE BA GZHUNG NAS GTZANG

DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDE'I MKHAN POR BSKOS, RJES SU RTZE CHEN CHOS

SDE'I GDAN SA'ANG BZHUGS, DGON PA BZHENGS GSO DANG SGRIG LAM

KUN SPYOD LEGS BCOS MDZAD, CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR

BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO NGA LNGA PAR RANG YUL DU PHYIR PHEBS TE RONG
BO

DGON CHEN GYI GDAN SAR BZHUGS, MDO SMAD PHYOGS KYI DGON KHAG

YONGS SU PHEBS SHING 'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER SPEL NAS DUS 'DA' BAR

MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BSDUS GRVA'I LEGS BSHAD GRANGS

MED BSKAL BZANG GI BLO GROS KYI PAD TSAL BZHAD PA'I LUNG RIGS
KYI NYI

MA// BCAS POD GSUM DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN CHU BZANG PA BYANG CHUB 'BAR,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

MUS KYI NGANG DKAR DU SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG
YIN,

DGUNG LO BDUN PA'I DUS SU YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN
ZHING

'DON CHOG SOGS LA THOGS PA MED, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR

LDOG LONG PA SH'AKYA BYANG CHUB LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA ZHUS,
DE NAS

@204 RAB TU BYUNG ZHING SPYOD 'JUG DANG DBU MA SOGS LA SBYANGS
PA DPYIS

PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DE NAS

LDOG LONG PA SH'AKYA BYANG CHUB LAS SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI LUNG
DANG SGRUB

THABS LAG LEN BCAS PAR LEGS PAR ZHUS, BSNYUNG GNAS TSAR

SUM BRGYA SGRUB PA'I TSE 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS ZHAL

GZIGS, DE NAS BLA MA'I BKA' LTAR PHA YUL MUS KYI NGANG DKAR DU

BYON TE SKU BSOD RGYAS SHING ZLA BA RE LA BSNYUNG GNAS SGRUB PA
CHEN PO RE

MDZAD, YI DAM MANG PO'I ZHAL GZIGS, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON

CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB CING DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU RTZA BRGYAD PAR
DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI THUGS RJE CHEN PO DPAL MO

LUGS KYI BRGYUD PA'I GDAMS RGYUN 'DZIN MKHAN YIN, KHONG GI

MCHOG TU GYUR PA'I SLOB MA NI SNYAG PHU PA BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG

YIN, ,

(MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

GNYAL LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YAB
YUM

GNYIS KYIS KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA LA PHUL BAS DGUNG LO BDUN PAR

RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO ZHES GSOL, KUN

MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA LAS SDE SNOD GSUM GYI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG YOD
TSAD

ZHUS NAS THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD CING BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LHAG
PAR BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG BA'I BSHAD SROL LTAR BYANG CHUB LAM GYI
RIM

@205 PA'I MAN NGAG MA LUS PA ZHUS SHING NYAMS LEN MDZAD, DE NAS
MON

GRA PA TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS LA BSTEN NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM
DANG,

'DUL BA, MNGON PA SDE BDUN BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA

MDZAD DE MKHAS PA'I KHYU MCHOG TU GYUR, RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN
POS KYANG,

ZAB CING RGYA CHE'I CHOS LA MNGA' BRNYES PAS, SKAL LDAN 'GRO BA
KUN

GYI SKYABS SU GYUR, 'PHRIN LAS BZANG POS BSTAN PA RGYAS MDZAD
PA,

DPAL LDAN BLA MA'I ZHABS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS, CES BSNGAGS

BRJOD MDZAD DO, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS NYI SHU
RTZA

GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN NYI MA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1225
LOR

SNAR THANG GI PHU'I STENG KARMA KHA RIR SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS
RAM YIN,

RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SHING MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1305 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG GZHON NU DUS NAS RAB TU BYUNG, 'BROM KU MA RA MA TI SLOB
DPON

DU BSTEN NAS BKA' GDAMS PA'I GLEGS BAM CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA

GSAN, KHYAD PAR DU MCHIMS NAM MKHA' GRAGS PA DANG SKYO STON SMON

LAM TSUL KHRIMS RNAM GNYIS NAS GDAM PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I BKA'

DRIN MNOS, KHONG GIS TSUL KHRIMS STAG BRGYAS BSKOS, CHOS KHRIMS

KYANG DAM PAR MDZAD, SNAR THANG GI GDAN SA LO NGO BDUN GYI BAR
DU

BSKYANGS SO, KHONG GI GDUNG RTEN NI GDAN SA GONG MA'I GDUNG RTEN
GYI

SHAR NA BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN
 
@206 RABS DGU PA YIN, ,

(MKHAN CHEN THOGS MED RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO (1758-

1804) LA BGRO GLING GI MCHOD SPRIN 'BUL GNANG MDZAD PA LAS RNAM

THAR ZHIB TU MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN TU PHANGS SO, ,KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI //BLA MA MCHOD PA'I KHRID// DANG, //LAM RIM GSER

ZHUN MA'I KHRID//, //DRAN PA BZHI LDAN NYAMS MGUR GYI BSHAD
PA//,

//BSTAN BCOS MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI SA BCAD//, //SKYES RABS

SO BZHI PA'I BSHAD PA//, //MDO MDZANGS BLUN GYI BSHAD PA//,

//MDO LAS BRGYA PA'I BSHAD PA//, //DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING BSHAD

PA//, //SNYING PO DON GSUM GYI KHRID//, //SHIS BRJOD LAM GYI LUS

MTHA' DAG YONGS SU TSANG BA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS
DPAL

STER//, //SKYABS MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG THOGS MED RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG
RJE

BLA MA TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I RNAM THAR DANG GZHAN YANG ZIN BRIS
SNA

TSOGS//, //RAB GNAS KYI CHED BRJOD GZHAN PHAN BDUD RTZI'I SNYING

PO// BCAS CHOS TSAN BZHI BCU ZHE BDUN LONGS PA'I BRIS MA POD
GNYIS

BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN BDE BA DPAL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I LCAGS MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1231

LOR GTZANG RONG GA-YAG SDER SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I ME
MO BYA

@207 LO STE SPYI LO 1297 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS
NAS RAB

TU BYUNG STE KLOG PA THOS BSAM DANG SPONG BA BSAM GTAN LA BRTZON
PAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR LHO BRAG BYANG CHUB DPAL DANG,

SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS BZANG PO, SLOB DPON DBANG PHYUG GRAGS

PA GSUM LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING 'DUL BA LUNG SDE BZHI DANG,

BYANG CHUB LAM RIM, DMIGS PA SKOR GSUM SOGS GSAN, GZHAN

YANG SLOB DPON YON TAN DPAL DANG, SLOB DPON BKRA SHIS BSOD

NAMS, RDZONG PHU BA DON YOD ZHAGS PA, GA-YAG SDE LO TZ'A BA BSOD

NAMS SENG GE SLOB DPON DKON MCHOG GRAGS, 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS

PA, MKHAN PO SENG GE ZIL GNON, KHRO PHU RIN PO CHE SOGS LA BSTEN

NAS THEG CHEN BLO SBYONG DANG, THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I SGRUB SKOR,
DON

YOD ZHAGS PA'I SGRUB SKOR, PHAR PHYIN SOGS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN,

DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA BRGYAD PAR LHO BRAG BYANG CHUB DPAL GYI
GDAN SAR

PHEBS TE LO NYER BDUN GYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING MDO
SNGAGS

CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DE NAS DKA' BZHI PA GRAGS PA GZHON

NU LA GDAN SA GTAD NAS ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD DE RGYAL BA'I GSUNG

RAB DGONGS 'GREL DANG BCAS PA MA LUS PA NYAMS LEN GYI LUS

GCIG TU DRIL BA BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA DANG, DE'I SNYING PO
BDAG

GZHAN MNYAM BRJE'I BLO SBYONG LA THUGS DAM RTZE GCIG TU GZHOL
BAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA BDUN PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS

SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS BDUN CU PA

@208 YIN NO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN PHYAG RDOR,)

KHONG NI LHO BRAG MKHAN CHEN NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG MI

GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1639
 
LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR BLO

BZANG YAR 'PHEL GYI MDUN NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS, DGUNG

LO BDUN PAR BLO BZANG YAR 'PHEL GYI MDUN NAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM

PA MNOS, SKABS DER PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS

GRUB CHEN RJE DPON LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB KYI SKU SKYER NGOS 'DZIN

MDZAD, DE NAS CHOS RGYAL 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO BLA MAR BSTEN TE
DBANG

LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN, 'PHAN YUL SMAN PA KUN DGA' BYANG

CHUB KYI MDUN NAS GSO BA RIG PA DANG, SKAR RTZIS, SOG YIG

BCAS SBYANGS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS GTZANG DU PHEBS TE RGYAL BA

LNGA PA CHEN PO DANG MJAL NAS CHOS 'BREL YANG ZHUS, DE NAS BKRA

SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS TE PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG MJAL NAS BKRA
SHIS

LHUN PO'I RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR PAn
CHEN BLO

BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA MNOS,
DE

NAS SOG YUL DU PHEBS, MDOR NA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYI SHU LHAG

LA BSTEN TE DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG RJES GNANG DANG BCAS PA SHIN TU

DGE

ZHE DGUR BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAN CHEN RTZI 'DUL BA THUGS RJE BYANG CHUB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG GZHON NU
DUS

NAS RAB TU BYUNG, SPYIR CHOS DANG KHYAD PAR DU PHAR PHYIN LA
SHIN TU

MKHAS PAR GYUR, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM GYI SNYAN GRAGS CHE BA

DANG, GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS SHING DGE 'DUN SDE GTZUGS PAR

MDZAD, GRVA RGYUGS DANG TSUL 'DZUGS LA SOGS PA MDZAD PAS DGE

'DUN STONG LHAG TZAM 'DUS, SPYIR CHOS THAMS CAD LA MKHAS KYANG

GTZO BO 'DUL BA LA MDZAD PAS TSUL KHRIMS KYI DRI PHUN SUM TSOGS
PA

MNGA', THUGS DAM GYI MTHIL SMAN BLA DANG SGROL MA LA MDZAD PAS
ZHAL

GZIGS, DE NAS ZHANG STON DGRA 'JIGS DANG MJAL ZHING SPYAN RAS

GZIGS BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI LUNG DANG, LAG LEN SGRUB THABS BSNYEN

TSAD DANG BCAS PA ZHUS, BSNYUNG GNAS STONG PHRAG GCIG GI DAM

BCA' BLA MA ZHANG STON DGRA 'JIGS LA PHUL BA LTAR NYAMS LEN
MDZAD

PA LAS TSAR SUM BRGYA SONG BA'I TSE SA GA ZLA BA'I TSES BCU DRUG
GI NYIN

THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I ZHAL GZIGS SHING GSUNGS BYON, DE NAS ZHAL

YANG YANG MJAL TE SEMS CAN MANG PO'I 'GRO DON MDZAD DE DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA MCHOG TU GYUR PA NI@210 LDOG LONG BA SH'AKYA BYANG CHUB YIN, KHONG NI THUGS RJE
CHEN PO DPAL MO

LUGS KYI BRGYUD PA'I GDAMS RGYUN 'DZIN MKHAN YIN NO, ,

GI MKHAN PO 'ONG ZHES KUN GYIS GLENG BA BYUNG, DE NAS RJE DGE

GRUB KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHEN POR GYUR TE
RTZE

THANG DU PO TI BCO BRGYAD KYI GRVA SKOR MDZAD, MTHIL DU BYON TE
CHOS RJE

BSOD NAMS MCHOG GRUB PA DANG MJAL, CHOS RJE BYAMS PA GLING PA

LAS SGRA BSLABS, DE NAS DGA' LDAN DU BYON TE RGYUD CHEN SBYIN PA

DPAL LAS GSANG 'DUS KYI RGYUD 'GREL RDZOGS PAR GSAN, DE NAS

SLAR GTZANG DU BYON TE SNAR THANG DU MTSAN NYID KYI 'CHAD MNYAN
MDZAD,

DE NAS KHONG GIS TSE 'DI LA MTHONG LAM THOB PA ZHIG BYED GSUNGS
TE

'CHAD MNYAN GYI BYA BA RNAMS BZHAG STE BYANG CHUB CHEN PO'I DBEN

GNAS DANG, RKANG BZHI PHU'I DBEN GNAS SOGS SU THUGS DAM GTZO

BOR MDZAD, DE NAS NYE GNAS CHEN POS SNAR THANG GI MKHAN POR

GDAN DRANGS KYANG PHEBS DKA' BAR BYUNG BA LA, RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB

KYI BKA' LUNG NAN GYIS PHEBS PA BZLOG MI NUS PAR DGUNG LO NGA

GSUM BZHES PA STE, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE
SPYI LO 1473

LOR GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS, LO NGO BCU BZHI'I BAR DU GDAN SA

BSKYANGS, DE NAS ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD DE DBEN PA'I GNAS SU

PA'I GDAN RABS BCU DGU PA YIN, ,

GSUNGS SO, ,

(MKHAN PO BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN,)

DANG

'DON CHOS BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD NAS BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS

TE DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA

BZHES SHING TSUL KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS BZHIN DU BSRUNGS, DE NAS GRVA

SA CHEN PO 'GRIMS TE THA SNYAD RIG GNAS DANG, GZHUNG CHEN BKA'

POD LNGA, GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE BZHI BCAS LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS,
RGYA

MKHAR BA YE SHES SMON LAM DANG, THO YON 'JAM DBYANGS 'PHRIN LAS

SOGS LA BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS KYI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG

MANG DU GSAN ZHING MKHAN PO'I GO SAR BZHUGS, KHONG GI RNAM THAR

GSUNG

RGYAN BRGYA

RTZA DNGOS GRUB BUM BZANG// BCAS POD CHUNG GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

@214 (MKHA' 'GRO RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

DUS NAS

YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LA BYANG ZHING CHUB PAR MDZAD CING, DE NAS MDO

SNGAGS GNYIS KA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD
NAS

BYAN

MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAR CHEN DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SGRAGS KYI GRONG MO CHER YAB NAM MKHA' YE SHES DANG, YUM GNUBS

MO DGE BA 'BUM GYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RTEN KHYIM PA
YIN,

MKHAR CHEN YE SHES MTSO RGYAL GYI MING PO YIN, SLOB DPON PADMA
'BYUNG

GNAS LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU ZHUS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD PAS MNGON SPYOD KYI LAS LA MNGA' DBANG 'BYOR

BA'I RIGS SNGAGS 'CHANG BA'I DBANG PHYUG PA ZHIG YIN TE, //GRUB

MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "DPAL GYI DBANG PHYUG PHUR BA
GDANGS

TSAD 'GUM" ZHES GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI GRUB THOB RJE DANG 'BANGS

NYER LNGA'I NANG TSAN ZHIG YIN NO, ,

@215 (MKHAR CHU BA CHOS BSAM 'OD,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO'I LO TSIGS MI GSAL, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I

SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1298 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS DGE
BA'I

BSHES GNYEN MANG PO BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS

PAR SLOB GNYER PHUL DU BYUNG BA MDZAD NAS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN
RDZOGS KYI

SDOM PA BZHES TE TSUL KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS BZHIN DU BSRUNGS BAR

MDZAD, CHOS RJE RTOGS LDAN RGYAL PO DGE MDZES 'OD LAS BKA' 

GDAMS LAM RIM DANG, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA, DUS 'KHOR RGYUD

'GREL, GSANG 'DUS SBYOR DRUG DBU SEMS KYI SEMS BSKYED, PHYAG

RGYA CHEN PO, BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR, THABS LAM

ZAB MO'I GDAMS PA, GANG ZAG SNYAN BRGYUD, N'A RO CHOS DRUG BCAS

LA LEGS PAR GSAN NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, RAB BYUNG LNGA
PA'I

LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1281 LOR GA-YA' BZANG DGON PA'I
GDAN

SAR PHEBS, DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING 'CHAD

NYAN GYIS BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS KYI BSTAN PA SPEL, DGON PA'I 'DUL

KHRIMS LEGS PAR 'DZIN PA'I BCA' YIG GTAN LA PHAB, CHEN PO'I

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS KYANG DGE SLONG DKYUS MA ZHIG GI BRTUL

ZHUGS 'DZIN PAS SDE DGON GNYIS KYIS GTZUG TU BKUR, LO NGO BCO

BRGYAD RING DU GDAN SA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, KHONG NI GA-YA' BZANG
DGON

PA'I GDAN RABS BZHI PA YIN, ,

(MKHAR CHEN BZA' MTSO RGYAL,)

@216 KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM
DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI BTZUN MO
YIN, RGYAL

PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS LAS
NANG GI

SKYED RDZOGS SDE GSUM GYI DBANG CHEN ZHUS TE, DE'I DBANG YON DU

BTZUN MO MKHAR CHEN BZA' MTSO RGYAL SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS
LA

PHUL TO, ,

(MKHAR RDO BZOD PA RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1672

LOR LHA SAR YAB NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, YUM AA LCE SKYID
GNYIS

KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG BYIS PA'I DUS
KYI MING

LA SHES RAB RGYA MTSO ZHES ZHU, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR YI GE'I SBYOR
KLOG

DANG 'DON CHOS BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM

PAR SE RA THEG CHEN GLING GI BYES PA GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE SLOB
DPON

RGYAL MTSAN DON GRUB LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL DKYUS GCIG TU

BSGRUBS SHING MTSAN LA BZOD PA RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BCU

BZHI PAR CHOS GRVAR 'GRIMS TE BSDUS GZHUNG DANG, PHAR PHYIN
GNYIS

LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR GRVA TSANG LA DGONGS
PA

ZHUS NAS SGRUB KHANG PA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I SKU MDUN DU PHEBS
TE BYANG

CHUB LAM RIM DANG, BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA, GCOD, SNYING PO

DON GSUM BCAS KYI KHRID RNAMS LEGS PAR ZHUS SHING SGRUB PA NYAMS

LEN MDZAD PAS RTOGS PAR MNGON DU GYUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR

@217 SLOB DPON RGYAL MTSAN DON GRUB LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING
BKA'

MANG DU GSAN, DE NAS 'OL KHA DANG, CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL, TZA RI,

YER PA, RVA SGRENG, MKHAR RDO, DBEN DGON, RGOD TSANG, SNAR

THANG, GANGS CAN, KHRO PHU, DNGUL CHU CHOS RDZONG, RTA NAG RTA

PHUG RDO RJE'I GUR KHANG SOGS SU 'GRIMS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD, SLAR MKHAR RDOR PHEBS TE SGRUB SDE BTZUGS NAS DGE 'DUN

MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU
BZHENGS,

DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS LNGA
BCU

NGA GSUM PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BLANGS DOR MUN SEL//,

//BLA MA MCHOD PA'I KHRID//, //PHA BONG KHA'I DKAR CHAG//, //BDE

LAM GYI ZHAL SHES LHAN THABS//, //RDOR SEMS KHRID YIG//, //BLA

MA'I RNAL 'BYOR//, //ME TOG BCUD LEN GYI SDOM PA//, //RGYUN
KHYER

GCOD KYI SNYING PO//, //GNAS BCU'I CHO GA//, //RGYUN KHYER TSOGS

MCHOD SNYING PO//, //RDOR SEMS BUM SGRUB//, //MGUR MA PHYOGS

BSDEBS//, //RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN YIG//, //BYANG CHUB

LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNGON 'GRO'I DON BSAM PA MDO LUNG GSAL BA'I NYI

MA//, //RJE DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR//, //RTA PHUG PA'I
RNAM

THAR// BCAS CHOS TSAN NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAS GRUB KHYUNG PO RNAL 'BYOR,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I ME YOS GONG GI BGRANG BYA ZHE DGU
PA

@218 SA PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 978 LOR SNYE MO RA MANGS SU YAB
STAG SKYES DANG,

YUM BKRA SHIS SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
GNYIS

PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1127 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG
LO

BCU PAR RGYA BOD YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DUS KYI
'KHOR

LO LA MKHAS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR SLOB DPON GA-YUNG DRUNG RGYAL

BA LAS BON CHOS MKHAS PAR BSLABS NAS GZHAN LA BSHAD PAS DPE

'GREMS BDUN BRGYA TZAM BYUNG, BLA MA 'BYUNG GNAS SENG GE LAS

RDZOGS CHEN SEMS SDE'I SKOR MANG DU GSAN NAS BSHAD PAS DER YANG

SLOB MA BDUN BRGYA TZAM BYUNG, DE NAS BAL YUL DU PHEBS TE PAndI
TA

PA SU MA TI LAS LO TZ'A BSLABS, LO NGO LNGA BCU TZAM GYI RING LA
RGYA BAL

BOD GSUM DU 'BYON BZHUD MDZAD, RGYA BAL DU BLA MA MKHAS PA DANG

GRUB THOB BRGYA DANG LNGA BCUR BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG
DANG

MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA THUGS SU CHUD, THUN MONG GI BLA MA RDO RJE

GDAN PA CHEN PO DANG, MEE TRI BA, SBAS PA'I RNAL 'BYOR, R'A HU
LA

STE BZHI, THUN MIN GYI BLA MA YE SHES GYI MKHA' 'GRO MA NI GU
MA, SU KHA

SIDDHI STE DRUG PO DE GTZO BOR MDZAD, NI GU MA LAS SGYU LUS KYI
LAM GYI

DBANG DANG, CHOS DRUG RDO RJE'I TSIG RKANG, SGYU MA LAM RIM SOGS

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU GSAN, MEE TRI BA LAS YE SHES MGON PO'I CHOS

SKOR GSAN, GLANG RI THANG PA RDO RJE SENG GE LAS BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS,

DE NAS GA-YAS RU SHANGS SU BYON NAS LO GSUM GYI NANG DU ZHANG
ZHONG GI

DGON PAS GTZOS PA'I DGON PA BRGYA DANG RTZA BRGYAD GSAR 'DEBS

@219 MDZAD, DE PHYIN NAS SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD DU GRAGS, GRVA BA
KHRI TSO

BRGYAD 'DUS PA LA 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD NAS LO SUM CU'I RING DU
SHANGS

PA BKA' BRGYUD SROL GTOD NAS DAR BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG GI SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI DRI MED SHES RAB KYI SDONG PO RME'U STON PA,
PHAN SEMS

YAL GA GA-YOR PO RGYA MO CHE, SNYING RJE'I LO 'DAB DNGUL STON
RIN

DBANG, BYAMS PA'I ME TOG LA STOD DKON MCHOG MKHAR, 'OD

GSAL SNYING PO ZHANG SGOM CHOS SENG, SGYU LUS RMI LAM GYI 'BRAS
BU SMIN

PA RMOG LCOGS PA RIN CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS BCAS SO, KHONG GI BSGYUR

RTZOM NI BSTAN 'GYUR LAS, //MCHOG GI SGROL MA RAL GCIG MA'I MAN

NGAG GI SGRUB THABS// DANG, //SNYAN NGAG MKHAN RTAG PA'I RDO
RJE'I MAN

NGAG BHA GU PAndI TA'I KHYAD CHOS// BCAS SO, ,

(MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1385
LOR

GTZANG LA STOD CHU 'OG TU LI YUL LCANG RA SMUG PO NAS 'ONGS PA'I
SE'I

RIGS KYI BRGYUD PA YAB KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS DPAL BZANG DANG,

YUM BU 'DREN RGYAL MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BDUN

PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1438 LOR DGA' LDAN KHRI PA THUGS
'GAN

BZHES RING DU SKU GSHEGS, GSER SDONG DGA' LDAN DU BZHUGS,

KHONG MKHAN CHEN SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE
TSUL GYI

SDOM PA BZHES TE MTSAN LA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO ZHES GSOL,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR NGAM RING CHOS SDE RU BO DONG PAn CHEN
'JIGS@220 BRAL PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DANG RIGS LAM 'GRAN PAS RIGS
PA'I RTZAL

RDZOGS PAR MKHYEN NAS, BO DONG BA KHONG GI THUGS YID 'PHROGS TE

//BUNG BA RNAM PAR RTZEN PA'I RGYUD MANGS// ZHES BYA BAS BSTOD
PA PHUN

SUM TSOGS PA ZHIG KYANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR RJE BTZUN

RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO GROS KYIS MKHAN PO DANG, CHOS RJE DPAL

'BYOR SHES RAB KYIS LAS SLOB, GNYAL BA BLO GROS MTSUNGS MED KYIS

GSANG STON MDZAD NAS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA BZHES PAR MA ZAD, RJE

BTZUN RED MDA' BA LAS TSAD MA SDE BDUN DANG, MNGON PA GONG 'OG

BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA, DBU MA RIGS TSOGS, 'DUL BA BCAS LA SBYANGS

TE RING POR MA THOGS PAR MKHAS PA'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN, DGUNG LO

NYER GSUM PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE RJE TZONG KHA PA DANG MJAL, MDO

SNGAGS KYI MAN NGAG DANG GDAMS PA THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I
TSUL

DU MNOS PAS NANG GI THUGS SRAS GCIG PUR GYUR, GZHAN YANG RGYAL

TSAB DAR MA RIN CHEN DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN

SOGS LAS BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DE RJES GTZANG DU PHEBS TE

LCANG RA DGON GYI MKHAN PO GNANG THOG RI BO MDANGS CHEN DGON
PHYAG

'DEBS PA'I GTZO SKYONG GNANG, DGUNG LO SO BZHI BAR RGYAL RTZE
PA'I

CHOS RGYAL RAB BRTAN KUN BZANG 'PHAGS KYI SBYIN BDAG MDZAD NAS

DPAL 'KHOR CHOS SDE GLING PHYAG BTAB, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PAR

DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI THOG TU PHEBS TE 'CHAD MNYAN BSHAD SGRUB KYI
SGO

THAMS CAD YAR ZLA BZHIN DU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR MDZAD DO, KHONG
NI

@221 PAn CHEN AER TI NI'I SKU PHRENG DANG PO YIN, KHONG GI SLOB
MA GRAGS CHE

BA NI MKHAN CHEN BSOD NAMS MCHOG GRUB DANG, KUN MKHYEN 'PHAGS

PA 'OD, GSANG MDA' BA CHOS LDAN RAB 'BYOR, SPYAN SNGA BLO GROS

RGYAL MTSAN BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI RNAM THAR DANG,

PHAR PHYIN RNAM BSHAD, RNAM 'GREL tIKA CHEN, SGRUB THABS, BSTOD

TSOGS BCAS PO TI BCU GNYIS YOD, ,

(MKHAS GRUB DAR MA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU

THANG LHA'I NYE LOGS SU YAB BSOD NAMS MGON DANG, YUM BKRA SHIS

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS
NAS SKU

GSUNG THUGS RTEN LA DGA' BA DANG, DGE 'DUN LA GUS PA, SNYING

RJE CHE BA LA SOGS PA'I YON TAN DU MA DANG LDAN PA ZHIG GO DGUNG
LO

DRUG PAR YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG LA MKHAS PAR GYUR, YUM RGYAS 'BRING

SOGS LA GZIGS PAS TSIG DON RAGS RIM THUGS LA BYON, CHOS RJE

RANG BYUNG RDO RJE DANG, MKHAN CHEN GZHON NU BYANG CHUB PA GNYIS
LAS

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR RAB TU BYUNG ZHING BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, SNYE
MDO

BA KUN DGA' DON GRUB DANG, BLA MA TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN, RTOGS

LDAN GRAGS PA SENG GE MKHAN CHEN NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN, BLA MA

BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN, BYANG CHUB MGON PO, BSOD NAMS

SENG GE SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI BLA MA MANG POR BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD

BSTAN BCOS BCAS LA GSAN PA RGYA CHER MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU MAN

@222 NGAG LA GTZO BOR MDZAD DE SGRUB PA LA THUGS GZHOL BAR MDZAD
NAS RI

KHROD DBEN PA RNAMS SU GA-YENG BA RNAM PAR BCAD NAS BSGOMS PAS

THAMS CAD KYANG GUS PAR GYUR, PHAG MO'I RI KHROD DU RTOGS LDAN

GRAGS PA SENG GE'I ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS PHYAG PHYIR 'BRANGS TE,

BSNYEN SGRUB DANG, SNYING THIG MKHA' SPYOD BSNYEN SGRUB SOGS KYI

GDAMS PA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA GSAN, GNAS NANG GI GDAN SAR

BSKOS, SKU TSE GANG BOR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN 'BA' ZHIG BSGRUBS

NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG NI ZHVA DMAR BA SKU PHRENG DANG

PO RTOGS LDAN GRAGS PA SENG GE'I MCHOG TU GYUR BA'I SLOB MA YIN,
,

(MKHAS GRUB NOR BZANG RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1423 LOR

GTZANG RTA NAG RANG BYUNG DU YAB NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG DANG, YUM

CHOS SKYABS 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DGU
PA'I

CHU MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1513 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
BCU

GSUM PAR BRAG DMAR CHOS SDINGS SU PHEBS TE CHOS RJE BLO GROS
MGON

PO DANG BYANG SEMS CHOS 'PHEL RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS LAS RAB BYUNG

BSGRUBS SHING BKA' CHOS GSAN, DE NAS RI KHUD CHOS SDER PHEBS

SHING MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GRAGS PA BZANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS
TE

SDE SNOD GSUM LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, 'CHUMS BDE CHEN

DANG CHOS 'KHOR SGANG DU BYON TE KUN MKHYEN SHES RAB RIN CHEN
SOGS

BSHES GNYEN DAM PA DU MA LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN,

@223 DE NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS TE RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB PA LAS
BYANG

CHUB LAM RIM DANG, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA, 'DUL BA, MNGON

PA MDZOD, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL BCAS LA ZHIB TU SBYANGS SHING GSANG

PHU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD NAS MKHAS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS PHYOGS BCUR
KHYAB,

DGUNG LO SO LNGA PAR DGA' LDAN DU PHEBS TE CHOS RJE BLO GROS
CHOS SKYONG

DANG, CHOS RJE GRAGS PA 'OD ZER, RONG PO BLO BZANG GSUM LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA GSAN,

DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR DBEN GNAS RIN CHEN SGANG DANG, AE'I

TI'U RA, 'OL KHA CHOS LUNG, RGYA SOG PHU, LHA SDINGS SOGS SU

'GRIMS NAS LO BZHI TZAM GYI BAR SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD NAS

RTOGS PA'I YON TAN LA MNGA' BRNYES SO, DGUNG LO GO GCIG PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD

KYI BLA RABS LNGA BCU NGA BDUN PA YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS
LAS

MCHOG TU GYUR BA'I THUGS SRAS NI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN
RGYA

MTSO YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //DUS 'KHOR SPYI DON DRI MED
'OD

RGYAN// DANG, //RTZIS GZHUNG PAD DKAR ZHAL LUNG//, //DPAL

GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RIM GNYIS KYI GNAD DON GSAL BAR STON PA

RIM LNGA YANG GSAL// SOGS MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(MKHAS GRUB BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN,)

PAn

@224 CHEN GYI SLOB MA GTZO BO YIN, GA-YAG SDE PAn CHEN DGONGS PA
CHOS

DBYINGS SU 'THIMS RJES, AE WAm GDAN SA LA YUN RING MA BZHUGS

NAS CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU PHEBS TE, 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD NAS YUN RING

DU BZHUGS, DUS PHYIS SU CHU MIG DGON GSAR DU BZHUGS SHING,

'CHAD NYAN MDZAD NAS SLOB MA'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, KHONG GI SLOB

MA'I TSOGS LAS MCHOG TU GYUR BA NI SLOB DPON NAM MKHA' GRAGS PA

YIN, ,

(MKHAS GRUB SBYIN PA DAR RGYAS,)

YOD PA MA ZAD DGA' LDAN BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG GI MTSAN NYID YIG
CHA'I

BDAG NYID CAN YIN, RNAM THAR ZHIB TU MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN

TU PHANGS SO, ,KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RGYU 'BRAS 'KHOR LO//
DANG,

SEL NOR BU'I PHRENG BA//, //RTAGS RIGS KYI ZUR RGYAN//, //YANG
