PA'I RIG GNAS SKOR GYI CHOS TSAN DRUG CUR NYE BA BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYA GAR SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I ME PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1436

LOR GTZANG SA SKYAR YAB 'JAM DBYANGS NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG,

YUM MA CIG DPAL 'BYUNG RGYAL MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,
RAB

BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1494 LOR SHAB
DGE SDINGS

SU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG SKYES STOBS KYI THUGS RAB SHIN TU CHE BA
DANG, DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN DKON MCHOG BZANG PO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS SA SKYA'I

CHOS SKOR DANG RTZIS SOGS GSAN SBYONG MDZAD NAS LEGS PAR MKHYEN
TE

@363 GSUNG RAB KYANG CI RIGS BRTZAMS PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER
BDUN

PAR MDO KHAMS SU PHEBS SKABS LAM 'DZOL NAS HOR SER YOD SA ZHIG

TU PHEBS, THOG MAR PHAN TSUN KHA BRDA MI 'PHROD PAS PHYAG PHYI
RNAMS

LA 'O BRGYAL CUNG BYUNG YANG YUN RING MA 'GOR BAR SA SKYA'I
SKYES CHEN

DAM PA YIN PAR RTOGS NAS 'GRO DON RGYA CHER 'PHEL, DE NAS PHEBS

PAS GRUB RDZA ZHES PA'I YUL SHIN TU MTHO ZHING CHU MED SA ZHIG
TU 'BYOR

BAS DRUNG 'KHOR DANG RTA KHAL RNAMS SKOM PAS NYEN PA NA KHONG
GIS BRAG

LA PHUR BA BTAB NAS CHU BTON PA DANG, KHA BA CHEN PO BABS NAS
'GRO

LAM MI MNGON PAR GYUR BA'I TSE 'BRONG RKYANG SHA BA SOGS RI
DVAGS

RNAMS KYIS LAM SNE KHRID PA SOGS GRUB RTAGS DU MA BSTAN PA SOGS

RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR BA SHIN TU MANG NGO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI
PO TI

KA PA GSER BRIS CAN GCIG DA LTA PE CIN MI RIGS RIG GNAS PHO
BRANG

DU BZHUGS SO, ,KHONG NI DPAL LDAN SA SKYA DGON PA'I KHRI PA BCU

DGU PA YIN, ,

(RGYA 'DUL 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I ME MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1047 LOR

MYANG STOD MANG RA LA YAB YUM RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I SRAS
SU

SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO
1131

LOR SHANGS SU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YAB

YUM GNYIS KA 'DAS NAS GNAS GZHI BYA ROG TSANG BA'I BTZUN PA

RNAMS KYI GSEB TU PHYIN YANG, KHONG GZUGS BYAD NGAN PAR YOD

@364 PAS NGED KYI MI 'BRU LA GNOD ZER NAS 'DUG TU MA BCUG PAR
BSKRAD

DE DGA' BA GDONG DU PHEBS TE, BTZUN PA RNAMS LA SKRU ZHING PHUB
MA'I

NANG TU NYAL, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA SBYOR KLOG MDZAD PAS BLO LA ZIN,

DE NAS SOG CAN DU BYON TE 'DUL BA LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, GZHAN

YANG DBUS GTZANG GI YUL DU 'DUL BA MKHAS ZER TSAD KYI MDUN DU

PHEBS TE 'DUL BA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS

GZUS RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYI SLOB MA SNE PHO GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN DANG,

GLAN TSUL KHRIMS BYANG CHUB, SPO CHUNG TSUL KHRIMS 'BYUNG GNAS
GSUM

LAS 'DUL BA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS SKOR MANG DU GSAN, GTZO BOR MYANG

MTSAMS RIN CHEN BLA MA DANG, KO KHYIM PA YE SHES BLA MA, SKAM

GSAL BA'I SNYING PO BCAS LA BSTEN PA MDZAD, DE LTAR DGUNG LO SO

BZHI PA'I BAR DU 'DUL BA GTZO BYAS PA'I CHOS SKOR RNAMS LA
SBYANGS PA

MTHAR THUG PA MDZAD, DE NAS DGE BSHES KYI CHU BZUNG STE DGUNG LO

BRGYAD CU'I BAR DU BZHUGS SA'I MTHIL DGA' BA GDONG DU MDZAD,

DGON PA CHU MIG LUNG BZUNG NAS CHOS GZHI MANG DU BSKOR ZHING,

'DUL BA'I BSHAD PA RGYA CHER MDZAD, BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS

PAR GRUB CING, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU RTZA LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI 'DAR 'DUL

'DZIN DANG, MTHA' BZHI BRTZON 'GRUS 'BAR, JO STAN NAG PO DAR

MA TSUL KHRIMS, RMA TSO BYANG CHUB RDO RJE BCAS YIN NO, ,

(RGYA NAG PA 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,)

@365 KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1686

LOR HOR YUL AA RU HO CHEN DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS

PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1738 LOR AU CHI MU CHEN GA-YON
RUR SKU

GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BZHI PAR SDE KHRI BLO BZANG DON GRUB NAS DUS

'KHOR RGYA NAG PA NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS KYI YANG SPRUL DU NGOS
'DZIN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SDE KHRI RIN PO CHE LAS RAB TU BYUNG,
YI

GE'I 'BRI KLOG BCAS LA SBYONG PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES RTZIS BZHAG THOG MAR GNANG SKABS
CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS, BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS LA BYAMS CHOS DANG DBU MA RIGS

TSOGS SOGS KYI TSIG RGYUGS PHUL TE LEGS SO THOB, DGUNG LO BCU

DRUG PAR SPYI DON RIGS RGYAN DANG BLO RTAGS SOGS TSAD MA'I SKOR
GYI

'BEL GTAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG NAS NYER GSUM GYI BAR

DU GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING
GO

RIGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI RIGS SMRA 'GRAN ZLA MED PA BYUNG, DGUNG LO

NYER LNGA BAR KUN MKHYEN BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN BKA' POD LNGA'I
BRGAL

LAN MDZAD DE RDO RAMS PA'I DAM BCA' THON ZHING MKHAS PA'I GRAGS

PA THOB, DE NAS RGYA NAG TU LAN GRANGS DU MA PHEBS TE DBANG LUNG

MAN NGAG GI RGYUN MANG DU SPEL, GA-YON RU'I SA HU BE HUNG WANG
GIS

SBYIN BDAG MDZAD DE BDE MCHOG BLOS BSLANGS LTAR GYI GTZUG LAG
KHANG

BZHENGS, SGO BZHI LA RGYUD DANG, DUS 'KHOR, SMAN PA, RIG

@366 GNAS KYI GRVA TSANG BZHI BTZUGS, BDE MO THANG DGA' LDAN
CHOS 'KHOR

GLING DANG BLA BRANG DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG GI KHRIR BZHUGS TE MDO
SNGAGS KYI

'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER SPEL, TZONG KHA BRGYAD CHU'I LHA KHANG
GA-YU THOG CAN

BDE YANGS BCAS PA GSAR DU BSKRUN, SKU TSE GANG BOR BSTAN 'GRO'I

BYA BA 'BA' ZHIG BSGRUBS NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG

RTZOM NI //DBUS MTHA' RNAM 'BYED KYI 'GREL BA// DANG, //DGE 'DUN

NYER LNGA'I RNAM GZHAG//, //RGYAL PO SPRIN GYI BZHON PA'I RTOGS
BRJOD//,

//PHAR PHYIN SKABS KYI DRIS LAN//, //DUS 'KHOR KHRI BSHAD// BCAS

CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO BZHI YOD PA POD GNYIS SU BSDUS NAS BZHUGS
SO,,

(RGYA NAG PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI KLU 'BUM NGAG DBANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG MI GCIG

YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(RGYA MA DBON STON GZHON NU 'BYUNG GNAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1138 LOR

DGYER SGOM PA'I GCUNG PO BU MO STAG GI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB

BYUNG BZHI PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1210 LOR SKU
GSHEGS, KHONG

NI BSKAL BA BZANG PO'I SANGS RGYAS SU GYUR BA BYANG CHUB SEMS
DPA'

SKAL LDAN SHING RTA NYID KYI SKYE BA BZHES PAR GRAGS, KHONG GIS
SPYIR

DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, SGOS SU SNE'U
ZUR

PA YE SHES 'BAR GYI ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING BKA' GDAMS PA'I

@367 GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD MA LUS PAR ZHUS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS, GTZUG

LAG KHANG CHEN PO BZHENGS PA LA SOGS PA'I GZHAN DON GYI BYA BA
RLABS

CHEN MANG DU MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA BZHI PA RAB BYUNG GSUM
PA'I

CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1172 LOR RGYA MA RIN CHEN SGANG GI
GDAN

SAR PHEBS SHING LO NGO BZHI BCU RTZA GNYIS KYI RING DU GDAN SA
BSKYANGS,

BSTAN 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD CING BSHAD
SGRUB

GNYIS KYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS BSTAN
'GRO'I

DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO BDUN CU RTZA GSUM PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI RGYA MA RIN CHEN
SGANG GI

GDAN RABS GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

(RGYA BRTZON 'GRUS SENG GE)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO MI GSAL YANG 'KHRUNGS YUL NI MNGA' RIS

PU RANGS YIN, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1040 LOR BAL YUL DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS BOD KYI MKHAS CHEN RIN

CHEN BZANG PO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU LEGS
SBYAR

GYI SKAD LA NANG BYAN TSUD PA ZHIG YIN, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I
LCAGS MO

LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1031 LO'I YAN MAN DU LHA BLA MA YE SHES 'OD
KYIS

KHONG NYID RGYA GAR DU JO BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA GDAN 'DREN
PAR

MNGAGS KYANG RE ZHIG GDAN DRANGS RGYU MA BYUNG, DE NAS KHONG GIS
JO

@368 BO RJE LA BSTEN TE BRI KA MA LA SH'I LA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG
DU BZHUGS SHING

BKA' DANG BSTAN 'GYUR MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR, KHONG GI
//BSTAN

'GYUR// GYI 'GYUR BYANG NANG DU "DGE SLONG" DANG "DGE BSNYEN"
ZHES

GNYIS KA 'KHOD 'DUG PAS YANG SNYING GI RTEN "DGE SLONG" NGAM
"DGE

BSNYEN" GANG YIN DA DUNG DPYAD DGOS, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI

//BKA' 'GYUR// LAS //LAG NA RDO RJE GOS SNGON PO CAN GYI CHO GA
DANG

BCAS PA'I GZUNGS// DANG, //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //DPAL 'KHOR

LO SDOM PA'I BSTOD PA DON THAMS CAD GRUB PA RNAM DAG GTZUG GI
NOR

BU//, //RIG PA 'DZIN PA RTZEN MA'I RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I RJES
SU

GNANG BA'I CHO GA//, //GZHAN DON SLOB MA RJES SU BZUNG BA'I CHO
GA//,

//DPAL RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SGRUB THABS//, //RIN PO CHE RGYAN
GYI

SGRUB PA//, //RDO RJE PHAG MO'I SGRUB THABS//, //DPAL RDO RJE
RNAL

'BYOR MA'I SGRUB THABS//, //LHA MO SGROL MA NYI SHU RTZA GCIG LA
BSTOD

PA RNAM DAG GTZUG GI NOR BU//, //RNAL 'BYOR PA LA GDAMS PA//,

//MTHU CHEN LA GDAMS PA//, //GLU MKHAN LA GDAMS PA//, //MI

STEGS PA LA GDAMS PA//, //SHAN PA LA GDAMS PA//, //RIG BYED

MKHAN LA GDAMS PA//, //SGYU MA MKHAN LA GDAMS PA//, //SMAD

'TSONG MA LA GDAMS PA//, //'KHOR BA LAS YID 'BYUNG BAR BYED

PA//, //RDO RJE THEG PA'I RTZA LTUNG RGYA CHER 'GREL BA LAM GYI
SGRON ME//,

//PHYAG NA RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR GYI RGYUD DU BKRAL BA//, //BDEN PA
GNYIS

LA 'JUG PA// BCAS MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

@369 (RGYA MTSO'I SDE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO LNGA PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS NAS

BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG

SOGS LA THOS BSAM MDZAD, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA

PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS TE BSTAN BCOS 'GA' ZHIG BOD YIG TU
BSGYUR

BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BKA' 'GYUR// LAS //MYA NGAN

LAS 'DAS PA CHEN PO'I MDO// BAM PO LNGA BCU RTZA DRUG DANG,
//BSTAN

'GYUR// LAS //'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI BSTOD PA RIN PO CHE'I
PHRENG

BA//, //TSOGS KYI DBANG PHYUG GI BSTOD PA//, //LAS THAMS CAD

GRUB PAR BYED PA//, //AA RA PA TZA NA'I SGRUB THABS// BCAS
BZHUGS

SO, ,

(RGYA YAG BSKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1858

LOR CHA GHAN PU LAG TU YAB SHAR BAN GSANG BDAG SKYABS DANG YUM
KHRO

LO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG
LO

LNGA PAR DBON PO PHYAG MDZOD CHOS RJE BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN
DANG, CHOS

RJE BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR, NANG SO BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB SOGS KYIS
SKU

GONG MA BLO BZANG MKHYEN RAB BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I YANG SRID DU
NGOS

'DZIN MDZAD CING CHOS RJE BLA MA'I DRUNG NAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM
PA@370 BZHES, DBU MDZAD DAM CHOS YAR 'PHEL DGE RGAN DU BSTEN TE YI

GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA SBYANGS PA YAG POR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO DGU PAR SKU 'BUM RANG SGAR DU GDAN SAR BKOD

CING ZI NA MKHAN CHEN SKAL BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO LAS RAB
BYUNG

DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR STONG

'KHOR DKA' BCU RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS SKU

'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE RNAM
'GREL

LA SOGS PA'I GZHUNG CHE CHUNG RNAMS LA THOS BSAM GANG LEGS
GNANG,

DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR GRUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG LAS 'JIGS BYED

DPA' GCIG DANG, LHA BCU GSUM MA, MI 'KHRUGS LHA DGU, RTA

MGRIN GSANG SGRUB, N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I DBANG BCAS LEGS PAR

ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR BSDUS GRVA'I DAM BCA' LEGS PAR

BZHAG DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR SGO MANG SKABS DANG PO'I SKYOR DPON

MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR DPAL LDAN GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA

GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS GSANG CHEN LAM GYI RIM PA LA
GSAN

SBYONG PHUL DU PHYIN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR SHING BZA'
BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN TSOGS SOGS LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LO DER GLING BSRES DKA' BCU BA'I MTSAN

BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR RI BO RTZE LNGAR PHEBS TE

BSNYEN BKUR GANG LEGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA RAB BYUNG

BCO LNGA PA'I CHU MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1883 LOR SKU 'BUM RGYUD
PA

@371 MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR DNGUL
SRANG

DRUG BRGYA LAS BRGAL BA'I RGYU SONG GIS SANGS RGYAS STONG SKU'I
GYAN THANG

BZHENGS TE RGYUD PA'I 'DU KHANG GI KHYAMS RA'I STENG SHOD DU
SPYOR

'JAGS MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI
LO

1884 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS

DANG,

TA RI GANG KA SOGS HOR GYI YUL GRU MANG POR PHEBS TE SO THAR GYI
SDOM

PA DANG DBANG LUNG RJES GSUM SOGS CI 'DOD DU BSTZAL, PE CIN GYI

TZAN DAN JO BO SOGS DANG, RI BO RTZE LNGA'I RTEN GNAS LA PHYAG
MCHOD

SMON 'DUN GANG RGYAS DANG, DBUS GTZANG DAG PA'I ZHING DANG, SA

SKYA GONG 'OG GI GTZOS GNAS CHEN MANG POR GUS MCHOD DANG RTEN

KHRI

SU

DU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS
PA

BYON TE

'CHAD NYAN PA YUN RING DU MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM PA

(RGYA SH'AKYA GZHON NU,)

GTZANG GI MKHAS PA MI BCU'I NANG GI YA GYAL MKHAS GRUB GNYIS
LDAN GYI

TSUL,

GI GTZUG

GRAGS CHE BA'I 'DUL 'DZIN GYI SLOB MA ZHIG YIN NO, ,

@375 SHING PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1774 LOR RONG BO THOS BSAM

BSTAN 'DZIN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LO BDUN GYI RING DU PHYAG
RDZAS

GANG YOD DGE 'DUN GYI SDE LA PHUL TE BSNYEN BKUR MDZAD, GLING
RGYAL

ZHO 'PHONG GNYIS NAS SBYIN BDAG RGYA CHEN BYAS TE GDAN YANG YANG

DRANGS SHING GA-YA' MA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI SGRUB SDE GSAR DU
BTZUGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I DKYIL ZHIG TU KHEL, 'DU KHANG PHYI NANG

DANG, BYAMS KHANG, GZIMS KHANG SOGS RTEN BRTEN PA LEGS

PAR GRUB, RDO SBIS PHYOGS KYI DGU RIS GRVA TSANG SOGS BSHAD
SGRUB KYI SDE

BCU LHAG GI DGON MGO PHUL BA BDAG GIR MDZAD DE CHOS SRID GNYIS

KA'I CHA NAS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS, SLAR YANG RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

GLING

RABS

BCU DRUG PA DANG, NYI SHU BA YIN NO, ,

(RGYAL MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG NYI MA,)

'DUL

'DZIN BLO BZANG NOR BU LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM

@376 RGYAL GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE MKHAS GRUB BLO BZANG
BSTAN DAR

SOGS KYI ZHABS LA BSTEN NAS MTSAN NYID KYI GZHUNG SLOB GNYER
LEGS

PAR MDZAD CING, MDO SMAD KYI CHOS SDE CHEN PO LA MO BDE CHEN
DANG,

BYA KHYUNG, SKU 'BUM, STONG SKOR, BTZAN PO DGON, DGON LUNG,

DMAR GTZANG, GRO TSANG RNAMS SU GRVA SKOR MDZAD PAS MKHAS GRAGS

RGYAS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS SHING 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA
TSANG GI

CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE MKHAS DBANG BLO BZANG SHES RAB SOGS LA BSTEN

NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM MDZAD, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG

YE SHES, KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU MA'I
ZHAL

GYI BDUD RTZI MYONG STE LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR
MDZAD CING LHA

RAMS PA'I DAM BCA' PHUL DU PHYIN, RTZOD PA ANG DANG BO THOB PA'I

LEGS SKYES SU RGYAL ME TOG THANG GI MKHAN SAR MNGA' GSOL, MI
DBANG

PHO LHA THA'I JIS BLA MAR BSTEN NAS SPYI BOR BKUR, MTSO SNGON
DKON

MCHOG WANG GIS GZHUNG SAR PHAN THOGS CAN GYI BLA MA ZHIG DGOS
ZHES

ZHUS PA LTAR KHONG NYID GDAN DRANGS TE MTSO SNGON DU LO 'GAR
BZHUGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1740 LOR
RONG

BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO
BCU

GSUM GYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS, THOS BSAM GLING GI 'DU KHANG

DANG, BKA' BSTAN 'GYUR, BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI LI SKU GTZO BYAS

PA'I SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS SO, KHONG NI RONG BO
THOS

BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU BA YIN NO, ,

@377 (RGYAL MKHAN PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1762

LOR MDO SMAD LHO RGYUD KYI SA'I CHA 'BO RA'I RGYA SGAR THANG
[DENG ZH'A HVO RDZONG

GI KHONGS 'BO RA ZHANG] DU YAB YUM SKYABS DANG, YUM LHA MO 'TSO

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO
BYA LO

STE SPYI LO 1837 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR MANG NGE DGE

SLONG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG DANG
'DON CHOS

'GAR BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR SE RA DGE BSHES BLO

BZANG CHOS 'PHEL LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN BLO BZANG DON GRUB

CES GSOL, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU

PHEBS TE CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BSDUS GRVA, BLO RTOGS, RTAGS

RIGS RANG LUGS, GRUB MTHA' RIN CHEN PHRENG BA SOGS TSOGS

RGYUGS PHUL, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR DPON SLOB BSOD NAMS GRAGS

PA LAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED

DBANG POS SGO MANG BLA MA SANGS RGYAS RDO RJE'I YANG SRID DU
NGOS 'DZIN

MDZAD DE BLA BRANG NANG DU SPRUL PA'I SKU'I GDAN KHRIR BKOD,
DGUNG LO

NYER GCIG PAR KUN MKHYEN GYI DRUNG NAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING
MTSAN

GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR DBUS

SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE HOR
SKAL

BZANG DNGOS GRUB DANG GUNG THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DGE RGAN DU

BSTEN NAS SLOB GNYER GYI RGYUN BSKYANGS TE SGO MANG GI TSOGS
DBUS SU

@378 GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG DGUNG LO NYER LNGA
BAR SDE BA

GZHUNG GI BKA' LTAR CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL GYI MKHAN PO MDZAD, DE NAS

MI RING BAR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MOR GDAN SA GSUM GYI DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN GYI MDUN DU DAM BCA' BZHAG NAS LHA RAMS PA'I MTSAN

RTAGS ANG DANG PO BZHES SO, DGUNG LO NYER DGU BAR MDO SMAD DU

PHEBS TE BLA BRANG MKHAN PO MDZAD DE DGON PAR RTEN GSAR BZHENGS

MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU BAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI TSOGS CHEN
KHRI

BAR MNGA' GSOL MDZAD PAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN
RABS

NYER GSUM PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BYANG CHUB SEMS PA'I

SPYOD PA LA 'JUG PA'I 'GREL BA RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA// SOGS
KHYON

BSDOMS BSTAN BCOS DGU BCU GO LNGA TZAM YOD PA PHYOGS GCIG TU

DRIL TE PO TI DRUG LHAG LONGS PA'I PAR SHING BLA BRANG DU BTAB
YOD,

KHONG GIS SKU TSE GANG BOR 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA'
BA

MDZAD CING, GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI PHYOGS MED DU SPEL TE, BU SLOB

MANG PO BKA' DRIN GYIS BSKYANGS SO,

(RGYAL MKHAN SPRUL? SKAL BZANG GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1880 LOR MDO SMAD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS RGYAL MKHAN PO'I SKU PHRENG BZHI
PAR NGOS

'DZIN MDZAD DE RGYAL MKHAN PO'I GDAN SAR PHEBS, RTZA BA'I BLA MA
NGAG

DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO SOGS SLOB DPON MANG PO BSTEN NAS MDO

@379 SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR DPYIS PHYIN PAR SBYANGS TE
MKHAS

PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, LHAG PAR DU NANG DON RIG PA DANG SNYAN NGAG

SOGS LA SHIN TU MKHAS, BSTAN 'GRO'I BYA BA 'BA' ZHIG BSGRUBS NAS

DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI SGRUB THABS DANG,

DRIS LAN, RNAM THAR, LO RGYUS, DBANG LUNG GI ZIN THO, GTAM

TSOGS, GNAS BSTOD SOGS CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO GSUM YOD PA DE

PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS NAS PO TI GNYIS SU BYAS TE BLA BRANG BKRA
SHIS

'KHYIL DU SHING PAR BRKOS NAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYAL TO RI LONG BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS GNYIS PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO LDE SPRIN BTZAN DANG, YUM GNYAN BTZUN MANG MO RJE GNYIS
KYI

SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG TA RA LA
HA RIS

MDZAD CING GSAS KHANG YANG BZHES, BTZUN MO 'O MA LDE BZA' KHRI

BTZUN BYANG MA KHAB TU BZHES TI RIGS SRAS KHRI BTZAN NAS SKU
'KHRUNGS,

KHONG GI BANG SO GANGS DKAR RTZE LA BTAB, KHONG NI 'OG GI BTZAN
LNGA

LAS BTZAN DANG PO YIN NO, ,

(RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1708

LOR KHAMS LI THANG DU YAB BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS DANG, YUM BLO

BZANG CHOS 'TSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
GSUM

PA'I ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1757 LOR SKU GSHEGS, LHA BZANG
HAN LA@380 DOGS NAS KHAMS SDE DGE BRGYUD MTSO SNGON KHRI SHOR RGYAL
MO'I 'GRAM

NGOGS KUN DGA' RNOR DU BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR SKU 'BUM

BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS TE NO MIN HAN NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI MDUN NAS THOG MAR DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA
MNOS,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR GONG MA BDE SKYID RGYAL PO'I SRAS DPON
'KHOR

DANG DPUNG TSOGS STONG PHRAG GSUM DANG BCAS SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS TE

BOD DU GDAN ZHU BYA RGYU'I BKA' LUNG BSGRAGS, BSTAN PA RGYAS
SHING 'GRO

BA 'DREN PA T'A LA'I BLA MA DRUG PA ZHES PA'I GSER GYI THAM KA
MAN JU

DANG, SOG PO, BOD GSUM GYI YI GE YOD PA ZHIG DANG, GSER

SRANG BRGYA DANG LNGA BCU LAS GRUB PA'I 'JA' SA BCAS BSTZAL, LO
DER

DBUS SU PHEBS NAS PO T'A LA'I PHO BRANG CHEN PO'I KHRI LA MNGA'
GSOL TE

MDZAD SGO GZAB CING RGYAS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS PAn CHEN BLO BZANG
YE

SHES LAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGA' LDAN KHRI ZUR BLO
BZANG

DAR RGYAS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN TE MTSAN NYID KYI GZHUNG CHEN
KHAG LA

SLOB GNYER LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR GONG MA GA-YUNG

tING GIS " NUB PHYOGS MCHOG TU DGE BA'I ZHING GI RGYAL DBANG SA
STENG

RGYAL BSTAN YONGS KYI BDAG PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BADZRA DHA RA
T'A LA'I

BLA MA" ZHES YIG RIGS BZHIS SPRAS KYI GSER THAM BSTZAL TE BOD
KYI

CHOS SRID MTHA' DAG GZIGS SKYONG DGOS PA'I BKA' LUNG THOB,

DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES LAS BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA ZHES, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR BKA' BLON NANG
KHUL

@381 MA 'CHAM PAR BRTEN BOD DU DUS ZING BYUNG STABS GONG MAS
KHONG GI

BDE 'JAGS LA DGONGS NAS LI THANG DU PHEBS DGOS PA'I BKA' LUNG

BYUNG, DE NAS LHO LAM BRGYUD KONG PO RGYA MDA', LHA RI 'GO SHO
PA

MDO, 'BA' THANG SOGS NAS LI THANG THUB CHEN BYAMS PA GLING DU

PHEBS, GONG MA'I MDZOD NAS DNGUL SRANG KHRI PHRAG BCU BZHI'I
MTHUN

RKYEN SBYAR TE MGAR THAR DU GTZUG LAG KHANG BLA BRANG DANG BCAS
RGYA CHE

GSAR SKRUN MDZAD, DE MUR LO NGO LNGA TZAM BZHUGS RING RGYUD SMAD

MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN GYI DRUNG NAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG

SOGS KYI CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR BYANG

LAM BRGYUD NAS DBUS SU PHEBS, DE NAS LO NGO BCO LNGA'I RING DU

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG, ZHVA LU MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG YON

TAN 'BYUNG GNAS BCAS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG

GNAS BCAS PAR LEGS PAR SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PA'I BDAG POR

GYUR, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PAR (SPYI LO 1751) BOD DU BKA' SHAG

SRID GZHUNG DNGOS SU BTZUGS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI MNGA' BDAG
TU

GYUR, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA PAR RTZE SLOB GRVA GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD,
DGUNG

HRIL

@388 GDUGS DKAR GCIG GIS KHYAB PA'I BDAG POR MNGA' GSOL TE

TZI DANG ZHAL 'DZOMS MDZAD DE GSOL STON GZAB RGYAS BSHAMS NAS

CHOS SRID KYI MDZAD SGO LEGS PAR GRUB STE BOD DU PHEBS, GONG MA

KYI

GSER GYI

NYIS BRGYA DRUG CU RE GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYAL BA CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DON GRUB,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG RGYAL

DBANG THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I BKA' LTAR SE CHEN RGYAL PO'I RGYUD
KYI BLA

MCHOD MDZAD CING PHYIR PHEBS NAS SKU 'BUM DGON DU BZHUGS PA

MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1638
LOR

SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN

SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA TSAGS 'DZIN NAN TAN DU MDZAD,

RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1639 LOR RGYA
YAG

DKA' BCU DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN DANG, ZI NA BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR

RGYAL MTSAN, ZI NA DPAL 'BYOR RIN CHEN KHU DBON GNYIS BCAS

KYIS SBYIN BDAG MDZAD DE, 'DU KHANG RNYING BA DBUS 'PHUG LTAR KA
BA

SUM CU RTZA DRUG YOD PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, MDZOD DANG 'DUL

BA'I 'DZIN GRVA GNYIS GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD DE BRTZI BZHAG KYANG
LEGS

PAR GNANG NGO, LO BZHI'I RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING DGON
PA'I

MNGA' THANG DAR BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN

RABS KHRI CHEN DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

(RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1758@390 LOR GTZANG THOB RGYAL LHA RI SGANG DU YAB BSOD NAMS DAR
RGYAS DANG,

YUM PHUN TSOGS DBANG MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1804 LOR SKU GSHEGS,

DGUNG LO GNYIS PAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS TE PAn CHEN SKU
PHRENG

DRUG PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI MDUN NAS DGE BSNYEN GYI
SDOM

PA BZHES TE MTSAN LA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG 'JAM DPAL

RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BZHI BAR BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS
DBUS

LHA LDAN DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO LNGA BAR RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN PO PO
TA LA'I

GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG

DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA DANG, YONGS 'DZIN

KHRI CHEN RIN PO CHES DUS GO BA MDZAD DE DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES,

KHONG LAS DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG MANG DU GSAN, DE NAS YONGS

'DZIN PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA DANG, BYANG RTZE CHOS RJE
BYA KHYUNG

PA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS GNYIS KYI MDUN NAS GZHUNG LUGS RAB

'BYAMS LA SLOB GNYER GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU

BAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS MKHAN PO DANG,
KHRI

ZUR NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYIS LAS SLOB, YONGS 'DZIN BLO

BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS GSANG STON SLOB DPON MDZAD NAS BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI BAR CHAN LUNG GONG
MAS

"NUB PHYOGS MCHOG TU DGE BA'I ZHING GI RGYAL DBANG SA STENG GI
RGYAL

BSTAN YONGS KYI BDAG PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BADZRA DHA RA T'A
LA'I BLA

@391 MA'I PHYAG RGYA" ZHES PA'I GSER GYI THAM KA DANG 'JA' SA
BSTZAL, DGUNG

LO NYER BDUN PAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS NAS PAn CHEN SKU
PHRENG

BDUN PAR DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BSTZAL TE MTSAN LA BLO BZANG
DPAL

LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO

SO GCIG PAR LHA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG LTE BA'I BAR SKOR ZHAL
PHYIR

BSTAN DANG, KHYAMS RA CHEN MO, SGO MCHOR MDO SBUG GSUNG

RA, DKYIL 'KHOR SDINGS, BAR KHANG RTZE MO BCAS KYI LDEBS BRIS

RNAMS RNYING SONG BA SNGAR BZHIN GSAR BRIS MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO

GSUM PAR SGRUB SDE TSE MCHOG GLING GI GTZUG LAG KHANG GSAR
BZHENGS

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO DGU BAR DGE SLONG MA DPAL MO LUGS KYI THUGS

RJE CHEN PO BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI SKU DANG, SMYUNG GNAS BLA RGYUD
KYI SKU,

GSER ZANGS LAS BSGRUBS PA'I TSE DPAG MED KYI SKU BCAS GSAR

BZHENGS MDZAD NAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PAR ZHABS 'DEGS ZHUS SO,

KHONG NI RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BRGYAD PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM
NI BLA

MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG, SGRUB THABS, CHO GA DKAR CHAG

GSOL 'DEBS, DRIS LAN, BLO SBYONG, BCA' YIG BCAS

CHOS TSAN BCU BZHIR BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYAL BA TEN NE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1127

LOR YAR MNGA' NUB KYI CHU 'KHOR DU YAB JO SRAS SKYAB BE DANG,
YUM

'TSUR MO BZA' MANG SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG BZHI

@392 PA'I ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1217 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG LO

GSUM PAR SNGON GYI SKYE BA RJES SU DRAN TE NGA MAL BRTZON 'GRUS
BLA MA

YIN ZHES GSUNGS, DE NAS SO SKU RING LAS THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I
RDZOGS

RIM DANG MA nI'I BZLAS LUNG ZHUS, DGUNG LO LNGA PAR RAS CHUNG PA

DANG MJAL ZHING TI PHU LUGS KYI DO HA ZHUS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR

CHOS RJE SGAM PO BA DANG MJAL ZHING PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO ZHUS,
DGUNG LO

DGU PAR SLOB DPON SGOM PA LAS SGROL MA'I 'DON LUNG DANG JO BO'I

LUGS KYI MAN NGAG RNAMS ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA'I TSUN DU YAB
CHEN

SBYANGS LAS MA GSHEN PHUR GSUM DANG, DPE SROG GTZANG GSUM BCAS

LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD KYI BAR
DU BYA

SA'I JO BO LHA CHEN PO DANG LHA BTZUN SNGON MO GNYIS KYI BLON PO
LO NGO GSUM

DU MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR 'BRING CHA RU BA LAS DGE BSNYEN
GYI

SDOM PA BLANGS SHING BDEN GNYIS KYI CHOS RNAMS ZHUS, DE NAS PA
TSAB

SGOM PA'I MDUN DU PHEBS TE DBANG DANG GDAMS NGAG ZHUS, DA DUNG

LAM LNGA'I KHRID DANG, SNYAN BRGYUD DO HA'I SKOR, RTEN 'BREL GYI
CHOS

SKOR, RDZU 'PHRUL GYI CHOS SKOR BCAS ZHUS SHING SGOM SGRUB MDZAD
PAS

RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS, BLA MA'I GSUNG RNAMS KYANG ZIN

BRIS MDZAD CING ZHIB MO DAR CHAGS SU BTAGS, DE NAS RGYAL KHAMS

'GRIM PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA MDZAD CING SLOB MA YANG MANG DU
BSKYANGS,

GTZO BOR SBAS PA'I BRTUL ZHUGS KHO NAR 'DZIN NAS DUS 'DA' BAR

MDZAD, KHONG NI CHIG BRGYUD SPAS PA'I BLA MA RNAM GSUM LAS GSUM
PA

@393 YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS KYI GTZO BO NI NGAM SHOD KYI
GTZANG PO

DRUG BTZUN MO DANG YUM BU DRUG DGE BSHES DRUG SNGAGS PA DRUG

KHYIM PA DAD CAN DRUG BLA MA'I BKA' RGYA MI SRUNG PA'I CHOS
'TSONG BA'I

TSONG DPON DRUG STE SUM CU RTZA DRUG BCAS YIN NO, ,

(RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1876
LOR

DVAGS PO SNANG RDZONG GLANG MDUN DU YAB KUN DGA' RIN CHEN DANG,
YUM

BLO BZANG SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
DRUG

PA'I CHU MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1933 LOR SKU GSHEGS, PAn CHEN

PA'I DBANG PHYUG GI GSUNG BRTAG DANG, GNAS CHUNG CHOS SKYONG GI
BKA'

LUNG, CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL LHA MO BLA MTSO'I GZIGS SNANG BCAS KYI
THOG

NAS RGYAL BA 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO'I YANG SRID YIN PAR NGES
BRNYED

THOB, DGUNG LO GNYIS PAR TSAL GUNG THANG DU PAn CHEN RIN PO CHES

GTZUG PHUD BZHES TE MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN
RGYA

MTSO 'JIGS BRAL DBANG PHYUG PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I SDE
ZHES

GSOL, DGUNG LO BZHI PAR RTZE PHO BRANG CHEN MO PO TA LA'I GSER
KHRIR

MNGA' GSOL, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SRID SKYONG RTA TSAG NGAG DBANG

DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA DANG,
PHUR

LCOG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS BYAMS PA RGYA MTSOS DUS GO BA MDZAD
DE RAB

BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, DE NAS YONGS 'DZIN RTA
TSAG

DANG PHUR LCOG GNYIS LAS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SLOB GNYER

@394 MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR YONGS 'DZIN PHUR LCOG LAS
BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS, LO DER BOD KYI CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI THUGS 'GAN BZHES,

DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR LHA RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG

LO NYER DGU PAR DBYIN JI BTZAN 'DZUL PA LA BYOL NAS SOG YUL DU

PHEBS TE LO NGO GSUM LA BZHUGS, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR PE CIN

DU PHEBS TE GONG MA KVANG ZHU DANG, RGYAL YUM TSI ZHI GNYIS LA
MJAL

'DZOMS MDZAD, GONG MAS "NUB PHYOGS SNYING RJE RGYAL PO SKYES BU

SANGS RGYAS" ZHES PA'I GSER GYI PANG LEB BSTZAL, DGUNG LO SO
BZHI

PAR BYANG LAM BRGYUD NAS LHA SAR PHEBS, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PAR
RGYA

GAR DU PHEBS TE GNAS MANG MJAL, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR BOD DU

PHEBS TE PHO BRANG CHEN MOR ZHABS SOR 'KHOD, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA
PAR

BKA' 'GYUR DANG GSUNG 'BUM PAR BRKOS NAS PAR SHING GSAR DU

BSKRUN, PAR KHANG GSAR DU BZHENGS TE GANGS CAN PHAN BDE'I GTER

MDZOD GLING ZHES 'DOGS PAR MDZAD, LHA SA BSTAN GLING NYE 'DABS

SU SMAN RTZIS KHANG GSAR DU BTZUGS MDZAD PAS GSO RIG LAS DON

GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL LO, KHONG NI RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BCU GSUM
PA YIN,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI KHYON BSDOMS PAR SHING DU 'KHOD PAR POD
LNGA

YOD, POD DANG PO PHUR LCOG RIN PO CHE'I RNAM THAR SOGS YIN, POD

GNYIS PA GSUNG BSHAD LJAGS SGRIG LE TSAN YIN, POD GSUM PA SNYAN

NGAG ME LONG GI DPER BRJOD CHA TSANG YIN, POD BZHI PA DGON SDE
KHAG

GI BCA' YIG DANG RTZA TSIG SOGS YIN, POD LNGA PAR GSAN YIG SKOR

@397 BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG ZHAL MJAL ZHING "BLA MA RJE LA PHYAG

RGYUD KYI

@399 RGYA MTSO DANG YONGS 'DZIN KUN BZANG RTZIS PA GNYIS KYIS

YUL DU SKU TSAB TSOGS PA CHED MNGAGS MDZAD NAS RGYAL BA YON TAN

MTSO RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG GSUM PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I YANG SRID
DU NGOS

'DZIN MDZAD DE LHA SAR GDAN 'DREN ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA BAR
RVA

SGRENG DGON DU KHRI KHAR BKOD, DE NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS DGON DU GDAN

DGA' LDAN KHRI THOG NYER BRGYAD DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN LAS DGE
TSUL

GYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR BZHES, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR BKRA SHIS
LHUN

POR PHEBS TE PAn CHEN SKU PHRENG BZHI PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI
RGYAL MTSAN

SKU MDUN NAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER

DRUG PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN 'BRAS SPUNGS
DGON

DU GDAN 'DREN ZHUS TE KHONG LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES,
DE

NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS DGON PA'I DGE 'DUN MANG TSOGS KYI RE 'DUN LTAR

GSUM PA'I KHRI PA DANG, DUS MTSUNGS SU SE RA DGON PA'I MANG
TSOGS

KYI RE 'DUN LTAR SE RA DGON PA'I GDAN RABS BCO LNGA PA'I KHRI PA

MDZAD DO, KHONG NI RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BZHI BA YIN,

1701 LOR GU SHRI BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS RGYAL GYI YANG SRAS (TSA BO)

ZHING 'KHRUG

DE NAS RGYAL PO LHA BZANG HAN GYIS CHIN GONG MA KHANG ZHI LA SDE

(RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU BA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1543 LOR

@402 RDZONG BU KHRID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BCU BA'I SA PHO BYI

LO STE SPYI LO 1588 LOR SOG YUL 'O THU ME 'UR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG

LO BZHI PAR MI DBANG BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG PAn

CHEN BSOD RNAMS GRAGS PA BCAS NAS RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I

YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD DE 'BRAS SPUNGS SU GDAN SAR BKOD,

DGUNG LO BDUN PAR KHRI CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA LAS DGE TSUL GYI

SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR KHRI DGE LEGS DPAL

BZANG LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO SO BZHI BAR SOG PO'I

CHA HAR RGYAL BO'AM JING GIR GYI GDUNG RABS BCU BDUN PA AAL THAN

KH'ANG GIS SOG YUL DU GDAN DRANGS TE RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSO LA

"THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BADZRA DHA RA T'A LA'I BLA MA" ZHES MTSAN
GSOL,

RGYAL BA KHONG GIS CHA HAR RGYAL PO AAL THAN KH'ANG LA "CHOS KYI
RGYAL PO LHA

TSANGS PA" ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR SA THAM
RGYAL POS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA LTAR 'JANG YUL DANG LI THANG DU
PHEBS

TE DGON THUB BSTAN BYAMS CHEN PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I
GLING

ZHES PA'I BSHAD GRVA CHEN PO ZHIG GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING BKA'
CHOS

GANG MANG GSUNGS NAS GDUL BYA THAMS CAD SMIN PAR MDZAD, DE'I

PHYI LO RMA KHAMS BRGYUD DE CHAB MDO BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS NAS
CHOS KYI

MDZAD SGO RGYA CHEN SPEL, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PAR TZONG KHA'I NYE
'DABS

SU PHEBS NAS RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I GNAS SU
BSHAD GRVA

SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING PHYAG BTAB, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PAR GNAS

@403 MCHOG MDZO MO MKHAR DANG 'PHAGS PA SHING KUN SOGS BRGYUD
NAS SOG

PO'I MKHAR SNGON POR PHEBS TE CHA HAR RGYAL PO AAL THAN KH'ANG
GI GDUNG

RTEN GSER ZANGS DNGUL GSUM LAS RGYAN PAR BZHENGS NAS 'DAS

MCHOD GANG LEGS MDZAD PAR MA ZAD, DU RING RGYAL BLON RNAMS LA
KYEE

RDOR BDE MCHOG GI DBANG LUNG GNANG NAS CHOS KYI DGA' STON RGYA
CHEN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE DRUG PAR GONG MAS GDAN 'DREN ZHUS PA LTAR PE

CIN DU PHEBS 'DOD YOD KYANG STABS MA LEGS PAR SOG YUL DU SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG GI SKU TSE GANG BOR CHOS KYI MDZAD PA 'BA' ZHIG
DON

DU GNYER TE ZHVA SER BSTAN PA SOG YUL DU SPEL NAS GONG MA'I
DGONGS

PA LTAR CHA HAR RGYAL PO MTSO SNGON NAS NANG SOG TU LOG BCUG PA
RED, ,

(RGYAL BA BYAMS PA BKRA SHIS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1618 LOR

RGYAL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO
STE SPYI LO

1684 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS DVAGS

PO GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE THUN MONG RIG GNAS KYI SKOR DANG MDO
PHYOGS LA

SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD DO, DE NAS RGYUD STOD DU ZHUGS
NAS

GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN BCAS LA SBYANGS PA
MDZAD,

RGYUD PA DANG SHAR RTZE'I 'CHAD NYAN PA MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU
GCIG

PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1675 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI LA

PHEBS NAS LO BDUN GYI RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING 'CHAD
NYAN

@404 GNANG, LHA DANG BCAS PA'I 'GRO BA YONGS KYI 'DREN PA PHYAG
NA PADMA

NGUR SMRIG GI RNAM PAR ROL BA RGYAL BA KUN GYI SPYI GZUGS NGAG
DBANG BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSO'I SNANG BRNYAN DNGUL LAS GRUB PA DANG, DGA' LDAN

YANGS PA CAN THOG GSER ZANGS KYI GANYDZIR BCAS BZHENGS, DE NAS

GLING YAGS SU ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD DE SKAL LDAN GYI GDUL BYA RNAMS

CHOS KYIS TSIM PAR MDZAD, GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR SOGS KYI DGON

KHAG RNAMS LA ZHAL 'DZIN GANG LEGS GNANG, DGUNG LO RE BDUN

PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN GSER

KHRI 'DZIN PA'I KHRI RABS BZHI BCU ZHE GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

(RGYAL DBANG CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS NAS SE RA THEG CHEN
GLING

DU CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA GSAN BZHES

MDZAD, RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BCU PA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO (1816-

1837) DANG, RGYAL BA SKU PHRENG BCU GCIG PA MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO

(1838-1855) SKU PHRENG GNYIS KYI MTSAN ZHABS KYI 'GAN

KHUR BZHES, KHONG GI RNAM THAR ZHIB TU MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS
SHIN TU

PHANGS SO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA 'BRUG RGYAL DBANG CHOS RJE
ZHES

BU'I

@405 PHRENG BA//, //RGYAL BA MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR
NGO MTSAR LHA YI

ROL MO DBYANGS CAN RGYUD DU SNYAN PA'I TA SPU RA//, //CHOS MNGON
PA

PHRENG

GONG MA RNAMS KYI SKYES RABS RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR NOR BU'I 'KHRI
SHING//

BCAS CHOS TSAN BCU DGU LONGS PA'I POD BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYAL MO GA-YU SGRA SNYING PO,)

MO TSA BA RONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, LO CHEN BEE RO TZA NAS RJES SU
BZUNG ZHING

MKHAS PA DANG GRUB PA'I PHUL DU PHYIN, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG
GNAS

LAS MAN NGAG LTA BA'I PHRENG BA SOGS ZHUS TE SKU GSER GYI RDO
RJER SPRUL

PA SOGS RDZU 'PHRUL SNA TSOGS STON NUS PA DANG, THEG MCHOG
RDZOGS

GYI ME LONG// LAS "GA-YU SGRA SNYING PO RTOGS PA'I MCHOG DANG

GI YA

GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1369 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG BYIS PA'I DUS KYI

DKON MCHOG BZANG PO ZHES ZHU, DGUNG LO DGU PAR PHYUGS 'TSO SA

NAS BROS TE BSAM GLING DU PHEBS SHING STON PA RIN CHEN BKRA SHIS
LAS

YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR BLA MA DPAL

'BAR DANG, MKHAN PO RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG, SLOB DPON RIN

CHEN RDO RJE GSUM LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL DKYUS GCIG TU

BSGRUBS TE MTSAN LA BZANG PO DPAL ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA

PAR AE'I CHOS GRVAR PHEBS TE BLA MA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN LAS
MNGON

PA KUN BTUS DANG, BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA, SPYOD 'JUG DBU MA

RIGS TSOGS BCAS LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS SA

SKYAR BYON TE BLA MA GZHON NU RGYAL MTSAN LAS TSAD MA SDE BDUN
DANG

PA'I SNYAN

@412 GRAGS RGYAS, DGUNG LO SUM CU THAM PAR MKHAN PO BYANG SEMS
RIN

CHEN DANG, BLA MA NAM MKHA' SANGS RGYAS, BLA MA KUN DGA' RGYAL

MTSAN GSUM LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR RTA

RA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS TE LO BDUN GYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS
SHING

'CHAD NYAN SPEL, KHONG GIS YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN BZHI BCU THAM PAR BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS THAMS

CAD KYI DGONGS PA MA LUS PA THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD DE BSHAD
SGRUB

GNYIS KA'I BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR GYUR TO, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON

LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA

BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS BDUN CU DON GSUM PA YIN NO, KHONG NI LAM RIM
BLA

MA'I

BCAS

CHOS TSAN BRGYA DANG BCO LNGA BZHUGS SO, ,

(RGYAL SRAS DON YOD CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DRUG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

DVAGS POR SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG

@413 DGUNG LO BZHI PAR RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS SKU GONG
MA'I SPRUL SKU

CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO'I YANG SRID DU THUGS THAG BCAD CING KHONG
LAS

RAB BYUNG ZHUS TE MTSAN LA DON YOD CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES 'DOGS
PAR

MDZAD, DE NAS DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG

GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHYEN
RAB

KYI KLONG BRDOL TE THOS PA RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL TU PHYIN, RGYAL
BA BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, GRUB
CHEN

THAR BA'I RGYAL MTSAN SOGS BLA MA DU MA LAS GDAMS NGAG GI TSOGS

BLANGS TE THUGS KYI BUM BZANG YONGS SU 'GENGS PAR MDZAD, PHYI

'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD DANG, NANG DU GSANG SNGAGS KYI NYAMS BZHES
LHUR

LEN PA RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I PHYAG SROL KHO NA MDZAD, CHOS LUGS
DANG

GRUB MTHA'I PHYOGS RIS LA BRTEN NAS YUL KHYAD PAR CAN LA SMOD PA
NI

RANG NGAN SONG SGRUB PA'I RGYU YIN GSUNGS NAS KUN LA DAG SNANG
PHYOGS

MED DU MDZAD, DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG GI MKHAN KHRI LA MNGA' BSGYUR
TE BLO

GSAL DON GNYER CAN GYI TSOGS LA ZAB PA DANG RGYA CHE BA'I CHOS
KYI

DGA' STON DGYES PAR MDZAD, DE NAS RGYAL BA YON TAN RGYA MTSO'I

BKA' LTAR MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SHING PHO
'BRUG LO

STE SPYI LO 1604 LOR DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD,

LO DER RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE'I GZIMS KHANG DANG, GRVA SHAG BRGYA
LHAG

TZAM, 'DU KHANG NYIS THOG RUNG KHANG DANG BCAS PA GRUB, DE LTAR
LO

DRUG GI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS NAS RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SA MO
BYA LO

@414 STE SPYI LO 1609 LONG DBUS SU PHEBS, MDO SMAD DU BZHUGS
RING DGON

LUNG GIS GTZOS PA'I DNGOS DANG BRGYUD PA'I DGON CHEN BCU GSUM,

SGRUB SDE BCU GSUM SOGS BTZUGS ZHES RNAM THAR LAS 'BYUNG LA, DE

DAG SO SOR YANG BSTAN PA'I RTZA BA GZHI GSUM GYI PHYAG LEN,
MTSAN

NYID KYI PO TI LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN SOGS MDZAD PA'I RGYUN DENG SANG
BAR DU

GONG 'PHEL DU YOD, MDO SMAD NAS BOD DU PHEBS TE PAn CHEN THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PAS DAM PA KHYED KYIS MDO KHAMS SU BSHAD SGRUB KYI
SDE

BTZUGS, BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON DPAG TU MED PA MDZAD

BKA' DRIN CHE ZHES PHYAG THAL MO SBYAR, DE LTAR SKU DNGOS KYI
GDUL BYA

RNAMS RDZOGS PA NA GDUL BYA RTAG 'DZIN CAN RNAMS CHOS LA BSKUL
BA'I PHYIR DU YA MTSAN PA'I LTAS DU MA DANG BCAS TE DGONGS PA
CHOS

KYI DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI
PHYAG

'DEBS PA YIN NO,

(RGYAL SRAS SPOM BRAG PA,)

KHONG NI SPOM BRAG PA BSOD NAMS RDO RJE DANG MI GCIG YIN

PAS DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

NGU'I

DUS NAS SNAR THANG DU PHEBS TE RAB TU BYUNG, RJE DGE 'DUN GRUB
PA

@415 LAS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL, RJE SHES RAB SENG GE LAS RIM LNGA'I
DMAR

KHRID, MKHAN CHEN DPAL BLO BA LAS DBU MA, PHAR PHYIN, 'DUL BA,

MNGON PA MDZOD SOGS GZHUNG MANG PO, RGYUD CHEN SBYIN PA DPAL BA
LAS

GSANG 'DUS SOGS GSAN PAR MDZAD, GZHAN YANG RGYUD PA GRAGS PA

BZANG PO DANG, CHOS RJE BA SO BA SOGS LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS
MANG

DU GSAN TE MDO RGYUD YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I MAN NGAG RGYA MTSO'I
MNGA'

BDAG TU GYUR, DE NAS BYAMS PA GLING DU GDAN SA MDZAD DE YUN RING

BZHUGS RJES SMAD RGYUD DU PHEBS, KHONG SMAD RGYUD KYI KHRI LA
BZHUGS

'DOD YOD KYANG RGYUD PA'I DBU MDZAD DON YOD KYIS SLOB DPON BKRA

SHIS RGYAL MTSAN RGYUD KHRIR BSKO BZHAG MDZAD PAS THUGS CUNG ZAD
MA

RANGS PA'I TSUL GYIS RGYUD PA'I NANG RTEN MGON PO'I ZHAL THANG
DANG KA

P'A LI BSNAMS TE DBUS STOD DU BYON, DE NAS RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN

MDZAD SKABS THOG MAR SLOB DPON DRUG DANG, RJES SU RIM GYIS

'DUL BA 'DZIN PA SO GNYIS 'DUS PA BYUNG BAS GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I

LHA GRANGS DANG MNYAM PA'I RTEN 'BREL 'GRIGS PAS, DGUNG LO NGA

DRUG PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1474
LOR DBUS

KYI RGYUD STOD GRVA TSANG PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD CING 'PHRIN LAS SHIN
TU RGYAS

TE GRVA TSOGS MANG DU 'DUS SO, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BRGYAD PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI GRAGS CHE BA'I SLOB
MA

NI RGYUD PA LHA RIN PA DANG, CHOS RJE YES BRTZE BA, SLOB DPON
DPAL

LDAN 'OD ZER BCAS YIN NO, ,

@416 (RGYUD CHEN SBYIN PA DPAL BZANG,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG GIS RJE

SHES RAB SENG GE (1383-1445) SOGS YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I

SLOB DPON MANG DU BSTEN TE MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR

SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHAS PA'I GTZUG RGYAN DU
GYUR,

RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1445 LOR RGYUD
SMAD KYI

BLA MA MDZAD NAS 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR BSKYANGS SO, RNAM THAR ZHIB
TU

MA MJAL BAS SHIN TU PHANGS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RGYUD KYI
RGYAL PO

DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYA CHER BSHAD PA SGRON MA GSAL BAR
BYED

PA'I tIKKA//BCAS POD GCIG BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI RGYUD SMAD PA'I
BLA

RABS GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

(RGYUD CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS 'PHAGS PA,)

NI LHUN PO RTZE YIN, KHONG GIS RJE CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO LAS
RGYUD 'GREL

SOGS GSAN SBYANGS MDZAD DE LHUN PO RTZER PHEBS, RJE SHES RAB
SENG GE

(1383-1445) SOGS LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PA MDZAD CING SRAD RGYUD
KYI BLA

MAR BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR BSKYANGS SO, RNAM THAR ZHIB TU

MA MJAL BAS SHIN TU PHANGS SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RGYUD
KYI RGYAL

@417 SGRON GTER GYI BANG MDZOD 'BYED PA'I LDE MIG MKHAS PA DGA'
BYED//

BCAS POD GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,KHONG NI SRAD RGYUD PA'I BLA RABS

DGU BA YIN NO, ,

(RGYUD NE RGAN PA BLO BZANG CHOS DBYINGS,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI RONG BO'I RTZA BA YIN ZHING MTSAN GZHAN LA STAG SDONG DKAR PO
ZHU'O,

KHONG DBUS SU PHEBS NAS SE RA BYES PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR
ZHUGS NAS

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, RGYAL DBANG

LNGA BA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA ZHUS, DE NAS RANG YUL DU
PHEBS

SHING RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1694 LOR BYA

KHYUNG GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS GDAN SA LO GNYIS KYI RING
DU

BSKYANGS TE 'CHAD NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL ZHING BLA BRANG KHANG DKAR
BZHUGS

KHRI DANG BCAS PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS STAG SDONG
DKAR PO'I RI KHROD GSAR BSKRUN DANG GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN BRTEN
PA

BZHENGS, DE NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NA MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA'

BA'O, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI KHYA DGE DPON SLOB DANG
STAG

TSANG DPON SLOB BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI CHOS RJE DON
GRUB

RIN CHEN GYI RNAM THAR DANG, LTA BA'I SKYONG TSUL, DAM CAN GSOL
KHA,

GZHI BDAG DMAR BA'I BSANG MCHOD SOGS POD CHUNG GCIG TZAM

BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS
NYI

@418 SHU RTZA LNGA PA YIN NO, ,

(RGYUS SMON LAM GRAGS PA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD
YUL

NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA

MDZAD CING, DE NAS KHA CHE DANG, BAL YUL, RGYA GAR SOGS SU

PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING RGYA GZHUNG
DANG RGYA

YIG BCAS LA SLOB GNYER LEGS PAR MDZAD NAS BSTAN BCOS GCIG

BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI//BKA'
'GYUR//

LAS//DPAL BDE MCHOG SDOM PA 'BYUNG BA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO CHEN

LE'U SUM CU SO GSUM PA BZHUGS SO, ,

(SGIS STENG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN,)

1881

LOR MDO SMAD REB KONG TSO 'DU'I YUL DU YAB SKU DBON CHOS MDZAD

DRUG PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1944 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
BYIS PA'I

MING LA PADMA BKRA SHIS SU GSOL, DGUNG LO BCU PAR SGIS STENG
DGA'

LDAN CHOS 'PHEL GYI SGRUB GRAR ZHUGS TE, GLANG GYA'I LHA RAMS PA
BLO

BZANG CHOS GRAGS LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG BAR MA RAB BYUNG SNGON DU
'GRO

BA'I SGO NAS TSIGS SNGA MA DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS SHING MTSAN
LA BLO

BZANG DPAL LDAN ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR RJE ZHVA

@419 DMAR PAndI TA DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DANG, GRUB
DBANG

'JIGS MED BSAM GTAN, TSO 'DU'I YONGS 'DZIN BYANG CHUB KUN

SPANGS BLO BZANG BSTAN PA BCAS LAS THUN MONG GI RIG GNAS DANG,

SGOS SU MDO SNGAGS KYI BKA' CHOS DBANG LUNG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG

LO NYI SHU THAM PAR RAB BYUNG MKHAN PO SEMS DPA' CHEN PO BLO
BZANG

CHOS GRAGS LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA MNOS, LO DER DUS 'KHOR

SNGAGS CHEN MTSO BYUNG DGYES PA'I DPAL LAS DBYANGS CAN SGRA MDO
DANG

SDEB SBYOR RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS BCAS LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD PAS KUN

BSHAD KYI MTSAN LA MI PHAM MTSO BYUNG BZHAD PA'I LANG TSO ZHES
GSOL,

DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR LDE'I TSA BKRA SHIS CHOS SDINGS SU PHEBS,

PAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO LNGA BAR STAG RDO DANG, SGA SAR, KA RING,

RDZONGS DKAR SOGS SU PHEBS NAS CHOS KYI SBYIN PA RGYA CHER
BTANG,

SKYABS

@421 SKUR THUGS THAG BCAD CING SGO MANG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DGUNG
LO BCU

GSUNG

BZHI BZHUGS,

@422 LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1907 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN
PAR

TSUL KHRIMS BYAMS PA LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS BCAS
LA

BYANG BAR MDZAD, DE NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG GSANG
CHEN

RGYUD SDE BZHI BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD DE RDO

PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR KHRI CHEN BLO

BZANG MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG PO'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PAR MES RGYAL NANG
KHUL

DU RBA YER BLA MAR PHEBS TE SMAD PHYOGS KYI CHOS SDE KHAG LA MDO
SNGAGS

KYI CHOS 'KHRO BSKOR, DGUNG LO NGA GCIG PAR GZHUNG SA CHEN PO'I

DGE'I

@423 (SGO MANG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO

DANG, YUM DBAL SHUL DKON MCHOG SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

LOR

DGON LUNG DU SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO GSUM PAR PAn CHEN DPAL

LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS SGO MANG CHOS DAR GYI YAN SRID DU NGOS
'DZIN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR TIG GYA DKON MCHOG KLOG GI YI GE'I 'BRI

KLOG LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS

BZHAD SKU PHRENG GSUM PA BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA
MTSO

LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA STABS GCIG TU MNOS,

DNGUL RA'I BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO DANG, DBAL MANG DKON MCHOG

BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR BLA BRANG THOS

NYER

@424 TE DAM PA'I CHOS KYI SBYIN PA TSAD MED BSTZAL, KHONG GI
GSUNG RTZOM NI

DRIS LAN, GSOL 'DEBS, SGRUB THABS SOGS CHOS TSAN BZHI BCU

ZHE LNGA YOD PA DE PO TI GNYIS SU BSDUS NAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(SGO ME DGE BSHES GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI RMA CHU'I 'GRAM HOR KY'A SDE BA YIN PAS HOR KY'A GRAGS RGAN
TSANG YANG

ZHU, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON PA'I SKABS SU DBUS SU PHEBS NAS 'BRAS

SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA
THOS BSAM

NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS RANG YUL DU BYON TE RONG BO GRUB CHEN

SHAR SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO LA BSTEN TE LAM RIM BLO SBYONG SOGS
RGYU PHAR PHYIN

THEG PA'I GDAMS PA GSAN BZHES MDZAD, SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA GRVA
TSANG

GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING SNGAGS KYI SA LAM YAN LAG DANG BCAS PAR

THUGS GNYER KHYAD THON GNANG, SLAR YANG DBUS GTZANG PHYOGS SU
BYON

GTUGS NAS 'BRAS BU GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I THUN MONG DANG
THUN

MONG MA YIN PA'I MAN NGAG SMIN BYED DANG BCAS PA BUM PA GANG
BYO'I

MDZAD DANG, RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRIR RIM GYIS BZHUGS SHING

ZHIB

MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO GLANG LO STE
SPYI LO

KHRI RABS BCU GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

NGU'I

GZHUNG SOGS LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, LHAG PAR DU BU STON

@426 //RMI LAM BRTAG PA// BCAS CHOS TSAN LNGA BCU NGA GCIG
BZHUGS SO, ,

(SGRUB KHANG PA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO

1641 LOR MNGA' RIS ZANGS DKAR DU YAB GU RU DKON MCHOG DANG,

YUM BU MO MCHOG GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS

PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1713 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG BYIS
PA'I DUS

KYI MING LA DMIGS ZA ZHES ZHU, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR YAB GSHEGS
SHING YUM

YANG NAD KYIS ZIN NAS LO BCU BDUN GYI BAR DU BSNYUN GA-YOG LEGS

PAR MDZAD CING YUM YANG GSHEGS, DE NAS BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS

TE SLOB DPON BLO BZANG LEGS PA LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS

SHING LO GNYIS KYI RING DU DPE CHAR SBYANGS, DE NAS SHANGS RGOD
TSANG

DU PHEBS TE DRUNG PA BRTZON 'GRUS RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB BYUNG DANG
DGE

TSUL DKYUS GCIG TU BSGRUBS SHING MTSAN LA DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO
ZHES

GSOL, BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN DVAGS PO GRVA TSANG DU PHEBS TE RJE
BTZUN

BLO GROS BRTAN PA DANG LHA SDINGS BLO BZANG DON GRUB SOGS LA
BSTEN

NAS BSDUS GZHUNG DANG, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA,

'DUL BA, MNGON PA MDZOD BCAS LA LO BCU DRUG GI BAR DU SBYANGS

TE MKHAS PA'I PHUL DU PHYIN NAS RGOD TSANG DU PHEBS SHING DRUNG
PA BRTZON

DAM

CHOS RGYAL MTSAN LAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM DANG, DBEN SA SNYAN

BRGYUD, DGA' LDAN PHYAG CHEN, N'A RO CHOS DRUG SOGS KYI DBANG

@427 LUNG KHRID GSUM GSAN ZHING SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, RDO
RJE 'DZIN

PA DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN LAS GSANG BDE 'JIGS DANG, SNAR

THANG BRGYA RTZA, SGRUB THABS DU MA'I DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM
ZHUS, DE

NAS RJE RTA PHUG PA'I BKA' LTAR DBUS SU BYON TE SE RA'I RGYAB
KYI SGRUB

KHANG DU BZHUGS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA'I YON

TAN LA MNGA' BRNYES, DE NAS RGYAL KHAMS 'GRIMS TE BLA MA RIN
CHEN

DON GRUB DANG, RE SGO AA TZA RA, ZHAL SNGA CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO,
HOR

DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DON GRUB, SLOB DPON BYAMS PA CHOS LDAN

SOGS LAS GCOD SKOR GTZO BOR MDZAD PA'I DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG

MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, SLAR SE RA'I RGYAB KYI SGRUB KHANG DU PHEBS
TE

SGRUB SDE GSAR 'DZUGS MDZAD NAS DGE SLONG MANG PO'I TSOGS PA

BSKYANGS SHING SGRUB BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA DAR BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO
RE

DRUG PAR PHUR LCOG TU DGE 'DUN NYI SHU LONGS PA'I SGRUB SDE
BTZUGS,

RA KHA BRAG TU SGRUB SDE GSAR BA ZHIG PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD, SGRUB
SDE GSUM

GAR BCA' YIG KYANG BZHAG STE CHOS KHRIMS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS SHING

DGUNG LO DON GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG

GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA DANG,
MKHAR

RDO BZOD PA RGYA MTSO, RGYUD SMAD MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG MCHOG
LDAN,

KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS BCAS YIN LA, GSUNG RTZOM NI //MGUR

MA// BCAS BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS
LNGA

BCU NGA GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

@428 (SGRUB KHANG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS NAS SE RA THEG CHEN
GLING DU

CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA GSAN BSAM PHUL

DU PHYIN PA MDZAD, RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO (1708-1751)

DANG RVA SGRENG KHRI SPRUL BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS (1759-1816) SOGS

LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KYI CHOS GZHUNG MANG DU GSAN,
KHONG

,KHONG

(SGRO CHOS BRTZON,)

DANG

MNGON RTOGS GNYIS, MDO RGYAS 'BRING GDAMS NGAG RNAMS GSAN,

DE NAS DING RI LA BYON TE PHA DAM PA SANGS RGYAS DANG MJAL ZHING
SHER

PHYIN LA SOGS PA'I CHOS RNAMS RGYUGS PHUL BAS SHIN TU DGYES PAR

GYUR, PHA DAM PAS KYANG 'PHAGS PA BRGYAD STONG LA SOGS PA'I CHOS

RNAM RDZOGS PAR GNANG, DE NAS LAN PA SE GSEB TU LO NGO NYI SHU
RTZA

DGU'I BAR DU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS

POD BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,

(NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1836 LOR

DENG KAN LHO'I ZH'A HO (BSANG CHU) RDZONG LA GTOGS PA'I KHA GYA
STOD MA

ZHANG GI KHA GYA'I 'BO RA ZHES PA'I SDE GRONG DU YAB MGON PO DON
GRUB

DANG, YUM SGROL MA 'TSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG BCO

LNGA PA'I SA MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1889 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
BYIS PA'I

DUS KYI MTSAN LA 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES 'BOD, DGUNG

LO DRUG PAR KUN MKHYEN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS

NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS KYI SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG, BSAM

GTAN RGYA MTSO'I MDUN NAS YI GE'I 'PRI KLOG DANG CHO GA PHYAG
LEN

BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR GDAN SA BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE RANG SGAR GYI GDAN SAR 'KHOD CING, KUN

MKHYEN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO LAS RAB BYUNG
DANG

DGE TSUL BSGRUBS TE MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO
ZHES

GSOL, DE NAS THOS GLING GI GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE BSDUS GRVA
DANG,

LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO, 'GREL CHUNG DON GSAL RNAMS LA SBYANGS TE

KUN MKHYEN MCHOG GI MDUN NAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO ZHE
BZHI

@439 BAR DBUS GTZANG DU PHEBS TE, DGON GNAS SO SO LA PHYAG MCHOD

MANG 'GYED RGYA CHER PHUL, RGYAL PAn YAB SRAS MJAL ZHING BKA'
CHOS

MANG DU ZHUS, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA BAR MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE BKRA
SHIS SGO

MANG GI MKHAN PO MDZAD NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA'

BAR MDZAD, TSUL 'DI LA SKABS DE'I MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO ZHANG

STON RDO RJE 'CHANG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSOS "DGAG SGRUB GNANG GSUM
RLABS

PHRENG CHER GA-YO BA'I, 'DUL GZHUNG RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL LEGS
PHYIN CING,

SGRA SNYAN SDEB SBYOR THA SNYAD RIG PA'I GZHUNG, MA LUS KUN
BYANG CHUB LA

GSOL BA 'DEBS, ZHES DANG, RNAM DPYOD THOGS PA MED PA'I

NAM MKHA'I KLONG, SBYANGS STOBS YON TAN SPRIN SNGON ROL BA LAS,

LEGS BSHAD DBYAR RNGA DAL GYIS RGOD PA YIS, MKHAS DGU'I YID

RAB 'PHROG LA GSOL BA 'DEBS," ZHES BSNGAGS PA NI DON LA GNAS

SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI GZHUNG 'GREL DANG, RNAM THAR, GSOL

'DEBS, BSTOD TSOGS, BSLAB BYA, MGUR MA, SNYAN NGAG ZIN

BRIS, BYANG CHUB LAM RIM SOGS BSTAN BCOS BRGYAD CUR NYE BA'I PO

TI LNGA BZHUGS SO,

(NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO

1660 LOR GSER LJONGS KHRI KA'I YUL GYI GNAS BDAG SRIN PO'I LHA

ZHOL YANG BZANG CHOS TSA NAS SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
PA'I

SA PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1728 LOR SKU GSHEGS, LA MO'I SKU
PHRENG GSUM@440 PA YIN, RGYAL DBANG LNGA BAS LA MO BLO GROS RGYA MTSO'I
YANG SPRUL DU NGOS

'DZIN GNANG ZHING KHONG LAS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM
PA'ANG

MNOS, DE NAS HOR SMIN GROL CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG, KUN MKHYEN

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA, KHRI CHEN DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA, LA MO

GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO SOGS MTSAN LDAN GYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN LNGA
BCU

LHAG TZAM LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS RAB 'BYAMS LA GSAN

BZHES RLABS CHEN MDZAD, GONG MA KHANG ZHI'I KHRI LO ZHE BZHI
BA'I LOR

PE CIN DU PHEBS PAS BDAG RKYEN SPAM MTHO BA DANG SBRAGS TSA KAN
NO

MIN HAN GYI CHO LO'I GZENGS BSTOD DANG GSER YIG 'JA' SA GNANG,

DBUS GTZANG DU SNGA PHYI LAN LNGA TZAM BYON, KHYAD PAR DU RGYAL
DBANG

BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO LA MO'I SGAR GZHUNG AU RGE KHAMS GSUM RNAM
RGYAL

DU GDAN DRANGS TE, BKA' GDAMS PHA CHOS BU CHOS SOGS KYI DBANG

LUNG MAN NGAG BDUD RTZI'I TSOGS KYIS THUGS KYI BUM BZANG YONGS
SU

GTAMS PAR MDZAD CING RGYAL DBANG MCHOG GI GTZUG PHUD KYANG BZHES

SO, BKA' DRIN ZAB PHYIR GONG MAS AA CHI THU NO MIN HAN ZHES PA'I

MTSAN SNYAN DANG LUNG LAS KYIS GZENGS BSTOD MDZAD DO, GCAN TSA'I

LA MO BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING NGAM, RGYA NAG GONG MAS DGE
TSOGS

GLING ZHES BSNGAGS PA'I CHOS SDE CHEN PO GSAR DU BTAB, DER LA MO

BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS DANG ZHVA DMAR NGAG DBANG 'PHRIN LAS SOGS
MKHAS

CHEN DU MAS YONGS SU BSKYANGS PAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA'I 'CHAD

MNYAN LA 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA ZHIG BYUNG, GDAN SA 'DI NAS KHRI CHEN
BLO

@441 BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DANG, ZHVA DMAR PA ndI TA, THAR
SHUL RIN

PO CHE SOGS MKHAS GRUB GSER RI'I PHRENG BA TSAR DU DNGAR BA MANG
DU

BYON, KHONG GIS JO BO LO KE SHVA RA, RJE NGA 'DRA MA, RTZE'I
SGROL MA

GSUNG 'BYON MA BYAMS PA CHOS 'KHOR MA SOGS RTEN RTZA CHEN KHAL
RGYAB

SUM BRGYA LHAG GDAN DRANGS PAS LA MO'I RTEN MDZOD CHEN MO ZHES
PA'I

SNYAN GRAGS YOD KYANG RIG GNAS GSAR BRJE SKABS SU MED PAR

BTANG, GSER GDUNG KHRU GSUM BZHENGS PA DE SGAR GZHUNG TSOMS

CHEN DU BZHUGS KYANG SPYI TSOGS BSGYUR BKOD BYED SKABS MI DMANGS

SRID GZHUNG LA RTZIS SPRAD DO, ,

(NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO

1750 LOR DA LTA'I KAN LHO'I CO NE RDZONG GI NYIN PA ZHANG GI
'BROG SDE

CHEN POR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING MO YOS LO
STE SPYI

LO 1795 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR GONG MA RAB 'BYAMS

PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING KHONG
NYID KYI

MDUN NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS PA MA ZAD, CHOS SPYOD PHAL
CHER

DANG, BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM, KUN RIG TSE MCHOG CHOS

SKYONG SKOR RNAMS ZHIB TU SBYANGS SHING BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD PAS
MKHYEN RAB

KYI KLONG BRDOL, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR KIRTI BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, DAG YIG SNYAN NGAG MNGON BRJOD

SOGS THA SNYAD RIG PAR BSLABS NAS MKHAS PAR GYUR PAS YUL DE'I

@442 SER SKYA RNAMS KYIS GTZUG RGYAN DU BKUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU
THAM PA LA

SLAR YANG KIRTI BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI
SDOM PA

MNOS, DGUNG LO NYER DGU BAR DBUS SU GNAS MJAL DU PHEBS,

DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR KHONG NYID KYI GDAN SA LUNG BZANG RI KHROD
DGA'

LDAN BYANG CHUB CHOS 'PHEL GLING (THE BO STOD DU YOD,) DU 'DU
KHANG

GSAR PA BZHENGS, RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM DANG GONG MA BLO BZANG BSAM

GTAN MCHOG GI GSUNG RNAMS GRVA MANG RNAMS LA BSHAD KHRID MDZAD
TSUL

HA CANG MKHAS PAS SKYA SER MCHOG DMAN MTHA' DAG GI YID RANG

DBANG MED PAR 'PHROG STE TSOGS DANG CHOS GRVA 'DZIN SKYOR MTHA'
DAG

LA SKUL MA CHEN PO THEBS SO, KHONG GI SKU TSE 'DI LA SGRUB PA
NYAMS LEN

GTZO BOR MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' BA LAGS SO, ,

(NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG,)

KHONG NI BSAM BLO SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(NGAG DBANG DBANG RGYAL,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI SHAR BA YIN, KHONG BYIS PA'I DUS SU KHRI CHEN BLO GROS RGYA
MTSO MJAL

ZHING RAB TU BYUNG NA PHYIS SU BZANG BO ZHIG YONG ZHES LUNG
BSTAN, KHONG

LA GTZUG PHUD TZAM PHUL NAS MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG ZHES

BTAGS, DUS YUN RING PO MA 'GOR BAR LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO

BZANG CHOS LDAN LAS RAB TU BYUNG BA'I TSUL KHRIMS MNOS, DGUNG LO

@443 NYER GCIG PAR DBUS SU BYON TE 'BRAS SGO MANG DU ZHUGS NAS
DGE

'DUN PHUN TSOGS SOGS LA BSTEN ZHING, GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA

THUGS GNYER LEGS PAR MDZAD DE GSANG PHUR DKA' BCU'I MING

BTAGS 'DZIN, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS MDZAD, DE

NAS MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE CHOS BZANG RI KHROD DU YUN RING BZHUGS

NAS THUGS DAM ZAB MO'I NYAMS LEN GTZO BOR MDZAD SKABS DGON

LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN
MDZAD,

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1737 LOR
DGON

LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO GSUM GYI
RING DU

GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGON PA'I 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS

'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM GANG LEGS GNANG ZHING, JA TSUL SOGS

KYI THEBS SU JA SBAG LNGA BCU, DNGUL SRANG NYIS BRGYA BCAS SPYI
'JOG

MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING DANG M'A THI ZI DGON
PA'I BLA

MA YANG MDZAD, KHONG NI DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN SA'I

MKHAN RABS NYI SHU RTZA DGU PA YIN NO, ,

(NGAG DBANG SBYIN PA TSUL KHRIMS,)

KHONG NI LA PHYI KUN BZANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO DANG MI GCIG YIN

PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

AA MDO'I GCAN TSA'I NANG STOD YIN, MTSAN GZHAN LA YE SHES RGYA
MTSO

@444 ZHES ZHU'O, KHONG GI GRVA SA SE RA BYES PA GRVA TSANG YIN,
RAB BYUNG BCU

GNYIS PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1689 LOR BYA KHYUNG DGON
PA'I

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO DRUG GI RING DU GDAN SA
BSKYANGS,

DE'I RING DU 'CHAD NYAN SHIN TU 'PHEL, RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA'I SKU
PAR

DANG, GZUNGS GZHUG KUN RIG GI CHO GA MNGON RTOGS RGYAN RNAMS

KYI PAR SHING GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD DE, 'DI DAG NI CHOS SDE 'DI PA'I

PAR SHING GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD PA'I THOG MA YIN PAR MNGON, BLA
BRANG

KHANG DMAR BZHUGS KHRI DANG BCAS PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, KHRI

ZUR NAS GCAN TSA'I BRAG LUNG DGON PA BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING GSAR

'DEBS MDZAD, KHONG NI GCAN RONG GRVA RGYUN NANG NAS BLA MAR
BSKOS

PA'I DANG PO YIN, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB

CING DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS NAS GDUNG LA BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN KHRU TSAD MA GSER SHOG
GI

RTZI CAN ZHIG BZHENGS, KHONG NI BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I
MKHAN

RABS NYI SHU RTZA BZHI PA YIN NO, ,

(NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS DBANG PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1559 LOR

SA SKYAR YAB SNGAGS 'CHANG NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' RIN CHEN DANG YUM

BSOD NAMS LEGS 'DZOMS DKAR MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1621 LOR DGE
SDINGS

CHOS KYI PHO BRANG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BZHI LNGA TZAM
NAS YI

@445 GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG YI DAM CHOS SKYONG SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG
MAN NGAG

MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR SPYAN SNGA NGAG DBANG CHOS

GRAGS LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU
BZHES

SHING DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR SA SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN PO'I KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU

DGU PAR CHOS RJE NAM MKHA' DBANG PHYUG SOGS LAS BSNYEN PAR

RDZOGS, NGOR CHEN DKON MCHOG DPAL LDAN LAS GSHED DMAR LHA

LNGA'I DBANG SOGS DANG, YAB CHEN SNGAGS 'CHANG LAS GSUNG NGAG

SPYAN SNGA 'JAM DBYANGS DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO LAS LAM 'BRAS GLEGS

BAM SOGS GSAN, GZHAN YANG SEMS DPA' CHOS KYI 'OD ZER, RJE

LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO, RJE GZHON NU BLO GROS, GTER STON RIN PO CHE

SOGS LA BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS DANG GRUB MTHA' SO SO'I

CHOS SKOR BCAS PO TI BRGYA DANG BCU GCIG TZAM LA SBYANGS PAR
MDZAD,

DE NAS DGE SDINGS BKRA SHIS BSAM GRUB DANG, BYAS 'GYUR RDO RJE'I

BRAG RDZONG, PHU RI GLANG BRAG GI RI KHROD SOGS SU PHEBS TE
SGRUB PA

NYAMS LEN LA THUGS DAM GZHOL BAS RTOGS PA'I YON TAN LA MNGA'

BRNYESS, DE NAS BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON RNAMS CHOS SRID

GNYIS KYI SGO NAS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS TE DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM

PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SA SKYA'I GDAN

SA CHEN PO'I KHRI RABS NYI SHU RTZA GSUM PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG
RTZOM

NI //DGES PA RDO RJE'I SGRUB THABS KYI RNAM BSHAD// DANG,
//GSUNG NGAG

@446 GI KHRID YIG//, //RANG RIG DBANG BSKUR GYI SGOM TSUL GCIG
SHES

KUN GROL//, //DRIS LAN BSTAN PA RGYAS BYED//, //SLOB DPON
PADMA'I

RNAM THAR//, //SNGAGS 'CHANG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BSTOD PA//,
//GNAS

CHEN RNAMS KYI BSTOD PA//, //GDAMS PA'I SKOR// DU MA, //GSOL

'DEBS KYI SKOR// BCAS MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(NGAN LAM RGYAL BA MCHOG DBYANGS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU DBU

RU 'PHAN YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING GDUNG RUS NGAN LAM YIN, RGYAL

PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI CHOS BLON YIN, BOD LUGS SHING MO YOS
LO STE

SPYI LO 775 LOR MKHAN PO BO DHI SA TVA LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING
BOD KYI CHOS

'BYUNG LO RGYUS THOG TU YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I SAD MI MI BDUN GYI
YA GYAL

ZHIG YIN, KHONG SKU SHIN TU BTZUN PAR GRAGS TE //SBA BZHED// LAS

"BTZUN PA'I RAB NI NGAN LAM LHA LUNG GNYIS," ZHES GSUNGS SO,
KHONG

GIS YI DAM RTA MGRIN LA BCOL NAS DBEN RTZAR SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS

YUL GSUM GYAD DU GYUR TE DBU GTZUG NAS RTA MGO THON ZHING RTA
SKAD

'TSER BA BYUNG STE TSE YI RIG 'DZIN BRNYES SO, //GRUB MTHA' SHEL
GYI

ME LONG// LAS "RGYAL BA MCHOG DBYANGS RTA SKAD THENGS GSUM
THON,"

ZHES GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI RJE DANG 'BANGS NYER LNGA NANG GI YA
GYAL

ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //'PHAGS
PA

'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG YI GE DRUG PA'I SGRUB THABS YID BZHIN NOR
BU//

BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

@447 (NGAM TA RA KLU GONG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI BLON PO YIN,
BAN BON

GNYIS KYI BAR LA CHOS KYI RTZOD GLENG BYUNG SKABS KHONG GIS BON
GYI KHA

'DZIN DANG SHAGS 'DEBS PA MDZAD NAS RTZOD PA LAS BON CHOS

KHUNGS NGAN LA GTAN TSIGS CHUNG BA DANG, BAN CHOS TE SANGS RGYAS

CHOS LUGS NI KHUNGS BTZAN ZHING GTAN TSIGS RGYA CHE BAS PHYIN
CHAD

BOD DU BON CHOS DOR NAS BAN CHOS TE SANGS RGYAS CHOS LUGS BYA'O

ZHES KHA 'CHAMS NAS RGYAL KHAMS KUN LA DRIL BSGRAGS SO, ,

(NGAM RDZONG RAS PA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS MGO TZAM LA

MDO KHRA LCIM LUNG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I GRUB THOB PA ZHIG YIN,
GDUNG

RUS NGAM RDZONG YIN, KHONG BYAMS CHOS LDE LNGA LA SHIN TU MKHAS
PAR

SBYANGS PAS NGAM RDZONG STON PA'ANG ZHU, KHONG GIS RJE BTZUN MI
LA'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS GDAMS NGAG RNAMS RDZOGS PAR THOB, RJE

BTZUN MI LA'I BKA' LA BSDU BA'ANG MDZAD, KHONG GIS GUNG THANG
RAS

PA LA BDE MCHOG GI SNYAN BRGYUD RDZOGS PAR GNANG, KHONG NI RJE
BTZUN

MI LA'I SLOB MA RAS CHEN BRGYAD KYI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI
SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI GUNG THANG RAS PA DANG, GNYAL BA GSUNG BCAD PA

NYI MA SENG GE BCAS YIN, ,

(NGOR RJE RAS PA,)

@448 KHONG NI BAL BU GONG BA DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

(NGO SHES LHA RAMS PA DON GRUB CHOS GRAGS,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, SKU 'BUM

MCHOD GZHIS KLU 'BUM NGO SHES SDE BAR YAB PADMA TSE BRTAN DANG
YUM TSE

RING SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG YONGS 'DZIN
RDO RJE

'CHANG NYA KY'A LHA RAMS PA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS KYI DRUNG NAS
RAB BYUNG

BSGRUBS, YANG KY'A RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB SLOB DPON

DU BSTEN NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA
BYANG

BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING

GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL LA SLOB GNYER MING
TZAM MA

YIN PAR RIGS LUNG SHAN SBYAR GYIS BRDAR SHA CHOD NGES MDZAD,
SKYABS

RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MDUN NAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES,

DE NAS DBUS GTZANG PHYOGS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA
TSANG

GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING BSHES GNYEN MKHAS PA'I DED DPON LA
BRTEN

NAS PO TI PHYI MA BZHI'I DKA' GNAD MA 'DRES PAR 'BYED PA'I THOS

BSAM MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD DE LHA RAMS PA'I MING BTAGS 'DZIN,

RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE GONG MA BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG THOGS MED
BSTAN

'DZIN RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, DPAL LDAN
SMAD

RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE GSANG CHEN LAM GYI RIM PA
LA SBYANGS

PA PHUL DU BYUNG BAR MDZAD, DE NAS RANG GI GRVA SA SKU 'BUM DU
PHEBS

@449 SHING RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO
1892 LOR SMAN PA

DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS GRVA TSANG
TSUL

BZHIN BSKYANGS, LO DER SMAN PA BLA BRANG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD,

KHRI ZUR NAS KYANG SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD
DO,

KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS LNGA BCU NGA
DGU PA

YIN NO, ,

(NGOR CHEN KUN DGA' BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I CHU PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1382
LOR

DPAL SA SKYAR YAB GRUB PA YON TAN DANG, YUM BSOD NAMS DPAL

LDAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYUD PA'I ME
PHO BYI LO

STE SPYI LO 1456 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR CHOS RJE YE
SHES

RGYAL MTSAN LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG SBYONG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO DGU

PAR YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA

BLANGS, DE NAS RIM GYIS CHOS RJE YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN LAS DGE
SLONG

DANG, BYANG SEMS, GSANG SNGAGS KYI SDOM PA BLANGS, MDO SNGAGS

KYI GZHUNG LA MKHAS PAR GYUR PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU SA SKYA'I
LUGS

KYI CHO GA DANG PHYAG LEN THAMS CAD THUGS SU CHUD, DGUNG LO NYER

LNGA PAR SHANGS CHOS 'KHOR SGANG DU BYON NAS LO TZ'A BA SKYABS
MCHOG

DANG, ZHE DGON DU BYON NAS BU DH'A SHR'I LAS CHOS MANG DU GSAN,
DE

NAS SA BZANG DGON DU BYON NAS SA BZANG BLA MA GZHON NU BLO GROS
LAS

CHOS YUN RING DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR SA BZANG BLA MA'I@450 BKA' LTAR SA BZANG DGON PA'I GDAN SA LO BCU DGU BAR DU

BSKYANGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE DGU PAR NA BZA' PHUG RI KHROD DANG,

BSAM GLING RI KHROD, AE RI KHROD SOGS SU PHEBS NAS SGRUB PA
NYAMS

LEN MDZAD, DE NAS AE WAm RI KHROD DU GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, THUB

SKU GSER ZHUN MA, BKA' 'GYUR GSER BRIS GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD

CING, BSHAD GRVA BTZUGS PA SOGS MDZAD NAS NGOR AE WAM CHOS LDAN

GYI GDAN SA CHEN PO GSAR DU BTAB, SKU TSE GANG BOR GZHAN DON

'BA' ZHIG MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI SA SKYA'I GDUNG RGYUD BZHI THOG PA KUN DGA'
DBANG PHYUG

DANG, BDAG CHEN CHU MIG PA BLO GROS DBANG PHYUG NGOR MKHAN PO

DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN, GZHON NU RGYAL MTSAN, DBANG PHYUG GRAGS

BZANG SOGS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR
MA'I

BSTOD PA// DANG, //THOB YIG RGYA MTSO//, //SPRING YIG SLOB MA LA

PA// BCAS AE WAm BKA' 'BUM ZHES POD BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I ME MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1497
LOR

GTZANG SA SKYAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I LCAGS MO GLANG
LO STE SPYI

LO 1541 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO GZHON DUS NAS BOD YIG GI

SBYOR KLOG SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR RJE

DKON MCHOG 'PHEL GYI MDUN NAS DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM

@451 NAS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, DE NAS NGOR PA'I GDAN SA
BZUNG STE

'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS BSTAN PA BSKYANGS NAS DUS 'DA' BAR

MDZAD DO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RJE DKON MCHOG LA BSTOD PA

RGYAN ME TOG DKAR PO'I PHRENG BA// SOGS SNYAN NGAG GI SKOR DANG,
//SA

SKYA'I GDUNG RABS YA RABS KYI KHA RGYAN// SOGS RNAM THAR LO

SKOR, //SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA'I RTZIS MKHAS PA'I KHA RGYAN//
SOGS
