SO, ,

(RDO STON SHES RAB GRAGS PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1127 LOR

SHAB KYI DRANG MDA'I THU LUNG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GSUM
PA'I SHING MO

SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1185 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGE BSHES SHA RA BA
CHEN

POS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS NAS BKA' GDAMS KYI CHOS PHYOGS THAMS

CAD THUGS SU CHUD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU'I THOG NAS SNAR THANG GI

GDAN SA MDZAD DE DGUNG LO LNGA BCU RTZA DGU'I BAR LO NGO NYI
SHU'I RING

DU TSOGS DPON MDZAD PAS SNAR THANG BA CHEN PO ZHES PHYOGS THAMS

CAD DUG RAGS PAS KHYAB, TSOGS PA YANG CHE BAR BSDUS SHING BKA'

GDAMS KYI BSTAN PA NYI MA LTAR GSAL BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GDUNG

RTEN NI GDAN RABS DANG PO'I GDUNG RTEN GYI SHAR NA BZHUGS SO,

KHONG NI DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS GNYIS PA YIN,

(RDO BA DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI 'KHRUNGS LO DANG 'DAS LO MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL@900 DA

NI RDO BA YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS DGON LUNG
BYAMS

PA GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE GRUB DBANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO
SOGS LA

BSTEN NAS MTSAN NYID KYI GZHUNG LA GSAN SBYANGS LEGS PAR MDZAD

CING RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, DE NAS DBUS SU BYON TE GRVA SA CHEN PO
NAS

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA ZHIB SBYANGS MDZAD DE NGAM RING DU PHEBS
SHING

RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DE NAS MDO SMAD DU

BYON TE RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO
1690 LOR

DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO GSUM
GYI

RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS, LHA SDE'I KHROD KYI KHA MCHU RTZOD PA
RNAMS SPYI

SO NAS THAG GCOD BYED CING, MKHAN POS CHOS 'CHAD NYAN GYI 'GAN

KHUR LAS GZHAN MED PA MDZAD PAS LEGS LAM CHE BA BYUNG, MKHAN

PO LAS THOG PA 'DI'I SKU RING LA LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG
CHOS LDAN

GYIS LI THANG NAS BKA' 'GYUR KHYAD 'PHAGS GDAN DRANGS TE SPYI
'JOG

MDZAD CING, SGOM BZHI'I GRUB CHEN DGE 'DUN BLO GROS SOGS KYIS

ZHU BA PO MDZAD DE, SKU 'BUM, DGON LUNG, BYA KHYUNG, REB SKONG

TSUN CHAD KYI MKHAS GRUB DU MA 'DUS PA LA LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHES
RDO RJE

'PHRENG BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR ZHE LNGA'I DBANG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA
BSTZAL,

DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR DU SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO
DPAL

LDAN RGYA MTSO ZHES BSNGAGS BRJOD YANG YANG MDZAD PA'I SKYES
CHEN DAM

PA ZHIG YIN, KHONG NI DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN SA'I

MKHAN RABS NYI SHU RTZA GCIG PA YIN NO, ,

@901 DA

(RDO SBIS SHES RAB RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO SPYI LO 1884
LOR

MDO SMAD RDO SBIS YUL DU YAB LHA LUNG SKYABS DANG, YUM LHA LUNG
SKYID

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I SA PHO
SPREL LO STE

SPYI LO 1968 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SGO MANG DGE
BSHES

NOR BU RIN PO CHE LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES PA

DANG, RDO SBIS DGON DU ZHUGS NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG LA LEGS PAR

SBYANGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL

DU PHEBS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS KUN LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD CING,

GUNG THANG BLO GROS TSANG LAS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG
LO

NYER GCIG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG
DU

ZHUGS, MKHAS DBANG MCHOG GRUB DKAR PO GTZO MDZAD PA'I BLA MA

SUM CU LHAG LA BSTEN NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS

PHYIN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR DMIGS GSAL GYIS LHA

RAMS PA 'PHAR MA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, NOR BU GLING GA'I RTZOD

RGYUGS TSE AANG DANG PO BZHES, DE LO'I SMON LAM NYI SHU BZHI'I
NYIN

NOR BU GLING GAR LHA RAMS DAM BCA'I AANG RIM SGRIG SKABS, RTZE
DRUNG

YIG CHEN MO CHOS DAR LAGS NAS 7 RGYAL BA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I

BKA' LUNG LTAR RIGS PA'I GNAS LNGA LA MKHAS PA AANG DANG PO NI

'BRAS SPUNG SGO MANG KLU 'BUM DGE BSHES SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'I
ZHES

MTSAN SNYAN GYI ME TOG DGUNG DU 'THOR BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO

@902 DA

BZHI PAR RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS BKA' LTAR BU STON RIN PO
CHE'I

GSUNG 'BUM LA LO DRUG TZAM RING DPAR GZHI GSAR BZHENGS KYI ZHUS

DAG MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PAR RGYAL BA RIN PO CHES BKA'

LTAR BKA' 'GYUR LA LO BRGYAD RING DPAR GZHI GSAR BZHENGS KYI
ZHUS

DAG MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA LNGA PAR GO MIN TANG GIS GDAN 'DREN

ZHUS PA LTAR RGYAL NANG DU PHEBS NAS BOD SOG AU YON LHAN KHANG
GI AU

YON KRANG GZHON PA'I 'GAN KHUR BZHES, SLOB GRVA CHE KHAG LNGA LA
SLOB

KHRID KYANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE BRGYAD PAR KRUNG HVA MI DMANGS
SPYI

MTHUN KHAB DBU BSNYES PA NAS BZUNG SNGA RJES SU MTSO SNGON ZHING
CHEN MI

DMANGS SRID GZHUNG GI KLU'U ZHI GZHON PA DANG, RIG GNAS SLOB

GSO AU YON LHAN KHANG GI KRU'U RIN, NUB BYANG DMAG DON DO DAM

AU YON LHAN KHANG GI AU YON, NUB BYANG MI RIGS LAS DON AU YON

LHAN KHANG GI KRU'U RIN AU YON GZHON PA, RGYAL YONGS MI DMANGS

'THUS MI TSOGS KYI SKABS DANG PO DANG SKABS GNYIS PA'I 'THUS MI,

RGYAL YONGS SRID GROS SKABS GNYIS PA DANG SKABS GSUM PA'I RGYUN
LAS

AU YON, RGYAL YONGS NANG BSTAN MTHUN TSOGS KYI HU'U KRANG BCAS

KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES MYANGS, DGUNG LO DON GSUM PAR RGYA GAR

DANG, BAL BO'I RGYAL KHAB GNYIS KYIS GDAN ZHUS LTAR SANGS RGYAS

BCOM LDAN 'DAS MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS NAS LO NYIS STONG LNGA BRGYA'I
RJES

DRAN TSOGS CHEN LA ZHUGS, SPYI LO 1958 LO'I SNGON RJES SU BOD
RIGS

MI DMANGS BCINGS 'GROL GYI DON DU SA CHA SO SOR PHEBS NAS SKU
NGAL

@903 DA

CHEN PO MYANGS, DA DUNG 'BAR MA DANG, CIN PU'U KRE, SING

GA LA, ROS TAN RGYAL KHAB BCAS LA PHEBS NAS CHOS KYI SBYIN PA

GNANG BA MA ZAD, MA'O KRU'U ZHI'I PHYI 'BREL GYI SRID JUS PHYAG
BSTAR

RNAL MA GNANG BA RED, KHONG LA SLOB MA BGRANG GIS MI LANG BA YOD
PA

LAS SRAS KYI THU BO NI DGE BSHES LHA RAMS PA BSKAL BZANG RGYA
MTSO

DANG, DGE BSHES GZHONG PA TSUL KHRIMS BCAS YIN, KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI MTSO SNGON MI RIGS DPE SKRUN KHANG NAS DPAR DU
BSGRUN

PA'I POD GSUM BZHUGS SO,

(RDO RING BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR,)

KHONG NI DGA' BZHI BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR DANG MI GCIG

YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(RDO RING PAndI TA,)

KHONG NI DGA' BZHI MGON PO DNGOS GRUB RAB BRTAN DANG MI

GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(RDOR BRAG NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1719

LOR LHO KHA RNAM SRAS GLING DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM
PA'I

LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1741 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SKU DRIN LAS SKU
GONG MA

RDOR BRAG RIG 'DZIN KUN BZANG PADMA 'PHRIN LAS THEG MCHOG DBANG
GI

RGYAL PO'I YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN GNANG STE KHRI 'DON MDZAD, DE
NAS

@904 DA

RDOR BRAG DGON DU CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD CING YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MAR BSTEN TE MDO SNGAGS GNYIS LA BYANG BA

MDZAD, LHAG PAR DU SKAR RTZIS DANG, GSO BA RIG PA LA SBYANGS PA

DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD KYANG SKU TSE MTHAR MA 'KHYOL NAS DGUNG LO
NYER

GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI MTSAN

GZHAN LA RIG 'DZIN CHEN PO NGAG DBANG 'JAM DPAL ZHES ZHU'O,
KHONG

NI RDOR BRAG GI SKU PHRENG BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

(LDAN MA STONG PHUD,)

KHONG NI 'BRAS BLO GLING DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG CHOS 'GRUB DANG

MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(LDAN MA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA CHOS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

MDO KHAMS LDAN MA KHUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG
NGU'I

DUS NAS YI GE'I SBYOR DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD,

MKHAN CHEN YON TAN DPAL GYI SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD CING
KHRI

'DON BYAS, RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS TE DBUS SU PHEBS

NAS SE RA THEG CHEN GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING GZHUNG CHEN
BKA'

POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS PAn CHEN
BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA DANG, RJE BSKAL BZANG MKHAS GRUB SOGS LA BSTEN TE

MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS SKOR MANG DU GSAN, LHAG PAR DU 'JAM BZHAD
SKU

PHRENG BZHI PA'I YAB CHEN LAS SMAN GZHUNG LA SBYANGS BA MDZAD
PAS SMAN

@905 DA

PA CHEN POR GYUR, 'JAM BZHAD BLO BZANG MKHAS GRUB DANG RVA
SGRENG

NGAG DBANG YE SHES BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SOGS SLOB MA MANG DU
BYON

NO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA 'KHRUL ZHIG PA GAR DBANG ZHES ZHU'O,
,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RANG GZHAN GYI GRUB MTHA'I RNAM GZHAG
LEGS

BSHAD RAB GSAL SHEL DKAR ME LONG// DANG, //SMAN MAR GYI LAG

LEN BCUD DU BSDUS PA BDUD RTZI//, //MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI RNAM

BSHAD GNYIS KYI DKA' GNAD GSAL//, //DBU MA LA THOS BSAM BYA

TSUL 'JAM DBYANGS ZHAL LUNG MKHAS PA'I DGONGS RGYAN//, //RTOGS

PA'I NYAMS MGUR RTZOL MED LHUN GRUB//BCAS CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO

GCIG LONGS PA'I POD GSUM BZHUGS SO, ,

(LDAN MA RTZE MANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

KHAMS LDAN DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG YI GE 'BRI BA LA SHIN TU MKHAS
PAS

GTER YIG PHAL CHER BRIS SHING YIG GZUGS KYI LAG RGYUN MA NYAMS

PA'I KHRID SROL DA LTA'ANG YOD PAR GRAGS, LO TZ'A BA YANG MKHYEN
TE

MCHAN BU'I LO TZ'A BA YIN, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS LAS DBANG

LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU ZHUS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON PAR
MDZAD

PAS RTOGS PA MNGON DU SHAR NAS CHOS THAMS CAD LA MI BRJED PA'I

GZUNGS THOB STE, //GRUB MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "LDAN MA
RTZE MANG

MI BRJED GZUNGS RNAMS THOB," CES GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI GRUB THOB

RJE DANG 'BANGS NYER LNGA'I NANG TSAN ZHIG YIN NO, ,

@906 DA

(LDAN MA TSUL KHRIMS SENG GE)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZA'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD
YUL

NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD CING, DE NAS BAL YUL DANG RGYA GAR SOGS

SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB DU MA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING RGYA GZHUNG
DANG

LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS NAS BSTAN BCOS
MANG PO

BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN
'GYUR//

LAS //DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSTOD PA RGYUN CHAGS PA//DANG,

//'PHAGS MA SGROL MA LA BSTOD PA//, //DKON MCHOG GSUM GYI BKRA

SHIS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA//, //DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA LNGA'I BKRA
SHIS KYI

TSIGS SU BCAD PA//, //DPAL RNAL 'BYOR GYI RGYUD KYI DKYIL 'KHOR

GYI LHA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA RIGS LNGA 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA LHA SUM
CU RTZA

GSUM GYI BKRA SHIS KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA//, //RJE BTZUN 'PHAGS MA

SGROL MAS GSUNGS PA'I BKRA SHIS BRGYAD PA//, //'JIG RTEN DBANG

PHYUG LAS GRUB PA THOB PA'I LO RGYUS// BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(LDAN MA YE SHES BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1415

LOR KHAMS LDAN SMAD SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA PHO
RTA LO

STE SPYI LO 1498 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS NAS DBUS

SU BYON TE 'BRAS SBUNGS MKHAN CHEN DPAL BLO LAS PHAR PHYIN DANG,

TSAD MA RNAM 'BREL, DBU MA RIG TSOGS, 'DUL 'DZIN DGE

@907 DA

LEGS DPAL BA LAS 'DUL BA RNAMS GSAN ZHING GLENG BSRE BA MDZAD

PAS DE'I SROL LEGS PAR TSUGS, 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS

DPAL LDAN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING BLO GSAL GLING GI 'CHAD
NYAN

PA GNAG, DE NAS SHAR DU BYON TE DBU MA DANG, PHAR PHYIN,

LAM RIM BCAS GSUNGS, DGUNG LO DON BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD

PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1493 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS LO DRUG GI RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING 'CHAD
NYAN

YAR LDAN DU MDZAD PA DANG, RGYAL BA BYAMS PA'I SKU BSNYAN CHEN
PO

BZHENGS, SLOB MA GRANGS CHE BA NI MKHAS BTZUN SOGS NYI SHU SKOR
DANG

GZHAN YANG GRANGS LAS 'DAS PA BYUNG, DGUNG LO DON DGU PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI

'DZIN PA'I KHRI RABS BCU BA YIN NO, ,

(LDE RGYAL PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO LDE SNOL PO DANG, YUM SA BTZUN SNYAN RJE GNYIS KYI SRAS
SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG DA SA HA RIS MDZAD
CING GSAS

KHANG ZHIG KYANG BZHENGS, BTZUN MO SMAN BTZUN LUNG GONG KHAB TU

BZHES TE RINGS SRAS LDE SBRIN BTZAN SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG
SO CHU

BO'I GZHUNG LA BTAB, KHONG NI CHU YI LDE BRGYAD LAS LDE BDUN PA
YIN

NO, ,

(LDE SNOL NAM,)

@908 DA

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU YAB RGYAL PO SE

SNOL PO LDE DANG, YUM 'O BZA' RI MO MTSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG AA LA NAN CIS MDZAD
CING

GSAS KHANG ZHIG KYANG BZHENGS, BTZUN MO KHRI SMAN RJE MA KHAB TU
BZHES

RE RINGS SRAS LDE SNOL PO SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG SO CHU
BO'I GZHUNG

LA BTAB, KHONG NI CHU YI LDE BRGYAD LAS LDE LNGA PA YIN NO, ,

(SNOL LO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU YAB RGYAL PO LDE

SNOL NAM DANG, YUM KHRI SMAN RJE MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU
'KHRUNGS,

KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG DAR MA HA RIS MDZAD CING GSAS
KHANG ZHIG

KYANG BZHENGS, BTZUN MO SA BTZUN SNYAN RJE KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS

SRAS LDE RGYAL PO SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG SO CHU PO'I GZHUNG
LA BTAB,

KHONG NI CHU YI LDE BRGYAD LAS LDE DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

(LDE SBRIN BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS GNYIS PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO LDE RGYAL PO DANG, YUM SMAN BTZUN LUNG GONG GNYIS KYI
SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG MU LA MA HOS
MDZAD CING

GSAS KHANG ZHIG KYANG BZHENGS, BTZUN MO GNYAN BTZUN MANG MO RJE

KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS RGYAL TO RI LONG BTZAN SKU 'KHRUNGS,
KHONG

GI BANG SO CHU BO'I GZHUNG LA BTAB, KHONG NI CHU YI LDE BRGYAD
LAS LDE

BRGYAD PA YIN NO, ,

@909 DA

(LDE 'PHRUL NAM GZHUNG BCAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU YAB RGYAL PO ZVA

NAM ZIN LDE DANG, YUM MTSO SMAN KHRI DKAR GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI ZHANG ZHUNG MTSO MI KUN SNANG GIS
MDZAD

CING GSAS KHANG ZHIG KYANG BZHENGS, BTZUN MO BSE GNYIS MER MO

KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS SE SNOL NAM LDE SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG
GI

BANG SO CHU BO'I GZHUNG LA BTAB, KHONG NI CHU YI LDE BRGYAD LAS
LDE

GNYIS A YIN NO, ,

(LDE GTZUG MGON,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU MNGA'

RIS PU RANGS SU YAB MNGA' BDAG SKYID LDE NYI MA MGON DANG, YUM

COG RO BZA' ZANGS KHA MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG
SKU NA

SON RJES MNGA' RIS ZANGS DKAR SGO GSUM DANG, SBI TI, SBI LCOG

DANG BCAS PA BZUNG NAS CHAB SRID BSKYANGS SHING, KHONG GI GDUNG

RGYUD GYES PA'I SKOR LA DPA' BO GTZUG LAG PHRENG BAS YA RTZE'I
RGYAL

RABS BYUNG BA GSUNGS 'DUG KYANG BOD KYI LO RGYUS YIG TSANG PHAL
MO CHE

LAS YA RTZE'I RGYAL RABS NI BKRA SHIS LDE MGON GYI GDUNG RGYUD
LAS BYUNG

BA GSUNGS 'DUG PAS DE LTAR SO BZHAG BYAS PA YIN, KHONG NI BOD
KYI

LO RGYUS STENG DU GRAGS PA'I STOD KYI MGON GSUM NANG GI YA GYAL
ZHIG

YIN NO, ,

(LDE REN PA MNON SNANG GRAGS,)
@910 DA

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO 'DUS SRONG MANG PO RJE RLUNG NAM 'PHRUL
GYI

RGYAL PO'I BLON PO YIN, DE NAS RGYAL PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN GYI
BLON

PO MDZAD KYANG RGYAL PO DGUNG LO CHUNG BA'I SKABS DANG BSTUN TE
BOD

LUGS SHING MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO 705 LOR DUS ZING BSLANGS
SHING SRID

'GYUR GYI MGO BRTZAMS KYANG PHYI MO 'BRO BZA' KHRI MA LOD DANG,
BLON

PO KHU MANG PO RJE LHA ZUNG GNYIS MNYAM 'BREL MDZAD NAS BON MO
NA LA

TZER ZHES PA'I SA GNAS SU TSAR BCAD DO, ,

(LDONG STON CHOS DAR RGYAS PA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS STOD TZAM GYI MI

YIN, AA MDO MDZOD DGE DGON GSAR DGA' LDAN GLING GI DGE

BSHES SHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR SLOB GNYER GNANG SA NI BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL YIN PA DANG, DGE BSHES THON NAS SKU TSE PHAL
CHE

BA RANG YUL GYI DGON GSAR DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS GLING DU RGYUN
BZHUGS

GNANG NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

//GZHI GSUM GYI NYAMS LEN GSAR DU TSUGS PA'I SMON LAM// NI RAB

BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1872 LOR
BRTZAMS PAR

MJUG BYANG DU GSUNGS SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI BLA MA'I RNAL
'BYOR

DANG, LAM RIM BSDUS DON, LAM GTZO RNAM BSHAD, DBANG

BSHAD, SGRUB THABS, BRGYUD 'DEBS, MAN NGAG ZIN BRIS, CHO GA
PHYAG LEN, ZHABS BRTEN GSOL 'DEBS BCAS CHOS TSAN NYER

@911 DA

DRUG YOD PA PHOD 'BRING ZHIG MI RIGS RIG GNAS PHO BRANG DU
BZHUGS

SO, ,

(LDOG LONG PA SH'AKYA BYANG CHUB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU

LDOG YUL SMAD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN,

DGUNG LO BDUN PAR YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN ZHING RAB TU

YANG BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR PHAR PHYIN DANG 'DUL BA LEGS

PAR MKHYEN ZHING SLOB MA'I TSOGS LA SBRAGS BSHAD MDZAD, KHYAD
PAR

DU 'DUL BA LA MKHAS PAS 'DUL BA'I SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA'ANG MANG DU

BSKYANGS, THUGS DAM GYI MTHIL SMAN BLA DANG SGROL MA LA MDZAD
PAS

ZHAL GZIGS, SENG LDENG NAGS SGROL GYIS ZHAL GZIGS SHING LDOG

STOD KYI DGON PA 'DEBS PAR LUNG BSTAN, RTZI 'DUL GYI SAR SONG LA

'PHAGS PA'I SGRUB THABS ZHUS SHIG CES LUNG BSTAN PA BZHIN DU

BSGRUBS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS BLA MA RTZI 'DUL LA BSNYUNG GNAS STONG

PHRAG LNGA'I DAM BCA' MDZAD PAS, SUM BRGYA THENGS PA'I DNGOS

GZHI'I NUB MOR 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYIS RIGS KYI BU 'ONGS

PA LEGS SO GSUNGS NAS 'OD ZER DKAR PO CIG SNYING GAR THIM PAS

LUS BDE BAS GANG, MA SHI BAR DU SEMS CAN GYI DON GYIS, SHI

NAS NGAS 'BOD DU BTANG GSUNGS SO, DE NAS NYIN MO SDE SNOD KYI

'CHAD NYAN GANGS LA GANG MOS MDZAD, MTSAN MO 'PHAGS PA'I SGRUB

THABS NYAMS LEN MDZAD, RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN RGYUD LA GKHRUNGS

@912 DA

SHING GZHAN DON PHUN SUM TSOGS PA MTHAR PHYIN TE 'OG MIN STUG PO

BKOD PA'I ZHING KHAMS SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG NI THUGS RJE CHEN PO

DPAL MO LUGS KYI BRGYUD PA'I GDAMS RGYUN 'DZIN MKHAN YIN, KHONG

GI MCHOG TU GYUR PA'I SLOB MA NI MKHAN CHEN CHU BZANG PA BYANG
CHUB

'BAR YIN NO, ,

(SDE KHRI 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1779

LOR MDO SMAD RTZE GZHUNG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI
PA'I CHU

PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1862 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO LNGA PAR
'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SDE KHRI 'JIGS MED LUNG

RIGS RGYA MTSO'I YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG
PAR

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GDAN DRANGS TE SDE KHRI GONG MA'I
KHRIR MNGA'

GSOL MDZAD, 'JAM BZHAD 'JIGS MED DBANG PO LAS RAB BYUNG

DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS TE MTSAN LA 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN
NYI

MA GSOL, DE NAS DPA' RIS DGE BSHES 'JIGS MED DAM CHOS

LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG DANG, 'DON CHOG GZHUNG CHEN LNGA'I RTZA BA

SOGS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO DGU BA NAS BCU GSUM GYI BAR

DU GUNG THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME LAS DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM MANG
PO

ZHUS NAS THUGS KYI BUM PA YONGS SU GANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO

BCU BZHI PAR BLA BRANG THOS BSAM GLING GI GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS,
GZHUNG

CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA BRTZON PA LHUR LEN MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA'I

@913 DA

DBANG POR GYUR, 'JAM BZHAD 'JIGS MED DBANG PO LAS ZAB

DGU'I GDAMS PA MA LUS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU MNOS TE

GDAMS PA KUN GYI GTER MDZOD LTA BUR GYUR, DBAL MANG DKON

MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN LAS GSANG SNGAGS KYI SDOM PA'I SNYING PO MA
LUS PA

ZHUS, MDOR NA SDE SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI BSDUS PA'I
GZHUNG

LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA DBANG 'BYOR ZHING MKHAS BTZUN GNYIS LDAN DU

GYUR PAS KUN GYIS GTZUG TU BKUR, MDO SMAD TSA GAN DGON DANG,

ME SHING DGON SOGS KYI MKHAN PO LO BCU LHAG TU BZHUGS TE DAM
PA'I

CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE DRUG PAR BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SAR LO GCIG TZAM BZHUGS RJES, SOG

YUL GYI DGON SDE MANG POR ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE, SER SKYA MANG

TSOGS RNAMS LA DBANG LUNG KHRID SOGS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON

RGYA CHER SPEL, GONG MA'I RGYAL SA PE CIN DU'ANG PHEBS MYANGS,
KHONG

GI GSUNG RTZOM NI RNAM THAR DANG, BYAMS CHOS 'GREL BA, 'DUL

BA'I SPYI DON, BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DANG DUS 'KHOR GYI SKOR,
SGRUB

THABS SNA TSOGS BCAS POD LNGA MI RIGS RIG GNAS PHO BRANG DU

BZHUGS SO, ,

(SDE KHRI 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1748 LOR MDO SMAD REB SKONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1778 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG
LO CHUNG

@914 DA

NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG MA SDE KHRI BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYI YANG
SRID DU THAG

BCAD DE GDAN SAR BKOD, DKA' BCU DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO LAS

YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA SBYANGS PAR
TSEGS

MED DU MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
GYI

CHOS GRVA LA ZHUGS NAS BSDUS GRVA DANG PHAR PHYIN BCAS LA GSAN
SBYONG

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR DBUS SU BYON TE 'BRAS SPUNGS

SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA
LA THOS

BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD CING LHA SA'I SMON LAM CHEN PO'I GRVA SKOR

MDZAD, RANG YUL DU 'BYON KHAR RGYAL BA RIN PO CHE DANG PAn CHEN

RIN PO CHES NO MIN HAN AER TI NI ZHES PA'I BKA' SHOG DANG, RTA

DAR, 'BOG LCAG THAM GA BCAS MKHAN CHAS KYIS GZENGS BSTOD

GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
PHYIR

PHEBS TE DGA' STON RGYA CHEN PO MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I
ME

MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1777 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
GDAN SA'I KHRI

LA PHEBS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO

DAM GANG LEGS GNAS BA DANG, DE LTAR CHOS SRID GNYIS KA'I CHA

NAS YAR LDAN DU BSKYANGS MUR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG NI SDE KHRI'I SKU PHRENG GNYIS PA YIN LA, BLA BRANG BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL

GYI GDAN RABS BCU DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

(SDE KHRI BLO BZANG DON GRUB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO

@915 DA

LOR MDO SMAD KHRI KA'I LAN KYOR YAB LTAG RING DGE BSNYEN GYI
SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1746 LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA PAR LA MO BDE CHEN DGON DU PHEBS

TE KHU BO RAB 'BYAMS PA LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOG
CHOS

SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR DBUS SU

PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS
SHING BYA BRAL

DGE 'DUN PHUN TSOGS DANG, RGYAL SRAS DON GRUB RGYA MTSO, T'A

DBON KUN DGA' 'OD ZER BCAS LA BSTEN TE GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA

LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS

SA'I SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS

BZHAD PA LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, RGYAL BA TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA
MTSO'I

SKU MDUN PA MDZAD CING RGYAL PO LHA BZANG HAN GYIS KYANG THUGS

'DINGS CHEN PO YOD, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I PHYAG MDZOD MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR

KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I ZHABS PHYIR MDO SMAD DU PHEBS

TE PHYAG MDZOD KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES, DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD PAR BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO BDUN GYI
RING DU

'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, RGYUD KHANG GSANG DU BZHENGS, DGUNG LO RE GSUM

PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO LUG LO SPYI LO 1739 LOR BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO DGU'I RING
DU

GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGON PA'I 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS @916
DA

'CHAD NYAN BCAS KYI THAD LA DO DAM GANG LEGS GNANG, KUN MKHYEN

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I BSTAN PA GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BA

MDZAD, LUNG RTOGS GNYIS KA'I BDAG NYID CAN GYI SKYES CHEN DAM PA

ZHIG YIN, KHRI ZUR NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BA

MDZAD DO, KHONG GIS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE

DGUNG LO DON BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG

YIN NO,

RI KHROD DU

DKON MCHOG DON GRUB CES GSOL, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR BRGYAL BA

RTAGS

YONGS

NAS PO T'A LA'I PHO BRANG DMAR PO 'DZUGS SKRUN BYED PA'I 'GO
BRTZAMS

PHYAG BRTZAMS GNANG YOD, ,

@923 NA

GAR SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING

BZHUGS SO, ,

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL NI MDO SMAD REB

SKONG YIN, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1807
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG NI DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS LHA BTZUN CHEN
PO

NANG SO NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG GI SKU SKYES SU GDAN SAR BKOD,
DGUNG

LO BCU GSUM PAR RONG BO GOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS NAS MTSAN NYID KYI GZHUNG SOGS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN
PAR

MDZAD, GSUNG RAB KYI DON LA RNAM DPYOD MCHOG TU YANGS SHING 'JAM

@924 NA

DBYANGS ZHI KHRO SBRAGS SGRUB KYI BSNYEN PA GNANG SKABS MCHOD
KHRI'I STENG

SOGS LA RI MO NGO MTSAR BA MANG PO 'CHAR, RMI NYAMS 'DRES MA'I
SNANG

BAR NAM MKHA' LA SPRIN GSEB TU RAL GRI CHEN PO ZHIG YOD PA GZHAN

ZHIG GIS RANG LA STER BA'I SNANG BA SOGS GZIGS PA NGO MTSAR CAN

MANG, SKYABS MGON MCHOG GIS RNAM BCU DBANG LDAN GYI RI MO YOD

PA'I DBU ZHVA SHEL GYI TOG DANG PHRU BTZUGS PA ZHIG GNANG NAS
'DI KHYOD

LA MDZES GSUNGS PA PHYIS SU DUS 'KHOR GSAR TSUGS KYI RDO RJE
SLOB

DPON MDZAD DGOS PA'I BRDAR NGO 'PHROD, DE NAS SGRUB PA'I SDE
CHEN

PO YIG SGAR YID DGA' CHOS 'DZIN GYI BLA MAR PHEBS, SGRUB SDE'I
DGE

'DUN RNAMS LA RJE 'DI'I SKU DRIN GYIS PHU DRUNG DANG, SLOG PA
GYON PA

TSUN CHAD 'DUL BA'I BCOS KHRIMS DANG, DGE 'DUN GYI NANG KHRIMS

SOGS KYI SPANGS BLANGS 'GRIG LAM SHIN TU DAM PAR MDZAD, BDE

MCHOG GI SGRUB MCHOD NGOS GTZANG NYIN BCU RE SOGS KYI CHOS RGYUN

BTZUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1804

LOR RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA
PHEBS NAS

LAM

NO,

LOR

CHOS LA

BYANG BAR MDZAD, BDAG CHEN SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN DANG BDAG CHEN

SOGS

TSOGS

BZUNGS

PO KHRI

KHYUNG GRAGS PAS MDZAD, BTZUN MO TSE SPONG BZA' 'BRI MA THOD
DKAR

BYA BA KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO SKU
'KHRUNGS,

KHONG GIS YAB RGYAL PO STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS KYI MDZAD 'PHRIN MU

MTHUD DU BSKYANGS TE, MYANG TZENG SKU DANG, DBAS DBYI TSAB,

MNON 'DRON PO BCAS LA MNAL TSIG BOR TE PHYI NANG MNYAM 'BREL

GYIS ZING PO RJE KHRI BANGS SUM BCOM NAS PHAG GI YUNG BA SNA MAN
CHAD,

KONG PO BRE SNA YAN CHAD MNGA' 'OG TU BSDUS SHING SNGAR YUL NGAS
PO ZER

TZES

KHYIM

SKABS

LAS MTHO, DBU RMOG NI RI LAS BTZAN TE KHONG GI MTSAN LA GNAM RI

SRONG BTZAN ZHES GSOL, KHONG GI SKU RING LA RGYA NAG NAS SMAN
RTZIS

SOGS KYI GTZUG LAG RIG GNAS SPYAN DRANGS PA DANG, ZAS KYI PHUD

DU GYUR PA'I LAN TSVA SOGS RNYED PAR GRAGS SO, MNGA' ZHABS CHE
BA

BYANG

BZHENGS

DGONGS PA RAB GSAL (953-1035) GYI MTSAN SNYAN GSAN TE

DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON DU BYON NAS BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB

GSAL LAS 'DUL BA GSAN PAS SNGAR KHONG NYID KYI CIG CAR 'JUG

PA'I SPYOD LAM DE LTA BU LA NGO GNONG ZHING SEMS 'GYOD NAS TSUL
BZHIN

DU BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL GYI DRUNG DU RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS
SHING,

'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA MDO KHAMS SMAD NAS DAR BA MDZAD PAR PHYAG

RJES CHEN PO ZHIG BZHAG YOD PA YIN, KHONG NI BLA CHEN DGONGS PA

RAB GSAL GYI GRAGS CHE BA'I SLOB MA BCU'I YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(GNUBS SANGS RGYAS YE SHES,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU YAB

GNUBS RIGS GSAL BA'I DBANG PHYUG DANG, YUM MCHIMS MO BKRA

SHIS 'TSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BRGYA DANG
SUM CUR

BZHUGS SO, KHONG GI BYIS PA'I MTSAN LA RDO RJE KHRI GTZUG CES
ZHU

ZHING, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR 'O BRAN DPAL GYI GZHON NU LAS YI GE'I

'BRI KLOG SBYANGS, MKHAN PO BO DHI SA HVA LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING
BKA'

CHOS MANG DU GSAN, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS LAS DBANG DANG

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU GSAN NAS SGRAGS YANG RDZONG DU SGRUB PA NYAMS

LEN BRTZON PAS GRUB PA BRNYES TE//GRUB MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG//
LAS

"SANGS RGYAS YE SHES BRAG LA PHUR BU 'DEBS, ZHES GSUNGS SO,

DE NAS RGYA GAR DANG BAL YUL SOGS LAN BDUN TZAM PHEBS TE DAM

CHOS MANG PO'I BKA' LUNG ZHUS TE SNGA 'GYUR GYI BSTAN PA BAR MA
KHONG LA

@938 NA

BKAS BABS PAS MDO SGYU SEMS GSUM GYI BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS
PAR

MDZAD DO, KHONG NI GRUB THOB RJE DANG 'BANGS NYER LNGA'I NANG GI
YA GYAL

ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI KHU LUNG YON TAN RGYA
MTSO

DANG, SO YE SHES DBANG PHYUG PA GOR BLON CHEN 'PHAGS, NGAN

YON TAN MCHOG SRU LEGS PA'I SGRON MA BCAS YIN NO, ,

(GNON BZA' MANG MO RJE JI DGOS,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS GSUM PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO LHA THO THO RI GNYAN BTZAN GYI
BTZUN MO

DANG, RGYAL PO KHRI GNYAN GZUNGS BTZAN GYI MA YUM YIN, //CHOS

'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU KHONG MO'I MTSAN LA RNO ZA MANG
DGAR

ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

(GNON KHRI BDUN GA-YU SBYIN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO 'DUS SRONG MANG PO RJE RLUNG NAM 'PHRUL
GYI

RGYAL PO'I BLON PO YIN, DRAG PO'I RTZAL LA SHIN TU MKHAS PAS RTA
RGOD

GA-YANG LA MCHONGS PA GYEN LA 'THEB THUB PA DANG, DRAG PO GA-YUL
GYI

LAS LA ZHUGS NAS DPUNG CHEN KHA LO BSGYUR ZHING RGYAL KHAMS DU
MA

DBANG DU BSDUS, DMAG DPON RTZAL BO CHE MI BDUN NANG GI YA GYAL

ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(GNON RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

@939 NA

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO 'DUS SRONG MANG PO RJE'I BLON PO YIN,
DRAG

RTZAL LA SHIN TU MKHAS PAS MDA' STE'U KHA MA 'PHANGS TE BYA KHRA
YI SKED

PA GCOD THUB PA DANG, DRAG PO GA-YUL 'GYED KYI LAS LA ZHUGS TE

DMAG DPUNG CHEN PO'I RU 'DREN MDZAD CING YUL KHAMS MANG PO DBANG

DU BSDUS, DMAG DPON RTZAL BO CHE MI BDUN NANG GI YA GYAL ZHIG
YIN NO, ,

(MNON 'DRON PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DRUG PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SKU TSE'I STOD DU ZING PO RJE KHRI BANGS SUM GYI
NANG

'KHOR BA ZHIG YIN, RJES SU RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI
ZHABS

LA GTUGS TE RGYAL PO DANG MNYAM DU MNA' TSIG BOR NAS ZING PO
RJE'I

CHAB SRID BRLAGS SHING RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI PHYAG TU
PHUL,

RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYIS KYANG KHO NA'I PU NU PO MNON
LA SOGS

PA BRAN GA-YOG KHYIM TSANG LNGA BRGYA GNANG ZHING BLON PO'I GO
GNAS KYI

BDAG RKYEN BSTZAL TO, ,

(RNAM GLING PAn CHEN DKON MCHOG CHOS GRAGS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1646

LOR LHO KHA RNAM SRAS GLING DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
LPA'I

SA PHO PHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1718 LOR JUN GAR DMAG GIS BKRONGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SMIN GROL GLONG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS
TE RAB

TU BYUNG ZHIG YI GE SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BA
MDZAD@940 NA

DE NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG, GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE
BZHI,

GSO RIG CHEN MO'I GZHUNG LUGS BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA

MDZAD CING PAndI TA CHEN PO'I MTSAN SNYAN THOB, RGYAL BA NGAG
DBANG BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG SDE SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO RNAM PA
GNYIS KYIS

GTZIGS SU 'DZIN PA'I SKYES CHEN DAM PA ZHIG YIN, RAB BYUNG BCU

GCIG PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1679 LOR //MES PO'I ZHAL
LUNG//

DPAR DU BSKRUN SKABS KHONG GIS ZHUS DAG MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU

GCIG PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1683 LOR //SUM RTAGS 'GREL
BA

LEGS BSHAD SNANG BYED NOR BU// LJAGS RTZOM GNANG, KHONG GI RNAM

THAR ZHIB TU MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN TU PHANGS SO, ,

(RNAM DAG RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI 'PHAN BLO BZANG DON YOD DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE

LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(RNAL 'BYOR CHOS GA-YUNG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1100 LOR KLUNGS SHOD RONG GI NGAL MDA' LA YAB YO MI KLU PHYUG GI

SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI
LO 1177

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YI GE'I 'BRI
KLOG

LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DE NAS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO'I ZHABS

LA GTUGS TE DBU MA DANG, TSAD MA, 'DUL BA, PHAR PHYIN

SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR BYA YUL BA

@941 NA

CHEN PO GZHON NU 'OD LAS RAB TU BYUNG, THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS PAR RJE
SGAM

PO BA DANG MJAL, RGYUD KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM ZHUS NAS YON
TAN

KHYAD PAR CAN BRNYES, SGOM PO SKU MCHED BZHUGS RING LA SLOB MA'I

TSOGS PA MA BSKYANGS, DE RJES LO NGO BDUN GYI RING DU TSOGS PA

BSKYANGS NAS BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MKHA' LA BSGRENGS SO, KHONG
NI

DVAGS PO LHA RJE'I SLOB MA GRUB CHEN BZHI'I YA GYAL ZHIG YIN, ,

846) PHYI BLON YIN NO, ,

RU

CHEN BZHI LAS DBU RU STOD SMAD KYI RU DPON YIN ZHING, RU RTA NI
ZE

DKAR RTA SKYA DANG, RU DAR NI DMAR PO LCE KHRA YIN NO, ,

(SNA NAM RGYAL TSA LHA GNANG,)

BOD

BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I SKABS SU KHONG GIS MCHOD

@942 NA

RTAGS

MANG DU BSTAN ZHING, //GRUB MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "RDO
RJE

BDUD 'JOMS RLUNG LAR THOGS PA MED,"CES GSUNGS SO, DUS

RGYUN GYI SGRUB GNAS NI BRAG DMAR KE'U TSANG YIN, LO TZ'A BA LA
MKHAS

//DBANG BSGYUR PA'I CHO GA//, //HE RU KA NYE BAR 'BYUNG BA//
ZHES BYA

BA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

SPYI

GDAN PA

@945 NA

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG LHA PHYUG
MKHAR BA

NYI ZLA 'OD (1135-1215) KYI DRUNG NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING

MTSAN LA SANGS RGYAS 'OD CES GSOL, KHRID DANG GDAMS NGAG

THAMS CAD TSAR BAR ZHUS TE BYANG MKHAR DANG, SPYIL SKUNGS MTHA'

BRAG RNAMS SU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, DE NAS GANGS DKAR TI SE

DANG RDZONG DRUG SOGS SU PHEBS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD CING,

KHYAD PAR DU BRAG SKYA RDO RJE RDZONG DU THUGS DAM GYI RTZAL
RDZOGS, DE NAS

RTA SGA'I DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING GDUL BYA'I RE BA YONGS

SU BSKONGS, GRVA PA YANG MANG DU 'DUS TE 'CHAD NYAN DANG SGOM
SGRUB

KYI GZHI LEGS PAR BTZUGS NAS GDAN SA'I KHRI LA RTOGS LDAN DAR

BSOD BKOD DE LOGS SU SGRUB PA MDZAD CING BZHUGS SO, KHONG GI

SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI RTOGS LDAN DAR BSOD DANG, JO SRAS, TSANG

'DUR BA CHEN PO, BSAM GTAN RDZONG PA BCAS YIN, ,

PO YIN,

BOD LUGS SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 755 LOR RGYAL PO KHRI LDE
GTZUG

DANG KHRIMS KYIS TSAR BCAD CING KHYIM GZHIS RGYU NOR THAMS CAD
GZHUNG

LA MNGA' GSOL ZHING RGYAL PO'I BKA' LAS MI 'DA' BAR SRID DON

KHONG LA KE KE RU STE NOR BU RIN PO CHE'I YI GE BSTZAL TO, ,

SNYING MO RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
BZHI PA'I

CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1833 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS KHU CHEN KUN MKHYEN RIN PO CHE LAS RAB BYUNG DANG
DGE

TSUL BSGRUBS, BLA BRANG THOS BSAM GLING DU ZHUGS NAS RIGS LAM

KLONG

RDOL NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DANG, HRE BO SANGS RGYAS BKRA SHIS
BCAS LA

LA

'KHYIL DU

TE LO

@947 NA

BZHI'I RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING CHOS SRID GNYIS KAR GRVA

SHING

GNYIS KYI GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO
BCAS

LA YAR LDAN DU MDZAD, GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG RTEN BRTEN PA BCAS PA

GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD PAR GDAN SAR PHEBS

TE JO BO'I SKU GTZO MDZAD PA'I RTEN BRTEN PA MANG DU GSAR
BZHENGS

YIN NO, ,

NAS

CHOS ZAB MO YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR ZHUS, BLA MA'I ZHABS TOG KYANG

DU

GYUR RO, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS MCHOG TU GYUR BA NI BLA

(SNAR THANG SAm GHA SHR'I,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

DPAL SNAR THANG DGON PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG DANG,

DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE MDO
SNGAGS

GNYIS KA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS

'GOS LO GZHON NU DPAL (1392-1481) DANG 'DUL 'DZIN

DPAL LDAN BZANG PO (1402-1473) SOGS LA SGRA DANG,

SNYAN NGAG MNGON BRJOD, RTZIS RIG BCAS SLOB KHRID GNANG NAS SLOB

BU MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI
LO STE

SPYI LO 1420 LOR BSHES GNYEN BLO GROS DPAL 'BAR GYIS YANG YANG

BSKUL BA'I NGOR THANG PO CHE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU//SNGAGS BSKAL
BKLAG THABS

BSDUS PA'I t'IKKA MTHONG BA DON GSAL// BRTZAMS, DA DUNG //KA L'A
PA'I

MTSAMS SBYOR LNGA PA'I t'IKKA GZHUNG DON GSAL BA//DANG, //SNYAN
NGAG

ME LONG GI BSHAD PA BKLAGS PAS DON THAMS CAD 'GRUB PA// //DON

RGYAN GSAL BA'I ME LONG MKHAS PA DGA' BYED 'OD ZER 'BUM PHRAG

BRGYA BA// BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(SNUBS NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1746

'KHRUNGS
@950 NA

RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1824 LOR
SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BCU PAR BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I CHOS SGOR

ZHUGS TE MDO BA MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG DON GRUB LAS RAB TU BYUNG,

DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE SE RA BYES PA GRVA
TSANG GI

CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS LAS DGE
TSUL

BSGRUBS, SKED TSANG BYAMS PA SMON LAM DANG, MKHAN CHEN BSKAL

BZANG, SGOM SDE LHA DBANG RGYA MTSO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS GZHUNG
BKA'

POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, ZUR CHOS KYI SLOB
DPON

BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS SOGS LA BSTEN NAS BSDUS CHEN GYIS MTSON

DPE KHRID BCAS DOGS GCOD MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR

PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING ZAB CHOS

MANG DU ZHUS, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR LHA RAMS PA'I DAM BCA'

MDZAD CING RGYUD SMAD DU ZHUGS NAS GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG
CHO GA

PHYAG LEN BCAS LA MKHAS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR RGYUD

SMAD KYI DGE BSKOS SU BZHENGS, YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN

LAS LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG, 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS SOGS DANG,

KLONG RDOL BLA MA LAS BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG GSAN, GZHAN YANG RGYAL

SRAS RIN PO CHE DANG, RVA SGRENG KHRI SBRUL, ZHI BA LHA, 'JIGS
MED

DBANG PO SOGS BLA MA BZHI BCUR NYE BAR BSTEN, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU

THAM PAR RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN

PAR RGYUD SMAD KYI MKHAN KHRIR PHEBS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GCIG
PAR

@951 NA

MNGA' RIS MTHO LDING GI KHRI DANG, DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD PAR BYANG
RTZE'I

KHRI LA PHEBS NAS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO GANG GI THAD NAS
KYANG SNGAR

SROL MA NYAMS PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI

BZHUGS NAS LO BDUN GYI RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING SKU
GSUNG

THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, DE NAS ZUR BZHUGS MDZAD CING SGRUB

PA NYAMS LEN KHO NA'I NGANG NAS DGUNG LO DON DGU PAR DGONGS PA

DBANG SNYAN GRAGS DANG, BYANG RTZE NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS ZHES

RE

@952 NA

ZHES GSOL, 'DUL BA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS SKOR RNAMS LA GSAN PAR

RGYAL

MTSAN DANG MJAL ZHING DBANG DANG GDAMS NGAG MA LUS PA THOB NAS

DPA'

MANG PO'I ZHAL GZIGS, DE NAS PO TO BA RIN CHEN GSAL LA BSTEN

TZAM

KYI

CHE

DGA'

BA'I

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHAS PA CHEN POR

GYUR, DE RJES BAL YUL DANG RGYA GAR SOGS SU PHEBS NAS LEGS SBYAR

GYI SKAD LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA MKHYEN TE RGYA GZHUNG GI BSTAN BCOS
MANG PO

'GYUR//

LAS//MDO DRAN PA NYE BZHAG//SHO LO KA STONG PHRAG SUM CU RTZA
DRUG DANG,

//SENG GE SGRA'I SGRUB THABS//, //SENG GE SGRA'I GZUNGS//,
//PADMA

GAR GYI DBANG PHYUG GI SGRUB THABS//, //'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG
DMAR

PO'I SGRUB THABS//, //BSTAN PA'I 'KHOR LO'I SGRUB THABS//,

//GSUNG GI MNGA' BDAG GI SGRUB THABS//, //SPROS PA MED PA'I
SGRUB

THABS//, //LHA LNGA'I KHYAD PAR GDAMS NGAG//, //RDO RJE LUS MED
KYI

SGRUB THABS//, //'PHAGS PA DPA' BO GCIG TU GRUB PA SGRUB

//SHES RAB MNGON PAR BSKYED PA//, //'PHAGS MA SENG LDENG NAGS

THABS//, //GDAMS NGAG GI KHYAD PAR GYI SGRUB THABS//, //SGROL MA

(B'A GRU ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA,)

@961 PA

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1866

LOR STONG 'KHOR MKHAR GYI NYE 'DABS SU YAB RTA MGRIN BSRUNG
DANG,

YUM LHA MO 'TSO GNYIS KYIS SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI
GSAL,

KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SKU 'BUM RANG SGAR DU GDAN SAR BKOD

CING AA BA KA ZHABS DRUNG YE SHES BSHAD SGRUB NYI MA LAS DGE
BSNYEN DANG

BAR MA RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA BZHES, SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD

NAMS RIN CHEN KLOG GI SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG

DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU THAM

PAR DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS TSAD MA
RNAM

'GREL DANG PHAR PHYIN BCAS LA 'BAD BRTZON NAN TAN DU MDZAD, RJE

BTZUN SKABS DANG PO'I SKYOR DPON DU BZHUGS, SKYABS RJE SHING

BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG LAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS SHING MI TRA BRGYA
RTZA'I DBANG

CHEN DANG, BA RI BRGYA RTZA, SNAR THANG BRGYA RTZA'I RJES GNANG
SOGS

CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN, DE NAS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR

ZHUGS TE SMIN GROL GYI LAM YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA LA THOS BSAM
PHUL

DU PHYIN PA MDZAD, CHE SHOS BLO BZANG BYANG CHUB BSTAN PA'I
SGRON ME

LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING TSUL KHRIMS GA-YAG RNGA BZHIN DU
BSRUNGS

BAR MDZAD, SE RA'I DGE BSHES AA MO TSANG LAS BKA' 'GYUR DANG RJE

YAB SRAS GSUM GYI GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG RNAMS GSAN, RAB BYUNG

BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1884 LOR SKU 'BUM
DUS 'KHOR

DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR BSKYANGS,

@962 PA

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1885 LOR SKU
'BUM RGYUD

PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS

'CHAD NYAN GANG LA YANG LE SHOR MED PA'I TSAGS 'DZIN GANG LEGS

GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR BYANG PHYOGS KHAL KHA'I YUL DU
THOG

MAR BSKYOD PA'I SKABS NAS BZUNG LHAM PHUD CHAB LEN GUNG TSIGS
PHAL

CHER DUS LAS MA YOL BAR MDZAD CING, CHU MCHOD DANG PHYAG 'TSAL

BA LA BRTEN NAS BLA MAR MCHOD PA DANG, THUN DRUG RNAL 'BYOR

SOGS LA RTAG SBYOR GUS SBYOR GYI BRTZON PA DRAG POS NYAMS LEN
SNYING

POR MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' BA'O, KHONG NI DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI

KHRI RABS SO GCIG PA DANG, RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI RABS RE DRUG
PA

YIN NO, ,

(B'A GRU ZHABS DRUNG BSHAD SGRUB 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1797

LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS KLU 'BUM LON PA SDE BAR YAB PHUN TSOGS

DANG, YUM SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU

BZHI PA'I ME PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1856 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
GIS

AA RIG BYAMS PA MCHOG LDAN DGE RGAN DE BSTEN NAS SKU 'BUM DPAL

LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE THUGS GNYER MDZAD,
DE

NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SE RA THEG CHEN GLING DU ZHUGS SHING THOS
BSAM

GANG LEGS GNANG, PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I DRUNG NAS DGE TSUL

GYI SDOM PA BZHES SHING CHOS RGYUN DU MA GSAN, RANG YUL DU PHEBS
TE

@963 PA

SKYABS RJE GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI DRUNG NAS BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS, SKU

'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN
SPYOD

DANG SLOB GNYER BCAS LA TSAGS 'DZIN LEGS PAR GNANG, KHRI ZUR

NAS SMAD SOGS KHAL KHA'I PHYOGS SU PHEBS TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO
RGYA CHEN

BSKOR, MKHAR SNGON SHR'I RI YE THU DANG, STONG 'KHOR LO THOG THU
THUB

BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO SOGS LAS SNGON RJES SU CHOS RGYUN MANG
DU

GSAN, DE NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LAN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS SUM CU SO GCIG
PA

YIN NO, ,

(PAKshI ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL 'BYOR,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1863

LOR MTSO SNGON CHING HE WANG GI HO'U SHOR YAB AENG KHE THA BU
NANG DANG,

YUM YU TAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL,

KHONG GIS KLU 'BUM RAB 'BYAMS PA YE SHES DGE LEGS SLOB DPON DU

BSTEN NAS SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING DANG RGYUD PA
GRVA TSANG

GZHUNG LAM 'BRAS BU'I DGONGS DON MA LUS PA LA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1895 LOR SKU
'BUM

BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA BA'I ME MO BYA

SKU GSHEGS PAR GSUNGS, GDUNG RA NYAG DGON DU BZHUGS,

DGUNG LO DRUG PAR GSER BUM BRTAG BSGRIL DKRUGS NAS PAn CHEN SKU

PHRENG BRGYAD PA'I YANG SRID DU THAG BCAD, RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN
RGYA

MTSOS DBU SKRA'I GTZUG PHUD BZHES TE MTSAN LA BLO BZANG THUB
BSTAN

CHOS KYI NYI MA DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL ZHES GSOL, BLO BZANG BSTAN

'DZIN DBANG RGYAL YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG

SOGS KYI CHOS BKA' MANG PO GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU PAR DBUS SU

PHEBS TE, RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG, BAR

MA RAB BYUNG SNGON DU SONG BAS TSIGS SNGA MA DGE TSUL DANG,
BSLAB

GZHI YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA BCAS RIM BZHIN

BZHES, DE NAS MTSAN NYID KYI GZHUNG LUGS BKA' POD LNGA LA GO RIM

LDAN PA'I THUGS GNYER GNANG, TSIG DON KUN LA THOS BSAM GYIS

SGRO DOGS LEGS PAR BCAD DE MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZER SON, DGUNG LO

NYER LNGA PAR RGYA GAR DU CHIBS BSGYUR THOG ZLA SHAS BZHUGS NAS
SLAR

BOD YUL DU CHIBS BSGYUR GNANG, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR GSER

ZANGS LAS BSGRUBS PA'I RJE BTZUN BYAMS PA MGON PO'I SKU BRNYAN
MTHO

TSAD KHRU BRGYA TZAM YOD PA ZHIG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR GSAR BZHENGS

MDZAD, DE NI 'DZAM GLING DU GSER ZANGS KYI SKU BRNYEN CHE SHOS
SHIG

YIN, DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PAR BKRA SHIS LHUN PO NAS SOG YUL BRGYUD

DE PE CIN DU CHIBS BSGYUR GNANG, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PAR GO MIN

TANG SRID GZHUNG GIS MTSAN 'PHAR GA-YANG tA'I THAM GA ZHIG 'BUL

BZHES KYI RTEN 'BREL BSKYANGS, RGYA SOG GI DGON SDE PHAL MO CHER

@977 PA

'PHEL LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS

DGUNG LO NYER DGU BAR GONG MA CHAN LUNG GIS AA SA HVA KAN AAM

AU DANG DZA SAG BLA MA NGAG DBANG DPAL 'BYOR BCAS MNGAGS NAS

BZHUGS SO, ,

(PAn CHEN BZANG PO BKRA SHIS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1410

RAB

BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1478 LOR SKU
GSHEGS, KHONG

GIS RJE SHES RAB SENG GE DANG, RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN GRUB PA, 'DUL

'DZIN BLO GROS SBAS PA, CHOS RJE BLO GROS CHOS SKYONG, DVAGS PO
KUN

BKRAS PA, CHOS RJE TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL BA, 'PHAGS 'OD PA BCAS

MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI BLA MA MANG POR BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS
KYI

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU GSAN, SA DGE RNYING GSUM GYI GSANG SNGAGS LA

MI MKHYEN PA MED DO, GANGS CAN CHOS 'PHEL GYI DGON PA BTAB CING

'CHAD MNYAM LEGS PAR SPEL, DGUNG LO RE BDUN PAR BKRA SHIS

LHUN PO'I GDAN SAR PHEBS, RGYAL BA DGE 'DUN GRUB PA'I SKU GDUNG

ZHAL CHEBS DANG MTHUN PAR DNGUL GYIS GDUNG KHANG RIN PO CHE'I
RGYAN

GI STENG DU

MCHOD KHANG LOGS SU GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, KHONG NI BKRA SHIS LHUN

PO'I KHRI PA GNYIS PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI SGRUB THABS
DANG,

GSAN, SHANGS 'BRAS SU SBUNGS KYI MKHAN PO'ANG MDZAD, DKYIL KHANG

SA

CHEN PO'I KHRI LA PHEBS, MKHAN THOG 'DIR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS

RGYAN THUGS GNYER DU PHEBS SKABS MJAL, 'GA' ZHIG GIS DE RING

DBEN SA RDZE DRUNG DANG MJAL BA 'DRA ZHUS PAS, MJAL SHIN TU

YI

DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB, THON PA MKHAS BTZUN YON TAN RGYA MTSO

@987 PA

BCAS BLA MAR BSTEN NAS PHAR PHYIN DANG, TSAD MA, DBU MA,

'DUL BA, MDZOD BCAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGAR SLOB GNYER DPYIS

PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR 'OD SNA'I BLA MA
SANGS

RGYAS BZANG PO DANG RIN CHEN CHOS BZANG GNYIS LAS DGE TSUL DANG

DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR RGYUD STOD
GRVA

TSANG DU ZHUGS TE SLOB DPON CHOS LDAN BLO GROS BLA MAR BSTEN NAS
LO NGO

GSUM GYI RING DU GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU
PHYIN PA

MDZAD CING, //RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM BSHAD// KYANG BRTZAMS, DGUNG
LO

SO BZHI PAR RGYUD STOD GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON GYI KHRI LA PHEBS
NAS LO

BCU BZHI'I RING RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN GNANG, DGUNG LO SO DRUG

PAR //GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RDZOGS GNYIS KA'I t'IK CHEN//

BRTZAMS SHING DE'I 'CHAD NYAN TSUGS, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PAR RGYAL

BA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I BKA' LTAR LO DRUG GI RING 'BRAS SPUNGS
BLO

GSAL GLING GI MKHAN PO MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA GNYIS PAR DGA' LDAN

GSER KHRIR PHEBS TE LO BDUN RING LA MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD PAR ZUR BZHUGS THOG 'BRAS SBUNGS KYI

KHRIR PHEBS, DE BZHIN DU SE RA THEG CHEN GLING DANG, SKYOR MO
LUNG,

PHAG MO CHOS SDE, NYI SDINGS, 'OD SNA, CHOS SDE RIN CHEN GLING
SOGS

ZHAL 'DZIN MKHAN PO MDZAD PAS RNAM DKAR GYI 'PHRIN LAS RGYAS,

RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I GTZUG PHUD BZHES NAS MTSAN GSOL,

KHONG NI DGA' LDAN KHRI THOG BCO LNGA PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG
RTZOM

@988 PA

NI //PHAR PHYIN GYI SPYI DON GSAL BA'I SGRON ME// DANG, //PHAR

PHYIN GYI MTHA' DPYOD YUM DON YANG GSAL SGRON ME//, //DBU MA'I
SPYI

DON ZAB DON GSAL BA'I SGRON ME// //DBU MA'I MTHA' DPYOD ZAB DON

YANG GSAL SGRON ME//BCAS CHOS TSAN BCU BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,

(PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO DANG 'DAS LO ZHIB TU MI GSAL MOD,

PHAL CHER SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BDUN PA'I LO RABS SUM CU SKABS

KYI MI YIN, KHONG NI BDE 'BYOR BYANG GI ZHAL NGO LA SKU
'KHRUNGS, THOS

BSAM GLING GI SLOB DPON MDZAD, BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GDAN SA CHEN

PO'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS GDUL BYA LA CHOS SKAL MANG DU BSTZAL, DE
NAS

LHUN RTZE'I MKHAN PO YANG MDZAD, KHONG NI BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I
KHRI PA

BCU GNYIS PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI BYANG STON MKHAS PA'I

DBANG PO'I DGONGS PA BZHIN MTSAN NYID KYI YIG CHA KHA SHAS
BZHUGS

SO,,

(PAn CHEN LHA DBANG BLO GROS,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO DANG 'DAS LO'I LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG

NI MYANG STOD RGYANG RO LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, LHA KHANG GRVA TSANG
NAS BKRA SHIS

LHUN POR BYON, KUN MKHYEN PA'I YIG CHA'I STENG NAS GZHUNG BKA'

BOD LNGAS MTSON MDO RGYUD GZHUNG LUGS KUN LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS,

DBUS KYI MNGA' RIS GRVA TSANGS DANG, RGYAL RTZE GZHI GNAS GRVA
TSANG

SOGS KYI MKHAN PO MDZAD, SHAR RTZE GRVA TSANG GI MKHAN POR PHEBS
SHING

@989 PA

KUN MKHYEN LEGS PA DON GRUB KYI GSUNG RGYUN RGYA CHER SPEL BAS
'PHRIN

LAS RGYA CHE'O, KHONG NI BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I KHRI PA BCO LNGA PA
YIN, ,

(PU RANGS BSOD NAMS BLO GROS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS NAS

BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG

THOS BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD CING, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG

LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PA MDZAD DE BSTAN BCOS GNYIS TZAM
BOD

BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

GNYIS

KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I SHING MO BYA LO
STE SPYI LO

'DUL BA GSAN, 'BROM STON RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS LAS GDAM@990 PA

NGAG RNAMS ZHUS, 'BROM STON 'DAS RJES RVA SGRENG GI GDAN SA YUN

RING DU BSKYANGS TE LAM SGRON RTZA BAR MDZAD NAS BKA' GDAMS
GZHUNG

DRUG GI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD DE BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG PA'I SROL BTOD,

PO TO DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD NAS TSOGS PA BSKYANGS PA'I

SKABS SU GRVA PA NYIS STONG BRGYAD BRGYA TZAM 'DUS TE CHOS 'CHAD
PA LA

MKHAS PA'I MCHOG TU GYUR PA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE
BA

NI DGE BSHES PHO BRANG SDINGS PA, DGE BSHES DOL PA BA, DGE

BSHES GLANG THANG PA, DGE BSHES SHA RA BA, BKA' RAM SDINGS MA

BCAS BZHUGS SO,,

(PRA NYE NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS,)

GYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'KHRUNGS LO MI GSAL, RAB BYUNG BCU
GSUM

PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1775 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI THOG MA'I GRVA RGYUN YIN, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG
PAR

DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS
SHING

GZHUNG BKA' BOD LNGA LA THUGS GNYER LEGS PAR MDZAD PAS LHA RAMS

PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, SGO MANG DGE BSKOS KYANG MDZAD, DE

NAS RGYUD SMAD DU ZHUGS SHING GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG CHO
GA PHYAG

@991 PA

LEN BCAS LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS PAS SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' YANG LEGS

PAR THON, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS GRUB CHEN BRGYAD CU'I

ZHES LUNG

BSTAN MDZAD, RGYAL SRAS YE SHES GRAGS PA LA SOGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB

MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, RTZE THANG

MKHAN PO DANG RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD BZHUGS, DE NAS YUN
RING

DU MA 'GOR BAR SGO MANG MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM

KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM LEGS PA MDZAD CING

BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA GONG NAS GONG DU SPEL BA MDZAD DO, LHAG
PAR

BYUNG

BKA' 'GYUR GYI LJAGS LUNG DANG SNYAN NGAG ME LONG GI RTZA 'GREL

GSAN PAR MDZAD, AA RIG RI KHROD PA LAS DBYANGS CAN SGRA MDO'I RI

@993 PA

DO, ,

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1276 LOR

LO STE SPYI

LO 1342 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI YUM SNGA MO NAS GRONGS TE LUG

PA

DANG GRUNG THOB AU RGYAN PA GNYIS KYIS 'DI BA DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN

CHEN PO ZHIG 'ONG GSUNG NAS BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR MKHAN

CHEN GSER KHANG PA DANG ME STON 'DUL 'DZIN GNYIS LAS RAB TU
BYUNG

GSAR MDZAD, DE NAS STAG SDE SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN GYI MDUN DU
PHEBS

TE SNGAGS DANG MTSAN NYID KYI SDE SNOD MANG DU GSAN, KHYAD PAR
DU

DUS KYI 'KHOR LO LA LEGS PAR BSLABS PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR,

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR STAG SDE BA GSHEGS NAS LO TZ'A BA MCHOG
LDAN

YANG GSAN,

BA YIN NO, ,

@998 PA

RIN PO CHE GNYIS LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DE

NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SGO MANG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS SHING
GZHUNG

CHEN RNAMS LA SLOB GNYER LEGS PAR MDZAD DE RANG DGON DU PHYIR

PHEBS, CUNG MA 'GOR BAR RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO BDUN GYI

RING DU 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM

GANG LEGS GNANG, RGYUD KHANG ZHIG GSOS DANG, DAM CAN GYI

BTZAN KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PA BCAS PA BZHENGS MDZAD, DE NAS

KUN MKHYEN RIN PO CHES BKA' LTAR GTZANG DGON DANG, BRAG DKAR

DGON GNYIS MNYAM DU BSKYANGS SHING, BRAG DKAR DGON PAR 'DU

KHANG SPYI KHANG SOGS GSAR BSKRUN DANG, GTZANG DGON PA CHOS SRID

GANG NAS KYANG GRVA ZUR MA NYAMS PA MDZAD, GNYA' GONG BRAG DKAR

DANG, GSER CHEN STAG RDZONG SOGS SU PHEBS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD DE THUGS DAM SHIN TU 'PHEL BAR GYUR, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1787 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL GYI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO NGO GSUM GYI RING DU GDAN SA
BSKYANGS

SHING CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO SOGS SNGAR SROL MA NYAMS PA

MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS GSANG SNGAGS SMIN RGYAS GLING GI KHRI LA
BZHUGS TE

'CHAD NYAN SPEL MUR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN RABS BCU DGU PA YIN NO,,

(DPA' RIS BLO BZANG RAB GSAL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1840

@999 PA

LOR KAN SU'U THEN KRU'U RDZONG GI DPA' RIS YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

'DAS LO MI GSAL, SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NAS MTSAN NYID THEG PA'I

GZHUNG CHEN PO LNGA DANG, RIG GNAS CHUNG BA LNGA LA SBYANGS PA
MTHAR

PHYIN PA MDZAD RJES, SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU DKA' CHEN BZHI'I
GRVA

SKOR MDZAD DE, MDO DBUS KHAMS GSUM DU MKHAS DBANG DPA'

RIS RAB GSAL ZHES YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR,

GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I PAndI TA CHEN PO 'JU MI PHAM RIN PO CHES
KYANG KHONG

GI SNYAN PA GSAN NAS, MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG CHEN PO'I DKA' GNAD

HA CANG MANG PO ZHIG LAS BRTZAMS TE DOGS SLONG GI DRI BA MANG DU
MDZAD

PA'I LAN KYANG 'BUL BA GNANG ZHING, DE LA 'JU MI PHAM RIN PO
CHES

SLAR YANG DGAG PA'I TSUL GYIS DOGS SLONG GNANG BA DE LA YANG LAN

MDZAD PA SOGS MKHAS PA'I NANG NA MKHAS PA MDZES PA'I DPE LTAR

PHAN TSUN THUGS MTHUN DGYES SPRO'I RNAM PA SHA STAG LAS, GRUB
MTHA'I

PHYOGS ZHEN DANG CHAGS SDANG RANG RGYAL GZHAN PHAM GYI KUN SLONG
NGAN

PAS MDZAD PA GTAN NAS MED PA NI MKHAS DBANG RNAM PA GNYIS KYI

RTZOD YIG LA GZIGS NA GSAL, RGYU MTSAN DE 'DRA'I RKYEN LA BRTEN

NAS T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU 'PHRENG BCU GSUM PA 7THUB BSTAN RGYA
MTSO MES RGYAL

NANG KHUL DU PHEBS PA'I LAM ZHOR SKU 'BUM GDAN SA CHEN POR RGYUN

RING BZHUGS SKABS, DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO 'DI NYID SKU

'BUM DGON POR GDAN ZHU GNANG THOG SGRA MDO DBYANGS CAN MA'I

SA RIS DANG, SNYAN NGAG ME LONG, SDEB SBYOR BCAS GSAN BZHEs
@1000 PA

GNANG BA'I SKOR RNAM THAR DU GSAL, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI RTOGS

BRJOD DANG, MCHAN 'GREL, DRIS LAN, MTHA' DPYOD, GA-YANG

'BOD BCAS PO TI GCIG TZAM MI RIGS RIG GNAS PHO BRANG GI DPE

MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(DPA' RIS LHA RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS DAR,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI 'JU LAG DPA' RIS PHYOGS SU YIN, KHONG SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN

BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL BCAS
LA

SBYANGS PA MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS SHING 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO
MANG

GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS
BSAM PHUL

DU PHYIN PA MDZAD, LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD
NAS LHA

RAMS PA'I MING BTAGS 'DZIN, RGYAL SRAS RIN PO CHE SOGS BSHES

GNYEN DAM PA DU MAR BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB KHRID MANG DU

GSAN PAR MDZAD, DBEN PA'I GNAS DU MAR TSOGS BSAGS SGRIB

SBYONG DANG 'BREL BA'I THUGS DAM ZAB MO LA RTAG TU GZHOL BAR
MDZAD,

DE NAS SDE BA GZHUNG NAS KHAL KHA KHU REL CHEN MO'I T'A BLA MAR
PHEBS

DGOS KYI BKA' LUNG BSGYUR BA BZHIN BYANG PHYOGS KHAL KHA RJE
BTZUN

DAM PA'I KHU REL CHEN MOR PHEBS SHING, RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO

CHE'I ZHABS 'DEGS KYIS MTSON PA'I TSAN KHAG NYER BDUN GYI CHOS
SRID

GNYIS KA'I BYA BA MTHA' DAG GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BAR MDZAD, DE

NAS RANG YUL DU PHYIR PHEBS SHING BSTAN 'GROR SMAN PA'I MDZAD PA

BA

NO, ,

(DPAL KHANG NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO,)

SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG GIS ZHVA LU LO TZ'A BA CHOS
SKYONG

GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHAS PA

DGA' RGYAL MTSAN HOR RGYAL PO GO DAN GYIS LUNG DRUG SDE BZHIR

DRANGS KHAR BLA MA 'U YUG PA BSOD NAMS SENG GE DANG, SHAR PA YE

SHES 'BYUNG GNAS MA GTOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN THAMS CAD LA

PHYAG 'TSAL DU BCUG NAS SH'AKYA BZANG PO SA SKYAR GZHI GNAS PA

SE CHEN RGYAL POS ZAM GLU GUN MIN DBANG HU'I GO GNAS DANG SHEL

GSAR CHEN MO BTAB CING YUL BDE ZHOL 'JAGS MDZAD, RAB BYUNG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YIG RTZIS DANG, 'JIG RTEN LUGS KYI
@1010 PA

BSTAN BCOS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DGE SLONG TSAL PA'I DRUNG

DU PHEBS TE THEG PA CHE CHUNG GI CHOS MANG DU GSAN PA MDZAD CING
CHOS

SRID GNYIS KYIS MNGA' 'BANGS BSKYANGS, DE NAS MDO KHAMS SMAD

DU PHEBS TE 'GRO BA MANG PO NAD KYI SDUG BSNGAL LAS BSKYABS PA
MDZAD

CING BDE SKYID KYI GNAS SU BKOD, RGUN 'BRUM GYI SA BON YANG

BSNAMS TE RANG YUL DU KHYAB GDAL SBEL BAS 'DOD 'JO'I 'BRAS BU

DUS SU SMIN PAR MDZAD, SLAR YANG DGE SLONG TSAL PA'I ZHABS LA

GTUGS TE GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA CHED DU SBYANGS PA MDZAD

PAS MKHAS PA CHEN PO GYUR TE SLOB MA YANG MANG DU BSKYANGS NAS
GSO

RIG 'PHEL RGYAS 'GRO BAR MDZAD RJES MNGON DU 'PHAGS PA BZHAG

DE NAS KARMA PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE'I (1284-1339) ZHABS PAD LA

BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS SKAL MANG DU THOB, RANG NYID KYIS

BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I MTHU STOBS LAS GA-YU CHEN RGYAL MO 'OD

'BAR ZHES PA'I YID BZHIN GYI NOR BU PHYAG TU THEBS TE CHOS RGYAL
SRONG

BTZAN SGAM PO'I MGUL RGYAN DU PHUL BA SOGS BSTAN PA'I ZHABS TOG

BRJOD KYIS MI LANGS BA MDZAD DO, MDOR NA DPON PO DANG SMAN PA

SBRAGS MA MDZAD NAS MNGA' THANG DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR MDZAD NAS

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA

DPON KHAMS PA GRAGS PA ZHES ZHU'O,,

(DPON TSANG NANG SO DAR RGYAS,)

KHONG NI BYANG NGOS NANG SO DAR RGYAS DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE

@1011 PA

LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(DPON TSANG YE SHES,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BDUN PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

'BRI GUNG KA TSAL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS NAS

SMAN RDZAS LA SPRO BA SHIN TU BRTAS PAS SNGON GYI BAG CHAGS SAD
CING GSO

RIG GI BSTAN PA BSKYANG BA'I RTEN 'BREL 'GRIGS, DGUNG LO NYI SHU

THAM PA NAS DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, DE NAS

DKON MCHOG 'GRO PHAN DBANG PO'I ZHABS PAD LA BSTEN NAS GSO BA

RIG PA'I RGYUD SDE RNAM BZHI DANG, DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG
ZHAL

RGYUN RNAMS LA SBYANGS PA DANG, LAG LEN GYI NYAMS MYONG DANG
SBRAGS

TE LO NGO BCU PHRAG TZAM GYI RING DU THOS BSAM MDZAD, DE NAS SKU
TSE

GONG BOR GSO BA RIG PA'I BSTAN PA BSKYANGS NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM

GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS

MCHOG TU GYUR PA NI SGAR 'OG PA'I KARMA BSTAN 'PHEL YIN, KHONG
GI

CAN

YUL

DANG 'DON

GRVA RGYUN

DU ZHUGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR YIG GZUGS KYI MDZES RTZAL DANG SUM

@1014 PA

RTAGS DAG GSUM BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN

PAR RDZONG SNGON BLO GROS TSANG LAS BKA' CHOS MANG PO GSAN CING
DE NAS

BZUNG DPE GZIGS MA CHAG PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR

RDZONG DKAR DU PHEBS TE GTZANG DGE BSHES TSANG LAS SNGA PHYIR
DPE KHRID

MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR SDI TSA DGON DU PHEBS TE
ZHVA

SHAR PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA, GUNG RU BLO BZANG DON GRUB, MKHAN PO

BLO BZANG THUGS RJE SOGS LAS 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS DANG, LAM

SGRON, BDE LAM, MYUR LAM, 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG, GSANG

BDE 'JIGS GSUM GYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM MTHA' YAS PA GSAN,

DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PAR RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG RGYUD
PA'I MKHAN

MTSAMS SU MKHAN KHRI LAS DGONGS GROL BYUNG STE SPANG LUNG RI
KHRID DU LO

DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PAR SHAR RTZE'I KHRI LA BZHUGS PA DANG RGYAL
BA LUNG

LOR DGA'

(SBOM BRAG PA BSOD NAMS RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1170

PA'I SA MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1249 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG
LO LNGA

PAR YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG MKHAS PAR MKHYEN, DGUNG LO DGU PAR BLA MA

GNYAN LHA KHANG SGANG BA YAB SRAS LAS BDE DGYES LA SOGS PA GSANG

SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR SANGS RGYAS

RAS CHEN DANG MJAL NAS GDAMS PA MANG DU ZHUS, SEMS KYI GNAS

LUGS RTOGS PA'I RTOGS PA'ANG 'KHRUNGS, DE NAS BLA MA'I BKA'

LTAR SPEL SGO DGON PAR PHEBS TE LO NGO BCU DRUG RING DU SGRUB PA

PA

DANG,

@1022 PA

(SPOM 'BOR DGE 'DUN TSUL KHRIMS,)

DPAL 'DZOM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI
PA'I

ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1807 LO'I HO ZLA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES
NYER LNGAR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN PAR YAB YUM GNYIS KYI GAM NAS

YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SOGS LA BYANG CHUB PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR RGYAL THANG DGE LDAN DGON DU ZHUGS NAS

MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG SBYIN PA SOGS LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL

BSGRUBS, SGRUB GRVA'I 'DON CHOS DANG GAR THIG DBYANGS GSUM BCAS

LA SBYANGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR DBUS SU BYON TE SER

SMAD THOS BSAM GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS KHU BO SBYIN PA
CHOS BZANG

DANG, ZHAL SNGA BSKAL BZANG RNAM RGYAL SOGS LA BSTEN ZHING DBU
MA,

'DUL BA, PHAR PHYIN, MNGON PA MDZOD, RNAM 'GREL BCAS LA

LEGS PAR SBYANGS TE TSOGS LANGS DANG, GLENG BSRE, LHA RAMS PA

BCAS KYI MTSAN BTAGS DON DANG LDAN PA BZHES, DGUNG LO SO BZHI

PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS
SHING

BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSAN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU THAM PAR

STOD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG CHO
GA PHYAG LEN

BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD CING SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' LEGS PAR THON,

DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL GYI MKHAN KHRI DANG,
DGUNG

@1023 PA

THAM PAR RGYUD PA'I MKHAN KHRI, SHAR RTZE'I KHRI BCAS LA RIM

NAS 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO STAG
LO

STE SPYI LO 1794 LOR GONG MA CHIN LUNG GI T'I SHR'IR PHO BRANG

DU PHEBS, GONG MAS T'I SH'I'I CHO LO DANG BKA' SHOG THAM KA BCAS

KHRI BSKYANGS SHING MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI 'CHAD MNYAN GONG NAS

BA DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO
LNGA

RNYING GI DBANG GDAMS PA LUNG LA SOGS PA GANG BZHUGS THAMS CAD

@1036 PA

GSAN, KO BRAG PA'I DRUNG DU'ANG CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, RJE RGOD
TSANG PA

LAS 'BRUG SKOR THAMS CAD GSAN, SA PAn LAS SA SKYA PA'I CHOS SKOR

RNAMS ZHUS, RJE SPYAN SNGA BA LAS 'DRI GUNG PA'I CHOS SKOR RNAMS
ZHUS,

GZHAN YANG BLA MA BZANG DGU'I ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS GDAMS PA

(SBYAN SNGA SHES RAB 'BYUNG GNAS,)

RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SOGS
LAS

LUNG RGYUN PO TI LNGA BRGYAR NYE BA DANG, RJES GNANG STONG PHRAG
LA NYE BA,

KHRID CHEN KHAG LNGA BCUR BRGAL BA, DBANG CHEN NYI SHUR NYE BAS
MTSON

PA'I SA DGE BKA' RNYING SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG RGYA MTSO
LTA BUR

GSAN BSAM RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS GTZANG DANG, DVAGS

PO, KONG PO, LHO BYANG, MDO SMAD, KHAMS PHYOGS DANG BCAS

@1049 PHA

PAR ZHABS KYI BCAGS TE SER SKYA MANG TSOGS RNAMS LA GANG LA GANG

'TSAMS KYIS CHOS KYI SBYIN PA BTANG NAS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I LAM
LA

BKOD PAR MDZAD, SKU TSE GANG BOR GRVA BU SLOB RNAMS LA 'CHAD
NYAN

GYI MDZAD PA 'PHRIN LAS KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG LA

MDO DBUS KHAMS GSUM DU KHYAB PA'I SLOB MA MANG PO BYIN PA LAS

THUGS SRAS KYI THU BO CHE RNAM 'DREN CHEN PO'I YONGS SU 'DZIN PA
MCHOG

ZUNG LTA BU'O, ,KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI//BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG//

DANG, //LAM RIM BSDUS DON//SOGS MANG DU BZHUGS SO,,

(PHA BZHIS ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DGE LEGS RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO
1870

LOR STONG 'KHOR CHA GAN 'O SU ZHES PA'I SDE BAR YAB DBANG PHYUG
TSE RING

GI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN

PAR RGYUD PA MKHAN PO AOR TU SU ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG MKHAS
GRUB NYI

MA'I MDUN NAS BAR MA RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD

PAR SKU 'BUM DGON DU PHEBS TE MTSAN SGROG MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I MDUN NAS DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, DE NAS DPAL

LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE RNAM 'GREL DANG
PHAR PHYIN

LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PA DANG, TSOGS LANGS BZHENGS SHING
KHYAD

PAR BSDUS GRVA'I DAM BCA' MING DANG DON MTHUN PA BZHAG DGUNG

LO NYI SHU THAM PAR SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MDUN
NAS

TSIGS PHYI MA'I SDOM PA BZHES SHING BSLAB BYA RNAMS TSUL BZHIN
BSRUN
@1050 PHA

BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PA DPAL LDAN GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD

PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I
GZHUNG LA

THOS BSAM PHRA ZHIB GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PA RAB BYUNG BCO
LNGA

PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1893 LOR DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB
KYI KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI SGO NAS THUGS KHUR CHER BZHES

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU THAM CAD PAR DBUS GTZANG DAG PA'I ZHING
DU

PHEBS SHING RGYAL BA YAB SRAS DANG, JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS SOGS
RTEN

DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA LA MJAL PHYAG SMON 'DUN GNAS 'BREL

MCHOD BKUR RGYA CHER MDZAD, DE NAS SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS TE DGUNG LO

SO GSUM PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1902 LOR

RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG
CHOS

'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM GANG LEGS GNANG, KHRI ZUR NAS BSTAN

DANG 'GRO BA'I DON DU THUGS KHUR MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' PA'O, KHONG

NI SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS SO DRUG PA DANG,
RGYUD

DGUNG LO DGU PAR BYA KHYI LHA KHANG DU MKHAN PO TSUL KHRIMS DANG

TZAM BSTEN NAS THUN MONG RIG GNAS DANG, THUNG MONG MA YIN PA'I

BZHUGS SO, ,

(PHUR LCOG BYAMS PA RGYA MTSO,)

BCAS

(PHUR BU 'OD,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD
YUL

GAR SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING

GZHUNG DANG LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS NAS
BSTAN@1060 PHA

BCOS GCIG TZAM BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM

BRGYAD PA

BZHUGS SO, ,

(PHE KYVA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, PHYAG RDO THANG

YE HOR PHE KY'A SDE BAR YAB TANG JIN DANG YUM P'A BSHU'A GNYIS
KYI SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DON GRUB
KYI MDUN

NAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS TE GDAN SAR BKOD, LHA

RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS DAR DANG, KHUR LUGS SMON RAMS PA BSHAD

SGRUB NYI MA SOGS SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS TSOGS 'DON GYI SKOR
RNAMS

BYANG BAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS
SGOR

ZHUGS SHING GZHUNG CHE CHUNG DGONGS DON LEGS PAR RTOGS PA'I
RTZOD PA

SHIN TU BZANG, SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I
DBANG

PHYUG TSUL KHRIMS PHUN TSOGS DPAL BZANG PO'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN
RDZOGS

KYI SDOM PA BZHES, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO STE
SPYI

LO 1865 LOR SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS,

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1868 LOR SKU
'BUM

SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS DUS SKABS DANG BSTUN
PA'I

CHOS SRID KYI BKA' DRIN BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS SMAD PHYOGS AA BA
GA

HO'U SHO SOGS SHOG KHA DU MAR LAN GRANGS KHA SHAS PHEBS TE GDUL
BYA'I

RE 'DOD YONGS SU BSKANGS, SLAR SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS TE RTZE BLA
BRANG

@1061 PHA

CHEN MO GSAR BZHENGS DANG, SMAN PA'I 'DU KHANG GSAR GSO,

TSOGS KHRO CHEN MO GSAR BLUG SOGS KYI THEBS SU DNGUL SRANG STONG
PHRAG

GSUM LHAG GI SPYI 'JOG RMAD DU BYUNG BA PHUL BA SOGS BKA' DRIN
CHE,

THUGS DAM ZHAL 'DON GYI RIM PAR CHU RGYUN LTAR BRTZON PA'I NGOS
ZHI

BAR GSHEGS SO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI

DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR DPAL DAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR

PA'I SA

MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1903 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI

CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM GANG LEGS GNANG NGO, KHRI ZUR NAS

KYANG BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN KHO NAR GNYER NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD

DO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS DRUG CU RE
GCIG

PA DANG, SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN BDUN CU DON

BRGYAD PA YIN NO, ,

(BUM PAR MKHAN CHEN TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1847

LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS KLU 'BUM TSO BAR YAB WANG KUN ZIN BA
HUN

LO MI GSAL, KHONG HOR LDING SGOM PA BLO BZANG DGE LEGS RGYAL

GZHUNG

RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS LNGA BCU PA YIN NO, ,

(BYA TSANG DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA YAR 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI 1858 LOR

RKA PHUG NYE 'DABS BYA TSANG DU YAB BLO GROS DPAL BZANG DANG,
YUM

GDONG RKO MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL,
KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS SU YAB BLO GROS DPAL BZANG LAS YI GE'I
SBYOR

KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA LEGS PAR BSLABS, RJE THAR SHUL

RIN PO CHE DGE 'DUN CHOS RGYA MTSO BYA TSANG RGYAL MTSAN BZANG
PO'I

SPRUL SKUR NGOS BZUNG ZHING DE BA LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, DGUNG
LO

BCU GNYIS PAR BYA KHYUNG DGON DU PHEBS TE MDO BA DKA' BCU BRTZON

'GRUS BZANG PO SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA

THOS BSAM MDZAD, GZHAN YANG RJE ZHVA DMAR RIN PO CHE DGE 'DUN

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DANG, GSER TOG NI MIN HAN BLO BZANG TSUL

KHRIMS RGYA MTSO, SHING BZA' PAndI TA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG
PHYUG

SOGS LAS CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GSAN PA MDZAD, MDO BA MKHAN CHEN

BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS, DE NAS SOGS YUL DU

BYON TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHER BSKOR, SNGA PHYIR PHYAG
RDZAS CI 'BYOR@1100 BA

CHUD ZOS SU MA BTANG BAR BYA KHYUNG 'DU KHANG CHEN MO'I KLAD DU
DNGUL

SRANG STONG DANG LNGA BCU'I RIN THANG GI RGYAL MTSAN CHA GCIG
DANG,

GSER TOG DUNG CHEN DNGUL GYI TSIGS RGYAN CAN, GSER GDUNG CHEN

MOR GSER LJANG RDUNG GI MCHOD RKONG SOGS RGYA CHER BSKRUN PA
PHUL,

DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GCIG PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA PHO
SPREL LO STE SPYI

LO 1908 LOR BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS
'GRIG

LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO DAM GANG LEGS

GNANG, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1909 LOR
RGYAL

DBANG SKU PHRENG BCU GSUM PA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO DBANG PHYOGS
GSER

GYI RGYAL KHAB NAS ZHAL BSGYUR TE SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS PA'I SKABS
SU

MKHAN PO 'DI BAS DBU DRANGS SHING BYA KHYUNG DGON DU SPYAN
DRANGS PA

BZHIN DE GAR PHEBS NAS DPE KHRID DANG BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYI
LJAGS

LUNG GNANG, RGYUN JA'I THEBS SU DONG KHRON STONG GSUM SBYOR
'JAGS

DANG, GCAN RONG STOD SMAD NAS JA TSUL GNYIS RE'I DO DAM PA
BSKOS,

AA RA PA TZA'I LHA KHANG DU 'JAM DBYANGS BSNYUNG GNAS 'DZUGS
RGYA'I

LJAGS BKOD DANG, KHRI KHAR TSE LHA RNAM GSUM GYI BRGYA THANG
GSER

ZHUN MAS BZHENGS PA BYIN RLABS KYI RTEN DU GNANG BA DA LTA AA RA
PA

TZA'I LHA KHANG DU BZHUGS SO, DA DUNG RGYAL DBANG RIN PO CHES
BYA KHYUNG

DGON DU BKA' SHOG PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PA DANG THAM GA GRU SGOR THAM

GA-YOG DU BKA' SHOG PHYAG RGYAS BTAB PA DANG THAM GA GRU SGOR
THAM

GA-YOG BCAS SRID NA RNYED DKA' BA'I BKA'I DRIN BLA LHAG TU
BSKYANGS,

KHRI ZUR NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN KHO NAR GNYER NAS DUS 'DA'

@1101 BA

BA'O, KHONG NI BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS DGU BCU

(BYA YUL BA CHEN PO GZHON NU 'OD,)

LOR

GYI LJANG BZA' LCAM BU GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
GNYIS

PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1138 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG
LO CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS YAB GSHEGS SHING YUM GZHAN DU BAG MA SONG BAS NE
NE

MO ZHIG GIS BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR SPYAN SNGA BA'I SLOB MA
YE SHES

RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN LA GZHON NU 'OD CES GSOL,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR STOD LUNG PA RIN CHEN SNYING PO LAS CHOS
SKOR

MANG DU GSAN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS STOD LUNG PAS RANG GI BLA MA
SPYAN

BKA'

GDAMS PA'I GDAMS NGAG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA GSAN, SPYAN SNGA PA'I

YUL DU

DGU,

GNAS BCAS YIN, ,

(BYA YUL SANGS RGYAS SGOM PA,)

KHONG BYIS PA'I DUS NAS LKOG GYUR MANG PO SHES PA'I GSAL SNANG

DGE

RDO RJE GZHON NU ZHES GSOL, MKHAN PO SBAL TE LAS 'DUL BA NYIS

KHRID TSAR GCIG GSAN, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR GLANG LUNG BA
RTZON

BSTEN NAS GDAMS PA THAMS CAD MA LUS PAR GSAN PA MDZAD,

TING NGE 'DZIN KHYAD PAR CAN THUGS RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS, GLANG LUNG
PA SKU

SANGS

BRGYAD

CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO DANG, BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, MKHAN CHEN

ZLA MGON SHES RABS BCAS KYI MDUN NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG DANG SUM

RTAGS DAG GSUM LA SBYANGS, DE DUS MTSAN LA RGYA RUG DAR MA RIG

'DZIN GSOL, DE NAS DKA' LNGA BA RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG DANG,

PO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL SOGS KYI DRUNG NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG

GNAS THAMS CAD LA DPYIS PHYIN PAR SBYANGS SHING, SENG GE RGYAL

MTSAN GYI MDUN NAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, MTSAN LA RNAM

GIS

TA SI TU'I GO GNAS DANG DNGUL GYI THAM GA BSTZAL, DGUNG LO SO

THOB

NGOS 'DZIN

RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS SO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI RTZE
THANG PA

DBANG DON GRUB SOGS LA BSTEN NAS BSDUS GZHUNG DANG, DBU

PHAR, 'DUL MDZOD, RNAM 'GREL BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN

PAR MDZAD, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS
SHING

BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSAN, GRUB DBANG DANG DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB
DANG,

RJE PHUR LCOG PA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS BYAMS PA RGYA MTSO, RGYAL
BA BSKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSO, KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN, KHRI CHEN
RGYAL MTSAN

SENG GE AA KA BSOD NAMS BZANG PO, BKA' GYUR BA RGYAL MTSAN

'OD ZER SOGS LAS ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN ZHING BKA' 'GYUR GYI

LUNG SOGS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA
SKOR

MDZAD NAS SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE GSANG SNGAGS KYI
GZHUNG DANG

CHO GA PHYAG LEN BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD CING RGYUD PA'I BLA MA
DBU

MDZAD DANG, RGYUD KYI MKHAN KHRI, BYANG RTZE'I MKHAN KHRI BCAS
LA

PHEBS NAS 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, ZHOGS KYI RGYUD KHANG ZHIG GSOS
RGYA

CHER MDZAD, RGYAL BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN DU
BZHUGS,

RGYAL BA RIN PO CHES TSIGS SNGA PHYI'I SDOM BZHES SKABS KYI LAS
SLOB

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA BRGYUD PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO
SPREL

LO STE SPYI LO 1764 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRIR BZHUGS NAS LO BDUN

GYI RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING RJE RIN PO CHE'I DNGUL SKU
MI TSAD MA

KHRI RGYAB YOL BCAS BZHENGS PA LHA LDAN DKYIL 'KHOR SDINGS SU
BZHUGS

SO, GSER ZANGS LAS JO SKU MI TSAD MA 'PHRA RGYAN PHUN SUM TSOGS
PA

ZHIG GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD PA BYA KHYUNG DU 'BUL BAR MDZAD, DGUNG

@1112 BA

LO DON GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, GDUNG

RTEN BYES GRVA TSANG DU BZHUGS, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA BYA
KHYUNG NGAG

DBANG CHOS GRAGS ZHES ZHU'O, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI 'DZIN

(BYANG RTZE NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS,)

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(BYANG RTZE DON GRUB RGYA MTSO,)

1655 LOR KRE HOR NAG TSANG DU YAB SPEN PA TSE RING DANG, YUM

DPAL BSAM 'DZOM PA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU

GNYIS PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1727 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG
GRVA

TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS BSDUS GZHUNG SOGS LA SBYANGS PA
DANG,

NYIN RE LA SHOG GU MDA' TSAD MA BCU RE TZAM CHAG MED DU THUGS
'DZIN

GNANG ZHING, PHAR PHYIN DANG, DBU MA, 'DUL BA, MDZOD,

RNAM 'GREL SOGS LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA SKYED DE

YANG LEGS BSHAD GSER PHRENG DANG RNAM BSHAD SNYING PO'I RGYAN

NAS LHA

RAMS PA AANG DANG PO'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

BYANG CHUB PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE SE

RA BYES PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS BRAG RI NGAG DBANG
DON GRUB

DANG, BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG SOGS LA BSTEN ZHING BSDUS GZHUNG

CHUNG YAN LAG DANG BCAS PAR GSAN BSAM MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD,

SE RA'I GLING BSRE'I BKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD, RGYAL BA BSKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSO DANG, DUNG DKAR NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO,

RIN CHEN BSAM GRUB SOGS SLOB DPON SUM CU LHAG LA BSTEN NAS

BRGYAD KYI BAR

DGA'

BLO GROS DANG, DPAL LDAN BLA MA, BLA MA KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN, RGYAS BA'I SRAS PO THOGS MED BZANG PO, BU STON RIN CHEN

KYI BLA RABS BDUN CU DON GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO DU MA BLA MAR BSTEN NAS RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB

MTHA' DAG LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS TE MTHAR PHYIN PAR MDZAD, KHYAD

KHRID MANG

NAS NANG SA LA GDAN DRANGS PA LTAR DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PAR (1408)

BRGYUD DE GONG

BDUD

RTZI BSTZAL BAS GONG MA CHEN PO YAB SRAS GNYIS KYI DBU BLAR
BKUR,

"'PHRIN LAS SNA TSOGS LA MKHAS SHING GSAL BA CHOS NYID DAM PA

@1122 BA

MCHOG TU RGYAL BA, SHES RAB RNAM DAG SNANG BA CHEN PO KUN TU
KHYAB

CING RGYAL KHAMS SKYOB PA, BSTAN PA RGYAS MDZAD RAB TU DGE PA,

BYAMS CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO" ZHES MNGA' GSOL TE 'JA' SA DANG
'BUL

BA GNANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE GNYIS PAR BOD DU PHEBS NAS RJE TZONG

KHA PA DANG MJAL TE GONG MAS GNANG PA'I GNAS BCU'I 'THAG SKU,

LJON SHING GI GUR, GSER DNGUL GYI MAn dAL BCAS PHUL NAS ZHABS

BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS KYANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE LNGA BAR (1419)

RJE TZONG KHA PA'I BKA' SLOB LTAR SE RA THEG CHEN GLING BTAB STE
'CHAD

MNYAN GYIS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN BCU BAR (14

24) GONG MA YUNG LOS SLAR YANG GDAN DRANGS PA LTAR PHEBS KYANG
GONG

MA'I PHO BRANG GI KHYAD NYER 'BYOR SKABS GONG MA SKU GSHEGS, 'ON
KYANG

SRAS Z'ON D'ES YAB RGYAL PO LAS KYANG LHAG PA'I GUS 'DUD MDZAD
PAR

MA ZAD, "NUB PHYOGS KYI LHA'I SRAS PO T'A GU'U SHR'I" ZHES PA'I
CHO LO

GNANG ZHING CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHER BSKOR TE 'GRO BA RNAMS
SMIN GROL

GYI LAM LA 'GOD PAR MDZAD DO, GSUNG LAS SKYES PA'I BU SLOB KYANG

SNYE THANG BA CHOS RJE AA MO LHA BA DANG, CHOS RJE BSOD NAMS
SHES RAB

SOGS MANG DU BYON YANG, 'DI RNAM PA GNYIS NI GONG MA YUNG LO'I

SRAS Z'ON D'E RGYAL PO'I DBU BLA MDZAD PAS LUGS GNYIS KYI 'PHRIN
LAS

HA CANG RGYAS SO, ,

(BYAMS CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1411

@1123 BA

LOR RONG GI SNAR RDO SBER SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I
SHING MO SPRUL

LO STE SPYI LO 1485 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN PAR CHOS

'KHOR SGANG DU SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING YI
GE'I SBYOR

KLOG BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR GSANG

PHU NE'U THOG TU PHYAG PHEBS TE SHANGS STON RIN CHEN GRUB PA LAS
BKA'

CHOS GSAN NAS BCU BZHI PAR MNGON DGA'I CHOS GRVAR GRVA SKOR
MDZAD

DE SKYOG PO BKA' BZHI PAR GRAGS, RONG STON SMRA BA'I SENG GE
SEMS

DPA' GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG RONG CHUNG SHER DPAL SOGS LA BSTEN

NAS MDO PHYOGS KYI CHOS SKOR LA GSAN PA RGYA CHER MDZAD CING
DGUNG LO

BCO BRGYAD PAR RTZES THANG GI DKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DGUNG
LO

BCU DGU PAR MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GI GDAN SAR PHEBS TE LO

BCU'I RING DU SLOB GNYER MDZAD NAS DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR DPAL

LDAN SA SKYAR BYON TE PO TI BZHI BCU RTZA LNGA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG
PAS

BYAMS CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA ZHES GRAGS, DE NAS AE WAm CHOS LDAN DU

PHEBS TE NGOR CHEN KUN DGA' BZANG PO DANG, RJE 'KHOR LO SDOM PA,

MKHAS PA GZHON NU SENG GE LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING GSUNG NGAG

RIN PO CHES GTZOS PA'I BDE DGYES GSANG GSUM GYI RGYUD MAN NGAG
GI

SNYING BCUD THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO SUM CU SO BRGYAD PAR KHA REG BOD 'BRUG TU BSTAN PA'I
GZHI

BTZUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN SBEL, DGUNG LO SO DGU PAR RIN SBUNGS NOR

BU BZANG POS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE 'BRAS YUL SKYED TSAL DU 'CHAD
RTZOD

@1124 BA

RTZOM GSUM GYIS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA NYIN MO LTAR GSAL BAR MDZAD
DO,

DGUNG LO DON LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI

SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI MKHAS GRUB BSTAN GSAL DANG, RTZES THANG
SANGS

RGYAS LHUN GRUB, GO BO RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS SENG GE 'BUM

PHRAG GSUM PA, BYAMS PA CHOS KYI DON GRUB, 'JAM DBYANGS KUN

DGA' CHOS BZANG SOGS YIN NO, ,

(BYAMS GSAR CHOS RJE YE SHES DPAL,)

PA'I ME PHO

DBON RDO

RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG DU DBU SKRA BSIL TE MTSAN LA YE SHES
DPAL ZHES

GSOL, YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LA SBYONG PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR, 'DUL

'DZIN RGYA STON GYI DRUNG NAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS, RMA
KHRA BLO GROS

DBANG PHYUG LAS PHAR PHYIN DANG BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGAR SBYONG PAS

NAG YE SHES DPAL BA, SKYOR MO LUNG MKHAN CHEN SHES RAB RDO RJE,

GRAGS PA, KARMA ROL PA'I RDO RJE BCAS MKHAS GRUB SUM CU LHAG LA

BSTEN NAS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL DANG, SA SDE LNGA, DUS 'KHOR, SBYOR

GYI

(BRAG PO CHE BA RDO RJE DPAL,)
