NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD PAR CAN RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS,

MDO SMAD RME STOD BYANG DKAR DU YAB DAR RGYAS DANG, YUM LO YAG

SGRON GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I
LCAGS MO

PAR YI

GE'I SBYOR KLOG SLOB PAS TSEGS MED DU MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS

NAS BCU DRUG PAR CHOS 'DON DU BYON, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR

GRUB CHEN BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG NAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM
PA

BZHES SHING MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG YE SHES ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO NYER

GNYIS PAR RGYAL BA BLO BZANG CHOS NYID KYI DRUNG NAS ZAB CHOS
MANG DU

GSAN TE MTSAN LA 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO

NYER GSUM PAR DBUS SU PHEBS NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS BLO GSAL GLING GI

CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS SHING GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM
MDZAD,

GSER

SNGAGS

'DZIN

BYUNG DANG PO'I BGRANG BYA DGU BA SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO
1035 LOR SKU

MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS SO, KHONG DGUNG LO BCO LNGA'I STENG NAS GTZANG
RAB

GSAL GYIS MKHAN PO BYAS, GA-YO DGE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS SLOB

DPON DANG, DMAR SH'AKYA MU NES DUS GO BA BYAS TE RAB TU BYUNG
ZHING

DGE TSUL DU BSGRUBS NAS MTSAN LA DGE BA RAB GSAL DU BTAGS,

PHYIS SU MKHYEN RAB SHIN TU CHE BA GYUR BAS DGONGS PA RAB GAL DU

GRAGS, DE'I PHYI LO BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PAS MTHA' 'KHOB TU MA
MTHA'

DGE SLONG LNGA MA TSANG BAS SGRUB MI RUNG GSUNGS PA LTAR, LHA
LUNG DPAL

GYI RDO RJES RGYA'I HVA SHANG KE WANG DANG GYI PHAN ZER BA GNYIS
BA TANG STE LNGA

TSOGS KYI SOGS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PAR MDZAD DO, KHONG GIS NON
'JAM

DPAL LAS BZLAS LUNG BLANGS, KHANG RIN CHEN RDO RJE LAS SEMS
SKYES

ZHUS, SKYI RGYAL BA'I GTZUG TOR LAS DBU MA DANG TSAD MAR
SBYANGS,

NAM DGA' LDAN BYANG CHUB LAS YO GA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS KYANG CI
RIGS

GSAN, DE NAS KHONG DAN TIG TU BZHUGS PA'I TSE SLOB MA SNGA BA
KHAMS

KYI ZOG PO MI DRUG RNAMS DANG PO MKHAN SLOB CHA MI TSANG BAS
BTZUN PA'I

CHA BYAD BLANGS NAS 'DUL BA LA SOGS PA'I CHOS RNAMS GSAN PAS

'DUL 'DZIN MANG DU BYUNG, DBUS GTZANG GNYIS NAS MKHAS PA MI LNGA

RE MDO SMAD DU PHEBS NAS KHONG GIS MKHAN PO DANG DMAR GA-YO
GTZANG

GSUM GYIS SLOB DPON MDZAD NAS MI BCU BO DE STAN THOG GCIG LA

SDOM GSUM RIM NOD KYIS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, KHONG GIS BSTAN PA
PHYI

DAR GYI ME RO DE MDO KHAMS SMAD NAS GSOS TE BOD RIGS KYI RIG

@1149 BA

GNAS LO RGYUS STENG DU CHES NGO MTSAR LA BRJID CHAGS PA'I DPE
RIS

SHIG BRIS YOD PA MA ZAD, 'DZAM GLING GI RIG GNAS LO RGYUS STENG

DU'ANG DGE MTSAN LDAN PA'I BSAM BLO'I DPAL YON ZHIG GSAR DU

BSKRUN YOD PA RED,

(BLA CHEN YON TAN GZUNGS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I ME PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1126 LOR

YAB NYI BO'I SRA SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SHING MO
YOS

LO STE SPYI LO 1195 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS DGUNG LO BCU GCIG

PAR SLOB GNYER MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR KHU PO LCE STON RGYA

NAG LAS BKA' BSKYED RZOGS GSUM GYI RGYUD LUNG MAN NGAG DANG

BCAS PA KUN LA SLOB GNYER RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU
RTZA

BZHI PAR KHU BO LCE STON RGYA NAG SKU GSHEGS SHING DAN SA
BSKYANGS,

SLOB GNYER GYI LHAG 'PHRO RNAMS DBUS PA STON SH'AKA DANG DBUS PA
ZHIG

PO GNYIS LAS TSAR BA MDZAD, DE NAS SGOM SGRUB LA ZHUGS TE MTSAMS

'OG NAS GDAN SA LO NGO BCO BRGYAD KYI RING DU BSKYANGS SHING
BSTAN

'DZIN GYI BU SLOB MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD CING, GDAN SA YANG
SHIN

TU DAR BAR MDZAD, GZHAN DON PHUN SUM TSOGS PA GRUB STE, DGUNG

LO BDUN CU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI

SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI DANG, STON PA BLA
BSKYANGS,

DBUS PA JO BSOD, SNYE STON NYI MA RDO RJE, MES STON MGON PO,

DPYAL KUN DGA' RDO RJE BCAS YIN NO, ,KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA LHA
@1150 BA

RJE LHA KHANG PA YANG ZHU'O, ,

(BLA CHEN BSOD NAMS BLO GROS,)

KHONG NI T'I SHR'I BSOD NAMS BLO GROS DANG MIG CIG YIN PAS DE

LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(BLA GO'I BLA SAR 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1803

LOR MDO SMAD DU YAB BLA MA SKYABS DANG, YUM MKHA' 'GRO SKYID KYI

SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO
STE SPYI LO

1865 LOR MTSAN SGROGS DGON DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG THOG MAR DUS

'KHOR GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS DKA' RAMS PAR DU SONG ZHING TSOGS

BSAGS RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BLANGS, DE NAS THOS

BSAM GLING DU ZHUGS TE BSDUS GRVA BLO RTAGS, THAL PHRENG YONGS
RDZOGS

THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD DE PHAR TSAD KYIS MTSON BKA' POD LNGA LA PHUL
DU

PHYIN PA SBYANGS, RDO RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, SDE KHRI RIN
PO

GRVA

RGE, DMU DGE'I KHRI BCAS LA BZHUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN

BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU
PHO KHYI

MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN RABS LNGA BCU BA
YIN NO, ,

(BLA CHEN KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1344
LOR

ZHA LU KHANG GSAR DU YAB 'JAM DBYANGS DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN DANG,

YUM YON TAN DPAL 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG

BDUN PA'I SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1418 LOR SHAB SDINGS SU SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG GI BYIS PA'I MING LA ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN ZHES ZHU, DE NAS
YI GE'I SBYOR

KLOG SOGS LEGS PAR MKHYEN, GZHON NU NYID NAS BLA MA DAM PA

BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BLA MA MNYAM MED PA SOGS LA BSTEN

TE YAB MES KYI CHOS THAMS CAD THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD CING, BLA

MA DAM PA'I TSAB TU GONG MA'I PHO BRANG LA PHEBS KYANG RGYAL
KHAMS MA BDE

BA'I DBANG GIS KHAMS NAS YAR BYON, GDAN SA CHEN PO DANG BSAM

YAS SOGS SU BZHUGS NAS BLA MA DAM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYI

GSUNG 'BUM 'THOR BA RNAMS PHYOGS BSGRIGS MDZAD, GDUNG RGYUD

RIN PO CHE SPEL BA'I BTZUN MO MA GCIG NAM MKHA' RGYAL MO KHAB TU

BZHES NAS RIGS SRAS BSKRUN YANG, PHYIS SU BLA MA DAM PA BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS TE MTSAN LA
KUN

CHEN

LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1375 LOR RIN CHEN SGANG BLA

GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG YAB
MES

KYI CHOS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BLA CHEN KUN

DGA' BLO GROS LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BZHES SHING THEG CHEN
SEMS

BSKYED SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR MKHAN PO BSOD

NAMS GRAGS PA SOGS LAS RAB TU BYUNG STE MTSAN LA BSOD NAMS

RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO ZHES GSOL, DE NAS BLA MA DPAL LDAN

GROS BRTAN PA, NA BZA' BRAG PHUG PA BSOD NAMS DPAL BA,

SRON PA CHOS DPAL BZANG PO, BRAG KHA BA GRAGS PA SENG GE SOGS LA

BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS

PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR PO DONG BYA RGOD
GSHONGS

KHRI RABS BCU GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

YAB 'BUM GNYIS DANG YUM SKYID 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

@1156 BA

BCAS PA MA ZAD, BOD KYI GRUB MTHA' SO SO'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I

DGON PA'I GDAN RABS LNGA PA YIN, ,

(BLA MA RIN BZANGS DKAR PO,)

NAGS SHOD LA SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN,
KHONG

GIS SPYIR MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI BLA MA MANG DU BSTEN NAS MDO

POR GYUR, DE NAS ZHVA DMAR BA SKU PHRENG GNYIS PA MKHA' SPYOD
DBANG

YON TAN CHEN POR MNGA' BRNYES, DUS PHYIS SU GRIB GDONG DGON PA

GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING, DGE 'DUN YANG BRGYA TZAM 'DUS TE,

TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING 'CHAD NYAN GYI SGO NAS CHOS RJE MKHA'
SPYOD

DBANG PO'I 'PHRIN LAS BSGRUBS PA MDZAD, ZHVA DMAR BA SKU PHRENG
GSUM

PA CHOS DPAL YE SHES KYI BLA MA MDZAD DO, ,

(BLA SMAN THABS MKHAS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BDUN PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU @1157
BA

LHO KHA YAR LUNG SHAM PA'I 'DABS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
BCU

GCIG PAR 'PHYONGS RGYAS RI BO CHOS GLING DGON DU CHOS ZHUGS
MDZAD

CING YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD,
DGUNG

LO BCU GSUM PAR 'TSO BYED NGAG DBANG SANGS RGYAS DPAL BZANG GI

MDUN DU PHEBS TE DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, DGUNG

LO BCU DRUG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS NAS LCAGS RI RIG BYED 'GRO PHAN

GLING DU ZHUGS TE GSO RIG GI GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS BSAM RMAD DU
BYUNG

BA MDZAD DE SMAN RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER

DRUG PAR PHO LHA BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAL (1689-1747) GYI BLA

SMAN MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU THAM PAR MTSO SNGON DU PHEBS TE LO
NGO

BCU'I RING DU BDE CHEN DPON SLOB 'JAM DBYANGS DPAL LDAN SOGS

SLOB MA MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR PHO
LHA THA'I

JI'I BKA' LTAR SLOB MA BCU DRUG LA GSO RIG CHED DU SLOB PAR
MDZAD

CING GZHAN YANG SLOB MA BRGYA DANG SUM CU SO LNGA TZAM BYON,
DGUNG LO

LNGA BCU THAM PAR PHO LHA THA'I JI'I RIM GROR RIN CHEN RIL BU
SBYOR BA

MDZAD, DGUNG LO DGU BCU BZHES DUS DBUS GTZANG NAS SLOB MA LNGA

BRGYA 'DUS TE RIL NAG CHEN MO'I LAG LEN MDZAD PAS SDE BA GZHUNG

NAS GNANG SBYIN DANG BKA' SHOG THAM KHA BCAS BSTZAL, DGUNG LO

DGU BCU GO BRGYAD PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO,

KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS MCHOG TU GYUR PA NI GTZANG SMAN YE
SHES

BZANG PO YIN NO, ,

@1158 BA

(BLA SMAN BYA SBUG PA DAM CHOS DPAL LDAN,)

STOD SHEL DKAR CHOS SDE ZHES PA'I KHUL BYA SBUG TSANG DU SKU
'KHRUNGS,

KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SHEL DKAR CHOS SDER CHOS
ZHUGS

MDZAD DE RAB TU BYUNG, DE NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD

BCAS LA BYANG BA MDZAD, MES PO GONG MA RNAMS KYI PHYAG RGYUN
RGYUD

'DZIN GNANG STE GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA THUGS GNYER LEGS

PAR MDZAD PAS STOD LUGS KYI SMAN PA MKHAS CHEN GYUR, RAB BYUNG

BCO LNGA PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1897 LOR RGYAL BA THUB
BSTAN RGYA

MTSOS BYA SBUG PA'I SNYAN GRAGS GSAN TE BKA' LUNG BSTZAL NAS BLA

SMAN GZHON PA'I GDAN THOB PHYAG RTAGS GNAS SHING PHO BRANG CHEN
PO PO

TA LAR BZHUGS, RGYAL BA THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS BKA' LUNG LTAR GSO

BA RIG PA'I KHRID RGYUN SPEL NAS SLOB MA MANG DU GSO SKYONG
MDZAD CING

'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, SKU TSE'I MJUG

TU BLA SMAN GYI LAS TSAN DGONGS ZHU MDZAD NAS LHA SA'I BYANG
PHYOGS KYI NYE

@1159 BA

GSUNG RTZOM NI//BU SBUG GCES BSDUS//SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,

(BLA SMAN AU RGYAN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

KONG POR SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS KONG
PO CHAB

DKAR DGON DU CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD DE DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG

BSGRUBS, YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG NAS BZUNG RIG GNAS CHUNG BA RNAMS LA

MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE LCAGS RI RIG BYED

'GRO PHAN GLING DU ZHUGS TE GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS

BSAM NAN TAN MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR TE, RGYAL BA THUB

BSTAN RGYA MTSO (1876-1933) DANG, DE MO RGYAL TSAB NGAG

DBANG BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RAB RGYAS RNAM GNYIS KYI BLA SMAN
GZHON PA

MDZAD, ZHOR DU LCAGS RI RIG BYED 'GRO PHAN GLING GI SLOB KHRID
PA'I

'GAN KHUR BZHES TE GSO BA RIG PA'I MAN NGAG RNAMS ZHAL NAS ZHAL

DANG, SNYAN NAS SNYAN, THUGS NAS THUGS SU BRGYUD PA'I SLOB MA

MANG DU GSO SKYONG MDZAD, KHONG GIS LCAGS RI RIG BYED 'GRO PHAN
GLING

BA//,

MNGON RTOGS//BCAS KYI DPAR SHING BRKOS TE DPAR KHANG BZHENGS
@1160 BA

DE MO RGYAL TSAB KYI DON RKYEN BYUNG BAR BRTEN SDE BA GZHUNG GIS
KHONG NYID

KHRIMS LA SBYAR TE 'BRUG YUL LA RGYANG 'BUD BTANG, DE NAS KYANG

LCAGS RI RIG BYED 'GRO PHAN GLING DU SMAN SGRUB KYI MCHOD RDZAS
KA RING

BZHI LA KA 'PHAN BZHI DANG, RGYAL MTSAN GSUM, PHYE PHUR GSUM,

GDUNG KHEBS GNYIS, MTHONG SKOR LA LCE 'DZAR CHA TSANG BCAS 'BUL

GNANG MDZAD DO, ,

(BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO,)

GNAS

(DBA'AS DBYI TSAB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DRUG PA'I NANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS
SHING,

SKU TSE'I STOD DU ZING PO RJE KHRI PANGS SUM GYI BLON PO YIN,
DE NAS ZING

PO RJE LA BLO LOG CING RGYAL PO STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS LA MGO
'BUL ZHUS

KYANG STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS DGUNG DU GSHEGS, DE NAS RGYAL PO

GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE THUN MONG DU MNA'
TSIG

BOR ZHING ZING PO RJE'I CHAB SRID BRLAGS NAS GNAM RI SRONG
BTZAN GYI

MNGA' ZHABS SU TSUD PAR MDZAD, RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN
GYIS

KYANG DBA'AS DBYI TSAB LA ZA GAD GSHEN GYI YUL KHA DANG, MAL
GRO

PHYOGS NAS BRAN GA-YOG KHYIM TSANG CHIG STONG LNGA BRGYA BYA
DGA' GNANG

ZHING BLON POR MNGA' GSOL, DE NAS RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM
PA'I

BLON PO MDZAD CING, KHONG GI BU TSA RNAMS DANG RGYAL PO BCAS
PA THUN

MONG DU MNA' TSIG BOR NAS RGYAL POS KYANG DBYI TSAB KYI BU TSA
SU 'OS

GCIG LA GSER YIG RGYUN CHAD MED PAR GNANG RGYU'I DBU MNA'
BZHES

PA MDZAD DO, ,

@1184 GDUNG SRAS MNGA' BDAG 'OD BSRUNGS DANG MNGA' BDAG YUM
BRTAN

GNYIS MA 'CHAMS PAR RGYAL SRID DBU RU DANG GA-YO RU GNYIS SU
GYES

PA'I DUS BABS DANG, LHAG PAR DU DBU RU NAS 'BRO SBAS RUS TSAN

GNYIS 'KHRUGS PA LA BRTEN TE SPYI LO 872 LO'I YAN MAN DU 'BA'S
LO

PHO LO CHUNG GIS LAG DPON BYAS TE DBU RU SA KHUL NAS KHENG LOG

('BANGS GYEN LOG) BYUNG ZHING, //LDE'U CHOS 'BYUNG// LAS
"KHENG LOG

DPE DANG LAG DPON RGYU MTSAN GSUM, PHYVA MKHAN 'DUN SA 'DZIN

MKHAN LHA DANG DRUG YUL RER RJE DPON TSAN RE CHAGS DANG BDUN,"

ZHES 'BANGS GYEN LOG BYED PAR 'DZOMS DGOS PA'I CHA RKYEN RNAMS

BKOD 'DUG KHONG NI 'BANGS GYEN LOG SKABS KYI SNYAN GRAGS CHE

BA'I 'GO KHRID PA ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(DBAL MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI
LO

1764 LOR DA LTA KAN LHO'I BSANG CHU RDZONG LA GTOGS PA'I BSANG

GZHUNG TSAR TSA'I RGYUD DU YAB DBANG DRAG SKYABS DANG, YUM BDE
BZA'

LHA MO RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
BZHI PA'I CHU

MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1853 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR
KUN

MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG POS DBAL MANG BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYI
SPRUL

SKUR THUGS THAG BCAD DE GDAN SAR BKOD, RGYUD PA DGE BSHES

BSAM GTAN SENG GE LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR SBYANGS TE
CHOS

SPYOD DANG RGYAN 'JUG SOGS THUGS SU 'DZIN, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG

@1185 PAR CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE BRTZI BZHAG DANG, BSDUS GRVA,
BLO RIGS,

RTAGS RIGS, GRUB MTHA' BCAS LA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, DGUNG LO

BCU DGU PAR KUN MKHYEN MCHOG LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO

SUM CU BAR RDO RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BLANGS, DGUNG LO SO BZHI 
BAR KUN MKHYEN MCHOG SPRUL BTZAL BA'I CHED DU DBUS SU PHEBS,

DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI TSOGS
CHEN KHRI LA

PHEBS TE BCA' YIG SOGS SGRIG LAM THAD LA DAG THER DANG DO DAM

GANG LEGS MDZAD PA RED, 'DU KHANG STENG SHOD DU MNYAM MED JO
BO

CHEN PO, KHU RNGOG 'BROM GSUM SOGS BKA' GDAMS GONG MA RAGS

BSDUS KYI SKU BRNYAN LI MA NANG BZHUGS KYI BKA' GDAMS LHA
KHANG

GNAM RGYAN MCHOD CHA DANG BCAS PA GSAR DU BSGRIGS, GZHAN YANG

RGYUD KHANG GSAR BZHENGS DANG MGON KHANG DU MGON CHOS 'DZIGS

GSUM GYI SKU BRNYAN BZHENGS, BSTAN PA'I RTEN RNAMS LEGS PAR

BZHENGS TE PHYI RABS PA LA PHAN BDER BSGRUBS, KHONG GI SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG GI GTER MDZOD CHEN PO RJE
SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO DANG, SDE KHRI 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA,
SU NYID

DKON MCHOG NOR BU BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI GDAN

RABS DANG, RNAM THAR, LO RGYUS, GZHUNG 'GREL RGYUD 'GREL

SOGS BSTAN BCOS CHIG BRGYA SUM CU LHAG TZAM YOD PA RNAMS PO TI

BCU THAM PAR BSDUS TE SHING PAR BRKOS NAS AA MCHOG DGON DU

BZHUGS YOD,

@1186 (DBAL MANG CHUNG BA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1768

LOR MDO SMAD GLAS DRUG TU YAB BLA MA BKRA SHIS DANG, YUM CHOS
SKYID

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING
PHO RTA LO STE

SPYI LO 1834 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR KUN
MKHYEN BLA

MAS RGYUD PA DPON SLOB BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO'I SPRUL SKUR THUGS
THAG BCAD

CING DGUNG LO BDUN PAR RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS SHING BSDUS
GRVA NAS BZUNG

GZHUNG BKA' LNGA LA THUGS GNYER DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD PAS RDO
RAMS

PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG, GRVA

TSANG GSUM GYI KHRI BA MDZAD CING 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS 'CHAD
PA LA

'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL BA ZHIG YIN, RGAN GYA'I BRAG DKAR DANG,
TSA

GAN PE SHING, BDE MO THANG RNAMS KYI KHRI LA PHEBS NAS MDO
SNGAGS

CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN SPEL, DE NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
GYI GDAN

SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING BRTZI BZHAG CHAG MED DANG, TSAR GCOD
RJES

'DZIN GYI DO DAM GANG DRAG GNANG, KHRI ZUR NAS AURGE'I KHRI BA
LAN

TA'I CHO LO GNANG, DE NAS PHYIR PHEBS SHING RNGA BA'I AA MCHOG
DGON

SOGS SU CHIBS BSGYUR GNANG STE GDUL BYA RNAMS LA BKA' CHOS
GANG

'DOD BSTZAL NAS DUS 'DA' BA'O, KHONG NI BLA BRANG DGON PA'I

GDAN RABS NYER DGU BA YIN NO, ,

@1187 (DBAL SHUL NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS,)

KHONG NI KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE DANG MI

GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(DBAL SHUL 'JAM DBYANGS DPAL LDAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1682

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL SHUL RNYING BA'I KHROD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1754 LOR SKU
GSHEGS, KHONG

DGUNG LO GZHON PA'I SKABS SU DBUS SU PHEBS TE YONGS SU GRAGS

PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS THOS

BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS MDO SMAD DU BYON TE KUN MKHYEN

YAB SRAS KYI DRUNG DU MDO SNGAGS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DU SNGAGS
KYI MAN NGAG

DANG PHYAG LEN BCAS LA ZHU GTUGS DOGS GCOD NAN TAN DU MDZAD,

RGYUD PA DPON SLOB DGE 'DUN RGYAL MTSAN DANG, GRUB DBANG SDE
KHRI

RIN PO CHE GNYIS KYI RING LA BLA MA DBU MDZAD KYI THUGS 'GAN
BZHES,

DGUNG LO NGA DRUG PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO RTA LO
STE SPYI LO

1738 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA
PHEBS TE LO RE

BZHIN DBYAR KHAR 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS YONGS RDZOGS DANG,
BSKYED

RIM GSUNG BSHAD DANG BCAS PA 'GRO ZHING, DGUN KHAR BSKYED
RDZOGS

CHEN MO GNYIS KYI GZAB BSHAD DANG DKA' GNAD KYI DOGS GCOD
RGYUN

RING SOGS 'CHAD NYAN ZLA MED MDZAD, 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS DANG

YIG CHA'I MDZOD GNYIS PAR DU BRKOS, KHRI ZUR NAS AURGE GRVA
TSANG

@1188 GSANG SNGAGS SMIN RGYAS GLING GI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS MDO
SNGAGS KYI

'CHAD NYAN GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO DON

GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI RABS BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

(DBAL SHUL BLO BZANG GNAS BRTAN,)

1696

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL SHUL RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU

GSUM PA'I SHI PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1754 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG DGUNG

LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS RNAM DPYOD SHIN TU CHE BA ZHIG YIN
PHYIR RTAGS

GSAL SOGS LA THOGS PA MED, DE NAS BYA LAG MDOR PHEBS TE KUN

MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA LAS BSDUS GRVA DANG, BSE NGAG

DBANG BKRA SHIS LAS BLO RTAGS DBU PHAR BCAS LA SBYANGS PA
MDZAD,

DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SGO MANG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS
SHING

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD PAS LHA
RAMS

PA'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD DE MING DANG MTHUN PA'I DGE BSHES KYI GO
'PHANG

THOB, DE NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE GZHUNG
BKA' POD

LNGA LA DAM BCA' RMAD DU BYUNG BA BZHAG PAS BSE NGAG DBANG
BKRA SHIS

KYANG BSNGAGS BRJOD YANG YANG MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED

DBANG PO'I YONGS 'DZIN GZHON PA YANG MDZAD, DE NAS RIM BZHIN

TSOGS CHEN ZHAL NGO DANG, RGYUD PA BLA MA DBU MDZAD BRGYUD DE
RGYUD

PA'I KHRI BA MDZAD CING RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN DANG BSKYED
RDZOGS KYI GZHUNG

@1189 BSHAD STAR CHAGS SU MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU
MO BYA LO

STE SPYI LO 1753 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I
KHRI LA

PHEBS NAS CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN SPEL BZHIN PA'I SGANG DU SKU
GSHEGS SO,

KHONG NI BLA BRANG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI RABS BDUN PA YIN
NO, ,

(DBUS PA JO BO BSOD NAMS,)

'KHRUNGS, RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1198
LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG

GIS ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING SEMS PHYOGS KYI
RGYUD

GDAMS NGAG RDZOGS PAR GSAN, DE NAS BLA MA ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI'I

BKA' LTAR KHONG GI SLOB DPON LHA RJE LHA KHANG PA STE BLA CHEN

GIS ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING SEMS PHYOGS KYI
RGYUD

GDAMS NGAG RDZOGS PAR GSAN, DE NAS BLA MA ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI'I

BKA' LTAR KHONG GI SLOB DPON LHA RJE LHA KHANG PA STE BLA CHEN
YON TAN

GZUNGS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE MDO SGYU 'PHRUL SEMS PHYOGS GSUM
LA

LEGS PAR GSAN, ZHIG PO BDUD RTZI DANG BLA CHEN YON TAN GZUNGS

GNYIS KYI THUGS SRAS DBUS PA JO BSOD CES MKHAS PA'I PHUL DU
PHYIN

TE SNYAN GRAGS KYIS PHYOGS BZHIR KHYAB PAR GYUR, DE NAS BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA GCIG
PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SGYU 'PHRUL GTZO
BOR

GYUR PA'I GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I SLOB DPON CHEN PO ZHIG YIN
NO, ,

KHONG NI AAR BYANG CHUB YE SHES DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,@1190 (DBEN SA BLO BZANG DON GRUB,)

LOR GTZANG GA-YAS RU'I DGE RGYAS BYE MA LHO KHUD KYI PHU DBEN

GDUNG RUS MDONGS YIN PA'I YAB BSOD NAMS RDO RJE DANG, YUM

DPAL 'DZOMS SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DGU

PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1566 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI
BYIS PA'I

MING LA MGON PO SKYABS ZHES BTAGS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR LHA

RTZE BA GRAGS PA DON GRUB KYI DRUNG NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE
TSUL GYI

SDOM PA MNOS TE MTSAN LA BLO BZANG DON GRUB CES GSOL, DE NAS

RJE LHA PA'I MDUN NAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM DANG, 'JAM DBYANGS BLO

BZANG BSHES GNYEN LAS GZHUNG SOGS CI RIGS GSAN, DGUNG LO

BCU BDUN PAR RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RDO RJE'I RJES 'BRANGS PAS THUN
MONG

MA YIN PA'I SNYAN BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PA THOB
STE LUNG

RTOGS KYI LUS STOBS YONGS SU RGYAS PAR GYUR, BYA BRAL THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA NYID KYI 'KHOR DU GRUB PA THOB PA'I SLOB MA BCU TZAM
YOD PA'I

NANG NAS KHONG NYID SRAS KYI THU BOR DGONGS NAS SNYAN BRGYUD KYI
BE'U

BUM DANG, SPRUL PA'I GLEGS BAM PHYAG TU GTAD DE RGYAL TSAB DAM
PAR

DBANG BSKUR, DE'I SKABS SU DBEN SAR MDUN SA CHOS KYI PHO BRANG

ZHES PA'I DGON PA 'DEBS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR

'BRAS SPUNGS DGON DU 'BROM STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RGYAL BA DGE

'DUN RGYA MTSO LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, LHA SAR
PHEBS TE

PA'I SMON LAM

MDZAD, DE NAS PAn CHEN BYANG CHUB BLO GROS DANG, MNGA' RIS LO

CHEN RNAM RGYAL BCAS LAS GSANG 'DUS RTZA RGYUD SGRON GSAL SOGS
KYI

GDAMS PA MTHA' YAS PA GSAN CING, DBEN GNAS BRAG RGYA RDO RJE'I

PHO BRANG, GA-YE MA STAG GZIG GLANG CHEN, KO BRAG KHYAD PAR DU
PA

SNAM JO MO LHA RI LA SOGS PA'I RI KHROD RNAMS SU SGRUB PA SNYING
POR

MDZAD, KHONG NI PAn CHEN AER TI NI'I SKU PHRENG GSUM PA YIN,
KHONG GI

SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI KUN MKHYEN LEGS PA DON GRUB DANG, BYANG

STON SMRA BA'I DBANG PO BSAM GTAN 'OD ZER, RJE BLO GROS RNAM
RGYAL,

CHOS RJE DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL, SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS RJE
NGAG

DBANG GRAGS PA SKU MCHED, KONG STON CHOS RJE 'JAM DBYANGS RGYAL

PO, BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI DKAR

CHAG DANG, GSOL 'DEBS, ZIN BRIS, SKU BSTOD, RNAM THAR,

BSLAB BYA, SGRUB THABS BCAS PO TI GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,

(DBEN SA SMYON PA,)

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

@1192 GNYIS NAS GSHIN RJE GSHED LA BSNYEN PA BSKYEL, DGUNG LO
BCU

BDUN PAR KHU BO 'BAL THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG

LA

KHU BO'I PHYAG PHYIR PHYIN PAS GRVA PA GCIG GIS RNAM GZHAG BYAS
PA'I SKAL

BA DAR YUG GSUM DANG, ZANGS PHYE MAR DANG BCAS PA KHYER NAS

'PHAGS PA LCE SGOM PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I

DBANG KHRID ZHUS, DE NAS SKYER SGANG DU MTSAMS BCAD DE SGRUB PA

MDZAD PAS SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI ZHAL MTHONG, SNGAGS BZLAS PAS

GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI ZHAL YANG MTHONG, DE NAS KHU BO 'BAL THAMS

CAD MKHYEN PA'I ZHAL BKOD LTAR GSER ZHO GANG DANG DAR YUG RNAMS

BSNAMS SHING LA STOD DU BYON TE TZA RI SGOM PA DANG MJAL ZHING
RAS

CHUNG LUGS KYI DBANG DANG GDAMS PA RNAMS RDZOGS PAR ZHUS, DE

NAS 'U YUG TU BYON TE BLA MA SPEN PHUG PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING

JO BO RJE'I GSANG SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA RNAMS LO NGO LNGA'I RING
DU BSTEN

NAS RDZOGS PAR ZHUS, DE NAS LKUGS LUNG DU BYON TE BLA MA RMOG
LCOGS

'KHRUNGS,

DE NAS BLA MA RMOG LCOGS PA'I ZHAL BKOD LTAR SKYER SGANG DU BYON
TE

BRTZIGS SHING BLA MA RMOG LCOGS PA'I GDAN SA LA YANG 'BUL BA
SKYEL,

GSUM PAR ZHI BAR GSHEGS, KHONG NI NI GU'I CHOS DRUG GI GDAMS

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS SPYIR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO'I ZHABS

(DBON PO NAM MKHA' BDE LEGS,)

NGU'I DUS NAS ZHANG PO TSA RONG DPAL LDAN RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG
NAS YI

GE'I SBYOR KLOG BSLABS TE LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DE NAS GSO RIG LA

MOS PA SKYES PAS DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI DANG, DE'I 'GREL BA RGYUD

DON RAB GSAL, YAN LAG BRGYAD PA, GSER BRE, NYAMS YIG

BRGYA RTZA, BYE BA RING BSREL, GDAMS PA SUM CU, LAG LEN POD

PAR DU ZHANG PO TSA RONG DPAL LDAN RGYAL MTSAN LAS SBUR TSO YON

NGO,,

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI BLA MA MANG
POR

BSTEN NAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG DANG BYIN RLABS BCAS MANG DU ZHUS,

DE NAS CHOS RJE DPON RAS DAR MA SENG GE LA BSTEN NAS 'DUL BA MDO

RTZA DANG, SPYOD 'JUG BSLAB BTUS, BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA, SHES

RAB BRGYA BA, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL, RDZOGS CHEN CHOS SKOR, BKA'

GDAMS PA'I LAM RIM, MA H'A M'A Y'A, SGYU 'PHRUL, ZHI BYED, BKA'

BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI SNYAN BRGYUD, DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG N'A
RO

CHOS DRUG BDE MCHOG GSANG 'DUS, DUS 'KHOR RNAMS KYI DBANG

CHEN DANG, ZAB MO BLA MA'I RJES GNANG BCAS ZHUS NAS SGOM SGRUB

KYANG GRANG BA'I 'JIGS PA MED PA BYUNG NGO, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I
ME MO

BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1237 LOR RA LUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS TE

GRAGS PA YANG ZHU'O, ,

(DBON RAS DAR MA SENG GE)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1177 LOR

SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1237
LOR SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG GIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS MDO

SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD,

KHYAD PAR DU CHOS RJE GTZANG PA RGYA RAS LAS SPYOD 'JUG DANG,
BLO SBYONG

DON BDUN MA, 'DUL BA, MNGON PA, TSAD MA, YO GA GUR

BRTAG ZHI BYED, RDZOGS CHEN, MA H'A M'A Y'A, MTSAN BRJOD PHYAG
LEN

DANG BCAS PA, SGYU 'PHRUL, THUGS RJE CHEN PO GTER MA, N'A RO
CHOS

DRUG BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR, SNYAN BRGYUD,
GDAMS

NGAG BCAS ZHUS PA DANG, DE NAS BDE DGYES GSANG GSUM GYI DBANG

CHEN DANG, DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA, ZAB MO BLA

MA'I RJES GNANG BCAS ZHUS NAS SGRUB PAR MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA LA

MNGA' BRNYES, KHONG NI CHOS RJE GTZANG PA RGYA RAS KYI RIGS KYI
DBON

@1197 PO DANG CHOS KYI SRAS YIN PAS RJE RGOD TSANG BA LA SOGS
PA'I BU CHEN PHYI

MA RNAMS KYI BLA MA YIN, CHOS RJE GTZANG PA RGYA RAS SKU GSHEGS
PA'I

DGONGS RDZOGS LEGS PAR BSGRUBS TE GDAN SA GTZANG NYANG STOD RA

LUNG DU GSER GYI GDUNG RTEN BKRA SHIS SGO MANG BZHENGS PA MDZAD,

RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I CHU PHO SPREL LOS TE SPYI LO 1212 LOR RA
LUNG DGON

PA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS TE DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS

SHING, GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BCAS BZHENGS

PAR MDZAD, LO NGO NYER LNGA'I RING DU GDAN SAR BZHUGS NAS DGON

PA DAR BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI RA LUNG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS GNYIS

PA YIN, ,

(DBON SHES RAB 'BYUNG GNAS,)

KHONG NI SPYAN SNGA SHES RAB 'BYUNG GNAS DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(DBON BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1187 LOR

SGA YUL NON 'JAM 'OM BU LUNG DU YAB AA NYE AA GRAGS KYI SRAS SU
SKU

'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS SKYU RA YIN, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING PHO
RTA LO

STE SPYI LO 1234 LOR 'BRI GUNG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS YIG RTZIS SOGS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU

GCIG PAR 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING DU PHEBS TE KHU BO CHOS RJE
SKYOB PA

@1198 LAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA BZHES SHING MTSAN LA BSOD NAMS
GRAGS PA

ZHES GSOL, BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI GDAMS NGAG GSAN TE

DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS NAS LO BCU GSUM RING

DU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD CING GRUB PA THOB, DE NAS STAG PHUR

BYON TE JO BO YON TAN GRAGS PA LAS GSANG 'DUS BDE DGYES SOGS

GSAN ZHING 'BRI GUNG DU PHEBS, SLAR YANG LO DRUG GI BAR DU SKU

MTSAMS BZHUGS, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PAR 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING
GI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO BCU GSUM GYI RING DU CHOS
SRID

GNYIS KYI SGO NAS GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO SO DGU PAR RIN PO

CHE SNA BDUN LAS GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SGO MANGS RGYA KHYON TSAD
LAS 'DAS

PA'I RTEN DANG BRTEN PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, DE LTAR BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB
GLING GI

GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

(DBYANGS CAN GRUB PA'I RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1809

LOR GTZANG GA-YAS RU'I BYE BRAG BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL GLING GI NYE
'DABS,

SNGON DUS 'JAD CES GRAGS KYANG, PHYIS SU SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG

GNAS KYIS YUL DE'I CHE BA'I DGE MTSAN LA ZHAL 'DZUM LAN GSUM

GROL BAS BZHAD CES THOGS PA'I YUL DU YAB BKRA SHIS DANG YUM

TSE RING SRI CHOD GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCO
LNGA PA'I

@1199 ME MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1887 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG
LO LNGA'I STENG

NAS KHU BO DHARMA BHA DRA'I DRUNG NAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS,
DGUNG LO

BCU BAR THOB RGYAL BLA MA NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS KYI DRUNG NAS
RTZIS KYI SA

RIS DANG SNYAN NGAG BCAS LA SBYANGS TE ZHOR DU MNGON BRJOD SNA
TSOGS

BLO LA BZUNG, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL DGON

GYIS GRVA KHRAL DU BSDUS TE DKA' CHEN DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI

MDUN NAS RAB TU BYUNG BAS MTSAN LA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL ZHES

BTAGS, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR DKA' CHEN DKON MCHOG CHOS

'PHEL GYI DRUNG NAS DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS,
DE

NAS BZUNG RJE MI LA'I RNAM MGUR DANG, THIG TSAD BLOS BKOD,

'DON RTA DBYANGS ROL MO BCAS LA SBYANGS PAR MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD DE

DBANG LUNG SOGS KYANG MANG PO THOB, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA NAS BLA

MA CHOS BZANG GI ZHABS ZHU BA MDZAD DE, SGRA DANG, RTZIS, SNYAN
NGAG

SUM RTAGS SOGS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS NAS BLA MA LA RGYUGS PHUL

SKABS SLOB 'BRAS SHIN TU BZANG BAS BLA MA DGYES NAS LHA RDZAS
SRID DU

RING BA MGUL DU BSTZAL TE KUN BTAGS KYI MING LA DBYANGS CAN GRUB

PA'I RDO RJE ZHES GNANG BA RED, DGUNG LO SO BZHI BAR BLA MA CHOS

BZANG GI MDUN NAS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG LO RE GCIG

PAR SA SKYA DANG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO, GDAN SA GSUM DU PHEBS NAS
BLA

DPON RNAMS LA CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI YANG YANG PHUL, MKHAS PA KUN
GYIS

GTZUG TU BKUR, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI NGAG DBANG TSUL@1200 KHRIMS DANG, SGO MANG LHA RAMS PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO, BLA
MA YE SHES

CHOS 'PHEL, SMIN GROL NO MON HAN, CHAB MDO 'PHAGS PA LHA, CHU

BZANG HU THOG THU SOGS MKHAS GRUB SHIN TU MANG POR BYUNG NGO,
KHONG

GI GSUNG RTZOM NI BSTAN BCOS BDUN CU DON BDUN YOD PA RNAMS PO

TI GSUM DU BSDUS YOD, 'JAM DBYANGS RDO RJE DANG BLO BZANG CHOS

'PHEL NI KHONG GI MTSAN GYI RNAM GRANGS YIN,

(DBRA STON SKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1897
LOR

YAB AO RGYAN RIG 'DZIN DANG, YUM TSE RING DBANG MO GNYIS KYI
SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI
LO 1959

LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS RUS KYI KHU DBON
MDO

RGYUD GRAGS PA LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG BSLABS PAS LEGS PAR MKHYEN,

DE NAS GLAG BRAG RDZONG DGON DU PHEBS TE MKHAN PO BSOD NAMS CHOS

GRUB LAS GZHUNG LUGS GSAN NAS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, DE NAS

'KHRUL ZHIG PADMA BDUD 'DUL YAB SRAS KYI GDAN SA KLU MO RAB TU
BYON

TE GZHUNG LUGS THAMS CAD THOS BSAM GYIS SGRO 'DOGS BCAD, YE

SHES DGON GYI MKHAN PO DRANG SRONG DAM PA TSUL KHRIMS MCHOG
RGYAL LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DBAL KHYUNG GTER STON BSTAN GNYIS GSANG

SNGAGS GLING PA DANG, MKHAS PA'I DBANG PHYUG HOR BRAG DKAR SPRUL
SKU

SOGS RIS MED KYI BLA MA DAM PA DU MAR BSTEN NAS THUGS RGYUD YON

TAN GYIS BKANG ZHING MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR BSNYEGS,

@1201 KHYAD PAR DU GRUB DBANG 'JA' LUS PA SHAR RDZA BKRA SHIS
RGYAL MTSAN LA

BSTEN NAS 'PHRUL NGAG GA-YUNG DRUNG BON GYI RING LUGS GTZANG
MA'I MDO

RGYUD KYI GZHUNG BSHAD DANG, RDZOGS CHEN GYI MAN NGAG DBANG
KHRID DANG

BCAS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN PAR MDZAD, 'PHRIN LAS

KYANG SHIN TU RGYAS SO, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA GSUM PAR ZHI BAR
GSHEGS,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //SUM RTAGS KYI 'GREL BA// DANG, //SNYAN
NGAG GI

'GREL BA//, //RTZIS YIG//, //SMAN SBYOR//, //MGUR GLU//,

//LUGS GNYIS BSTAN BCOS//, //'DZAM GLING YUL BSHAD//, //DRIS

LAN SKABS LNGA BA//, //GRUB MTHU'I RNAM DBYE//, //BSTAN GNYIS

DGONGS PA GCIG DRIL//, //DAM PA GSUM GYI BSHAD KHRID//, //SHAR

RDZA BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN GYI RNAM THAR// BCAS PO TI LNGA TZAM
BZHUGS

SO,

('BA' RA BA RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1310
LOR

SHANGS KYI CHAB LUNG DU YAB DBON 'BUM ZHES PA'I MI CHEN GYI SRAS
SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1391
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO GZHON PA'I DUS SU CHOS RJE BSOD NAMS RGYAL

MTSAN GYI GSOL JA BA MDZAD, DE'I MOD LA SKYO SHAS DRAG PO
'KHRUNGS

TE SGRO MON CAN PA LA SOGS PA'I BLA MA RNAMS LA KHRID ZHUS PAS
JI LTA BA

BZHIN DU 'KHRUNGS, DUS PHYIS SU ZUR PHUG PA DANG, SHUG GSEB RI

PA LA SOGS PA LAS GDAMS PA ZAB DGU GSAN, BRTZON 'GRUS DRAG

@1202 POS SGOM SGRUB MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA MCHOG TU GYUR, 'BA' RA
DGON

PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, DE NAS SPA GRO LA

BYON TE BSTAN 'GRO'I ZHABS TOG MDZAD PAS 'PHRIN LAS SHIN TU
RGYAS,

SLAR YANG SHANGS SU PHEBS NAS 'GRO DON YUN RING DU MDZAD, DE NAS

YANG SPA GRO LA BYON TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN SKOR NAS
GZHAN DON

PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BDE LEGS KYIS 'GRUB CING, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU

RTZA GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI ZUR

PHUG PA'I MCHOG TU GYUR BA'I SLOB MA YIN ZHIG ,

('BA' RE BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1706

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL MANG GI NANG TSAN 'BA' RE ZHES PA'I RUS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1766 LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS SU BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
GYI CHOS

SGOR ZHUGS SHING DBAL MANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB DGE

RGAN DU BSTEN NAS BSDUS GZHUNG DANG, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS BCAS

LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS 'DZIN GRVA'I SKYOR
DPON

DANG TSOGS CHEN ZHAL NGO, RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD BCAS KYI
THUGS

'GAN BZHES TE DGE 'DUN MANG TSOGS KYI THUGS YID TSAM PAR MDZAD,

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA PHEBS TE LO

BDUN GYI RING DU BZHUGS TE LO RE BZHIN 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI

BSHAD PA RDZOGS PAR 'GRO ZHING, BSKYED RIM GSUNG BSHAD DANG

@1203 BCAS PA YONGS RDZOGS DANG, tIKA CHE CHUNG GI LE'U MTSAMS
YAN CHAD

LO GNYIS RE LA RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU KHRI RIN PO NGAG
DBANG

BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, KHRI BA BLO BZANG DON GRUB GNYIS LAS 'GREL
BA'I

BSHAD LUNG KHA YANG GSAN PA SOGS KYIS RGYUD PA'I GDAN RABS RNAMS

KYI KHROD NA 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS 'CHAD PA LA 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I
MKHAS

GRAGS RGYAS, RGYUD KYI KHRI BA MDZAD SKABS GTONG SGO'I SKOR
SNGAR SROL

GANG YOD LAS 'PHAR MA'I THOG SNGAR MED KYI MCHOD RDZAS GANG DGOS

GSAR BSGRIGS DANG, DNGUL SRANG SUM BRGYA'I YON SBYAR TE RGYUD
tIKA

CHEN MO DPAR DU BZHENGS PA SOGS CHOS SRID GANG NAS KYANG BKA'

DRIN GYIS BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS THUGS DAM NYAMS BZHES MDZAD MUS

DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI RABS BCU
GCIG PA

YIN NO, ,

('BANG ROM DAR MA DBANG PHYUG)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1127 LOR

'PHAN YUL GYI DKA' BA YUL SNAR YAB STON PA 'BYUNG GNAS BLO GROS

DANG, YUM JO MO LO CHUNG MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG

GSUM PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1199 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI

BYIS PA'I MING LA 'BUM SKYABS ZHES ZHU, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR
MKHAN

PO KA BA DAR MA SENG GE DANG, SLOB DPON DBANG PHYUG GZHON NU

GNYIS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN LA DAR MA DBANG PHYUG CES GSOL,

@1204 DGE BSHES BYA YUL BA DANG, PO TO BA'I BU CHEN GRU 'BU LUNG
PA GNYIS

LAS BKA' GDAMS KYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG

PAR SANGS RGYAS SGOM PA ROGS LA KHRID NAS RJE SGAM PO BA DANG
MJAL,

BKA' BRGYUD KYI CHOS RNAMS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU ZHUS, DKA'

TSEGS MED PAR RTOGS PA CI CHAR DU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD

PAR RJE SGAM PO BA'I ZHAL BKOD MDZAD PA LTAR BYANG 'BA' ROM RDZA
DE LA

'U RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA LA PHEBS NAS LO NGO BDUN GYI RING DU
BSGRUBS PA

MDZAD CING, PHAL CHER TING NGE 'DZIN GYIS DNGOS SU 'TSO BA
BYUNG,

DE NAS KHAMS SU BYON TE DPON CHEN YE SHES GSAL GYIS ZHABS TOG

LEGS PAR MDZAD, KO MTSO DANG LO SDE'I DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS

MDZAD, DE NAS SLAR BYANG 'BA' ROM DU PHEBS TE BRAG DMAR GYI

LOGS SU 'BA' ROM DGON PA ZHES BYA BA DE GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD,

RIN PO CHE STAG LUNG BA DANG 'BRI GUNG CHOS RJE SOGS LA CHOS
'BREL MANG

DU ZHUS, SKU TSE GANG BOR SLOB MA'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS NAS DUS
'DA'

BAR MDZAD CING, 'BA' ROM BKA' BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA'I SROL CHEN

'BYED DO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI RTZE BROM DBANG PHYUG
SENG

GE, BRAG KA JO BTZUN, BLA CHEN LHA PA, STON PA RIN CHEN BLA MA,

BRAG KA LHA STON, SGOM PA GZHON NU BU GRAGS, KHYI MNYE A'ARYA DE
WA,

LHA RJE BLO GROS BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BKA' BRGYUD
KYI BLA

MA'I GSOL 'DEBS// SOGS MGUR CHEN NYER DGU'I SKOR SOGS MANG

DU BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI RJE SGAM PO PA'I SLOB MA BRGYUD PA 'DZIN
PA

@1205 BZHI'I YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

('BAL LDONG TZAB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES AAG TSOM CAN
GYI BLON

PO YIN, BOD LUGS SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 755 LOR RGYAL PO
KHRI LDE

GTZUG BRTAN MES AAG TSOM CAN LKOG TU BKRONGS NAS SRID 'GYUR

BSLANG BA'I NGAN SEMS YOD KYANG, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN
GYIS

BOD LUGS ME PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 756 LOR 'BAL LDONG TZAB
DMAG

DANG KHRIMS KYIS TSAR BCAD CING KHYIM GZHIS RGYU NOR DANG BCAS
PA

GZHUNG BZHES MDZAD NAS DUS ZING LHING 'JAGS SU BTANG NGO,

('BAL BLON 'BRO MA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING
YON

GYI NANG BLON YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS MI

GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA'

KHRIMS BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS

GSAL ZHING, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BUM PHRAG GSUM PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1432 LOR

BRGYAD PA'I

@1206 SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1504 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG LO BDUN

PAR SEMS DPA' GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING YI
GE'I

SBYOR KLOG BCAS LA LEGS PAR BSLABS, DE NAS MDOG CHOS 'KHOR

SGANG DU PHEBS TE PAn CHEN SANGS RGYAS SENG GE DANG, BYANG SEMS
BLO

GROS RIN CHEN, DOL PHRUG CHOS BZANG RNAMS LA BSTEN NAS GZHUNG

CHEN DAG LA SLOB GNYER MDZAD DE SA SKYAR DKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR
MDZAD,

DE NAS 'BRAS YUL SKYED TSAL DU PHEBS SHING BYAMS CHEN RAB 'BYAMS

PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL LAS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SBYANGS TE

BSHAD PA MDZAD PAS 'BUM PHRAG GSUM PA ZHES MTSAN SNYAN GSOL,

SGRA PA SHES RAB RIN CHEN DANG SHANGS PA KUN DGA' DPAL LDAN LAS
SGRA

DANG, SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR BCAS LA SBYANGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO

SUM CU THAM PAR BYAMS CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL DANG,

GO BO RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS SENG GE ZHVA LU DKA' BCU BA

GSUM LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING RTZES THANG DU GZHUNG LUGS DRUG
CU

BSHAD PA'I DGA' STON SPEL, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PAR NGAM RING DU

PHEBS TE SHER PHYIN STONG PHRAG BRGYA PA LA BSHAD PA'I SROL CHEN
PO BTOD,

DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR NGOR CHEN YAB SRAS LAS NGOR LUG SDANG,

BDAG CHEN RGYA GAR BA LAS RDZONG LUGS, BSHES GNYEN BLO GROS
RGYAL

MTSAN LAS BO DONG PA'I DE NYID 'DUS PA, STAG LUNG NGAG DBANG
GRAGS

PA LAS DVAGS PO BKA' BRGYUD DANG RAS CHUNG SNYAN BRGYUD, MKHYEN
RAB

YON TAN DPAL BYUNG LAS SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD DANG RI CHOS, KA

@1207 TOG NOR BU BZANG PO LAS RDZOGS CHEN GYI CHOS SKOR, RNAL
'BYOR RDO RJE

LAS ZHI BYED KYI CHOS SOGS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DE NAS CHU MIG

DANG, YAR 'BROG RKYANG 'DUR, NOR BU SGANG SOGS 'GRIMS SHING

LO BCU'I BAR DU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA

BDUN PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1489 LOR

GTZANG STOD BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE
MNYAN

YOD BYA RGOD GSHONGS KYI CHOS GRVA CHEN PO GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING

DANG

DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO DON GNYIS PAR

NI

BYANG GI LHA DBANG RNAM GNYIS, 'JAM MGON BLO GROS BKRA SHIS SOGS

YIN NO, ,

('BUL SDUD SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS

YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG, CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD CING
GRVA

SA CHEN PO'I CHOS SGO 'GRIMS TE GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG
GSANG

CHEN RGYUD SDE BZHI LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA
PA'I CHU MO

YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1903 LOR RONG THA DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO LAS
RTZIS RIG

@1208 SOGS GSAN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS MDO DBUS KHAMS GSUM DU PHEBS

TE MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR ZHING GDUL BYA THAMS CAD
SMIN

PAR MDZAD, SKU TSE'I SMAD DU LHA LDAN KUN BDE GLING DU BZHUGS
NAS

SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON MUR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //MKHAN CHEN MKHYEN RAB BSTAN PA

CHOS 'PHEL GYI RNAM THAR BYIN RLABS BDUD RTZI'I BUM BZANG//
DANG,

//BA SO RTA TSAG NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI
RNAM THAR

BCAD//, //DBU MA 'JUG PA'I SA BCAD//, //RI KHROD DGE 'PHEL

SO, ,

('BE BZA' WA MO SKYID,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DGU PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO GLANG DAR MA 'U DUM BTZAN PO SKU GSHEGS

NAS GDUNG SRAS MNGA' BDAG 'OD BSRUNGS DANG, MNGA' BDAG YUM

BRTAN GNYIS MA 'CHAMS PAR RGYAL SRID DBU RU DANG GA-YO RU GNYIS
SU

GYES PA'I DUS BABS DANG, LHAG PAR DU GA-YO RU'I ZHANG RJE GSAS
SNE

BTZAN GYIS RANG GI DBON PO GA-YU SNE BSAD PAR BRTEN TE GA-YU
SNE'I

BZA' ZLA 'BE BZA' WA MO SKYID KYIS 'GO KHRID BYAS NAS MCHIMS
KONG

YUL GYI MI DRUG TZAM GROS KHONGS SU BSDUS NAS 'BANGS GYEN LOG
BYAS

@1209 PA DANG BRGYUD DE, "YUL GRU RE RER YANG CHE SRID DANG
CHUNG SRID,

MANG TSAN DANG CHUNG TSAN, GSER PA DANG GA-YU PA, SHA ZAN DANG
RTZAM

ZAN ZHES SDE TSAN GNYIS GNYIS SU 'CHAD DE RTZOD," CES //CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// LAS GSUNGS PA LTAR BOD KHAMS SIL BUR

'THOR BA RED, KHONG MO NI 'BANGS GYEN LOG SKABS KYI SNYAN GRAGS
CHE

BA'I 'GO KHRID PA ZHIG YIN NO, ,

('BRAS BLO GLING DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG CHOS GRUB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1890

LOR MDO KHAMS LDAN MA KHUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG
PA'I

SA MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1949 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE DGE BSNYEN DANG, RAB

BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA
BYANG BAR

MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS BLO GSAL GLING GI

CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA
DPYIS

PHYIN PA MDZAD CING LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD
DE MKHAS

PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PAR SBYIN BDAG
GIS

GDAN ZHUS LTAR RGYA NAG RI BO RTZE LNGAR PHEBS NAS CHOS KYI
'KHOR LO RGYA

CHER BSKOR, DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA LDAN MA STONG PHUD CES ZHU'O, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //TSUL DANG TSUL MA YIN PA RNAM PAR
'BYED PA'I

BSTAN BCOS RIG PA'I NYIN BYED// DANG, //CHOS KYI DBYANGS GSAL@1210 BAR 'BYED PA'I GTAM KLU SGRUB DGONGS RGYAN DANG DE'I RANG
'GREL//

BCAS POD CHUNG GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

('BRAS MO BA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS CHOS
RJE

GTZANG PA RGYA RAS RTZA BA'I BLA MAR BSTEN NAS GDAMS NGAG THAMS
CAD

ZHUS PAS THUGS DAM KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS, DUS PHYIS SU MYANG
STOD

DU 'BRAS MO DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING TSOGS PA BSKYANGS TE

BSTAN PA'I ZHABS TOG LEGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,

('BRI GUNG KUN DGA' RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG PO, ,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1475

LOR 'BRI GUNG GZHU STOD DU YAB RJE RIN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN
DPAL

BZANG PO DANG, YUM MGAR BZA' RIN CHEN DPAL MO GNYIS KYI SRAS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS SKYU RA YIN, RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME MO

PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1527 LOR MTSE'U KHA BDE LDAN PHO BRANG DU
SKU GSHEGS,

GONG GI BYIS PA'I MTSAN LA RIN CHEN LHUN PO ZHES ZHU'O, DGUNG LO

BDUN PAR SLOB DPON SBYIN GRAGS LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG LEGS PAR

BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA KHU BO WANG RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LAS

BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA'I GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD BUM PA GNAG BYO'I
TSUL

DU GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR MKHAN CHEN KUN DGA' BLO GROS

DANG, SLOB DPON BLO GROS BSTAN PA, DUS SGO BA LEGS PA RIN CHEN

@1211 SOGS LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU
BZHES

SHING MTSAN LA KUN DGA' RIN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG

PO ZHES GSOL, MKHAN SLOB DE DAG LAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHAS PA CHEN POR

GYUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR RAB BYUNG GI MKHAN SLOB LAS
BSNYEN

RDZOGS MDZAD CING 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI
LA

BZHUGS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS BSHAD SGRUB KYI BSTAN PA
BSKYANGS

SHING GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS BSTAN MANG DU GSAR

BZHENGS MDZAD, DUS DER DBUS GTZANG GI SA KHUL DU ZING 'KHRUG
DANG,

NAD YAMS, MU GE LA SOGS PA BYUNG BA LA BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'

CHEN PO'I BRTUL ZHUGS 'DZIN NAS DE DAG BZLOG PA'I MTHUN RKYEN
KHO

NA MDZAD DO, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA PAR ZHVA DMAR CHOS KYI GRAGS PA
DANG

MJAL ZHING DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU ZHUS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU
THAM

PAR BKRA SHIS SGO MANG LEGS PAR GRUB STE RAB GNAS CHO GA RGYAS
PA

MDZAD, DBUS GTZANG GI CHE DGU THAMS CAD KYI BLA MAR GYUR TE KUN

GYIS SKYOB PA 'JIG RTEN MGON PO'I RNAM 'PHRUL DU NGOS 'DZIN BYAS

SO, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

'THIMS SO, KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I
MKHAN

RABS BCO LNGA PA YIN NO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI RAS
CHEN

RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO DANG, ,SLOB DPON 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN,

MKHAN CHEN KUN DGA' RGYA MTSO, PAn CHEN RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN, RAB

@1212 'BYAMS PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, CHOS SGO BA BCAS DANG, GSUNG
RTZOM

NI //RJE BTZUN RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I DKYIL CHOG// DANG, //MOS
GUS

SROG 'KHOR GYI KHRID//, //BDE MGON GYI LAS RIM GSAL SGRON// BCAS

BZHUGS SO, ,

('BRI GUNG SKYOB PA 'JIG RTEN MGON PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1143
LOR

MDO KHAMS LDAN STOD GTZONG DU YAB SKYU RA RDO RJE DANG, YUM
BTZUN MA

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME MO GLANG
LO STE SPYI

LO 1217 LOR 'BRI GUNG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR YI

GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG SOGS YAB LAS
ZHUS,

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR RVA SGRENG SGOM CHEN DANG SLOB DPON SKYES BU
GNYIS

LAS BSTAN RIM DANG, LHO PA RDO RJE SNYING PO LAS GSANG 'DUS
'PHAGS

SKOR GYI SGRUB THABS SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR LHO LA

BYON TE SLOB DPON YE SHES LAS RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I DBANG DANG
MAN

NGAG RNAMS ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN
MDZAD

CING BCAD RGYA MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE DGUNG LO NYER LNGA

PAR PHAG GRU RDO RJE RGYAL PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING BYANG CHUB
SEMS

SDOM ZHUS PAS MTSAN LA RIN CHEN DPAL ZHES GSOL, PHYAG RGYA CHEN

PO'I MAN NGAG SOGS ZAB CHOS THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU

GSAN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR GA-YE CHUNG DU BYON TE LO

GSUM GYI RING DUS GRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO NGA PAR

@1213 ZHANG SUM THOG PA DANG, SLOB DPON RTZI LUNG PA, GNYAL BA
'DUL

'DZIN SOGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING 'DUL BA GSAN, DE NAS

PHAG GRUR PHEBS TE LO GSUM GYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING
'CHAD

NYAN SPEL, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PA RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA MO PHAG LO

STE SPYI LO 1179 LOR 'BRI THEL BYANG CHUB GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD

NAS DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS PAS 'BRI GUNG BKA'

BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA'I SROL TSUGS, PHAG GRU'I GDAN SA DANG BSAM

YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS ZHIG GSOS MDZAD CING, DBUS GTZANG

GI GNAS RI MANG POR 'GRIMS NAS BYIN GYIS BRLABS, DGUNG LO NGA

DRUG PAR PHAG GRUR GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG RTEN BRTEN PAR GSAR

BZHENGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR SING GA LA'I DGRA BCOM

PAS ME TOG PHUL BA DANG KHA CHE PAn CHEN GYIS KLU SGRUB GNYIS PA
ZHES

BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE DRUG PAR SPYAN SNGA
GRAGS

PA 'BYUNG GNAS PHAG GRU'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA MNGA' GSOL, DGUNG

LO DON GSUM PAR 'BRI GUNG DU DGE 'DUN KHRI TSO BCO BRGYAD 'DZOMS

MANG PO

MNGAGS NAS 'BRI GUNG GI BSTAN PA DAR BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO DON

'KHRUNGS SHING GDUNG RUS SKYU RA YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS

NAS KHU BO RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
DPAL

BZANG PO DANG, RIN CHEN BSOD NAMS DPAL GYI RGYA MTSO GNYIS LAS

RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING MTSAN LA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES
GSOL,

RAB BYUNG GI MKHAN PO GNYIS LAS BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI
THUN

MONG MA YIN PA'I GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU

THOS BSAM MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO

1570 LOR 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS
NAS

GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG BKRA SHIS SGO MANG DNGUL LAS GRUB PA SOGS
SKU

GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS TE RAB GNAS LEGS PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO,

KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU
DGU

PA YIN NO, ,

('BRI GUNG TSE DBANG BRTAN PA,)

KHONG NI DKON MCHOG 'GRO PHAN DBANG PO DANG MI GCIG YIN

PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRI GUNG RIN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO,)

@1223 KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1449 LOR

'BRI GUNG GZHU STOD DU YAB RJE CHOS RGYAL RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG
DANG,

YUM MGAR BZA' BSOD NAMS SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS

SHING GDUNG RUS SKYU RA YIN, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO
'BRUG LO

STE SPYI LO 1484 LOR 'BRI GUNG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS SLOB DPON RIN CHEN 'OD LA BSTEN TE PHYI NANG THUN
MONG

GI RIG GNAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD CING MKHAS PA
CHEN

POR GYUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR MKHAN PO BSHES GNYEN BZANG
PO

SOGS LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL DKYUS GCIG TU BSGRUBS TE 'DUL

BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS LA THOS BSAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG

PAR KONG PO DANG, 'OG SHOD, DVAGS PO SOGS SU PHEBS TE CHOS KYI

'KHOR LO RGYA CHER BSKOR, DE NAS 'BRI GUNG DU PHEBS TE YAB RJE'I

DGONGS RDZOGS SU GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA'I THUB PA'I SKU THOG
TSAD

MA ZHIG BZHENGS PA DANG CHOS 'KHOR SGANG DU SA 'BUM LAS MCHOD
RTEN

CHEN PO DAG KYANG BZHENGS, DE NAS 'BRI GUNG GI CHE DGU RNAMS
KYIS

GDUNG RGYUD SPEL BA ZHUS PA'I NGOR RE ZHIG TU TSUL KHRIMS KYI
SDOM PA PHUL

NAS MGAR BZA' RIN CHEN DPAL MO KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS

RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL DANG, RGYAL DBANG KUN DGA' RIN CHEN, CHOS

KYI RGYAL PO BSTAN PA RGYAL MTSAN, SRAS MO 'GRO BA'I SGROL MA
BCAS SKU

'KHRUNGS, DE NAS TSUL KHRIMS KYI SDOM PA BSKYAR DU ZHUS TE 'BRI
GUNG

BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS BSHAD SGRUB
GNYIS KYI

@1224 BSTAN PA BSKYANGS MUR DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS
DBYINGS

SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA CHOS RJE BCO LNGA PA ZHES
ZHU'O,

KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU
BZHI

PA YIN NO, ,

('BRI GUNG RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
DPAL BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1519 LOR

LHA BO STOD DU YAB BYAMS PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN LEGS LDAN RIN
CHEN

DPAL BZANG PO DANG, YUM SKYID SHOD BZA' BSOD NAMS SGROL MA

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING GDUNG RUS SKYU RA YIN, RAB
BYUNG

BCU PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1576 LOR MTSE'U KHA BDE LDAN
PHO BRANG DU

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA PAR YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON
CHOS

SPYOD SOGS LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR MKHAN PO GRAGS

PA RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO LAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES,
'BRI

GUNG RIN CHEN PHUN TSOGS LAS BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA'I GDAMS NGAG

DANG SGOS SU 'BRI GUNG PA'I CHOS MDZOD MTHA' DAG BUM PA GANG
BYO'I

TSUL DU GSAN, GZHAN YANG KARMA MI SKYOD RDO RJE DANG, ZHVA DMAR

DKON MCHGO YAN LAG GTER STON ZHIG PO GLING PA, MKHAN CHEN

KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS, MKHAN CHEN GRAGS RGYAL BA, SNANG GSAL BA

BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR

@1225 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS
CHOS SRID

GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR MKHAN PO

KUN DGA' RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS TE 'DUL

BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS LA THOS BSAM RMAD DU BYUNG BA MDZAD, DGUNG

LO NYER GNYIS PAR THEL GYI THOG KHA GSER KHANG DANG 'DZAM GLING
RGYAN SGO

MANG SOGS KYI SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BCAS ZHIG GSOS DANG GSAR

BZHENGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU THAM PAR MDZO SER DANG, 'BAB

ROM, SGOM SDE SOGS SU PHEBS TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHER
BSKOR,

LO DER RGYA NAG GONG MA CHEN POS 'JA' SA GNANG, DGUNG LO SO

GSUM PAR 'PHAN YUL DANG, ZHOGS PA, RANG ZHABS SOGS SU

PHEBS TE GDUL BYA RNAMS SMIN GROL DU BKOD, RGYAL BA'I BKA'

'GYUR GYI GTZOS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, DGUNG LO

ZHE BDUN PAR GCUNG PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS DPAL GYI RGYA MTSO 'BRI

GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SAR DBANG BSKUR, DE NAS DBUS
GTZANG

GI DUS ZING LANGS BA LA BRTZE SEMS CHEN POS 'DUN MA 'GRIG PA'I

MTHUN RKYEN MANG DU BSGRUBS KYANG PHAN 'BRAS DE 'DRA MA BYUNG,
DE

LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD
PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG
CHUB

GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

('BRI GUNG RIN CHEN PHUN TSOGS CHOS KYI RGYAL PO,)

@1226 'BRI GUNG GZHU STOD DU YAB RJE CHOS RGYAL BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN DANG,

YUM BSOD NAMS SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING
GDUNG

RUS SKYU RA YIN, RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1557 LOR

RGYA MA KHRI KHANG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA PAR SKYU
RA'I GDUNG

BRGYUD YIN MIN LA NANG KHUL NAS RTZOD PA CUNG ZAD BUD PAR BRTEN
SKU

'KHOR NYUNG BSDUS DANG BCAS YAR KLUNG PHYOGS SU PHEBS TE MKHAN
CHEN

BSOD NAMS BKRA SHIS LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN,

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR ZHVA DMAR CHOS KYI GRAGS PA LAS RAB BYUNG
BSGRUBS

SHING MTSAN LA RIN CHEN PHUN TSOGS CHOS KYI RGYAL PO ZHES GSOL,
DE

LTAR ZHVA DMAR BA SOGS LA BSTEN GSAR RNYING GI CHOS SKOR DANG
RIG

GNAS BCAS LA THOS BSAM RMAD DU BYUNG BA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU

DRUG PAR 'BRI GUNG DU PHEBS TE SNGAR GYI RTZOD PA ZHI BAR GYUR
ZHING 'BRI

GUNG KUN DGA' RIN CHEN LAS BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA'I CHOS SKOR THAMS

CAD BUM PA GANG BYA'I TSUL DU GSAN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU
THAM

PAR MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG, SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS

DPAL BZANG, GSANG STON GRUB CHEN TSE 'PHEL BZANG PO SOGS LAS

BSNYEN RDZOGS MDZAD CING 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I
KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO NYER

BZHI PAR RGYA NAG GONG MA YUNG LO RGYAL POS WANG GI CHO LO DANG
'JA' SA

GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA NAS BZUNG YANGS RI SGAR GYI GTZOS

SGRUB SDE BRGYAD TZAM GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS

@1227 LA MTHUN RKYEN GANG LEGS SBYAR, DGUNG LO SUM CU THAM PAR
RIG

'DZIN BDUD 'JOMS RDO RJE DANG, RGYA MA MI 'GYUR KUN DGA' DPAL

BZANG, MNGA' RIS PAn CHEN SOGS LA BSTEN NAS BKA' BRGYAD

BDE 'DUS BCAS GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I CHOS SKOR MANG DU GSAN TE

BSTAN PA GNYIS LDAN GYI BDAG POR GYUR, DE NAS RIG 'DZIN BU KHRID

BDAG YUM DU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS CHOS RGYAL PHUN TSOGS SKU
'KHRUNGS,

GTZOS SKU GSUNG THUGS BSTAN MANG DU BZHENGS, DBUS GTZANG STOD

SMAD KYI YUL GRU PHAL CHER ZHABS KYIS BCAGS NAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR
LO

MDZAD PA SOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO

BYANG CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU DRUG PA YIN, KHONG

SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL DANG, PAn CHEN RIN

BTANG

RDO RJE DPAL 'BAR, MKHAS GRUB BYAMS PA DPAL BA, SNANG GSAL

BA BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO BCAS MANG DU BYON NO, ,

LO

RTZAL

BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, SKU NA SON RJES 'BRI GUNG KHRI SKOR

SRAS CHOS RGYAL RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG SKU 'KHRUNGS, T'A MIN GONG

KHONG GIS DMAG DPON MDZAD NAS RGOL LAN SPRAD DE RNAM PAR RGYAL,

'GAN

BZHAG CING YAB RJE DON GRUB RGYAL PO LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE
TSUL,

BCU GCIG GI RING DU SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS SHING RTOGS PA'I YON TAN

DU GDAN SA

GNANG

CHUB GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS BCU GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

ZHU'O, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR KHU PO RIN CHEN PHUN TSOGS CHOS KYI

PO LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU BZHES
SHING

MTSAN LA RIN CHEN BSOD NAMS DPAL GYI RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL, DE

NAS KARMA PA YAB SRAS DANG, DPA' PO GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA, SNANG

GDAN

MTSO

LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS LA
SBYANGS PA

DAM CHOS

@1231 MKHAN CHEN BYAMS PA CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS

GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI DKA' GNAD MANG DU GSAN, DE NAS

MDO KHAMS STOD SMAD DU PHEBS TE GDUL BYA MANG PO SMIN GROL LA
BKOD,

DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR TZA RI DANG, MTSO DKAR, GA-YU MTSO, ME

'BAR MTSO, MTSO GNYIS MA, KA LA DUNG MTSO SOGS SU GNAS MJAL

DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING GI
GDAN

SAR PHEBS NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DE NAS

GZHAN GYIS PHRA MA BCUG PAR BRTEN DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG GIS GNAS

SKABS SHIG LA DO DAM BYAS KYANG RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA NGAG DBANG
BLO BZANG

RGYA MTSOS GLOD GROL DU BTANG STE THUGS MTHUN KHRIMS GTZANG GIS
CHOS

'BREL MDZAD, 'BRI GUNG GI GDAN SA DANG, DE MIN GYI SGRUB SDE
KHAG

LA SKU GSUNG THUGS BSTAN MANG DU BZHENGS PA MDZAD, DE LTAR BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE LNGA PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA DKON

MCHOG PHUN TSOGS ZHES ZHU'O, KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING
GI

GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS NYER GSUM PA YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS

CHE BA NI DKON MCHOG 'PHRIN LAS BZANG PO DANG, LHO DKON MCHOG
'PHRIN LAS RNAM RGYAL, RGYAL SRAS BKRA SHIS PHUN TSOGS, PAn CHEN

DKON MCHOG LHUN GRUB, DKON MCHOG 'GRO PHAN DBANG PO BCAS

LO'I

BYUNG BSGRUBS TE MTSAN LA RGYAL BA'I BLO GROS ZHES ZHU'O, DE NAS

CING RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS RO LANGS GSER DU BSGYUR NUS PA'I DNGOS

@1233 BRNYES TE, //GRUB MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "RGYAL BA'I
BLO GROS RO

LANGS GSER DU BSGYUR," ZHES GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI GRUB THOB RJE

DANG 'BANGS NYER LNGA'I NANG TSAN ZHIG YIN NO, ,

('BRI YON TAN,)

SNYING

PO SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD// KYI NANG DU "RGYAL PO DE'I (KHRI LDE
SRONG BTZAN SAD NA

LEGS MJING YIN) SKU RING LA YI GE'I MKHAN PO 'BRI YON TAN ZHES

BA BYUNG STE, RJE LA YI GE STANGS SU PHUL BAS, NYA LTO DKAR CHU
NAS

BTON PA 'DRA BA ZHIG BYUNG STE, GUNG BLON RNAMS KYI GA-YAR DAM
DU

BZANG BAS, RJES RTZIS DANG BSNYEN BKUR BA NI, DBU STON, GZHUNG

STON, THA STON, ZA SRUNG, ZLA STON, SKRA 'KHRUD CHU STON, ZA

'DEGS, BYA DGA'I STON MO DPAG TU MED DO," ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG

GO ,

('BRI SE RU GUNG STON,)

GUNG LA SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I MED
THABS

@1234 GONG MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS TE BAL BZA' KHRI BTZUN DANG,
RGYA BZA'

SHING PHYI

NANG BAR GYI KHOD RNAMS SNYOMS PAR MDZAD DO, ,

('BRING STON YE SHES YON TAN,)

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1119
LOR SKU

PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1102 LOR RGYAL LHA KHANG GI GDAN SAR

NGO BCU BDUN GYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING SLOB MA MANG DU
GSO

SKYONG MDZAD, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE

DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS, KHONG NI RGYAL LHA KHANG GI GDAN RABS GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

('BRING YAS BLON STAG RMA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING
YON

GYI NANG BLON YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS MI

GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA' KHRIMS
BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS

GSAL ZHING, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO ,

('BRING YE SHES YON TAN,)

@1235 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU DBUS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS SU MDO SMAD TZONG
KHA'I

YUL RMA LUNG RDO RJE'I BRAG DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON (DENG
SANG MTSO

SNGON ZHING CHEN ZHUNG HVA RDZONG KHONGS) DU BYON NAS BLA CHEN
DGONGS PA

RAB GSAL (953-1035) LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL,

DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU BZHES SHING DBUS GTZANG DU
LOG

PHEBS MDZAD CING BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS LA ZHIG GSOS

MDZAD, DE RJES KHONG GIS NGAN LAM DU SPYI MO BRTZIGS SHING DKAR
CHU

DANG SNYE THANG BRAG SNA BZUNG STE 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA SPEL NAS
DGE

'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING, DE LAS GYES PA'I CHOS
RGYUD

LA 'BRING TSO STOD PA DANG 'BRING TSO SMAD PA ZHES GRAGS SO,
KHONG NI

BSTAN PA PHYI DAR GYI SKABS SU BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL LAS

BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PA'I DBUS GTZANG GI MKHAS PA MI BCU'I NANG GI
YA

GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

('BRUG KHAMS SBRUL BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS KYI NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO

1730 LOR KHAMS RDZA STOD DPON TSANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BCU

GSUM PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1779 LOR KHAMS PHUN TSOGS
CHOS

'KHOR GLING DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BZHI PAR KHAMS LHA
THOG

RGYAL PO'I MNGA' KHONGS 'BRUG PA BKA' BRGYUD KYI RTZA BA'I GDAN
SA

PHUG TSOGS CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN ZHUS TE
GDAN

@1236 SAR BKOD, DE NAS SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS DANG 'JAM DPAL

DPA' BO SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN TE MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR THOS BSAM RMAD DU BYUNG BA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PA

NAS BZUNG RNAM RGYAL CHOS 'KHOR GLING DANG, GSANG CHEN MTHONG
GROL

GLING SOGS GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING RANG DON THOS BSAM SGOM

GSUM DANG, GZHAN DON 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA'

BAR MDZAD, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE

DGUNG LO LNGA BCU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO,

KHONG NI 'BRUG KHAMS SPRUL GYI SKU PHRENG BZHI PA YIN, KHONG GI
SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI MKHAS GRUB BSOD NAMS RAB 'PHEL DANG, RAB

'BYAMS PA BLO GROS BRTAN PA, 'DZI SGAR RDO RJE GRAGS PA SOGS
DANG,

GSUNG RTZOM GRAGS CHE BA NI //RGYAN GYI BSTAN BCOS ME LONG PAn
CHEN BLA

MA'I GSUNG BZHIN BKRAL BA DBYANGS CAN NGAG GI ROL MTSO// BCAS

BZHUGS SO, ,

('BRUG PA KUN DGA' SENG GE)

KHONG NI 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN

PAS DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA NYI MA SENG GE)

KHONG NI DBON PO NYI MA SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER GZIGS
PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG,)

@1237 KHONG NI NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA PADMA DKAR PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1527 LOR

MCHIMS YUL DU YAB JO SRAS KLU'I DBANG PO DANG, YUM CHOS SKYONG

SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME
PHO SPREL

LO STE SPYI LO 1596 LOR SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO GSUM PAR 'BRUG PA

RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG MJAL, DGUNG LO DGU
PAR

LHA PHYOGS YANGS PA'I RGYAL KHAMS SU PHEBS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR

GDAN SA SENG GE'I KHRI CHEN DU MNGA' GSOL, DE NAS BZUNG SLOB

DPON SHES RAB GO CHA LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR SBYANGS
MDZAD,

SLOB DPON CHOS GRAGS BSTAN 'PHEL DANG, KUN MKHYEN BKRA SHIS

SOGS MKHAS CHEN MANG PO BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG

BCAS PAR GSAN, BSTAN PA'I BDAG PO NGAG GI DBANG PO LAS DGE

BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG MANG PO THOB,

DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR CHOS GRVA CHEN PO DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN DU

KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS MKHAN PO MDZAD,

LAS SLOB SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN PA, GSANG STON

SLOB DPON SANGS RGYA YE SHES, GRIB TSOD NYANG RAM PA, GROGS DAN

PA DGE SLONG SANGS RGYAS LHUN GRUB, DAD PA'I DGE 'DUN GRANGS
TSANG

BA'I DBUS SU DGE BSNYEN, DGE TSUL, GSOL BA DANG BZHI'I LAS

@1238 KYI BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA CHIG RDZOGS SU MNOS, MTSAN LA
NGAG DBANG

KUN DGA' RNAM RGYAL NOR BU DPAL BZANG PO ZHES GSOL, BYANG CHUB

SEMS BSKYED PA'I MTSAN LA MI PHAM PADMA DKAR PO PHYOGS LAS RNAM

PAR RGYAL BA'I SDE ZHES GSOL, SKU TSE GANG BOR 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM
GSUM

GYIS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG

GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RJOD BYED TSIG GI RGYUD BSHAD PA MKHAS PA'I
KHA RGYUN//

DANG, //CHOS 'BYUNG BSTAN PA'I PADMA RGYAS PA'I NYIN BYED//,
//MNGON

RTOGS RGYAN GYI 'GREL BA BYAMS PA'I ZHAL LUNG//, //DPE RDZI//,
//SENG

GE SGRA'I LO RGYUS//, //RTEN 'BREL RNAM BSHAD ZHIB MO RNAM
'THAG//,

//RDZA RI'I GNAS BSTOD// BCAS CHOS TSAN SUM BRGYA THAM PA YOD
PHA PO

TI BCU BZHIR BSDUS NAS BZHUGS SO, ,

('BRUG PA BLO GROS SENG GE)

KHONG NI BLO GROS SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA GZHON NU SENG GE)

KHONG NI DBON PO GZHON NU SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA YE SHES RIN CHEN,)

KHONG NI YE SHES RIN CHEN DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA SHES RAB SENG GE)

@1239 KHONG NI SHES RAB SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA SENG GE RGYAL PO,)

KHONG NI BCU GSUM PA SENG GE RGYAL PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRUG PA SENG GE RIN CHEN,)

KHONG NI SPOS SKYA SENG GE RIN CHEN DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DER

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('BRE SHES RAB 'BAR,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I RNGOG BLO LDAN SHES RAB (1059-1109) KYI SLOB

MA YIN, KHONG GIS SPYIR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA

MDZAD, SGOS SU RNGOG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS
MTSAN

NYID LA SOGS PA'I CHOS SKOR RNAMS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS PAS SANGS

RGYAS CHOS LUGS KYI MTSAN NYID RIG PA SPYI DANG, LHAG PAR DU
PHAR PHYIN

LA MKHAS PA'I MCHOG TU GYUR, DE NAS SKYEGS GNAS RNYING DANG,
GZHAN

RNAMS SU'ANG CHOS GZHI BZUNG ZHING, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU
PHYIN PA'I

MDO DANG BSTAN BCOS GNYIS KA'I STENG NAS 'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER

MDZAD, KHONG GI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA DE NI BSTAN PA SNGA DAR GYI
PHA

ROL TU PHYIN PA'I BSHAD RGYUN KHAMS SU 'PHOS PA LAS BYUNG BA YIN,@1240 SLOB MA SHIN TU MANG NA YANG BSHAD PA'I RGYUN GYI GTZO BO
AAR BYANG CHUB

YE SHES KYIS BZUNG BA YIN, KHONG NI RNGOG BLO LDAN SHES RAB KYI
BU CHEN

THUGS SRAS BZHI'I YA GYAL ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI
//PHAR

PHYIN GYI 'GREL BA// DANG, //NYI KHRI'I 'GREL BA//, //MDO SDUD
PA'I

'GREL BA// BCAS DKAR CHAG KHAG TU BSHAD, ,

('BRO RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I ZHANG BLON DANG,
DBUS

GTZANG RU BZHI NANG GI RU LAG STOD KYI RU DPON YIN ZHING, RU RTA
NI

NGANG PA PHUNG DMAR DANG, RU DAR NI SENG DKAR GNAM 'PHYONG YIN

NO, ,

('BRO CHUNG BZANG 'OR MANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES AAG TSOM CAN
GYIS

BOD LUGS SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 728 LOR NANG BLON CHEN PO'I
GO

SAR BSKO BZHAG MDZAD CING SRID DON THAMS CAD RGYAL PO'I BKA'

BZHIN DU BSGRUBS PA DANG, LHA SA MKHAR BRAG BRAG DMAR MGRIN

BZANG, MCHIMS PHU NAM RAL, BRAG DMAR KA RU, MA SA GONG GI

GNAS TE GTZUG LAG KHANG LNGA BZHENGS PA'I ZHABS TOG KYANG PHUN
SUM

TSOGS PA MDZAD DO, ,

('BRO LDOG SRONG STON,)

@1241 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU
SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING
YON

GYI DPANG PO DANG, DMAG DPON, PHYIS BLON BKA' LA GTOGS PA

ZHIG YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS NAM DU

YANG MI GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I

BKA' KHRIMS BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA'

GTZIGS// LAS GSAL BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA

TSANG NI //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BRO ZHANG KLU BZANG LHA BO BTZAN,)

841) GYI PHYI BLON ZHIG YIN TE, KHRANG CHIN KHRI LO GSUM PA, BOD

LUGS CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 823 LOR //DBON ZHANG DBU SNYUNG
RDO RING//

NGAM //KHRANG CHIN MTHUN SGRIL RDO RING// BZHENGS PA'I SKABS SU
"BOD CHEN

PO'I BLON PO PHAL GYI THABS DANG MYING RUS," ZHES //DBON ZHANG
DBU

SNYUNG RDO RING// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BRO BZA' KHRI RGYAL MO BTZAN,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI BTZUN MO
YIN, DUS

PHYIS SU RAB TU BYUNG STE MTSAN LA BYANG CHUB RJE ZHES ZHU'O,
KHONG MOS

DGE RGYAS BYE MA GLING BZHENGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,

@1242 ('BRO BZA' KHRI MA LOD,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO MANG SRONG MANG BTZAN GYI BTZUN MO
DANG,

RGYAL PO 'DUS SRONG MANG PO RJE RLUNG NAM 'PHRUL RGYAL PO'I MA
YUM YIN,

SRAS DGUNG LO CHUNG BA'I DUS SU CHAB SRID 'GAN DBANG BZUNG STE
RGYAL

SRID MA NYAMS PAR MDZAD CING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES

AAG TSOM CAN GYI CHAB SRID KYANG ROGS SKYOR CHEN PO MDZAD NAS
BOD

LUGS CHU PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 712 LOR SKU GSHEGS SO,,

MJING

YON GYI BTZUN MO CHEN MA YIN PA DANG, RGYAL PO KHRI GTZUG LDE
BTZAN KHRI

RAL PA CAN DANG RGYAL PO 'U DUM BTZAN PO KHRI GLANG DAR MA'I MA
YUM

YIN NO,,

('BRO BZA' DUNG PYANG BZHER,)
