DANG,

RGYAL PO 'BRONG GNYAN LDE'U MA YUM YIN, //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I

DGA' STON// DU KHONG MO'I MTSAN LA 'BRO ZA MO DUR YANG BZHER
ZHES

'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BRO SHES RAB GRAGS PA,)

@1243 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS CAN GYI LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG
GIS

THOG MAR BOD YUL NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD CING, RAB BYUNG DANG,

DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES SHING 'DUL

BA'I CHOS GZHUNG BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS KHA CHE DANG,

BAL YUL, RGYA GAR SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA

GTUGS SHING RGYA GZHUNG DANG RGYA YIG BCAS LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS
NAS

BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR

RTZOM NI //BKA' 'GYUR// LAS //DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RTZA BA'I RGYUD
LAS

DBANG MDOR BSTAN PA// DANG, //DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSDUS PA'I

RGYUD// LE'U LNGA BA, //RAB TU GNAS PA MDOR BSDUS PA'I RGYUD//,

//BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //RDO RJE SNYING PO'I 'GREL BA KYE'I RDO
RJE'I BSDUS

PA'I RGYUD KYI RGYA CHER BSHAD PA// LE'U DRUG PA, //DGONGS PA'I
SKAD KYI

'GREL BA//, //DBANG MDOR BSTAN PA RGYA CHER 'GREL BA//, //RGYUD

KYI RGYAL PO DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I DBANG GI RAB TU BYED PA'I
'GREL

BA RDO RJE TSIG 'BYED PA//, //DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I SGRUB THABS YAN
LAG

BCU GCIG PA//, //RNAL 'BYOR GSUM GYI SNYING PO GSAL BA//,

//SBYOR BA YAN LAG DRUG GI MAN NGAG//, //RIM PA BZHI PA'I RNAM
PAR

'BYED PA//, //DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB

THABS//, //DPAL RDO RJE PHAG MO'I SGRUB THABS//, //GRUB PA'I RDO
RJE

RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SGRUB THABS//, //RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA'I SGRUB
THABS//,

@1244 //DPAL MGON PO NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS//, //LHAN CIG SKYES
GRUB//

BCAS CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO GSUM BZHUGS SO,,

('BRO SENG DKAR SH'AKYA 'OD,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING, DE RJES BAL

YUL DANG RGYA GAR SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA

GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM MANG DU GSAN

PA DANG, LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA YANG BYANG ZHING CHUB PA SLOB
GNYER

GNANG STE RGYA GZHUNG GI BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA

MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BKA' 'GYUR// LAS //STAG RNA'I
MDO//

BAM PO GNYIS PA DANG, //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //KYE RDO RJE BSDUS
DON

GYI RGYA CHER 'GREL BA// LE'U LNGA BA YAN CHAD, //MTHA' BRAL
RTOGS PA'I

SHES RAB STON PA DE KHO NA NYID THEG PA CHEN PO NYI SHU BA//,
//'PHAGS

PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA STONG PHRAG NYI SHU LNGA
BA'I MAN NGAG GI

BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA'I
RNAM

PAR 'GREL BA// SHO LO KA STONG PHRAG BZHI BRGYA, //MNGON RTOGS
RGYAN

SDUD PA DANG SBYAR BA'I 'GREL BA// SHO LO KA NYIS STONG CHIG
BRGYA BA,

//RNAM PAR RIG PA TZAM NYID DU GRUB PA//, //LHAN CIG DMIGS PA

NGES PAR GRUB PA// BCAS BZHUGS SO,,

('BRO BHIRMA BHI,)

@1245 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM
DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS PAn GRUB MANG
PO'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR THOS

BSAM MDZAD CING, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA LEGS PAR

SBYANGS TE BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG
GI

BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI
SGRUB

THABS ZHI BA 'OD KYI RIM PA// DANG, //'JAM DPAL KHRO BO'I SGRUB
THABS

RDO RJE 'OD KYI RIM PA//, //DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA//, //SKYABS
'GRO

SEMS BSKYED DBANG BZHI'I GDAMS PA//, //RDO RJE KLU'I GDAMS

NGAG//, //KHRUS KYI CHO GA//, //GTOR MA'I CHO GA//, //BDUN TSIG

GI CHO GA//, //RO SREG PA'I CHO GA//, //S'ATZTSA GDAB PA'I RIM
PA//,

//RAB TU GNAS PA'I CHO GA//, //SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA//, //THUN
MONG

GI DNGOS GRUB SGRUB THABS KYI MAN NGAG//, //MAndAL DBUL BA'I MAN

NGAG// BCAS BZHUGS SO,,

('BROG MI KHYE'U CHUNG LO TZ'A BA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING GDUNG RUS 'BROG MI YIN, GZHON NU'I DUS NAS LO
TZ'A

BA MKHYEN PAS MTSAN YANG DE LTAR DU GRAGS, SLOB DPON PADMA
'BYUNG

GNAS LAS DBANG DANG GDAMS NGAG MANG DU ZHUS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS

LEN LA BRTZON PA MDZAD PAS RDZU 'PHRUL GYIS NAM MKHA'I BYA RNAMS
LTA

STANGS DANG SDIGS MDZUB KYIS 'GUGS PAR NUS SHING, //GRUB

@1246 MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "KHYE'U CHUNG LO YIS NAM
MKHA'I BYA RNAMS

ZIN," ZHES GSUNGS SO, RTEN KHYIM PA STE SNGAGS 'CHANG GOS DKAR

LCANG LO CAN YIN, KHONG NI GRUB THOB RJE DANG 'BANGS NYER LNGA'I
NANG

GI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO,,

('BROG MI JO SRAS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS PAn GRUB MANG
BO'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD

YIG LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PA MDZAD CING BSTAN BCOS GNYIS
TZAM

BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN
'GYUR//

LAS //'PHAGS MA SGROL MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI SGRUB THABS CHO GA//
DANG,

//BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I RIM PA'I MAN NGAG// ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,,

('BROG MI DPAL GYI YE SHES,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS LAS DBANG CHEN ZHU

DUS ME TOG BLA MED HE RU KA'I DKYIL 'KHOR LA PHOG STE SRID PA MA
MO'I

BKA' BABS YIN ZHING, SRID PA BDE 'GRO'I DKYIL 'KHOR MNGON

SUM DU GZIGS SHING SNANG SRID MA MO THAMS CAD BRAN DU BKOL, LO

TZ'A BA LA YANG MKHAS PAR MKHYEN PAS MA MO'I RGYUD SOGS BOD YIG
TU

BSGYUR BA MDZAD, DE NAS YAR STOD SHAM PO GANGS RI SOGS SU PHEBS

TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON PA MDZAD PAS GRUB PA BRNYES
SHING,

@1247 //GRUB MTHA' SHEL GYI ME LONG// LAS "DPAL GYI YE SHES MA
MO MNGON SUM

'KHOR," ZHES GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI GRUB THOB RJE DANG 'BANGS NYER

LNGA'I NANG GI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

('BROG MI SH'AKYA BLO GROS,)

KHONG NI RMA LO DGE BA'I BLO GROS (1044-1089) DANG

DUS MNYAM YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS BSTAN PA'I
CHOS

SGOR ZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA

RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS LA THOS BSAM

NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS KHA CHE DANG, BAL YUL, RGYA GAR

SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS PAD LA GTUGS SHING
RGYA

GZHUNG DANG LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN
PA MDZAD

CING BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI

BSGYUR RTZOM NI //MDO MANG GI SKOR// LAS //BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I
SO

SOR THAR BA'I CHOS BZHI BSGRUB PA'I MDO// DANG, //'PHAGS PA CHOS

RGYA MTSO'I MDO//, //'PHAGS PA CHOS KYI RGYA MO//, //LTUNG BA
SDE LNGA'I

DGE MI DGE'I 'BRAS BU BRTAG PA'I MDO//, //'PHAGS PA 'JAM

DPAL GYI RTZA BA'I RTOGS PA SUM CU RTZA DRUG PA//, //BSTAN
'GYUR//

LAS //DKON MCHOG GSUM GYI BSTOD PA//, //BRGYA LNGA BCU PA'I
BSTOD

PA//, //SGRON MA GSAL BA MDOR BSHAD PA'I SA BCAD SNYING GI ME

LONG//, //RNAL 'BYOR PA'I RTOG PA'I GEGS SEL BA//, //DUG LNGA

SBAS PA'I LAM MCHOG TU GSANG BA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA//, //SHES

@1248 RAB BRTZAM PA DUS KYI GTAM//, //TING NGE 'DZIN TSOGS KYI
LE'U//,

//'JIG RTEN LAS 'DAS PA'I YAN LAG BDUN PA'I CHO GA//,

//'PHAGS PA YI GE DRUG PA'I SGRUB THABS//, //MNGON RTOGS RGYAN
GYI

TSIG LE'U BYAS PA'I 'GREL BA//, //MNGON RTOGS RGYAN BRGYAD STONG
PA

DANG SBYAR NAS SEMS TZAM DU STON PA 'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA
ROL TU

PHYIN PA BRGYAD PA'I DKA' 'GREL SNYING PO MCHOG// SHO LO KA
STONG PHRAG

BRGYAD PA, //SKYES PA'I RABS KYI RGYA CHER BSHAD PA//, //YAN LAG

BRGYAD PA'I SNYING PO//, //CHED DU BRJOD PA'I TSOMS KYI RNAM PAR

'GREL BA'I SMAD DUM// SHO LO KA STONG PHRAG BCU GNYIS DANG LNGA
BRGYA YOD

PA, //'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG PHYUG KHA SARBA nI'I SGRUB

THABS// BCAS BZHUGS SO,,

('BROG MI SH'AKYA YE SHES,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG MA TSUGS GONG GI CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
993

LOR MANG MKHAR DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SHING PHO
STAG LO

STE SPYI LO 1074 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS
NAS

YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG SOGS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, LO STON RDO RJE
DBANG

PHYUG DANG, RGYA SH'AKYA GZHON NU, SE YE SHES BRTZON 'GRUS,
NYANG RDO

RJE RGYAL MTSAN BZHI LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING 'DUL BA'I CHOS
GZHUNG

SOGS LA THOS BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS RGYA GAR DANG BAL

YUL SOGS SU PHEBS TE LO BCU GSUM GYI RING DU SLOB GNYER MDZAD

CING GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE'I BDUD RTZI BZHES TE SA SKYA'I CHOS
RGYUD KYI CHU

@1249 MGO YIN, DGUNG LO NGA GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I CHU MO
LUG LO STE

SPYI LO 1043 LOR RANG YUL MANG MKHAR DU MYU GU LUNG BTAB CING

'CHAD NYAN SPEL BAS SLOB MA'I GTZO BO MAN NGAG TSAR BA GSUM
DANG,

RGYUD TSAR BA LNGA, GRUB THOB BDUN SOGS BYON, LEGS SBYAR GYI
SKAD

YIG LA YANG SHIN TU MKHAS PAS BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU

BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BKA' 'GYUR// LAS
//BSHAD

RGYUD THUN MONG BA DPAL YANG DAG PAR SBYOR BA'I RGYUD CHEN PO
BRTAG PA

BCU BA// DANG, //DPAL GSANG BA RDO RJE'I RGYUD// LE'U BZHI PA,

//DPAL GSANG BA THAMS CAD GCOD PA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO//, //DPAL

'KHOR LO SDOM PA GSANG BA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA'I RGYUD KYI
RGYAL PO//,

//DPAL NAM MKHA' DANG MNYAM PA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO//, //DPAL
RIN

CHEN PHRENG BA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO//, //DPAL YE SHES GSANG BA'I
RGYUD KYI

RGYAL PO//, //DPAL YE SHES 'BAR BA'I RGYUD KYI RGYAL PO//,
//RNAL

'BYOR MA ZLA BA'I PHRENG BA//, //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //MNGON PAR

RTOGS PA'I RIM PA//, //DUR KHROD BRGYAD//, //DPAL DPA' BO

GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS//, //KYE RDO RJE'I SGRUB THABS YAN LAG
DRUG

PA//, //'BYUNG PO THAMS CAD PA'I GTOR MA//, //BDAG MED MA'I

SGRUB THABS RGYAS PAR BSTAN PA// BCAS CHOS TSAN DRUG CU RE BDUN

BZHUGS SO,,

('BRONG GNYAN LDE'U,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS LNGA PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU YAB RGYAL@1250 PO KHRI GNYAN GZUNGS BTZAN DANG, YUM 'BRO BZA' DUNG PYANG
BZHER

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU BON NI KHU'I MANG
RJE LOD

POS MDZAD, BTZUN MO MCHIMS BZA' KLU RGYAL NGAN MO MTSO KHAB TU

BZHES TE RIGS SRAS STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS

MDZE NAD BZHES TE GDUNG RGYUD RNAMS LA SNYUN MI PHOG PA'I CHED
DU YAR

LUNG ZHANG MDAR BANG SO BRTZIGS NAS BTZUN MO DANG, BLON PO
SNYAGS

THANG PA YAR RJE BCAS GSON POR DUR DU ZHUGS PAR GRAGS SHING,

BANG SO'I MING LA YANG GSON MCHAD BZLUMS PO ZHES ZER RO, ,

('BRONG RTZE TSUL KHRIMS CHOS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1561

LOR GTZANG GI NYANG 'BRONG RTZER SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
PA'I CHU

MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1623 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG
NGU'I

DUS NAS 'BRONG RTZE CHOS SDER RAB TU BYUNG, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR
PHEBS

NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU BYON TE SE RA BYES PA GRVA

TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG CHEN RNAMS LA MKHAS PAR

SBYANGS SHING RAB 'BYAMS PA'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD, BYANG RTZE GRVA
TSANG GI

'CHAD NYAN PA DANG, GSANG SNGAGS MKHAR RI BO BDE CHEN SOGS KYI

MKHAN PO MDZAD, LCANG LO CAN DU BZHUGS PAS LCANG LA CAN PAR

GRAGS, DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS PHO
SPREL

LO STE SPYI LO 1620 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRIR PHEBS NAS LO NGO
BZHI

YI RING DU GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI 'CHAD
NYAN

@1251 LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS
DBYINGS

SU GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS KYI PHYIR DU DNGUL GDUNG BYANG CHUB
MCHOD

RTEN BZHENGS TE LI MA LHA KHANG GI SHAR GYI GTZO BO'I GA-YON
GNYIS PAR

BZHUGS SHING DUS MCHOD KYANG LEGS PAR TSUGS SO, KHONG NI DGA'

LDAN GSER KHRI 'DZIN PA'I KHRI RABS SUM CU SO GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

('BRONG RTZE LHA BTZUN RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU

GTZANG GI 'BRONG RTZE ZHES PAR BOD KYI RGYAL PO'I GDUNG BRGYUD
DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG (1385-

1438) LA SOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO'I ZHABS LA

GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS BCAS LA THOS BSAM MDZAD PA

DANG, SGOS SU GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD
CING

RTZA BA'I PHYAG BZHES NI STOD BRGYUD DRI MA MED PA YIN, KHONG GI
MTSAN

GZHAN LA BLO GROS DPAL BZANG DANG 'BRONG RTZE LHA SRAS ZHES
ZHU'O, KHONG

GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //'BRONG RTZE'I BE'U BUM CHEN MO// DANG, //DBU

MA'I LTA BA'I YIG CHUNG//, //NAD GDON DBYUG PA'I MAN NGAG//,
//ZHAL

SHES MAN NGAG GI YIG CHUNG//, //GSHIN PO RJES SU BZUNG BA'I CHO
GA NGAN

SONG GI SGO 'GOG THAR BA'I LAM STON//, //'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM

DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD//, //'JIGS BYED RDZOGS RIM DNGOS GRUB

RGYA MTSO// BCAS CHOS TSAN NYI SHU THAM PA BZHUGS SO, ,

('THONG ZHI LEGS,)

@1252 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU
YAB RGYAL

PO GU RU LEGS DANG, YUM GUR SMAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

KHONG GIS DBON GSAS GU RUB BTZAN DO MI SER BSTEN ZHING LHA BON
CO

SNYAN RING GIS MDZAD, GSAS KHANG RIN CHEN ZUR MANG DANG SKU
MKHAR

KHRI RTZE BZHENGS, BTZUN MO MTSO SMAN 'BRONG MO KHAB TU BZHES TE
RIGS

SRAS THI SHO LEGS SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG SO GA-YA' SPANG
MTSAMS SU

BTAB, KHONG NI BAR GYI LEGS DRUG NANG GI BZHI PA YIN NO, ,

('BROM STON,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1078 LOR
SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1143
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA GSUM PA RAB BYUNG GNYIS
PA'I

LCAGS PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1140 LOR RGYAL LHA KHANG GI GDAN
SAR

PHEBS TE LO NGO BZHI YI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO DRUG
CU

RTZA BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, DE RJES RAB
BYUNG

GNYIS PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1144 LO NAS RAB BYUNG
GSUM PA'I

CHU PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1152 LO'I BAR DU AAR GYIS DBYAR
GCIG RGYAL

LHA KHANG GI GDAN SAR BZHUGS PA MA GTOGS LO NOG DGU'I RING DU

GDAN SA STONGS ZHES 'GOS LOS GSUNGS, KHONG NI RGYAL LHA KHANG GI

GDAN RABS DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

('BROM STON PA RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I GONG GI LO SKOR THA MA'I SHING PHO

@1253 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1004 LOR DBU RU BYANG PHYOGS KYI STOD
LUNG PHU'I RTZA

SGYE MOR YAB SKU GSHEN YAG GZHER 'PHEN DANG, YUM KHU 'OD BZA'

LAN GCIG MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I
SHING

PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1064 LOR RVA SGRENG DU SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG GI

BYIS PA'I MING LA CHOS 'PHEL BTAGS, DGE BSHES GA-YUNG CHOS

MGON LAS YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG BSLABS TE LO BZHIR BZHUGS, RGYAL GYI

ZHANG SNA NAM RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA
MNOS TE

MTSAN LA RGYAL BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO BCU DGU

BAR GRUM GYI MKHAN BU CHEN PO SE BTZUN LA BSTEN NAS DBU MA,
SPYOD

PHYOGS, SNGAGS RNYING MA SOGS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, PAndI TA SMRI
TI

LAS SGRA RIG PA DANG SAmSKRi TA'I SKAD LA BSLABS, DGUNG LO SO
BRGYAD

PAR (SPYI LO 1042) KHAMS NAS MNGA' RIS SU JO BO RJE MJAL DU
PHEBS, SPU HRANGS SU JO BO DANG MJAL NAS BLA MAR BSTEN TE BKA'

CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NGA BZHI BAR (SPYI LO 1057 LOR)

'PHRANG KHA BER CHUNG SBYIN BDAG GTZO BO BYAS TE RVA SGRENG DGON
PA PHYAG

BTAB, JO BO'I SKU GDUNG DNGUL GYI MCHOD RTEN DU BZHENGS, DE

NAS JO BO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KHONG GIS CHOS DANG 'TSO BA GNYIS KA'I
SGO

NAS BSKYANGS TE BKA' GDAMS BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR GYUR, KHONG NI

DGE BSNYEN YIN YANG BSLAB KHRIMS BSRUNGS BAR DGE SLONG LAS KYANG

LHAG PAR MDZAD, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI PO TO BA RIN
CHEN

GSAL DANG, SPYAN SNGA BA TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR, PHU CHUNG BA GZHON NU

@1254 RGYAL MTSAN BCAS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //MI CHOS
GNAD KYI

PHRENG BA// LTA BU BSLAB BYA'I SKOR DANG, //JO BO RJE'I BSTOD PA
SUM CU

BA// LTA BU BSTOD TSOGS KYI SKOR DANG, SA DPYAD, LO RGYUS, RNAM

THAR, BCA' YIG 'PHRIN YIG BCAS BSTAN BCOS MANG POR

BZHUGS PA MA ZAD, //BRGYAD STONG PA// DANG, //BRGYAD STONG 'GREL

CHEN//, //'GREL CHUNG//, //NYI KHRI SNANG BA// LA SOGS PA'I MDO

PHYOGS KYI SKOR DANG, //YE SHES GRUB PA// LA SOGS PA'I SNGAGS
PHYOGS

KYI SKOR LA 'GYUR BCOS DANG ZHUS DAG MANG DU MDZAD DO, ,

('BROM BLON RGYAL BZHER KHAR TZE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING
YON

GYI DPANG PO DANG, DMAG DPON, PHYIS BLON BKA' LA GTOGS PA

ZHIG YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS MI GZHIG

CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA' KHRIMS

BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS GSAL

BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS 'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BROM YANG GZIGS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

GYI DPANG PO DANG, DMAG DPON, PHYIS BLON BKA' LA GTOGS PA

@1255 ZHIG YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS NAM DU
YANG

MI GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA'

KHRIMS BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS

GSAL BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

('BROM SE RI STANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

GYI DPANG PO DANG, DMAG DPON, PHYIS BLON BKA' LA GTOGS PA

BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS 'BYUNG

PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

(RBA TSUL KHRIMS BLO GROS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU DBUS

SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS SU MDO SMAD TZONG
KHA'I

YUL RMA LUNG RDO RJE'I BRAG DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON (DENG
SANG MTSO

SNGON ZHING CHEN ZHUNG HVA RDZONG KHONGS) DU BYON NAS BLA CHEN
DGONGS PA

RAB GSAL (953-1035) LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL,

DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU BZHES SHING DBUS GTZANG DU
LOG

@1256 PHEBS MDZAD CING BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS LA ZHIG
GSOS

MDZAD, DE RJES YUNGS 'GUR BRTZIGS SHING LAN PA'I SPYIL BU BZUNG

STE 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA SPEL NAS DGE 'DUN MANG TSOGS KYI 'TSOGS

PA BSKYANGS, DE LAS 'PHEL BA'I CHOS RGYUD LA RBA TSO ZHES GRAGS
SO,

KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI MAL SEMS DPA' SHES RAB KYIS
STOD

LUNG CHA THOG BRTZIGS SHING THAG MA LHA KHANG DANG MON GRA
BZUNG, KHONG

NI BSTAN PA PHYI DAR GYI SKABS SU BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL
LAS

BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PA'I DBUS GTZANG GI MKHAS PA MI BCU'I NANG GI
YA

GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(RBA YE SHES BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG
NGU'I DUS NAS

BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG

SOGS LA THOS BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD CING, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI
SKAD YIG LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS TE BSTAN BCOS GNYIS TZAM
BOD

YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN 'GYUR//
LAS

//RIN PO CHE 'KHOR LO DBANG GI MAN NGAG GI RIM PA// DANG,
//DBANG

GI RIM PA BSTAN PA// ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

(SBA DPAL DBYANGS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

@1257 'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI CHOS
BLON YIN, SBA YE

SHES DBANG PO LHO BRAG MKHAR CHU BTZAN GYI DBEN GNAS SU BSGOM PA
LA

PHEBS SHING RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS KHONG NYID BCOM
LDAN 'DAS

KYI RING LUGS SU BSKOS SO ZHES //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA'
STON//

LAS GSUNGS SO, ,

(SBA YE SHES DBANG PO,)

KHONG NI SBA GSAL SNANG DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

(SBA RATNA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI CHOS BLON ZHIG
YIN,

//CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// LAS SAD MI MI BDUN GYI GRAL
DU

BGRANGS 'DUG KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //SHES RAB 'BUM// SOGS

BZHUGS SO, ,

(SBA GSAL SNANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI CHOS BLON YIN,
KHONG

THOG MAR MANG YUL SKYID GRONG GI KHA BLON MDZAD CING RGYA GAR
DANG BAL

YUL DU PHEBS TE MKHAN PO BO DHISA TVA MANG YUL DU GDAN DRANGS
SHING

DAM CHOS GSAN NAS LHA KHANG GNYIS KYANG BZHENGS, DE RJES ZHANG
BLON MA ZHANG GROM PA SKYES BKRONGS TE RGYAL POS BOD YUL DU DAM
CHOS

@1258 BSGRUB CHOG PA'I BKA' BSTZAL BAR BRTEN KHONG BAL YUL DU
PHEBS NAS

MKHAN PO LHA SAR GDAN 'DREN ZHUS SHING DGE BA BCU LA SOGS PA'I

CHOS RNAMS MKHAN POS GSUNGS, DE NAS RGYAL POS KHONG THANG RGYAL

RABS KYI GONG MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHO NYA MNGAGS SHING RGYA NAG
HVA SHANG LAS

CHOS KYI SGOM LUNG MANG PO ZHUS NAS BOD YUL DU PHEBS, KHONG SLAR

YANG BAL YUL DU THENGS GNYIS PA PHEBS TE MKHAN PO BO DHI SA TVA
DANG

SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNYIS BOD YUL DU GDAN DRANGS TE BOD LUGS

SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 775 LOR BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG

BZHENGS 'GO BRTZAMS NAS KHONG NYID MKHAN PO BO DHI SA TVA LAS
RAB TU

BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA YE SHES DBANG PO ZHES GSOL, DE NAS RGYAL PO
KHRI

SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS KHONG NYID CHOS KYI RING LUGS SU BSKOS TE
YIG TSANG

GSER GYI YI GE CHEN PO GNANG STE GRAL YANG ZHANG BLON CHEN PO'I
GONG DU

BZHAG CING RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR DANG BSTAN 'GYUR GNYIS LAS SGRA

BSGYUR YANG MANG DU MDZAD, SKABS SHED DU KHONG NYID MYANG TING
'DZIN

BZANG PO DANG MA 'CHAMS NAS LHO BRAG MKHAR CHU BTZAN GYI DBEN

GNAS SU GSANG STABS KYIS PHEBS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON

PAR MDZAD DO, KHONG NI BOD KYI SAD MI MI BDUN NANG GI YA GYAL
ZHIG

YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //SBA BZHED// SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,

(SBAL RDO RJE RGYAL PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD
YUL NAS

@1259 SLOB GNYER MDZAD CING, DE NAS KHA CHE DANG, BAL YUL, RGYA
GAR

SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS RGYA

GZHUNG DANG LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS
SHING BSTAN

BCOS GNYIS TZAM BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR
RTZOM

NI //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG

PAR BRJOD PA'I RNAM PAR BSHAD PA// DANG, //'PHAGS PA 'JAM

DPAL GYI MTSAN YANG DAG PAR BRJOD PA'I PHAN YON GYI 'GREL BA

SNGAGS KYI DON SNYING PO BSDUS PA// BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(SBAS SKYES BZANG STONG BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES AAG TSOM CAN
GYI BLON

PO YIN, BOD LUGS LCAGS PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 710 LOR THANG
RGYAL

RABS KYI GONG MA'I PHO BRANG DU BYON TE SRAS MO GYIM SHING KONG
JO BOD

RGYAL KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN GYI BTZUN MOR BSUS NAS BOD YUL DU
PHEBS

SO, DE'I SKABS SU BOD KYI BLON PO SBAS SKYES BZANG STONG BTZAN
SOGS

GYIS THANG RGYAL RABS KYI RGYAL SA KHRANG AAN DU RTA THOG SPO LO
'PHEN PA'I

SGYU RTZAL 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA ZHIG DNGOMS PAR GRAGS SO, GNAS TSUL
DE

YANG THANG RGYAL RABS KYI RI MO 'BRI MKHAS PA YAN LI PAN GYIS
//THANG

MING HONG GIS MTSAN MOR RTA THOG SPO LO 'GRAN PA// ZHES PA'I
THANG BOD

BAR GYI MDZA' BRTZE'I 'BREL BA MTSON PA DANG LO RGYUS KYI DON
SNYING LDAN

PA'I DPE RIS NYAMS DOD PO ZHIG BZHENGS YOD PA RED@1260 (SBAS LCANG DPAL GYI LEGS BZANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO'I NANG BLON CHEN PO
DRUG GI

YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(SBAS STAG SNA,)

GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(SBUG GYIM BTZAN RMANG CHUNG,)

ZHANG

ZHUNG RGYAL KHAMS DBANG DU BSDUS KHAR RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM
POS

SRING MO SAD MA DKAR GYI DRUNG DU BANG CHEN BTANG BA DANG, SRING
LCAM

SAD MA DKAR GYI GSANG 'PHRIN RNAMS KYANG RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN

PO'I SNYAN DU SGRON PAR MDZAD CING, ZHANG ZHUNG DBANG DU BSDU
BA'I

KHROD NAS KYANG BYAS RJES CHE GRAS SHIG YIN NO, ,

@1261 PAR CHOS 'KHOR RTZER GRVA KHRAL LA PHEBS NAS CHOS KYI RDO
RJE'I DRUNG DU

GTZUG PHUD PHUL ZHING MTSAN LA YON TAN RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL,
DGUNG

BA'I

TSAD DU 'DZIN, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR LA STOD DU PHEBS TE GONG

RING DU GSO BA RIG PA'I RGYUD SDE RNAM BZHI DANG, MAN NGAG DMAR

CHUD, DE NAS 'TSO BYED MAN MKHAR DRANG SRONG LA RTZA RGYUD 'GREL
BA

//RGYUD DON RAB GSAL// DPANG DU BTZUGS TE BGRO GLENG MDZAD SKABS

RNAM DPYOD CHE BAS RNAM PAR RGYAL, GONG SMAN DKON MCHOG 'PHAN

DAR THUGS SHIN TU DGYES TE "MKHAS MCHOG BRANG TI'I GSUNG RAB NAM

MKHA'I KHYON, JI BZHIN SMRA BA'I GZHON NU RI BONG 'DZIN, RGYU
SKAR

DBUS NA MDZES PA KHYOD NYID RGYAL, PHA ROL CA CO SGROG PA ZUM
PAR

(nI BA DGE 'DUN DKON MCHOG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1851 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG

LO BDUN PAR SKU GONG MA'I GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL ZHING GUNG THANG

'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR

DBUS SU PHEBS TE BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE BSTAN
PA'I

NYI MA LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, GDUGS RTA DAR DANG, THAM GA GRU

SGOR BKA' SHOG DANG BCAS PA'I GZENGS BSTOD GNANG, SNAR THANG

BKA' 'GYUR SOGS PHYAG DPE DANG RTEN GSUM MANG BO GDAN DRANGS TE

GDAN SAR BYON, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI
LO 1822

LOR GZIM KHANG LAS 'GO BRTZAMS TE LO GSUM GYI MTSAMS NAS LEGS

PAR GRUB, RNGA BA NAS RDO BZO CHED DU BOS TE RDO GYANG BRTZIGS
SHING

'DU KHANG BZO BKOD KHYAD 'PHAGS CAN GSAR BZHENGS DANG, BYAMS

KHANG GI KHYAMS DANG, MDA' YAB BCAS ZHIG GSO GNANG, MGON

KHANG DANG RGYAL KHANG GNYIS RNYING BA BSKYOD DE GSAR BZO MDZAD,
RJE

GSER KHANG BA SNGA PHYIR LAN 'GA' GDAN DRANGS TE BKA' CHOS MANG
DU

GSAN ZHING NYAMS BZHES CHE BA'I TSAD DU BYED, DE LTAR BSTAN
'GRO'I

DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO NGA DRUG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

NO,,

@1271 (MA nI BA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1898
LOR

MDO SMAD MGAR RTZER SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I SA MO
SBRUL

LO STE SPYI LO 1929 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR SKU

GONG MA GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL ZHING SKYABS MGON BLO BZANG BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RDZONG DKAR RDO RJE 'DZIN PA
ZUR

BA RIG GNAS RGYA MTSO'I PHRENG 'DZIN 'JIGS MED BLO GROS SOGS BLA
MA

DU MA'I ZHABS LA BSTEN TE MKHAS PAR GYUR, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS

PAR RONG BO THOS BSAM GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS MKHYEN RAB
KYI

SNYAN PA KUN LA GRAGS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR KHRI RGAN 'JAM
PA'I

DBYANGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN

DANG, KHRI RGAN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, GTZANG STON BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS

'PHEL, BYA BTANG NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN SOGS LAS BKA' CHOS MANG

DU GSAN, DUS ZHABS MTSO BYUNG DGYES PA'I DPAL LAS RTZIS DKAR

NAG DANG, DBYANGS CAN SGRA MDO RNAMS LA SBYANGS PAS KUN BSHAD
KYI

MTSAN DU DBYANGS CAN GRUB PA'I GZHON NU GSOL, RGYA NAG RI BO
RTZE

LNGA DANG PHO BRANG CHEN MO PE CIN MKHAR DU PHEBS NAS PAn CHEN
CHOS KYI

NYI MA LAS GSUNG GI BDUD RTZI CI DGA' BZHES, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS

PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI MA nI BA'I SKU
PHRENG

LNGA BA YIN NO,,

(MA nI BA BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG)

@1272 KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI
LO 1719

LOR MDO SMAD AA RIG CHU SMAD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1719 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG

LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS RDZONG DKAR GYI GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL ZHING
SKU

DBON LAS RAB TU BYUNG, KHRI SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI MA DANG, RJE
BSTAN

'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS SOGS LA BSTEN NAS GDAMS PA'I MDZOD DU GYUR,

DPON TSANG CHING WANG SBYIN BDAG DANG SKU BDAG GI MTHIL DU SONG
BAS

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE THOS BSAM
GNANG,

DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SMON LAM CHEN MOR DGE 'DUN KHRI RA CAN
LA

BSNYEN BKUR DANG, BYA BRAL KHAMS TSAN BZUNG STE 'BRAS SGO MANG
CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS NAS BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR,
RGYAL

BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS CHOS RGYUN MANG DU ZHUS, PAn CHEN
BLO BZANG

YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DE NAS PHYIR RDZONG DKAR DGON DU

PHEBS TE, RI KHROD PA NYIS BRGYAR NYE BA LA ZLA RE'I NANG DU DUS
BZANG

BRGYAD RE, LNGA MCHOD, SMYUNG GNAS, KLU DBANG RGYAL BO RNAMS KYI

CHOS THOG LA JA 'GYED DANG, MAR 'GYED, PHOG CHEN, GRO NAS KYI

PHOG SOGS ZAM MI 'CHAD PA DANG, ZHING BRGYA LHAG PHOG 'THEB TU
SBYOR

'JAGS MDZAD, 'DU KHANG DANG, BTZAN KHANG GNYIS GSAR DU

BZHENGS, 'JAM DBYANG KUN GZIGS MI TSAD KYIS GTZOS SKU BRNYAN

MANG PO GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, GSER DNGUL GNYIS KYIS

BZHENGS PA'I BKA' 'GYUR DANG BSTAN 'GYUR, SDE DGE NAS BKA'

@1273 BSTAN 'GYUR GNYIS KA GDAN DRANGS PAR MDZAD, DNGUL SRANG
BRGYA

'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DE'I SKABS SU SPYOD PA RGOD CING
RTZUB

PAS RTZED GROGS SUS KYANG GLAGS MI 'KHEL BA ZHIG BZHUGS, DGUNG

LO BCO LNGA PAR MANG MKHAR MYU GU LUNG DU PHEBS TE 'BROG MI
SH'AKYA YE

SHES LAS SGRA BSGYUR BSLABS SHING LEGS PAR MKHYEN, BAL PO SPYI
THER

BA LAS DPAL GDAN BZHI SOGS RGYUD 'GA' ZHIG GSAN PA DANG, SGRA

TSAD GSO RIG BCAS LA'ANG LEGS PAR SBYANGS, RGYA GAR LA LAN

GSUM DANG, BAL YUL LA LAN BZHI BYON, NUB LAKshI tA'I DGON

PAR PHEBS NAS DPAL YE SHES SNYING PO LAS GSANG 'DUS DANG, SGYU

LUS, 'OD GSAL, RIM LNGA SOGS GSAN, LHO DUG MTSO KHOL MA'I

GLING DU BYON TE DPAL ZHI BA BZANG PO LAS MA H'A M'A YA DANG,
RNAL

'BYOR GSUM, SGYU MA GSUM SOGS RGYUD KYI GDAMS PA GSAN, SHAR

PHYOGS KYI RI RAB TU 'KHRUNGS PA'I DGON PAR PHEBS NAS MNGA' BDAG

MEE TRI PA LAS RGYUD KYI GDAMS PA DANG, PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I MAN
NGAG

GSAN NAS RTOGS PA MNGON SUM DU 'KHRUNGS, BYANG M'A H'A RIR BYON

@1286 NAS RJE N'A RO PA LAS DGYES RDOR RGYUD DANG, BSRE 'PHO
MTSAMS SBYOR

GYI GDAMS NGAG GTUM MO'I LAS RGYA SOGS LO NGO BCU DRUG TU GSAN,

N'A RO DANG MEE TRI RNAM GNYIS KYIS BYANG PHYOGS KHA BA CAN 'DUL
BA'I RGYAL

TSAB TU DBANG BSKUR, THA MAL PA RNAMS KYI SNANG NGOR BUD MED
BSREL

BA, YUL MI DANG 'THAB BA, MKHAR LAS DANG ZHING LAS MDZAD PA

SOGS SNANG YANG SKAL BA DANG LDAN PA DAG GI SNANG NGOR GRONG
'JUG KYANG

LAN BRGYA TZAM MDZAD PA DANG, NGO MTSAR BA'I RDZU 'PHRUL SNA
TSOGS

BSTAN PA GRANGS LAS 'DAS SHING, GSANG SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO

CHE'I BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS KYI BDAG POR GYUR, KHONG GI SLOB MA
GRAGS CHE

BA NI BKA' CHEN BZHI STE, RNGOG STON CHOS SKU RDO RJE LA RGYUD
BSHAD

DANG, DOL GYI MTSUR STON DBANG NGE LA 'PHO BA, MES STON TSON PO

LA 'OD GSAL, GUNG THANG GI MI LA RAS PA LA LTA SGOM GYI BKA'
BABS

KYI

(MAL KA BA CAN PA,)

@1287 YUL GA-YO'I BYE CAN PA LA YAB MAL DAR MA MGON DANG, YUM
HAB

PA'I LCAGS MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1211 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS
MO

YUGS SHIN TU PHYUG PA ZHIG KHYIM THABS BZHES, DE NAS KHONG GI
BDAG

MOS CHOS LA SKUL BAS CHOS SGOR ZHUGS, 'OL KHAR PHEBS TE SLOB

DPON DAR MA GRAGS LAS ZHI BYED RMA LUGS RNAMS ZHUS, MAL SPOS KA

BA SMON LAM LAS N'A RO PA'I CHOS DANG BYA ROG MA'I SGRUB THABS
ZHUS NAS

LDOM BU BA MDZAD, DE NAS DAM PA SGOM SMON GYI ZHABS LA GTUGS

NAS BAR DO'I GDAMS PA DANG, DON BRGYUD KYI GDAMS PA THAMS

CAD RDZOGS PAR ZHUS SHING LO NGO BCU GNYIS RING DU SGRUB PA
NYAMS LEN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA LNGA PAR SHA MI SGOM CHEN SMON LAM
'BAR

DANG MJAL, LO NGO BCU GNYIS BAR DU BSTEN NAS ZHI BYED SO LUGS

KYI CHOS SKOR THAMS CAD GSAN, LO NGO BZHI BCU THAM PAR SGRUB PA

NYAMS LEN MDZAD, YON BDAG GE RGOD KYIS GDAN DRANGS TE ZLA BA

GNYIS DER BZHUGS PA MA GTOGS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NAR MDZAD

NAS DUS 'DA' BA LAS GRONG GSEB TU 'GRIM MA MYONG PA YIN, BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB CING DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU RTZA DRUG
PAR

NI

@1297 GYI LO RGYUS LAS BTZAN PO 'DIS SA SMAN TING TING MA'AM
SA DING DING MA

KHAB TU BZHES, SKU GSHEN CO'U LAN TSAS MDZAD, GSAS MKHAR KHO

MA NE'U CHUNG BZHENGS, ZHANG ZHUNG NAS MKHAS PA CHEN PO GSHEN
NAM

DRANGS, BOD DU BON GYI 'DU GNAS CHEN PO BZHI BCU RTZA LNGA
BTZUGS,

BSGYUR

ZHES DANG, BON CHOS//LUNG GI SNYING PO//LAS "DAG PA LHA YI YI
GE STAG

GZIG SPUNGS YIG TU BSGYUR, STAG GZIG GI SPUNGS YIG ZHANG ZHUNG
GI

YIG RGAN DU BSGYUR, YIG RGAN SMAR SBRAG TU BSGYUR, DE SMAR CHE
CHUNG

MA LAS BRTZAMS SO, "ZHES GSUNGS SO, KHONG GI BANG SO GNAM LA

(MU KHRI SRONG PO,)

KHONG NI BOD LUGS LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 760 LOR YAB

RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DANG, YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG
SGRON

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS
SKU

GSHEGS PAS BANG SO YANG BRTZIGS MED DO, ,

(MU TIG BTZAN PO,)

KHONG NI BOD LUGS CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 763 LOR YAB RGYAL

PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DANG, YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG SGRON
GNYIS KYI

SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, BOD LUGS SHING PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO
804 LOR

@1298 SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO SUM CU SO LNGA PA ME MO GLANG
LO STE SPYI LO

797 LOR GCEN RGYAL PO MU NE BTZAN PO YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG

SGRON GYIS DUG DRANGS NAS BKRONGS RJES, MI 'JIGS GDONG LNGA'I
KHRI

LA BZHUGS TE RGYAL SRID LO NGO BRGYAD KYI RING DU BSKYANGS NAS
DGUNG LO

BZHI BCU ZHE GNYIS PAR SKU GSHEGS SO, BANG SO NI DON MKHAR

MDA' RU BRTZIGS TE MING LA KYA RI KYANG LDEM ZHES ZER, GONG GI
LO

TSIGS 'DI DAG NI KRUNG DBYANG MI RIGS SLOB GRVA CHEN MO'I DGE
RGAN

THUB BSTAN PHUN TSOGS KYIS//BOD LJONGS ZHIB 'JUG//THOG TU BKOD

PA'I//CHOS RGYAL SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO NAS GLANG DAR MA'I BAR
GYI RGYAL

RABS LO TSIGS LA DPYAD PA//ZHES PA'I LTA BA BZHIN BKOD PA YIN
NO, ,

(MU NE BTZAN PO,)

KHONG NI BOD LUGS CHU PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 762 LOR YAB
RGYAL

PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DANG, YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG SGRON
GNYIS KYI

SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, BOD LUGS ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 797
LOR

YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG SGRON GYIS DUG DRANGS NAS BKRONGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA BOD LUGS LCAGS PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO
780 LOR

YAB RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN DAM CHOS SGOM SGRUB LA ZHUGS
NAS CHAB

SRID KYI THUGS 'GAN BZHES TE BOD 'BANGS RNAMS DBUL PHYUG LAN

GSUM SNYOMS PA DANG, LHA SA DANG, KHRA 'BRUG BSAM YAS SOGS

SU MCHOD PA'I SDE CHEN BZHI BTZUGS SHING MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO
BZHI'I

GDUGS, 'PHAN CHEN PO BCAS BZHENGS PA MDZAD, BTZUN MO RU

@1299 YONG BZA' MDO RGYAL KHAB TU BZHES KYANG RIGS SRAS MA
'KHRUNGS PA

DANG, YAB RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI ZHAL CHEMS LTAR
PHO YONG

BZA' RGYAL MO BTZUN YANG BTZUN MO'I TSUL DU THUGS RJES
BSKYANGS

DGUNG LO SUM CU SO DRUG PA BOD LUGS ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO

797 LOR YAB RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN 'DAS NAS LO GCIG
DANG ZLA BA

BDUN GYI MTSAMS SU MA YUM TSE SPONG BZA' ME TOG SGRON GYIS DUG

DRANGS NAS BKRONGS SO, ,BANG SO NI KHRI LDE GTZUG BRTAN MES
AAG

TSOM CAN GYI BANG SO'I GA-YAS NGOS MDUN NA YOD CING, MING LA
LHA RI

LDEM PO ZHES ZER TO, ,

(MU TSO BZA',)

KHONG MO NI GNAM MUG MUG DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(MUN ME BRAG KHA BA GRAGS PA SENG GE)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1255

LOR GA-YAS RU BYANG GI RGYAL TE THANG KAR DU SKU 'KHRUNGS,
GDUNG RUS

NI GLAN YIN, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I CHU MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO
1343 LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS SU KHRO PHU BSOD NAMS SENG GE
LAS

RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA GRAGS PA SENG GE ZHES GSOL, DGUNG
LO

NYI SHU PAR KHRO PHU BSOD NAMS SENG GES MKHAN PO DANG, DBU MA
PA

SHES RAB 'BUM GYIS SLOB DPON, BU STON SENG GE 'OD KYIS GSANG

STON MDZAD CING BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, SA SKYAR PHYA RU BA SENG GE
DPAL@1300 LAS RNAM 'GREL DANG, BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA, DBU MA RIGS
TSOGS,

RGYUD SDE DANG BCAS PA GSAN PAS MKHYEN PA DPAG TU MED PA
MNGA',

DE NAS JO MO NANG DU PHEBS TE KUN SPANGS THUGS RJE BRTZON
'GRUS DANG

BYANG SEMS RGYAL BA YE SHES LAS SBYOR BA YAN LAG DRUG GI KHRID
RNAMS

ZHUS SHING GA-YA' LUNG GI RI KHROD DU SGRUB PA GTZO BOR MDZAD,
ZHAR LA

RGYUD 'GREL GYI BSHAD PA DANG KHRID KYIS SLOB MA RNAMS RJES SU
BZUNG,

DE NAS BRAG KHA LA BYON TE SKU MTSAMS BCAD CING DUS 'KHOR GYI
BSNYEN

PA BYE BA DANG SBYIN BSREG 'BUM PHRAG BCU MDZAD PAS ME LCE
RNAMS RIN

PO CHE'I RNAM PAR 'BYUNG BA LA SOGS PA'I MTSAN MA KHYAD PAR
CAN

BYUNG, ZHAG RE LA LUS SBYOR DRUG RE MA GTOGS BSKYED RDZOGS KYI

THUGS DAM LA GTZO BOR MDZAD, SBYOR DRUG DANG, DMAR KHRID,

GCOD, GZER LNGA RNAMS LA KHRID CHEN BZHIR MING BTAGS NAS GTZO

BOR SKYONG, PHYAG TU DNGOS PO BYUNG TSAD BLA MA RNAMS KYI GDAN
SAR

GTONG, MNGON PAR SHES MNGA' BAS SA SKYA PA'I BDE DOG LA SOGS

PA LUNG BSTAN PA THAMS CAD DON THOG TU DBAB, DGUNG LO GYA DGU

PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG GI SLOB MA
GRAGS

CHE BA NI CHOS RJE BLA MA DAM PA DANG, DKA' BCU PA GZHON NU
SENG GE

BLO GROS, BANG MO ZHU BA GZHON NU DPAL BCAS YIN,,

(MUS CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1388

LOR MUS STOD GLING SKYAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I
SA MO GLANG

@1301 LO STE SPYI LO 1469 LOR MUS BSTAN 'DZIN PHUG TU SKU
GSHEGS, KHONG

DGUNG LO DGU PAR DBANG 'OD PA LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCO

LNGA PAR MKHAN PO KUN SMON DANG BYANG CHUB SENG GE GNYIS LAS
PHAR PHYIN

DANG SPYOD 'JUG SBYANGS SHING BCO BRGYAD PA LA BSHAD STON
MDZAD,

DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR NAM MKHA' RNAL 'BYOR LAS GCOD KHRID
ZHUS,

DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR GA-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL BA LAS
PHAR

PHYIN GYI DKA' GNAD RNAMS LA DOGS GCOD ZHUS TE SA SKYAR GRVA
SKOR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR MU GU LUNG DU PHEBS TE SEMS

DPA' GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG LAS 'U YUG PA'I TSAD MA RIGS MDZOD,

DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR NGAM RING CHOS SDER BYON NAS RONG CHEN
SMRA BA'I

SENG GE LAS PHAR TSAD KYI DOGS GCOD, DGUNG LO SO BZHI PAR DPAL

'BYOR SHES RAB LAS RED MDA' BA'I DBU MA'I 'GREL BA BCAS GSAN

PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PAR GANGS CHEN KUN DGA' DPAL LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PAR SA SKYAR PHEBS TE
NGOR

CHEN KUN DGA' BZANG PO LAS BDE DGYES KYI ZAB LAM DANG, BRTAG

GNYIS BSHAD PA, SBYOR DRUG GSUNG NGAG SOGS GSAN PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS PAR NGOR DGON GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD PA'I MKHAR

LAS PA MDZAD CING, DGUNG LO RE DGU PAR NGOR PA'I GDAN SA

BSKYANGS SHING MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN SPEL, DGUNG LO DON
GNYIS

PAR MUS SU YA MA'I DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD, DGUNG LO DON

LNGA PAR NGOR PA'I GDAN SA SHER RGYAM LA GTAD NAS MUS BSTAN
'DZIN

@1302 PHUG TU THUGS DAM BZHUGS MUR DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU RTZA
GNYIS PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS

GSUNG NGAG BLO BSHAD KYI BKA' BAB NI BDAG CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG
MA TI H'A

TZA SHR'I BHA DRA KHO NA YIN NO, ,

(ME NYAG CHEN PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I NANG DU BYON PA'I LO

TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS
NAS

LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD
CING BSTAN

BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM
NI

//BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS//
DANG,

LO SDOM PA'I SNYING PO DE KHO NA NYID GRUB PA//, //DPAL LHAN
CIG

SKYES PA BDE MCHOG BDAG BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA//, //BDE MCHOG
LHAN

LHAN CIG SKYES PA'I BDE BA'I MCHOG BDAG BYIN GYIS BRLABS PA//

BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(MER KEN MKHAN PO BLO BZANG TSE 'PHEL,)

LO

GSAL, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1780

@1303 LOR PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI MDUN NAS BSNYEN
RDZOGS KYI SDOM

PA MNOS, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU GRVA RGYUN LA PHEBS TE
'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO DANG, GUNG

THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME BCAS SLOB DPON DU BSTEN CING, DAM
CHOS

MANG DU ZHUS SHING RIG GNAS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DU NANG DON
RIG PAR

SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, THU'U BKVAN CHOS KYI RDO RJE
YANG SLOB

DPON DU BSTEN NAS GSAN SBYANGS MDZAD CING, GZHUNG BKA' POD

LNGA LA MKHAS PAR GYUR TE DKA' BCU PA'I MTSAN SNYAN BLANGS,
KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI KA NAS TA'I BAR POD DGU BZHUGS SO, ,

(MER KHRI BTZAN PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS GSUM PA'I NANG DU YAB

RGYAL PO SO KHRI BTZAN PO DANG, YUM SE BZA' SMAN MO'AM DOG MER

MER GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI SKU GSHEN NI CO'U
SHANGS

DKAR GYIS MDZAD, GSAS MKHAR ZO PO KHYUNG LAG BZHENGS SHING

BTZUN MO GDAGS LHA DKAR MO'AM DAR BZA' MA KHAB TU BZHES TE

RIGS SRAS GDAGS KHRI BTZAN PO'AM KHRI SPE BTZAN PO SKU
'KHRUNGS SO,

BTZAN PO

ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG KHONG GI BANG SO GNAM LA BTAB, KHONG NI

GNAM GYI KHRI BDUN LAS KHRI LNGA BA YIN NO, ,

(MER KEN CHOS RJE,)

KHONG NI BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG MI GCIG

@1304 YIN PAS DE LAS GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(MES STON BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RAB BCU GCIG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

MYANG STOD STAG TSAL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS RJE BTZUN MAR
PA CHOS

KYI BLO GROS LA 'BUL BA CHEN MO LAN GSUM MDZAD PAS ZHABS TOG
GIS

MNYES PA YIN, DE NAS RJE BTZUN MAR PAS MA H'A M'A Y'A DANG,

GDAMS NGAG MTHA' YAS PAR GNANG, KHONG GIS DGYES PA RDO RJE

DANG, BDE MCHOG GSANG 'DUS GSUM, M'A Y'A THOD PA RNAMS LA

BSHAD GRVA BTZUGS, GNAS GZHI RA DO BTAB, BRTAG GNYIS LA t'IKA

MDZAD, SLOB MA ZHANG BSOD NAMS MKHA' SOGS GRUB THOB DU MA BYON

PA NI MES STON LUGS KYI BSHAD RGYUN LA MES STON BKA' BRGYUD DU

GRAGS SO, KHONG NI RJE BTZUN MAR PA'I SLOB MA KA CHEN BZHI LAS
NUB

KYI KA CHEN YIN,,

(MONG BZA' KHRI LCAM,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BDUN PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

BOD YUL DBUS KYI SA'I CHA STOD LUNG DU GRAGS PA'I LUNG TSAN
MONG DU

ZHANG BLON GYI BU MOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM
PO'I BTZUN

MO CHE BA DANG, RGYAL PO GUNG RI GUNG BTZAN GYI MA YUM YIN,
BRAG

YER PA'I LHA KHANG SOGS BZHENGS SO, //TUN HONG GTER YIG// LAS

KHONG MO'I MTSAN LA MONG ZA KHRI MO GNYEN LDONG STENG ZHES
'KHOD 'DUG GO,

(MON GRVA PA TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS,)

@1305 KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS MGO TZAM
DU

MON GRONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS
NAS KUN

MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE RAB TU BYUNG ZHING
MTSAN LA

TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS ZHES BTAGS, BSAM SBYOR GNYIS KYI SGO NAS

TSUL BZHIN DU BSTEN TE SDE SNOD GSUM GYI DGONGS 'GREL RNAMS LA

SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PA'I GO 'PHANG THOB CING, KHYAD PAR DU MNGON
PA

SDE BDUN LA SHIN TU MKHAS PAS CHOS MNGON PA'I DON LA MI 'JIGS

PA'I SPOBS PA THOB, KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA LAS BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS

SHING 'DUL BA GSAN PAS 'DUL 'DZIN CHEN POR GYUR, BYANG CHUB

LAM RIM ZHUS NAS NYAMS SU BLANGS TE MYONG BA PHUN SUM TSOGS
PAR

THON ZHING KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA MNGA'
GSOL,

'DUL BA DANG MNGON PA'I 'CHAD NYAN GTZO BOR MDZAD NAS DGE 'DUN

MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI
GRUB

CHEN LAS KYI RDO RJE DANG MKHAN CHEN CHOS SKYABS BZANG PO RNAM
GNYIS

YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //LAM RIM GYI KHRID YIG// BCAS
BZHUGS

SO, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS NYI SHU RTZA GCIG
PA YIN

NO,,

(MYANG TING 'DZIN BZANG PO,)

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS
MJING YON

(764-814) GYI BAN DE BKA' CHEN PO LA GTOGS PA YIN TE,

@1306 BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS NAM DU YANG MI
GZHIG CING

DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA' KHRIMS BSGRAGS
SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS GSAL BA DANG, 

//BKA' GTZIGS//KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI//CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I

DGA' STON//DU 'KHOD 'DUG KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA BAN DE MYANG

TING NGE 'DZIN ZHES ZHU'O, KHONG NI RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE
BTZAN GYI SKABS

SU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA
LEGS MJING

YON DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS SU BU RDZI MDZAD MYONG BAS DRIN
GZO BA'I

PHYIR DU RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING YON
GYIS KHONG LA

//BKA' GTZIGS// SNGA PHYI LAN GNYIS GNANG STE, GTZIGS KYI MDO
RDO

RING LA YI GE BRKOS NAS ZHVA'I LHA KHANG GI MDUN DU BSLONGS
SO, RDO

RING LA BRIS PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// SNGA PHYI LAN GNYIS KYI MA
YIG NGO

BSHUS NI DON GRUB RGYAL DANG KHRIN CHIN DBYIN RNAM GNYIS KYIS
MDZAD

PA'I //BOD KYI BTZAN PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN GYI LO RGYUS MDO
TZAM BRJOD PA

SNGON BYON MKHAS PA'I BZHED DGONGS KYI BUM BZANG MDZES PAR
BRGYAN

PA'I RMA BYA GZHON NU'I SGRO MDONGS// ZHES PA'I KHRO DPAR GYI
SHOG NGOS

BCO LNGA DANG SO GNYIS NA GSAL TO,,

MJING YON

GYI NANG BLON YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS
MI

@1307 GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA'

KHRIMS BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS

GSAL BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS//KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI//CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON//DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

TE,

LOR //DBON ZHANG DBU SNYUNG RDO RJE RING//NGAM//KHRANG CHIN
MTHUN SGRIL RDO

RING// BZHENGS PA'I SKABS SU "BOD CHEN PO'I BLON PO PHAL GYI

DANG MYING RUS, "ZHES //DBON ZHANG DBU SNYUNG RDO RJE RING//
DU 'KHOD 'DUG

GO,

(MYANG BLON LEGS BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS
MJING YON

GYI PHYI BLON YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS
MI

GZHIG CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA'

KHRIMS BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS

GSAL ZHING, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS
'BYUNG

MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,

@1308 (MYANG TZENG SKU,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DRUG PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SKU TSE'I STOD DU ZING PO RJE KHRI PANGS SUM
GYI BLON PO

MDZAD, ZING PO RJE KHRI PANGS SUM NI DGE BA LA MI DGE BAR
BRTZI NAS

LAS 'BRAS GO LDOG TU LTA BA'I RJE BO YIN PAS DE LA
YID MA RANGS NAS

RGYAL PO STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS LA MGO 'BUL YANG STAG RI GNYAN

GZIGS DGUNG DU GSHEGS, DE NAS RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI

ZHABS LA GTUGS TE THUN MONG DU MNA' TSIG BOR ZHING ZING PO RJE
KHRI

PANGS SUM GYI MNGA' THANG BCOM STE GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYI
MNGA'

ZHABS SU 'DUS PAR MDZAD, RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYIS
KYANG

MYANG TZENG SKU LA GNYAN 'DZI ZUNG NAG PO'I MKHAR SNGUR BA
DANG, BRAN

GA-YOG KHYIM TSANG CHIG STONG LNGA BRGYA BYA DGA' GNANG BA
DANG, BLON

PO'I GO SAR MNGA' GSOL TO, ,

(MYANG MANG PO RJE ZHANG SNANG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DRUG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SKU TSE'I STOD DU RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN
GYI BLON PO

YIN, DE NAS RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO ZHABS NAS 'DEGS TE
RGYAL

PO'I KHRI LA MNGA' GSOL ZHING BLON PO'I 'GAN KHUR BZHES, SUM
PA'I

RGYAL KHAMS SOGS LA DRAG PO GA-YUL GYI LAS LA RTEN MA DGOS PAR

THABS MKHAS ZHI BA'I SGO NAS RGYAL PO'I CHAB 'BANGS SU BKUGS,
'ON

KYANG RGYAL BLON GNYIS KYI BAR LA BLON PO KHYUNG PO SPUNG SAD
ZU TZES PHRA MA

@1309 BCUG PAS RGYAL PO SRONG BTZAN SGAM POS MYANG BLON BLO
LOG PAR

DGONGS NAS MYANG GI MKHAR SPUR BA'I MTHA' NAS DMAG GIS BSKOR
BA

DANG, MYANG RANG GI 'KHOR GA-YOG PA TSAB GYIM PHO ZER BAS NANG
DU

BSLU THABS KYIS MYANG BLON BKRONGS SO, ,

(DMU LCAM BRA MA,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS GNYIS PA'I NANG DU
SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING RGYAL PO AE SHO LEGS KYI BTZUN MO DANG RGYAL PO
DE SHO LEGS

KYI MA YUM YIN NO, ,

(DMU LCAM RMANG LEGS,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING RGYAL PO AI SHO LEGS KYI BTZUN MO DANG, RGYAL
PO ZVA NAM

ZIN LDE'I MA YUM YIN, //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON// DU
RMU

LCAM RMAD LEGS ZHES 'KHOD 'DUG,

(DMAR SH'AKYA MU NE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DGU PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU GA-YO RU

GAN PA BYANG THANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, DE NAS BSTAN PA'I CHOS
SGOR ZHUGS

TE RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RIM GYIS
BZHES

SHING MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA NANG BYAN CHUD PA
MDZAD,

BOD LUGS CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 843 LO RGYAL PO GLANG DAR
MA 'U

DUM BTZAN POS DBUS GTZANG YONGS KYI SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA
BSNUBS

NAS RAB TU BYUNG BA RNAMS LA RI DVAGS BRNGON DU BCUG PA'I GNAS@1310 TSUL RNAMS DPAL CHU BO RI LA SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PA'I
DGE SLONG

DMAR SH'AKYA MU NES MTHONG STE RI DVAGS BDA' MKHAN BTZUN PA AAD

DAN CIG PA DANG, LHA LUNG 'TSAG PO, ZHA SNGA KHYAMS PO GSUM LA

RAB TU BYUNG BAS RI DVAGS BDA' DGOS PA'I RGYU MTSAN GNAS TSUL

RNAMS ZHIB TU DRIS PAS, DE'I LAN DU BTZUN PA GSUM POS MGRIN

GCIG TU RGYAL PO GLANG DAR MA 'U DUM BTZAN POS DBUS GTZANG YONGS

KYI BSTAN PA BSNUBS NAS RAB TU BYUNG BA RNAMS LA BKA' CHAD PHOG

PA'I GNAS TSUL RNAMS ZHUS RJES, DGE SLONG DMAR SH'AKYA MU NE
DANG,

GA-YO DGE BA'I 'BYUNG GNAS, GTZANG RAB GSAL GSUM GYIS SPRANG
CHAS

SPRAD DE DAM CHOS 'DUL BA DRE'U'I KHAL GCIG BKAL NAS DPAL CHU BO

RI LAS STOD MNGA' RIS BRGYUD CING BYANG LAM DED DE MDO SMAD LHO
NGOS

BE RI'I SA CHA DE'U TSVA MTSO RGYUD RMA LUNG RDO RJE'I BRAG DAN
TIG SHEL GYI

YANG DGON DU BDE BAR PHEBS, BOD LUGS SHING PHO STAG LO STE SPYI
LO

894 LOR BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL GYIS DMAR GA-YO GTZANG

GSUM LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA DKYUS

GCIG TU BSGRUBS PAS BOD YUL DU 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA MI NUB PA'I

SA BON BSKRUN PA YIN, KHONG NI BOD KYI LO RGYUS THOG TU GRAGS
PA'I

MKHAS PA MI GSUM NANG GI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(DMUS LONG DKON PA BKRA,)

KHONG NI RGYAL PO STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA
GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

@1311 (RMA SGOM CHOS KYI SHES RAB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1055

LOR YAR STOD SKYER SNANG DU RMA SMON LAM GYI SRAS SU SKU
'KHRUNGS, 'DAS

LO MI GSAL, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN LA

CHOS KYI SHES RAB CES GSOL, YAB CHEN LAS PADMA DBANG CHEN DANG,

SPYOD PHYOGS, DBU MA, DO HA STOD LUGS, GRUB RNYING RNAMS GSAN,

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR PHA DAM PA SANGS RGYAS DANG MJAL NAS PHA
RGYUD

DANG PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO RNAMS ZHUS PAS NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD PAR CAN
SKYES,

DE NAS SGOM SGRUB NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS NGES SHES KHYAD PAR CAN
SKYES

TE DGUN KHAR 'PHAN YUL DU BYON NAS PHA DAM PA SANGS RGYAS LAS

BKOD PA DRUG CU RTZA BZHI PA'I RDE'U KHRID ZHUS, DE NAS PHA YUL
DU BYON TE

'KHOR 'DAB DANG NOR RDZAS SPANGS TE SGRUB PAR MDZAD NAS RMA'I
PHUG

PAR LO GCIG BZHUGS, DE NAS KONG PO BRAG GSUM GYI MTSO RDZONG LA
BYON

TE LO DGUR BZHUGS, YUL DE'I 'KHRUGS PA RNAMS BSDUMS PAR

MDZAD, DE NAS DVAGS RDZONG KHA DANG, YAR KLUNG DU BYON TE LO
GSUM

BZHUGS SHING BU SLOB MANG DU BSKYANGS, ZHI BYED BRGYUD PA BAR MA
RMA

LUGS ZHES PA DE KHONG GIS SROL GTOD NAS BRGYUD PA ZAM MA CHAD
PAR

YANG NAS YANG DU DAR RO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI GANG
BAR

GSHEN DANG, SHUD PU LO TZ'A BA, BLA MA SHE'U, SOG PO MDO SDE,

ZHANG DGA' LDAN PA RNAMS YIN, ,

(RMA GCO RIN CHEN MCHOG)

KHRI SRONG

GZHUNG

(RMA SE RTOGS LDAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1386 LOR

MI NYAG YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG GI YAB YUM

MA GSHEGS BAR DU RANG YUL LA BZHUGS NAS BLA MA MANG POR BSTEN TE

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU ZHUS SHING THUGS DAM LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD,

SKABS DER CHOS RJE DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA

PHYOGS DER PHEBS PA DANG MJAL NAS 'BUL BA CHEN PO'ANG MDZAD,

SKU 'KHOR GYI DPON CHE CHUNG RNAMS LA'ANG LONGS SPYOD KYIS SHIN
TU

TSIMS PA MDZAD, DE NAS YUN RING MA 'GOR BAR KHONG DBUS SU

PHEBS NAS GNAS SKOR MDZAD, MTSUR PHUR BYON NAS CHOS RJE DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SKU MDUN NAS GDAMS PA SNYAN BRGYUD DANG BCAS

PA ZHUS, DE DUS BAN GZUGS RAL PA CAN DU YOD PAS DGE 'DUN

SGANG BA LA RAB TU BYUNG, DE NAS KHAMS SU BYON TE SPYI 1423 LOR

ZUR MANG DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD, GDUL BYA BSKYANGS PAS

@1319 GRVA PA MANG DU 'DUS, GLING DU SDOD PA DANG RI KHROD 'DZIN
PA'I GRVA

GNYIS BYUNG, DE RNAMS KYI NANG NAS MCHOG TU GYUR PA NI RTOGS
LDAN

YA BRGYAD DANG, 'JA' MO MI GSUM BYA BA BYUNG STE, DE THAMS CAD

THUGS DAM BZANG ZHING GZHAN DON NUS PA 'BA' ZHIG YIN, KHONG NI

CHOS RJE DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI NANG NAS 'PHRIN
LAS

SHIN TU CHE BA YIN NO, ,

(RMA GSANG KONG,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, SKU LUS KYI CHA TSAD MNYAM PA DANG SKYE 'BRAS
BZANG

BA'I MI ZHIG YIN, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYIS BSAM YAS
GTZUG

LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I SKABS SU THOG MAR LHO NGOS AA RYA PA LO'I
GLING

BRTZIGS TE THOG PHUB PA DANG, DE'I NANG BRTEN BZHENGS DUS LHA
BZO

RGYA MTSAL BU CAN GYIS RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN LA "LHA
RGYA GAR DANG RGYA'I

LUGS GANG BGYI ZER, GROS BGYIS PAS MKHAN PO'I ZHAL NAS SANGS

RGYAS RGYA GAR DU BYON PA YIN PAS RGYA GAR LUGS SU GYIS GSUNGS,

BTZAN PO'I ZHAL NAS BOD KYI LUGS SU BGYIS NA BOD NAG PO LA ZHEN
PA

RNAMS DAD PA SKYED RE BA YIN PAS LHA BOD LUGS SU BYA BAR CI
GNANG

ZHES ZHUS PAS 'O NA BOD 'BANGS KUN SDUS SHIG LHA BOD LUGS SU
BYA'O

GSUNGS, BOD MI'I GZUGS SU BGYID PA'I DPE BOD 'BANGS TSOGS

PA LAS DE'I NANG NAS GZUGS BZANG BA RMA GSANG KONG LA DPE BYAS
TE

AA RYA PA LO'I GLING GI SGO SRUNG DU RTA MGRIN BZHENGS,
"ZHES//CHOS 'BYUNG@1320 MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON //DU GSUNGS SO,,

(RMOG LCOGS PA RIN CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1110

LOR LHA PHU SPANG RTZA LA YAB SHES RGAN SMAN CHUNG DANG, YUM 'BE
MO PADMA

SGRON GNYIS GYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS NI ZHI SHE YIN,
RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1170 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR ZHANG ZHONG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING BLA
MA

SHANGS PAS KYE RDOR GYI DBANG BSKUR, BLA MA LAS GDAMS PA 'GA'

ZHUS TE BSGOMS KYANG NYAMS MYONG CHER MA BYUNG, DE NAS MGON PO'I

SKOR DANG NYI KHROS KYI GDAMS PA ZHUS, BLA MAS GSER ZHO DRUG
DANG,

DAR YUG DRUG MDO SDE RGYAN PO TI GCIG RNAMS GNANG NAS GA-YOR PO

RGYA MO CHE'I MDUN DU SONG GSUNGS NAS PHYIN PA NA, KHAMS PA AA
SENG

DANG MJAL ZHING DGE BSHES CHEN PO PHYVA BA SOGS DRUG CU TZAM
TSOGS

PA'I DBUS SU DON DAM BDEN PA'I SKOR GYI BGRO GLENG MDZAD PAS BLA
MA

LA SANGS RGYAS DNGOS KYI 'DU SHES SKYES, KHAMS PA AA SENG LAS
RDUL

MTSON DANG TING NGE 'DZIN GYI DKYIL 'KHOR LA BSTEN PA GNYIS
DANG,

BSKYED RIM L'U YI PA DANG LHAN SKYES GNYIS RDZOGS RIM SBYOR DRUG
RTZA

'GREL, SBYOR PHRENG RTZA 'GREL, SNYING PO GSUM RTZA 'GREL GNYIS
BCAS

ZHUS, RAS CHUNG PA'I GDAMS NGAG RNAMS KYANG THOB, NYAG MO DGE

BSHES SOGS LAS SPYAN SNGA'I SGOM SOGS GDAMS NGAG MANG DU ZHUS,

DE NAS SLAR BLA MA SHANGS PA'I MDUN DU BYON TE DBANG CHOG GDAMS

@1321 NGAG THAMS CAD ZHUS, RTZE GCIG TU SGRUB PA MDZAD CING
NYAMS

RTOGS KYANG SKYES, DE NAS CHOS RJE SGAM PO PA'I MDUN DU PHEBS TE

CHOS DRUG SOGS ZHUS, PHYAG CHEN GYI LTA BA LA THAG CHOD PA'I
BOGS

THON, TSUR 'BYON DUS SKYEL THUNG YANG MDZAD DE NAS RMOG LCOGS

SU SLOB MA MANG DU 'DUS PAS SLOB MA RNAMS MA SHONG NAS LKUGS
LUNG

DGON PA GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD KYI BSTAN

PA SHIN TU DAR BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI MCHOG TU GYUR BA'I SLOB MA NI

DBON STON SKYER SGANG PA YIN,,

(SMA RA ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS CHI KY'A TSO BA'I NANG YIN, KHONG SKU
'BUM

DGON DU PHEBS TE DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS

NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA GSAN SBYONG LHUR LEN MDZAD, DE NAS

DPAL LDAN GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS
NAS

BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS SNGAGS GZHUNG RNAMS LA GO LO THOS LO TZAM MA
YIN

PAR RANG RGYUD LA BSKOR NUS PA'I THUGS GNYER MDZAD, SHA RDZONG
SGRUB

SDE DANG, SKYA YUS RI KHROD SOGS SU SPROS PA DANG BCAS MA BCAS
KYI

RNAL 'BYOR THUGS NYAMS SU BZHES, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU PHO
KHYI

LO STE SPYI LO 1862 LOR SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA

BZHUGS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1869
LOR

SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD
DANG

@1322 CHOS 'CHAD NYAN GYI BYA BA THAMS CAD LA THUGS KHUR NAN TAN
DU MDZAD,

KHRI ZUR NAS SNGAR GYI THUGS DAM ZAB MO'I NGANG LA BZHUGS SHING,
NYAM

THAG PA'I NAD PA MANG POR SMAN SBYIN DANG KHYAD PAR ME BTZA'
GCIG

PUS LUS SROG SKYOB PA'I THABS MKHAS PHUL PHYIN MDZAD PA'I NGOS

GZUGS SKU RAGS PA BSDUS PA'I TSUL BSTAN, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DUS

'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS BCO BRGYAD PA DANG, SMAN PA DPON

SLOB KYI KHRI RABS BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA PA YIN NO,,

(SMAD KYI BYANG SEMS SHES RAB BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI BYANG SEMS SHES RAB BZANG PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(SMAN KHANG PA NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO

1635 LOR GTZANG KHUL DU YAB DAR RGYAS DANG, YUM TSE RING BSAM

GRUB GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME
MO

PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1707 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA PAR

SHEL DKAR CHOS SDE'I MKHAN PO LEGS PA DON GRUB LA GTZUG PHUD
PHUL,

DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR SHEL DKAR CHOS SDE'I CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE

GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA GSAN BSAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO

BRGYAD PAR RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO
LAS RAB

BYUNG GI SDOM PA ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU LA RTA NAG CHOS RJE DAM
CHOS

RGYAL MTSAN LAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM SOGS KYI BSHAD LUNG GSAN,

@1323 DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR MKHAN PO BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSO LAS
BSNYEN RDZOGS

BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR CHOS SDE'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DGUNG

LO SO GSUM PAR RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR GYI KHONGS GTOGS 'BUM POD

BZHI DANG, SHES RAB KHRI PA SOGS POD 'GA' THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD

CING TSOGS RGYUGS PHUL, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU BAR LO SHAS RING DU

DGON PA ZHIG GSO'I PHYAG LAS KYI THUGS 'GAN BZHES, DGUNG LO ZHE

GNYIS PAR LO SHAS RING DU KHA ZAS RAGS PA RGYUN GCOD MDZAD DE

MTSAMS SGO 'DAG SBYAR GYIS SKU MTSAMS DAM POR BZHUGS, DGUNG

LO ZHE BDUN PAR DGE SLONG DON GRUB DANG LHAN DU RTA NAG TU PHEBS
TE

CHOS RJE RTA PHUG PA DAM CHOS RGYAL MTSAN DANG MJAL ZHING CHOS
'BREL

ZHUS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SE RA DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS, RVA

SGRENG, LHO KHA, DVAGS PO SOGS LA GNAS MJAL PHEBS, DE NAS

GTZANG DU PHEBS TE PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DANG MJAL ZHING
CHOS

'BREL ZHUS, DGA' LDAN CHOS 'PHEL DU BZHUGS NAS BKA' CHOS

MANG DU GNANG, DE RJES STOD KHUL RJE BTZUN MI LA RAS PA'I SGRUB

GNAS CHU DPAR BRAG DMAR DU SGRUB PA RTZE GCIG TU MDZAD, SHEL

DKAR DGON SOGS LA RTEN DANG BRTEN PA MANG DU BZHENGS PA MDZAD,

DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO DON BCU

DON GSUM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI//'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS GSANG BA DRI MED//

DANG, //NGO MTSAR MED KYANG NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL GYI BYA PHRAN
KHYUNG

@1324 RJES RNYOG 'DRA'I RNAM THAR//, //'CHAL GTAM TSIG LA MGUR
BTAGS

TSIG PHRENG// BCAS POD GNYIS BZHUGS SO,,

(SMAN BTZUN LUNG GONG,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING RGYAL PO LDE RGYAL PO'I BTZUN MO DANG, RGYAL PO
LDE SPRIN

BTZAN GYI MA YUM YIN NO,,

(SMAN 'TSONG BDE CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO

1757 LOR REB SKONG SENG GE GSHONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO

MI GSAL, KHONG DGE BSHES SHES RAB BSTAN 'DZIN LAS RAB TU

BYUNG ZHING RAB 'BYAMS PA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS YI GE'I SBYOR
KLOG

LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU BA NAS GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR

ZHUGS, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS

PHYIN PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR KHRI CHEN DGE 'DUN
BSTAN

'DZIN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1795 LOR RONG BO DUS

'KHOR GSANG SNGAGS DAR RGYAS GLING GI KHRI LA BZHUGS, LO BDUN
GYI

RING DU 'CHAD NYAN BSKYANGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU MO PHAG
LO

STE SPYI LO 1803 LOR RONG BO RGYUD GSANG CHEN CHOS KYI BANG
MDZOD KYI KHRI

BA MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1809

LOR RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA
BZHUGS

@1325 NAS LO GNYIS KYI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS
RAB BYUNG

BCU BZHI PA'I CHU SPREL YAS MAS SU MGON SHUL CHU DMAR DU CHU
DMAR

RAB RGYAS SGRUB SDE GSAR 'DEBS GNANG, 'DU KHANG KA BA BRGYAD CU

CAN RTEN DANG BRTEN PA GSAR BZHENGS GNANG, SMAN 'TSONG BDE

CHEN BLA BRANG DU BYAMS CHEN SOGS KYANG BZHENGS PAR MA ZAD, RTZE

GZHUNG DU CHU KHOG SHOG BZHI'I SER SKYA RNAMS LA DUS 'KHOR DBANG
CHEN

SOGS CHOS KYI DGA' STON CI YANG BSTZAL, THUG MO DGON DANG, THO

RGYA'I DGON, SMAN 'TSONG BDE CHEN SOGS CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GNYIS

KAS BSKYANGS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //DUS 'KHOR BDAG 'JUG//

SOGS BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI

GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS NYER BZHI BA YIN NO, ,

(SMAN BZA' KLU STENGS,)

RGYAL PO

KHRI THOG RJE BTZAN GYI MA YUM YIN, //CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I
DGA'

(SMAN RI BA BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL,)

@1326 MCHOG GI MCHOD DPON MKHAN PO MDZAD CING SPYI LO 1858 LOR

NGAM RING CHOS SDE'I BYAMS KHANG STENG SHOD DANG, BLA BRANG,
CHOS RA,

GRVA SHAG SOGS NYAMS GSO GSAR BSKRUN DANG, BKA' 'GYUR SOGS

BRIS MA POD GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

(SMAN LUNG BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN,)

@1327 CAD KYI YID DBANG 'PHROG PA'I YUL DU GYUR, KUN MKHYEN
'JIGS

MED DBANG PO LAS SGRA DANG, SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR BCAS LA BSLABS

BTAGS BZHES, BLA BRANG GI RGYUD GRVAR ZHUGS TE SNGAGS GZHUNG
DANG CHO

GA PHYAG LEN BCAS LA SBYANGS PAS SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' LEGS PAR

CHEN DGON SOGS SU 'GRIMS NAS BKA' POD LNGA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG

STE KUN GYIS BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, LO LNGA TZAM GYI RING DU THOR
GOD

DKON MCHOG DZA SAG GI BLA MA MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PA RAB
BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1798 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA

(SMIN GLING NGAG DBANG DPAL BZANG,)

BZANG

DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

KHONG NI LO CHEN DHARMA SHR'I DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS

PAR ZHU'O, ,

(SMIN GLING MI 'GYUR DPAL SGRON,)

KHONG MO NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO

1699 LOR SMIN GROL GLING DU YAB GTER BDAG GLING PA DANG, YUM

PHUN TSOGS DPAL 'DZOMS GNYIS KYI SRAS MOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1769 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR YAB GTER BDAG GLING PA LA GTZUG PHUD

PHUL TE MTSAN LA MI 'GYUR DPAL GYI SGROL MA ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO

BCU GSUM PAR YAB RJE LAS GTER CHOS KYI ZAB DON MAN NGAG THAMS

CAD ZHUS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS RTOGS PA'I YON TAN LA

MNGA' 'RNYES, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR LO CHEN DHARMA SHR'I LAS ZAB
LAM

BDE GSHEGS KUN 'DUS KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM LEGS PAR ZHUS

SHING RTZA RLUNG THIG LE'I 'PHRUL 'KHOR LA NYAMS LEN DPYIS PHYIN
PAR

MDZAD, GZHAN YANG KHRAG 'THUNG 'JIGS MED RDO RJE DANG, KA:THOG

RIG 'DZIN ZHABS DRUNG 'GYUR MED GZHAN PHAN DBANG PO, BSHES

GNYEN AO RGYAN RAB BRTAN, SO STON MTHU STOBS RNAM RGYAL, 'DUL

'DZIN KUN DGA' BLO GROS, SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS BLO GROS RGYAL

@1329 MTSAN SOGS LA BSTEN NAS GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI BKA'
CHOS

MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR AO ROD CUN GAR GYI

DMAG DPUNG BOD DU SLEBS DUS 'BRAS LJONGS RDZOGS CHEN DGON DU

BROS BYOL MDZAD NAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN BSKOR, DGUNG LO
NYER

GNYIS PAR BOD DU PHEBS NAS GCEN PO RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL DANG

MNYAM DU SMIN GROL GLING ZHIG GSOS MDZAD CING RGYAL DBANG BSKAL

BZANG RGYA MTSO LA GZUG PHUD PHUL BAS MTSAN LA RJE BTZUN SHES
RAB

SGROL MA ZHES GNANG, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO DRUG PAR SMIN GROL GLING

NAS SLOB MA NYIS BRGYA BDUN CU LHAG LA YAB RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM POD

CHEN BCU GSUM DANG, SNYING TIG YA BZHI'I PO TI BCAS KYI DBANG

LUNG KHRID GSUM GNANG BA MDZAD, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN YANG MANG
DU

BZHENGS TE GSANG SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BAR

MDZAD, DE LTAR SKU TSE GANG BOR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN KHO NAR

BSGRUBS NAS DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG MO'I GSUNG RTZOM NI //SNYING THIG MA
BU

GCIG DRIL GYI GDAMS PA KHRID YIG BDE CHEN LAM BZANG// DANG,

//SLOB BU'I RIGS LA GDAMS PA'I ZHAL GDAMS//, //MGUR MA//,

//ZHUS LAN SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDOMS PA'I DVANGS GSAL ME
LONG//,

//BDE CHEN LAM BZANG// BCAS MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1822@1330 LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS CHU DKAR THANG 'BROG SDER YAB DAR
RGYAS

DANG, YUM SGROL CHUNG GNYIS KYI SUS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BCO

LNGA PA'I CHU MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1883 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG

LO GZHON NU'I SKABS SU SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI
CHOS

SGOR ZHUGS TE BKA' POD LNGA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA LUNG RIGS GNYIS KYI

RKYA BAR NAS DRANGS PA'I RTZOD PA PHUL DU PHYIN ZHING CHO 'PHRUL
SMON LAM

CHEN MO'I STENG DU GRVA SKOR MDZAD, GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG
DANG, SKU

MCHED BLO BZANG BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO SOGS BSHES GNYEN DAM PA MANG

PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE LAM RIM BLO SBYONG BSKYED RDZOGS KYI SKOR
DANG,

RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I THUN MIN MANG NGAG RNAM GSUM SOGS KYI ZAB
KHRID

PHYAG LEN DANG BCAS PAR THOS BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, YI DAM RDO

RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI LAS BSNYEN CHEN PO YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA LEGS

PAR ZHUS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO
1882 LOR SKU

'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING 'GRIG LAM KUN

SPYOD DANG SLOB GNYER BCAS LA DO DAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, KHRI ZUR

NAS SGRUB PA NYA LAS LEN MDZAD CING DUS 'DA' BA'O, DGUNG LO DRUG

CU RE GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SKU

'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS NYER BRGYAD PA YIN NO,,

(SMYUNG GNAS PA BSOD NAMS BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1341

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI
LO 1433

@1331 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS SPYIR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG
PO'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS

PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, SGOS SU CHOS RJE PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL
DANG

NYA DBON KUN DGA' DPAL BA GNYIS LA BSTEN NAS DUS 'KHOR YAN

LAG DANG BCAS PA DANG, MAN NGAG PHYAG LEN DANG BCAS PAR LEGS

PAR GSAN NAS KHRID BSHAD DBANG GSUM GYIS GDUL BYA YUN RING DU

BSKYANGS, DBANG SGRUB KYI YIG CHA'ANG MANG DU MDZAD, CHOS RJE DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA DANG MTHONG BA DON LDAN GNYIS KAS KYANG ZHABS LA

GTUGS, SKYES BU CHEN PO RNAMS KYI BLA MAR GYUR, KHONG GI SLOB MA
DKA'

BCU PA PAD MA BZANG POS RGYUD 'GREL GYI t'IKA CHEN BRTZAMS, CHOS

RGYAL CHOS BZANG NYI LAS GA-YA' SNANG RI KHROD BTAB CING TSOGS
PA

BSKYANGS SO,,

@1332 /TZA/

(TZA YU NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO

PA'I LCAGS PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1790 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
BLA BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS SHING BSDUS GZHUNG NAS
BZUNG

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD CING
RDO

BCAL RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DE NAS BLA BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING BLA MA DBU
MDZAD DANG

KHRI BA GNYIS KA'I THUGS 'GAN LO BCU DRUG GI RING DU BZHES TE
CHOS

'CHAD NYAN DANG 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD BCAS KYI THAD LA DO DAM GANG

LEGS MDZAD, GRVA TSANG LA BCA' YIG ZHU BA MDZAD NAS KUN MKHYEN

RIN PO CHE'I BKA' LTAR BSGRUBS PA MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS THUGS DAM

NYAMS BZHES MDZAD MUR DGUNG LO NGA DGU PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD
PA'I KHRI

RABS BCO BRGYAD PA YIN NO,,

@1333 (TZA YUS NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO

SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI
LO 1812

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS LHA BRTAN
ZHABS

DRUNG LAS RAB TU BYUNG, LDONG NGE BLO BZANG DON GRUB LAS YI GE'I
SBYOR

KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, NYANG TSANG

DPON SLOB LAS RIN 'BYUNG GI RJES GNANG DANG, RNGA RGOD NAM MKHA'

SENG GE LAS 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI KHRID, GCUNG BLO GSAL RGYA
MTSO

LAS BDE 'DUS SOGS SNYING SKOR GYI SGRUB 'PHRIN PHAL CHER GYI
RGYUN,

SLOB DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO LAS SKU GONG MA'I GSUNG
'BUM

GYI LUNG RNAMS GSAN, KIRTI BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE RGYAL

BA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DANG, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES MJAL

NAS CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, SMIN GROL GLING DU BYON TE MKHAN PO AU
RGYAN

BSTAN 'DZIN LAS GTER KHA GSUM GYI CHOS TSAN PHAL CHER GYI DBANG

LUNG GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE GNYA'
GONG

BRAG DKAR DANG RGYAL MO GSHAG RAL DU SGRUB PA MDZAD PAS GZIGS

SNANG KHYAD PAR CAN BYUNG, RONG PHYOGS KUN TU GUS ZHEN CHE BAS
MDZAD

'PHRIN GYI KLONG RDOL, LE MDO SGAR BTAB STE DE'I 'DU KHANG DANG,
TZA

YUS SGAR BA'I 'DU KHANG, DGON PA'I SHAR DU BDUD 'DUL MCHOD

@1334 RTEN, RTZAM SDER SGAR BA'I 'DU KHANG RNA LAS BZHENGS,
DGUNG LO RE

BDUN PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI TZA YUS AA

LAGS 'PHRIN LAS RAB BRTAN GYI SPRUL SKU YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA
GRAGS

CHE BA NI BKA' 'GYUR BA DKON MCHOG DPAL 'DZIN DANG, RTZE DBUS

GCOD PA YE SHES TSUL KHRIMS, THANG LUNG GCOD RGAN SKAL BZANG NYI

MA, AA KHYUNG NGAG DBANG MKHYEN RAB BCAS YIN NO,,

(TZA YUS 'PHRIN LAS RAB BRTAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1667

LOR MDO SMAD TZA YUS ME TOG SHAR DU YAB SNYING GAR BYAMS DANG,

YUM GCOD MA THAR GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU

GNYIS PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1744 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS LHA BRTAN BLA MA 'PHRIN LAS PHUN
TSOGS

LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR SHUG SHAR RI KHROD DU

PHEBS TE SNGAGS RAMS PA BSOD NAMS YAR 'PHEL LA BSTEN NAS MDO

SNGAGS LA SBYANGS, DE NAS YUL DBUS SU PHEBS SHING 'BRAS SPUNGS
SGO

MANG CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS, GSANG PHU'I
DKA'

BCU MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I BKA'

LTAR RGYUD SMAD DU ZHUGS SHING SNGAGS LA SBYANGS PAS MDO SNGAGS
KYI

GZHUNG LA MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR, SMIN GROL GLING DU PHEBS TE
GTER

STON LAS BKA' CHOS CI RIGS GSAN, DE NAS RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE

GZHI DGE BKRA SHIS CHOS 'KHOR GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING 'DU

@1335 KHANG KHYAD MTSAR LNGA DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU
BZHENGS, SHUG

SHAR DANG, TZA YUS SGAR, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL, ZHAL DRO, AA DZU,

DUS CHEN, MDZOD DGE BRAG RA, KHA GYA'I STAG LUNG SOGS YONGS SU

GRAGS PA'I SGRUB GNAS DGU DANG MA GRAGS PA SO SOR GSAR RNYING GI

CHOS RGYUN RGYA CHER SPEL BAS RONG KHAMS KUN TU 'PHRIN LAS
RGYAS,

DGUNG LO DON BDUN PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG

GI GSUNG RTZOM NI PO TI GCIG BZHUGS SO, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS
CHE

BA NI GCUNG BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO DANG, LHA BRTAN ZHABS DRUNG, MU
TO

BLA MA KUN DGA' 'OD ZER, SKYI THANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL, T'A
DBON

SPRUL SKU, REB TSA SPRUL SKU, NYANG TSANG ZHABS DRUNG, RNGA RGOD
NAM

MKHA' SENG GE MU TO RGYA MTSO DON LDAN BCAS YIN NO,,

(TZAN DRA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS NAS

YI GE'I 'BRI KLOG LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS SHING MKHAS PAR GYUR, DE
NAS

MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD

PA DANG, LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA SLOB GNYER PHUL DU PHYIN PA

MDZAD NAS BSTAN BCOS GCIG TZAM BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD,

KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //SMAN DPYAD GCES
PA GRUB

PA// ZHES BYA BA SLOB DPON NYI MA BSRUNG BAS MDZAD PA BZHUGS
SO,,

(TZONG KHA PA,)

@1336 KHONG NI RJE TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA DANG GCIG
YIN PAS

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(GTZANG NAG PA BRTZON 'GRUS SENG GE)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I PHYVA BA CHOS KYI SENG GE'I (1109-1169) SLOB
MA

YIN, KHONG GIS SPYIR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO LA BSTEN NAS

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR

MDZAD, LHAG PAR DU PHYVA BA CHOS KYI SENG GE'I ZHABS LA GTUGS
NAS

TSAD MA DANG DBU MA SOGS LA SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR,
RJE

BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYI BSNYEN PA MANG DU BZLAS PAS BLO RNO
ZHING

RIGS LAM LA SHIN TU BYANG BAS SENG CHEN BRGYAD LAS DANG PO YIN,

KHONG GI SLOB DPON PHYVA BA CHOS KYI SENG GES SLOB DPON ZLA BA
GRAGS PA'I

GZHUNG LA DGAG PA MANG DU MDZAD KYANG, KHONG GIS "DPAL LDAN ZLA
BA

GRAGS PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA, SBYANGS PA'I STOBS KYIS GZHUNG DON

NGES GYUR PA, NGA 'DRA'I SKYE BO SLAN CHAD 'BYUNG MI 'GYUR,"
ZHES

GSUNGS NAS GTZIGS SU 'DZIN, DBU MA'I BSDUS PA'ANG CHE PHRA MANG

DU MDZAD PA RNAMS ZLA BA GRAGS PA'I LUGS YIN, //TSAD MA RNAM
NGES

KYI 'GREL CHEN// DANG, SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MDO
SBYOR

DANG, BSLAB BTUS, SPYOD 'JUG DBU MA'I BSTAN BCOS RNAMS

LA'ANG RNAM BSHAD MANG DU BRTZAMS SO,,

(GTZANG PA RGYA RAS YE SHES RDO RJE,)

@1337 KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1161

LOR MYANG STOD KHU LER YAB RGYA ZUR BO TSAB PE DANG, YUM MAR
BZA'

DAR SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I
LCAGS MO

LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1211 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI BYIS PA'I MING
LA

GA-YUNG DRUNG DPAL ZHES ZHU, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR YUM GSHEGS,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR GTZANG RONG DU PHEBS TE YI GE'I SBYOR
KLOG

LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR SLOB DPON RTA THANG

LAS MNGON PA DANG, YO GA ZHI BYED BCAS ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA

PAR SLOB DPON MKHAR LUNG BA LAS RDZOGS CHEN DANG TSAD MA SOGS

GSAN, SO DAR MA SENG GE LAS SPYOD 'JUG DANG, KHU LUNG LHA RJE
KUN

RGYAL LAS MTSAN BRJOD, SLOB DPON 'DUL 'DZIN LAS THUGS RJE CHEN

PO JO BO'I LUGS BCAS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR SNA PHUR

BYON NAS GDAMS NGAG ZHUS PAS ZHAG BDUN NAS RAS RKYANG THUB PA

BYUNG, RJES NAS NYON MONGS PA'I GA-YUL LAS RGYAL BA'I GRUB PA
THOB,

SLOB DPON RNGOG PA LAS GUR BRTAG DANG, MA H'A M'A Y'A, MTSAN

BRJOD RNAMS KYI PHYAG LEN DANG BCAS PAR GSAN, DE NAS BLA MA
GLING

RAS PADMA RDO RJE 'DAS NAS DGONGS RDZOGS LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, RA

LUNG DU BYON TE LO GSUM BZHUGS NAS RA LUNG BTAB, RTOGS PA NAM

MKHA' DANG MNYAM, RJE BTZUN RAS CHUNG PAS GTER DU SBAS PA'I RO

SNYOMS SKOR DRUG GTER LAS BTON, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR MDO BO

RAS PA LAS CHOS DRUG GI KHRID ZHUS, 'BRI GUNG DU BYON NAS TSOGS

@1338 CHOS GSAN, SKYID SHOD DU PHEBS NAS KLONG RDOL KYI DGON PA
BTAB,

DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA GSUM PAR BLA MA ZHANG GIS MKHAN PO DANG,
RTZI

'DUL 'DZIN GYIS SLOB DPON MDZAD NAS CHIG RDZOGS BSGRUBS,

MTSAN LA YE SHES RDO RJE ZHES GSOL, SNYING RJE LA BOG CHEN PO
THON, DE

NAS GTZANG PHYOGS DANG PHO MA LA SOGS PA'I 'BROG BOD DANG BYANG
TSA KHA

TSUN CHAD DU KHRI BTAB PA DANG, GZHAN GYI LONGS SPYOD DON YOD
PAR

MDZAD PA DANG, 'KHRUG BSDUMS MDZAD PA DANG BLA MA'I GDAN SAR

'BUL BA BSKYAL BA LA SOGS PA DPAG TU MED PAR MDZAD, GNAM GYI

PHUR 'BRUG DGON PA BTAB, DE'I DUS SU 'BRUG SGRA DRAG PO THENGS

'GAR GRAGS PAS GDAN SA'I MING LA 'BRUG TU BTAGS, LO DER

SPYIL BU STONG DU LONGS, SLOB MA KHRI LNGA TZAM TSOGS, DE THAMS
CAD LA

GDAMS NGAG BYIN PAS 'JIG RTEN GYI ZHEN LOG TSE BLOS BTANG GI
SGRUB

PA, BLA MA'I MOS GUS GSUM GTZO BOR 'DZIN NAS PHYAG RGYA CHEN
PO'I

RTOGS PA SHAR BA STONG PHRAG LNGA TZAM BYON, DPAL 'BRUG PA BKA'

BRGYUD KYI BSTAN PA BYA RGOD KYI NYIN LAM BCO BRGYAD DU KHYAB
PAR GRAGS

SO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN NI SHES RAB BDUD RTZI 'KHOR LO DANG,

GTZANG PA RGYA RAS RDO RJE GZHON NU ZHES ZHU, DE NAS SKU TSE
'DI'I 'PHRIN

LAS RDZOGS NAS DGUNG LO LNGA BCU RTZA GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG GI GDAN SA GTZO BO NI RA LUNG DGON

PA YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI DANG PO CHE BA SPA
RKYANG GNYIS,

BAR DU CHE BA RGYA 'BRAS GNYIS, THA MA CHE BA LO RGOD GNYIS BCAS
YIN,

@1339 (GTZANG STOD DAM CHOS DPAL 'BAR,)

CHOS SDER RAB TU BYUNG ZHING PAn CHEN GNAS PA'I DRUNG NAS SLOB

MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS, DE NAS DBUS

BCU'I GOS SKU DANG MGON KHANG GSAR MA DANG BCAS PA BZHENGS, YI

MA'I

BOD LUGS CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 843 LOR RGYAL PO GLANG DAR
MA 'U

DUM BTZAN POS DBUS GTZANG YONGS KYI SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA BSNUBS

SLONG

GTZANG RAB GSAL GYIS RIG STE RI DVAGS BDA' MKHAN BTZUN PA AAD

DAN CIG PA DANG, LHA LUNG 'TSAG PO, ZHA SNGA KHYAMS PO GSUM LA

RAB TU BYUNG BAS RI DVAGS BDA' DGOS PA'I RGYU MTSAN GNAS TSUL

BKA'

LUNG RDO RJE'I

GSAL GYIS

GNAS GSUM LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA

DKYUS GCIG TU BSGRUBS PAS BOD YUL DU 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA MI
