'DZIN SOGS YIN NO, ,

(TSOGS GNYIS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI CHAGS PA CHOS 'PHEL DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O,,

(TSOGS CHAG CHUNG BA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS PAn GRUB MANG
PO'I

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR THOS

BSAM MDZAD CING, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD YIG LA SBYANGS PA

DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD DE BSTAN BCOS GCIG TZAM BOD YIG LA BSGYUR

BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI //BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //GSHIN
RJE

GSHED NAG PO'I SGRUB THABS// ZHES BYA BA SLOB DPON GHO shA
BADZRAS MDZAD

PA BZHUGS SO,,

(TSONG BTZUN SHES RAB SENG GE)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU GTZANG

PHYOGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I

@1395 DUS MGO TZAM MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL RMA LUNG RDO RJE'I
BRAG DAN TIG

SHEL GYI YANG DGON (DENG SANG MTSO SNGON ZHING CHEN ZHUNG HVA
RDZONG KHONGS)

DU BYON NAS BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL (953-1035) LAS

RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS DKYUS

GCIG TU BZHES SHING 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS GSAN TE, DBUS

GTZANG DU LOG PHEBS MDZAD CING BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS LA

ZHIG GSOS GANG LEGS MDZAD, DE NAS KHONG GIS SNGO GLING BZUNG STE

DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING 'DUL BA'I BSTAN PA
DAR

BAR MDZAD, CHOS RGYUD DE LAS GYES PA'I SKAL SKOR DANG, RGYAN

SKOR, GNAS GSAR GYI SKOR, GNAS RNYING GI SKOR, RBA TSO,

NYAN TSO SKOR, BYA CHOS SKOR, SMON GRO SKOR, DVO TSO BCAS KHRAL

TSO DGU YOD, KHONG NI BSTAN PA PHYI DAR GYI SKABS SU BLA CHEN
DGONGS

PA RAB GSAL LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS PA'I DBUS GTZANG GI MKHAS PA

MI BCU'I NANG GI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO,,

(MTSAN SGROGS DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1847

LOR KHRI KA GSER MO LJONGS SU YAB BLO BZANG DANG YUM DPAL MO
RGYAL

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO
BDUN

PAR SKYABS RJE GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS SKU GONG MA BLO
BZANG BKRA

SHIS NYI MA'I YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD CING RANG DGON GONG
BA GRVA

TSANG GI BLA BRANG DU GDAN SAR BKOD, THAR SHUL DGE 'DUN CHOS
SKYONG RGYA

@1396 MTSO LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, DE NAS
SKU 'BUM

RANG SGAR GYI GDAN SAR PHEBS TE BLO BZANG RIN CHEN YONGS 'DZIN
DU

BSTEN NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG
BAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB

GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE TSAD MA SDE BDUN DANG PHAR PHYIN GYI
GZHUNG LA

THOS BSAM DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD DE TSOGS LANGS KYANG BZHENGS,

SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI DRUNG NAS RDOR PHRENG GI
DBANG CHEN

DANG, TSE DPAG LHA DGU, 'JIGS BYED DPA' GCIG BCAS KYI

DBANG RNAMS LEGS PAR ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR DUS ZING

LANGS PA'I STABS KYIS RANG DGON GONG BA GRVA TSANG DU PHEBS NAS
MDO

SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS RGYA MTSO LTA BU LA DPE GZIGS DANG MDZUB
KHRID,

RIGS PA RNAM GRANGS DU MAS DPYAD RTOG NAR MAR MDZAD, DUS RGYUN

DU ZHAL 'DON DGE SBYOR LA BRTZON PA THUGS DRAG POS 'JIG RTEN
CHOS

BRGYAD KYI GA-YENG BA RGYANG RING DU BSRINGS NAS BUD SNYEGS THOB
GSUM,

GTAD BA BZHI, RDO RJE GSUM GYI NYAMS BZHES ZAB MOS BKA' GDAMS

GONG MA'I RNAM THAR BDAG GIR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR

DPAL LDAN GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS
NAS

GSANG CHEN LAM GYI RIM PA LA THOS BSAM GANG LEGS GNANG, DGUNG

LO BZHI PAR SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS TE 'DU KHANG
RNYING SKYON

CHE BA'ANG ZHIG GSOS LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR

MCHOD RTEN SKES DGON PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS CHOS 'CHAD NYAN YAR

@1397 LDAN DU BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU THAM PA RAB BYUNG BCO
LNGA PA'I

BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO
SA'I KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO

DAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS KYANG SKU 'BUM DGON DANG,

RANG DGON GONG BA GRVA TSANG GNYIS SU RES MOS KYIS BKA' DRIN

BSKYANGS PA LAGS SO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI
KHRI

RABS NGA GNYIS PA DANG, SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN

BDUN CU PA YIN NO, ,

(MTSAN SGROGS DGE 'DUN DON GRUB,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG NI RAB

BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1734 LOR SKU
'BUM

DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI CHEN LA BZHUGS TE LO BDUN GYI RING DU
GDAN

SA BSKYANGS, DE'I RING DU DUS GSUM SANGS RGYAS KYI LHA KHANG
GZHI NAS

GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, CHE SHOS LHA BZO BLO BZANG BSHES GNYEN GYIS

'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS KYI SNANG BRNYAN KHYAD 'PHAGS CAN

BZHENGS NAS RAB GNAS RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA LA DENG SANG 'JAM

DBYANGS KUN GZIGS SU GRAGS PA DE'O, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I

LCAGS PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1740 LOR MI DBANG PHO LHA BA BSOD
NAMS

STOBS RGYAS NAS DNGUL SRANG NYIS KHRI BDUN STONG LAS BRGAL BA'I
RGYU

SONG GIS GSER SDONG CHEN MO'I STENG GI GSER ZANGS KYI RGYA
PHIBS,

GANYDZI RA'I TOG GI NANG DUSH'A KYA'I RGYAL PO'I 'PHEL GDUNG
SOGS BYIN

@1398 RTEN, NOR BU 'BAR BA CHA GCIG GI NANG DU RGYA BOD KYI GTER
RDZAS SNA

TSOGS KYIS SPRAS PA, GRVA ZUR GYI MGO RGYAN DANG BCAS PA RAB
BYUNG

BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1741 LOR LEGS PAR

GRUB, GDAN SA'I KHRI CHEN KHONG DANG, RGYUD PA MKHAN PO,

DKAR PO CHOS RJE SOGS DGE 'DUN LNGA BCU THAM PAS RAB GNAS KYI
CHO

GA RGYAS PAR MDZAD CING BKRA SHIS KYI DGA' STON RMAD DU BYUNG BA
MDZAD

DO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN NYER BZHI PA

YIN NO,,

(MTSAN SGROGS BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO

1791 LOR RONG PHYOGS RGAN GYA SDE BAR YAB BRAN DU SHOR DANG,

YUM CHOS 'PHEL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU

BZHI PA'I SHING MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1845 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG MA'I YANG SRID DU NGOS
'DZIN

MDZAD CING YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA LEGS PAR

SBYANGS, NGANG RONG MKHAN PO LAS DGE BSNYEN DANG BAR MA RAB
BYUNG

GI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI

RANG SGAR DU GDAN SAR BKOD CING DGA' STON RGYAS PAR SPROS, DE

NAS DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING BKA'
POD

LNGA'I GZHUNG LA THOS BSAM LEGS PAR GNANG, SKYABS RJE GSER

KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO LAS TSIGS
SNGA MA

@1399 DANG PHYI MA'I SDOM PA RIM GYIS BZHES, DPAL LDAN GSANG
SNGAGS

RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE GSANG CHEN 'BRAS BU
THEG PA'I

SMIN GROL GYI LAM GYI RIM PA MA LUS PA LA GSAN SBYONG DPYID MO
PA'I LCAGS PHO

'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1820 LOR RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS

NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA TSAGS 'DZIN

LEGS PAR GNANG, DGUNG LO SO DRUG PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME
MO

KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1826 LOR SGO ME MCHOD RTEN SKES DGON PA'I
KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS 'DUL BA'I BCA' KHRIMS DANG BSHAD SGRUB BYA BA DAG

GTZANG GONG 'PHEL YONG BA'I DO DAM THUGS KHUR CHER BZHES MDZAD,

DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE
SPYI LO

1833 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS CHOS

SRID GNYIS KAR THABS MKHAS KYI SGO NAS GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL
BAR

BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS GDAN SA 'DI DANG, KHRI KA'I GONG BA

GRVA TSANG SOGS DGON SGRUB SDE DU MAR CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI SGO
NAS BSTAN

PA'I BYA BA RGYA CHEN POR MDZAD, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PAR
DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I

KHRI RABS BZHI BCU ZHE GNYIS PA DANG, SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN

RABS KHRI CHEN LNGA BCU NGA GNYIS PA YIN NO,,

(MTSAMS BCAD PA GRAGS PA BSOD NAMS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I LCAGS PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 124@1400 LOR 'DAN STOD GRONG KHYER TZONG NGUR YAB RDO RJE SENG GE'I
SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS KYU RA YIN, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA PHO BYI
LO

STE SPYI LO 1288 LOR 'BRI GUNG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BCU

GSUM PAR GCEN PO THOG KHA BA RIN CHEN SENG GE LAS RAB BYUNG
BSGRUBS

TE MTSAN LA GRAGS PA BSOD NAMS ZHES GSOL, DE NAS BKA'

BRGYUD GONG MA'I GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU

GSAN TE DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS, DGUNG

LO NYI SHU THAM PAR GCEN RIN PO CHE LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS MDZAD CING

'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG SOGS LA THOS BSAM MDZAD, SLAR YANG LO

BCU GSUM GYI RING DU SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS TE GRUB PA'I RTOGS PA

MNGON DU GYUR, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PAR 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB GLING
GI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS NAS LO NGO GSUM GYI RING DU CHOS SRID
GNYIS KYI

SGO NAS GDAN SA BSKYANGS TE SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS
PA

SGRUB PA'I BSTAN PA DAR BA MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE DGU PAR DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS SO, KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG BYANG CHUB
GLING GI

GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

(MTSO SNA BA SHES RAB BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS MGO TZAM DU

MON MTSO SNA'I THANG GRONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
BRGYAD PAR

ZANGS CHEN DGON DU BROS TE ZANGS CHEN DAR MA BSOD NAMS LAS

RAB TU BYUNG BA DANG TSIGS SNGA MA DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS TE
MTSAN

@1401 LA SHES RAB BZANG PO ZHES BTAGS, DE NAS ZANGS CHEN PA LA
BSTEN

TE BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG DRUG DANG, 'DUL BA LUNG SDE BZHI BCAS

LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG
BA'I

DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, YANG ZANGS CHEN PA LAS BYANG CHUB

LAM RIM GSAN NAS NYAMS SU BLANGS TE GDENG THOB PAR MDZAD,

ZANGS CHEN DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS GTZO BOR 'DUL

BA'I 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR BSKYANGS, DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON

CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO DON GNYIS PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS MCHOG TU GYUR

PA NI MON GRA PA TSUL KHRIMS BKRA SHIS YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM
NI

//'DUL BA MDO RTZA'I 'GREL BA LEGS BSHAD NYI MA'I 'OD ZER//
DANG,

//MDO RTZA'I MCHAN 'GREL//, //LAM RIM BSDUS DON// BCAS BZHUGS

SO, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS NYI SHU BA YIN NO,
KHONG

GI YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I MTSAN GZHAN LA KUN MKHYEN MTSO SNA BA
ZHES

ZHU'O, ,

(MTSO SMAN KHRI DKAR,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS
SHING

RGYAL PO ZA NAM ZIN LDE'I BTZUN MO DANG, RGYAL PO LDE 'PHRUL NAM

GZHUNG BTZAN GYI MA YUM YIN NO, ,

(MTSO SMAN 'BRONG MO,)

KHONG MO NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU SKU

@1402 'KHRUNGS SHING RGYAL PO 'BRONG ZHI LEGS KYI BTZUN MO DANG,
RGYAL PO THI

SHO LEGS KYI MA YUM YIN NO, ,

('TSO BYED RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SNYE
MO

KHUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YI GE'I
SBYOR

KLOG DANG THA SNYAD RIG GNAS LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DBUS

SU PHEBS TE LCAGS RI RIG BYED 'GRO PHAN GLING DU BZHUGS SHING
KARMA

'JIGS MED CHOS KYI SENG GE'I ZHABS PAD DU YUN RING BSTEN NAS

GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN

PA MDZAD, KARMA 'JIGS MED CHOS KYI SENG GE SKU GSHEGS KHAR SMAN

KHUG DANG SMAN DPE BCAS PA KHONG LA GNANG ZHING 'PHRIN LAS SHIN
TU

RGYAS PAR GYUR, SKABS SHIG TU 'BRUG PA RGYAL POS GDAN 'DREN

ZHUS PA LTAR 'BRUG YUL DU PHEBS TE 'BRUG PA RGYAL PO'I NAD GZHI

THAMS CAD 'JOMS PAR MDZAD PAS tAM DKAR STONG PHRAG KHA SHAS

DANG, 'BU RAS SNA TSOGS, 'BRUG GI, PHOR PA RDZAB YA SOGS

'BUL BA MANG PO BSNAMS NAS LHA SAR PHEBS, DE NAS TZA RI RONG
BSKOR

PHEBS SKABS GLO PA ZHIG NAD GZHI BCOS TE DUG SBRUL KLAD TIG CES
PA

YON DU PHUL, //BEE RO'I RNAM THAR 'DRA 'BAG CHEN MO//DANG,

//KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED GLING PA'I GSUNG 'BUM//DPAR DU BZHENGS

PA'I SBYIN BDAG MDZAD CING DPAR SHING LA ZHUS DAG BCAS RNAM DKAR

DGE BA'I LAS TSOGS MANG DU SPEL, SKU TSE'I SMAD DU BRAG YER PAR

@1403 BZHUGS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA BRTZON MUR DGUNG LO DRUG
CU RE

DRUG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, ,KHONG GI SLOB

MA GRAGS CHE BA NI MKHAS DBANG MKHYEN RAB NOR BU DANG, GUS KYI

PHA DKON MCHOG 'OD ZER GNYIS YIN NO, ,

('TSO SMAD MKHAN PO,)

KHONG NI SKA BA SH'AKYA DBANG PHYUG KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG MI

GCIG YIN PAS DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(MTSUNGS MED CHOS RJE,)

KHONG NI GUNG RU RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DE LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(MTSUNGS MED RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1424

LOR CHAG SKYAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA PHO RTA LO
STE SPYI LO

1498 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR GLANG 'KHOR

BA 'JAM DPAL LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING DGUNG LO DGU PAR MUS

SRAD KYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA ZHABS PAD BSTEN TE LO GSUM GYI BAR DU
CHOS

RJE YON TAN MGON PO LAS RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG SOGS GSAN,

DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BLA CHEN CHOS DPAL BZANG PO LAS LO DRUG GI

BAR DU RGYUD GSUM GYI GSAN SBYONG DANG SA SKYA'I GSUNG RAB SOGS

THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR NGAM RING DU

PHEBS TE RDO RJE 'CHANG A'A NAN TA MA TI LAS LO NAG DRIL GSUM
DANG,

@1404 'JIGS BYED RVA LUGS, PHAG MO SKOR GSUM, DBANG BKA' BCU

BDUN SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG

DANG NAM MKHA' LHUN GRUB BZANG PO SOGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS
SHING

BKA' CHOS ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR GUNG THANG DU PHEBS

NAS RGYAL MTSAN DKON MCHOG LAS GSUNG NGAG LAM SKOR DANG,

GSANG 'DUS MI BSKYOD LUGS KYI DBANG BKA' 'GOS LUGS, BSHAD

BKA' BO DONG LUGS NAG KHRID DMAR KHRID BCAS GSAN PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PAR SH'AKYA BHA DRA LAS DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I
DBANG

BSHAD MAN NGAG THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN, DGUNG

LO ZHE LNGA PAR BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DANG BDE CHEN RNAM
RGYAL

GRAGS BZANG LAS DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM LEGS PAR

ZHUS, DGUNG LO ZHE DGU PAR SA SKYAR PHEBS NAS SMAN GRONG DANG,

NYI THOG ZHE DGON SOGS SU BZHUGS TE ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO

BSKOR, DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG

LO DON LNGA PAR SA SKYA'I GRANG MO CHER DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS
SU

GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI 'JAM DBYANGS BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, CHOS RJE BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN, RTOGS

LDAN BLO GROS BZANG PO, DKA' BCU DKON MCHOG BZANG PO, CHEN

PO RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN, DBON PO NAM MKHA' RIN CHEN, BYANG

PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN, 'DZIM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN,

SHANGS PA KUN DGA' DPAL LDAN, RGYA GAR SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN,

@1405 BDAG PO BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN, 'DZIM PA KUN DGA' SNYING

PO, MUS CHEN RNAM RGYAL BZANG PO BCAS SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM

NI//RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG LAG LEN//DANG, //SPYI 'GRO GSAL BYED RNAM

BZHI//, //BLA MA 'PHAGS PA//, //BLA MA DAM PA//, //PHYAG

LEN//, //BKA' SGRUB//STE SGRUB PA RNAM BZHI, //BIR SRUNGS

'KHRUL SEL// SOGS 'KHRUL SEL RNAM BZHI, //CHU RGYUN RNAM BZHI//

SOGS MANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

(MTSUR STON DBANG GI RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

DOL MDA' LA YAB SNGAGS PA MTHU CHEN ZHIG GI SRAS SU SKU
'KHRUNGS,

GDUNG RUS MTSUR ('TSUR) YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS

DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN LCE PA'I MDUN DU PHEBS TE DKA' BA DU MA
SPYAD

NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD, DUS PHYIS SU SKU BSOD RGYAS TE 'BUM
BZHENGS

PA'I YIG MKHAN LA DA LTA GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I GDAMS PA SU CHE DRIS

PAS LHO BRAG MAR PA CHE ZER, DE NAS DAD PA TSAD MED SKYES TE LHO

BRAG BRO BO LUNG DU BYON NAS RJE MAR PA'I BKA' LUNG LTAR MTHU
MDZAD DE

SKU DGRA MAR PA MON NAG BTUL, GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I RGYUD DANG

GDAMS NGAG MANG DU ZHUS, DUS PHYIS SU RJE MAR PA MTSUR GYI DOL
MDA'

LA SPYAN DRANGS NAS CHOS RIM LNGA'I MAN NGAG DANG RGYUD RKYANG
GI BSHAD

PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PA ZHUS, SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LEGS PAR MDZAD,

KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI KHAMS PA RO MNYAM RDO RJE DANG,
'KHON

@1406 GAD PA K'IRTI, 'CHES STON BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN BCA YIN, ,

KHONG NI RJE MAR PA CHOS KYI BLO GROS KYI KA CHEN BZHI LAS SHAR
GYI KA CHEN

YIN NO, ,

(MTSUR STON DPYIG GI RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD
YUL

NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD CING, DE NAS KHA CHE DANG, BAL YUL,

RGYA GAR SOGS SU PHEBS TE PAn GRUB MANG PO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS
SHING

MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA
MDZAD

PA DANG, LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA YANG BYANG ZHING CHUB PA MDZAD
NAS

BSTAN BCOS GCIG BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR

RTZOM NI//BSTAN 'GYUR// LAS //KYE'I RDO RJE'I 'GREL BA// SLOB
DPON

PADMA'I MYU GU RDO RJES MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,

(MTSUR SHES RAB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU MDO SMAD

YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI THOG MA'I LTA BA NI CIG CAR 'JUG

BA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA ZHES BYA BA DGE BA'I PHYOGS CI YANG MI BYED
PA'I LOG

RTOG GI LTA BA 'DZIN MKHAN ZHIG YIN YANG, DE'U TSA'I MTSO RGYUD
RMA

LUNG RDO RJE'I BRAG DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON DU BZHUGS PA'I
BLA CHEN

DGONGS PA RAB GSAL (953-1035) GYI MTSAN SNYAN GSAN TE

DAN TIG SHEL GYI YANG DGON DU BYON NAS BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB

@1407 GSAL LAS 'DUL BA GSAN PAS SNGAR KHONG NYID KYI CIG CAR
'JUG PA'I

SPYOD LAM DE LTA BU LA NGO GNONG ZHING SEMS 'GYOD NAS TSUL BZHIN
DU BLA

CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL GYI DRUNG DU RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING,
'DUL

BA'I BSTAN PA MDO KHAMS SMAD NAS DAR BA MDZAD PAR PHYAG RJES
CHEN

PO ZHIG BZHAG YOD PA YIN, KHONG NI BLA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL

GYI GRAGS CHE BA'I SLOB MA BCU'I YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

@1408 /JA/

(DZ'A YA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1642

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE
SPYI LO

1708 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BZHI PAR 'DUL 'DZIN

BLO GROS RGYA MTSO LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG LO
LNGA BA

NAS BCU YI BAR SLOB DPON SHES RAB RIN CHEN LAS 'JIGS BYED

DANG, GDUGS DKAR, GSANG 'DUS SOGS THUGS 'DZIN

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE RGYAL DBANG

LNGA BA CHEN PO LAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, GLING STOD ZHABS
DRUNG

BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS SPYOD 'JUG DANG, GSO RIG RTZA RGYUD SOGS

KYI LUNG ZHUS, DE NAS GTZANG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR ZHUGS NAS DKA'

CHEN NAM MKHA' BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAR BSTEN TE TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL

YONGS RDZOGS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD CING RTZOD PA LA'ANG MKHAS PA
GYUR,

DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR RGYAL DBANG LNGA BA CHEN PO LAS BSNYEN
RDZOGS

ZHUS SHING MTSAN LA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS ZHES GNANG, KHONG GIS

@1409 RGYAL DBANG LNGA PA CHEN PO DANG, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS
RGYAN, KHYAB

BDAG DGE 'DUN DON GRUB, SLOB DPON 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA,

DGA' LDAN KHRI PA BLO BZANG DON YOD SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN
MANG

DU BSTEN NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM DPYIS PHYIN
PA

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PAR SOG YUL DU PHEBS TE GDUL BYA

RNAMS SMIN PAR MDZAD, KHONG SOG YIG LA MKHAS PAR GYUR PAS

CHOS BKA' MANG PO SOG YIG TU BSGYUR BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE

BDUN PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS SO, ,KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI//SKYE BA SNGA PHYI'I BRTAG PA BSTAN BCOS DNGUL
DKAR ME

LONG//DANG, //DON RGYAN SO LNGA'I DPER BRJOD TSANGS SRAS DGYES

PA'I GLU DBYANGS//, //YI GE'I BSTAN BCOS MDOR BSDUS// BCAS

CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO BZHI LONGS PA'I POD LNGA BZHUGS SO, ,

(RTZVA? DE BA GHO shA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI SKABS SU SNYAN
GRAGS

CAN GYI LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN NO, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI//BSTAN
'GYUR//

LAS//BYANG CHUB KYI LTUNG BA BSHAGS PA'I 'GREL BA// BCAS BZHUGS

SO, ,

(RDZA DPAL SPRUL AO RGYAN 'JIGS MED CHOS KYI DBANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO
1808

LOR KHAMS SDE DGE'I YUL GYI BYE BRAG RDZA CHU KHAR SKU 'KHRUNGS,
RA@1410 BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1887 LOR
SKU GSHEGS,

KHONG SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NAS GRUB BRGYA'I GTZUG RGYAN RIG
'DZIN BYANG

CHUB RDO RJE'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN LA AO RGYAN 'JIGS
MED

CHOS KYI DBANG PO ZHES GSOL, SKU NA CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS THEG
PA CHEN

PO'I RIGS SAD CING SKYES THOB KYI MKHYEN PA THOG MED MNGA' BAS
SLOB

DPON GYIS JI SKAD GSUNGS PA THAMS CAD TSEGS MED DU MKHYEN,

RIS MED DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG DU BSTEN NAS RIG PA'I GNAS

CHE CHUNG KUN LA MKHYEN PA'I KLONG BRDOL, GANGS CAN MKHAS
DBANG

KUN GYI GTZUG RGYAN DU GYUR, BLA MA GONG MA RDZA DPAL DGE BSAM
GTAN

PHUN TSOGS KYI RTOGS PA RGYUD LA 'PHOS PAS NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD
PAR

CAN THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS, SNYIGS DUS KYI GRUB THOB YONGS KYI
RGYAL POR

GYUR, DE LTA BU MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI SKYES CHEN DAM PA
'DIS

CHER RLOM DANG KHENGS DREGS GTAN NAS MED PAR PHYI TSUL PHAL
PAR

MDZAD CING, GSUNG RTZOM MANG CHE BAR RTZOM PA PO'I MING THO
BKOD

MED LA, GSUNG RTZOM 'GA' ZHIG LA MJUG BYANG DU MING THO 'KHOD
PA

RNAMS KYANG DPER NA, "KHYI RGAN DPAL DGE" ZHES PA SOGS RANG

NYID DMAN SAR 'DZIN PA'I MING THO KHO NAR 'KHOD, KHONG GIS
MDZAD

PA'I BRTZAMS CHOS TSANG MA BRDA RNYING DANG MNGON BRJOD MANG
PO MED

CING TSIG SNYAN 'JEBS DANG LDAN PA, BLTAS PA TZAM GYIS DON

GSAL BAR GO NUS PA, NGO BSTOD DANG ZOL ZOG GI TSIG GTAN NAS
MED

CING, TSIG NYUNG ZHING DON 'DUS PA DANG, DKOR RDZAS LA RNGAM

@1411 ZHING LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN CI'ANG MED PA'I BLA RDZUN
CHEN POR RLOM PA

DAG LA ZUR ZA'I TSIG DAG NI KHAB LTAR RNO ZHING GNAD 'PHIGS
PA'I

RANG BZHIN YOD, MA RABS KYI SPYOD NGAN LA RGOL ZHING, YA RABS

KYI SPYOD PA LA BSTOD PA DANG, GA-YO SGYU SPANGS TE DRANG PO
BYA RGYU 'DI

NI MI CHOS KYI MCHOG YIN PAR GSUNGS SO, KHONG NI NANG NYAMS
RTOGS

KYI DROD TSAD SHIN TU MTHON POR GYUR KYANG, PHYI TSUL THOG
RANG GI

YON TAN LA MNGON RLOM CUNG ZAD MED PAR SBAS SHING, RANG NYID

LA DMAN PA'I 'DU SHES KYIS DMA' SAR KHO NAR 'DZIN PAS GZUR

BOR GNAS PA'I MKHAS PA KUN GYIS BSNGAGS BRJOD THOB, KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI DRIS LAN DANG, CHOS 'BYUNG, RNAM BSHAD, RTZIS

GZHUNG, MDZOD DANG DBU MA, MNGON RTOGS RGYAN, RGYUD BLA

MA'I BSDUS DON SA BCAD, SEMS KHRID LAM RIM KUN BZANG BLA MA'I

ZHAL LUNG BCAS PO TI DRUG BZHUGS SO, ,

(RDZONG DKAR 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO
1861

LOR MDO SMAD GA-YU RNGOG TU RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA'I YAB
YUM

GYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO KHYI
LO STE SPYI LO

1922 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR
SKU GONG MA'I

GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL ZHING AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO

LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR GDAN SA RANG NAS SKYA SER

RNAMS LA DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I KHRID GNANG BAS KUN GYI DAD
PA DAG

@1412 SNANG GI YUL DU GYUR, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR RONG BO THOS
BSAM

GLING GI GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE, BSDUS GRVA NAS GZHUNG CHEN
DAG LA THOS

BSAM DPYID PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM
RGYAL

GLING GI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS SHING 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD
DANG, CHOS

'CHAD NYAN, RTEN BRTEN PA GSAR BZHENGS BCAS KYI THAD LA DO

DAM GANG LEGS GNANG, KHRI ZUR NAS RI KHROD DAG TU BZHUGS TE

SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, KHONG NI RDZONG

DKAR SKU PHRENG LNGA BA YIN LA, RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL
GLING GI

GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS NGA GCIG PA YIN NO, ,

(RDZONG DKAR 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1804

LOR AA RIG CHU STOD MA'I MTSAMS SKYOR TSOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG

BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1859 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO BDUN PAR GTZANG SGAR DU KAD KOR SPRUL BA'I SKU BSTAN

'DZIN CHOS RGYA MTSO LAS RAB TU BYUNG, GUNG THANG RIN PO CHES
RDZONG

DKAR SPRUL SKUR THUGS THAG BCAD, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR RONG

BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS RIGS PA
SMRA BA

CHOS DAR RGYAS DANG, SHING BZA' PAndI TA, DRUNG YIG BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS SLOB GNYER GYI ZHOR DU BKA'
CHOS

MANG PO GSAN, RONG BO RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA LO GSUM DU BZHUGS,

DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE SGO MANG MKHAN PO
NGAG

@1413 DBANG TSUL KHRIMS DANG, HOR BLO BZANG MGON PO, RGYAL
SRAS

BLO BZANG BSTAN GRAGS, GUNG RU BLO GROS BSTAN PA SOGS BLA MA
BCU

PHRAG KHA SHAS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE MDO RGYUD KYI GZHUNG LA
ZHIB DPYOD

LEGS PAR GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA BAR TSE CHOG BSAM GTAN

GLING DU LHA RTZE YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,
PHAR

PHYIN DAM BCA' BZHAG STE PHYIR 'BYON KHAR GZHUNG SA NAS SU
TZIG THU

AER DHE NOM CHI'I CHO LO DANG, BKA' SHOG THAM GA GRU SGOR,
MKHAN

CHAS CHA TSANG BCAS GNANG, DE NAS MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE DBAL

MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DANG, 'DAN MA DPAL LDAN THUB

BSTAN RGYA MTSO, KHRI SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE SOGS
LAS

CHOS RGYUN MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER DGU BA RAB BYUNG BCU
BZHI

PA'I CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1832 LOR RONG BO THOS BSAM
GLING GI

BSKYANGS, KHONG GIS GRVA TSANG LA RNAM 'GREL 'DZIN GRVA ZUR DU
PHYES SHING

RTA NAG DGE 'DUN BLO BZANG GI MTHA' DPYOD STENG NAS RTZOD PA
CHA TSANG

NGES PAR MDZAD DGOS KYI BKA' LTAR MTHA' DPYOD KYI DPAR DANG

BCAS PA GRVA TSANG LA BZHAG MDZAD, DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON
CHEN

LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA DRUG PAR DGONGS PA
CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING
GI

GDAN SA'I KHRI RABS SO GNYIS PA YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI
//RJE'I

RNAM THAR// DANG, //RONG BO'I GDAN RABS//, //DBU PHAR

@1414 SDOM TSIG// SOGS BZHUGS SO, ,

(RDZONG DKAR MA nIB BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO

1695 LOR RJE SHES RAB BKRA SHIS KYI RIGS DBON DU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1738 LOR
SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS TSUL KHRIMS BKRA
SHIS

KYI YANG SPRUL DU THAG BCAD, KHU CHEN SHES RAB BKRA SHIS LAS
RAB

TU BYUNG ZHING RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING NAS SLOB
GNYER GNANG,

DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI
CHOS SGOR

ZHUGS NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD,

PHYIR MDO SMAD RANG YUL DU PHEBS TE KHRI SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI
MA LAS RDOR

PHRENG GI DBANG DANG, CHU DMAR BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS BKA'
'GYUR,

GA-YER GSHONG 'JAM DBYANGS BLO GROS LAS BKA' CHOS MANG DU
GSAN,

KHYAD PAR DU KHU CHEN SHES RAB BKRA SHIS LAS GDAMS NGAG BUM PA
GANG

BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN ZHING BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, KHU CHEN GYI PHYAG
SROL

LTAR YIG DRUG GI 'PHRIN LAS SPEL ZHING RDZONG DKAR LEGS SKYONG
MDZAD,

KA RING BKRA SHIS DAR RGYAS GLING GI DGON MGO PHUL BA ZHAL
GYIS BZHES

TE BCA' YIG GSAR 'JOG MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME

MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1717 LOR RONG BO THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL
GLING GI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO BCO LNGA'I RING DU 'CHAD NYAN

BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DANG, SHEL

@1415 DGON, TSA RGYAL SOGS RDZONG DKAR DANG KHYAD MED DU
SKYONG MUR DGUNG

LO BZHI BCU ZHE BZHI BAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,
KHONG

NI RONG BO DGON GYI THOS BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I
MKHAN

RABS BRGYAD PA YIN NO, ,

(RDZONG DKAR LUNG RTOGS GTER CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO
1739

LOR MDO SMAD MDO BA'I YO LAG TU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU
GSUM

PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1803 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG

LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG MA'I GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL ZHING
KHRI

SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI MA LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA
LA

SHIN TU MKHAS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SGO MANG KLU 'BUM
KHANG

TSAN DANG BIS MDO'I MI TSAN NYIS 'DZIN GYIS BZHUGS SA LCANG
SKYA RA

SKOR BYAS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS TSOGS CHEN GYI BLA MAR MDZAD CING,
RGYAL

BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO LAS GSUNG CHOS MANG DU THOB CING
GZHUNG

BKA' POD LNGA LA ZHIB SBYANGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR
PAn

CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DBUS GTZANG NAS

GSANG CHEN BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR MNGA' GSOL, RGYAL BA 'JAM

DPAL RGYA MTSOS SU TZUG THU AER TE NI NO MIN HAN ZHES PA'I
MTSAN LUNG

DANG BKA' SHOG GDUGS RTA DAR, RGYA GLING CHA, SKU GSUNG

THUGS RTEN, NA BZA' SNAM GOS BCAS KYI BDAG RKYEN DANG, GZHUNG

SA CHEN PO SOGS NAS BKUR BZO CHEN PO BYAS, PHYIR RANG YUL DU

@1416 PHEBS TE SBRA NAG KHA GSUM GYI DMAG MANG POS ZI LING LA
GTZES SKABS

KHONG GIS THABS MKHAS KYIS CHINGS YIG MDZAD DE ZHI BAR BYAS
PAS

TZONG 'DU DANG AAM BHAN GNYIS KYIS GONG MA CHEN POR ZHU 'BUL
BTEGS

DON LTAR KHONG LA BKA' SHOG GSER 'BRUG BRGYAD KYIS BSKOR BA

GNANG, PE CIN PHO BRANG DU BYON SKABS JUN GAN YA MON NAS MA nI

BLA MA HO THOG THU ZHES PA'I CHO LO DANG, GSER THAM GRU SGOR,
GSER

'BRUG BDUN GYIS BTEGS PA'I PAD RAG GI TOG GOS CHEN YUG

GNYIS, BYU RU'I LAS PHRENG, LAS LVA BCAS GNANG, PHO

BRANG CHEN PO PE CIN NAS ZANGS MA KHAL CHEN BDUN BZO BO MI
LNGA BCAS

GDAN DRANGS TE 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS THOG TSAD PHYED DANG

GNYIS YOD PA RIN PO CHE PHRA TSOM GYIS SPRAS PA KHRI RGYAB YOL
DANG BCAS

LEGS PAR SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS PA MDZAD,

RGYA BOD HOR GSUM GYIS GTZUG TU BKUR BA'I BLA CHEN ZHIG YIN,
DGUNG

LO RE BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI
RDZONG

DKAR SKU PHRENG GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

(RDZONG BA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I CHU PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1382
LOR SA

SKYA'I MTHONG SMON BLA BRANG DU YAB DPON PO NOR 'PHEL GYI SRAS
SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS ZHANG YIN, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I ME PHO

STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1446 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA
PAR

BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS,

@1417 DGUNG LO BCU PAR SHAR PA YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN LAS DGE
TSUL BSGRUBS

SHING MTSAN LA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO NYI
SHU

THAM PAR THEG CHEN CHOS RJE KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS DANG SHAR PA YE
SHES

RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, PO DONG AER PHEBS NAS

TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL SOGS LA SHIN TU BYANG BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO

BCU GSUM PAR GDAN SA CHEN POR GRVA SKOR MDZAD, GA-YAG PHRUG

SANGS RGYAS DPAL BA LAS PHAR PHYIN GSAN ZHING LEGS PAR MKHYEN,

THEG CHEN CHOS RJE KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS LAS GSUNG NGAG SOGS ZAB

RGYAS KYI GDAMS PA DANG, ZHANG BLA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN, SA 
BZANG GZHON NU BLO GROS, BLA MA DPAL LDAN DON GRUB SOGS LAS

RGYUD SDE'I MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA GSAN PAS GSANG SNGAGS ZAB
MO'I

BDAG POR GYUR, DE NAS NGAM RING GI CHOS SDE DANG, YA GA CHOS

SDINGS, SLOB BSHAD NOR BU'I GLING GI GRVA TSANG, RDZONG PA
SOGS

SU PHEBS TE MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD NAS BZHUGS
MUR

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI SNGAGS 'CHANG A'A NAN TA PA
DANG, BDAG

CHEN DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG, SEMS DPA' GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG

MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG BCAS YIN NO, ,

(MDZE SMAD BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN 'DZIN YAR RGYAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I THOG MA'I ME MO YOS LO STE
SPYI LO

1927 LOR MDO KHAMS KHUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, DA LTA (1991)

@1418 RGYA GAR DU 'TSO BZHUGS MDZAD, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG
NGU'I DUS NAS

MDZE SMAD SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG STE KHRI 'DZON MDZAD, YI
GE'I

SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA BYANG BA MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS
SU

PHEBS TE DGA' LDAN SHAR RTZE GRVA TSANG DU CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD
CING GZHUNG

CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA SLOB GNYER MDZAD, KHRI BYANG BLO BZANG
YE SHES

SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU PHRAG KHA SHAS LA BSTEN NAS MDO

SNGAGS CHOS KYI DBANG LUNG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA
PAR

RANG GI RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA
BZHES,

DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR
MDZAD

CING LHA RAMS PA'I DAM BCA' GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR LHA

SA SLOB CHUNG AANG DANG PO'I DGE RGAN MDZAD NAS 'CHAD NYAN
SPEL, DE

NAS RGYA GAR PHEBS TE BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN SGRUB BZHIN
BZHUGS,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //'JAM DPAL DGYES PA'I GTAM GYIS RGOL
NGAN

PHYE MAR 'THAG PA REG GCOD RAL GRI'I 'PHRUL 'KHOR// ZHES PA
POD

GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

(MDZOD DGE DKON MCHOG DAM CHOS YAR 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO
1719

LOR MDO SMAD MDZOD DGE SMAD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL,

KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG PAR LHA KHANG LUNG PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO
LAS RAB TU

BYUNG ZHING DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR KUN MKHYEN 'JIGS MED DBANG PO
LAS

DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, DE NAS SKU GONG MA BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO BZANG
NYI

@1419 MA'I SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG STE RGYAL MO BSAM GRUB
GLING GI GDAN

SAR BKOD, LHA KHANG LUNG PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO DANG MDZOD DGE
RI

KHROD DBANG BO RNAM GNYIS LA BSTEN NAS THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I
DBANG

LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR GUNG
THANG

'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING BKA' CHOS GSAN,

LO DER DBUS SU PHEBS TE RGYAL PAn RNAM GNYIS DANG, RGYAL SRAS

RIN PO CHE, SA CHEN DBANG SDUD SNYING PO SOGS LA MJAL ZHING
CHOS

'BREL ZHUS, RIG GNAS THAMS CAD DANG LHAG PAR DU SNYAN NGAG LA

MKHAS PAS SMRA BA'I DBANG POR GYUR, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU'I NANG
NAS

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM
NI//GUNG

THANG 'JAM PA'I DBYINGS KYI RTOGS BRJOD CHOS DUNG
DKAR PO'I SGRA

DBYANGS,// SNYAN NGAG GI //DON RGYAN SO LNGA'I DPER BRJOD//,
//BLA

MCHOD ZIN BRIS// BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(MDZOD DGE 'DUN DPAL BZANG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO

1731 LOR MDO SMAD BZHAG SDOM DPON RGYUD DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1809 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL
DU PHEBS

'DUN RNAL MAR YOD RUNG THOG TU MA KHEL, DGUNG LO SUM CUR NYE

SKABS RANG YUL GYI BYANG MJAL PA 'GA' DANG 'GROGS NAS BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS TE CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DBYAR THOG PHAL
CHER@1420 DZA

LA ZVA TSOD BSKOL NAS BZHES PA SOGS SROG 'TSO BA TZAM GYI MTHUN
RKYEN

LA BRTEN ZHING TSOGS CHOS 'GRIMS, GZHUNG CHEN RNAMS LA THOS BSAM

NAN TAN DU MDZAD CING RDO RAMS PA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG LEGS

BSHAD SNYING PO DANG, YIG CHA'I DBU PHAR YONGS RDZOGS, DRANG

NGES RNAM 'BYED CHEN MO, LAM RIM CHEN MO, RNAM BSHAD DGONGS

PA RAB GSAL, LCANG SKYA'I GRUB MTHA' RNAMS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD,

DE NAS RGYUD GRVAR ZHUGS TE GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG CHO GA
PHYAG LEN

BCAS LA SBYANGS PAS SNGAGS KYI DAM BCA' LEGS PAR THON, DBUS

SU PHEBS TE BLO GSAL MANG POR DPE KHRID GNANG, KLONG RDOL BLA MA

LA YANG CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, DE NAS MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE BLA BRANG
BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG KHRIR BZHUGS TE
'CHAD

NYAN BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS KIRTI'I KHRI YANG BSKYANGS, DGUNG LO

DON BRGYAD PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA

BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI RABS NYER GNYIS PA
YIN NO, ,

('DZAM GLING CHOS KYI RGYAL PO,)

KHONG NI 'BRI GUNG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE LA

GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

('DZENGS SGOM DHARMA BI DHI,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1052

LOR YAB BKRA SHIS GA-YUNG DRUNG DANG, YUM 'TSAR DGU BZA' SKYID

DE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA PHO
BYI LO

@1421 DZA

STE SPYI LO 1168 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BRGYAD KYI BAR
DU

ZHANG PO'I DRUNG DU BZHUGS SHING KLOG YIG LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DE
NAS

DAM PA RGYA GAR DANG MJAL ZHING YI GE DRUG PA'I GDAMS NGAG ZHUS
TE

BSGRUBS PA MDZAD PAS BYIN RLABS THUN MONG MA YIN PA BYUNG, DE

NAS DBUS SU BYON TE AA KHU DPAL 'BAR DANG, SNUBS SHANGS PO

CHE, BA RI LO TZ'A BA BCAS LA BSTEN NAS KHRAG 'THUNG LA SOGS
PA'I

GSANG SGRUB MANG DU ZHUS, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA LNGA PAR SBA SGOM
YE

SHES BYANG CHUB DANG MJAL NAS RDO RJE ZAM PA'I GDAMS NGAG ZHUS,
YU

MO BA LAS DUS 'KHOR GYI SBYOR DRUG ZHUS, DE NAS DBU RUR BYON TE

LHA RJE SNYI SGOM LAS CHOS DRUG DANG SKYES SBYOR, LAB SGRON LAS
GCOD

YUL, DGE BSHES DGROL SGOM LAS N'A RO THABS LAM BCAS ZHUS

PAS RTOGS PA KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS TE DPA' BO 'DZENG CHUNG ZHES

MTSAN THOGS, KHONG GIS SKU TSE GANG BOR BLA MA RNAMS LA BSTEN
NAS

ZHABS TOG LEGS PAR PHUL ZHING DKA' THUB KYANG SHIN TU MDZAD,

CHOS THAMS CAD LA NANG BYAN TSUD CING DGONGS PA NAM MKHA' BZHIN

DU 'DRES, DON THAMS CAD SPROS BRAL RNAM DAG LA SONG STE YI DAM
LHA

YIS ZHAL GZIGS SHING MNGON PAR SHES PA'I RTOGS PA 'KHRUNGS,
SNYAN

BRGYUD RDO RJE ZAM PA'I GDAMS NGAG 'DI 'DZENG SGOM KHONG GI RING
LA

DAR RGYAS CHEN PO BYUNG BA YIN, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN
LEGS

PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO BRGYA DANG BCU BDUN PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI RDO RJE ZAM PA'I GDAMS NGAG LA NANG

@1422 DZA

BYAN TSUD PA'I GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I SLOB DPON CHEN PO ZHIG
YIN,

KHONG NI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI SLOB DPON KUN BZANG DANG,
'DZENG

JO SRAS, MYANG DHARMA SIDHA, SLOB DPON GSER LUNG PA, BLA MA

NGU RDO RJE RGYAN, GZIG YE SHES DBANG PO, GA-YAG STON ZLA BA 'OD

ZER BCAS YIN NO, ,

('DZENG DBANG PHYUG RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG MA TSUGS GONG GI ME PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1016 LOR KHAMS PHYOGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I CHU
PHO

KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1082 LOR RVA SGRENG DU SKU GSHEGS, KHAMS NAS
BYON

TE SLOB DPON NYAN TSOR MJAL ZHING CHOS RNAMS LEGS PAR GSAN,

DE NAS JO BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA'I SKU MDUN DU PHEBS TE JO
BO RJE LA

DAR YUG BRGYA PHUL ZHING SGOM GYI GDAMS PA THAMS CAD RDZOGS PAR

ZHUS, SGOM PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS GEGS MANG PO BYUNG BA YANG

RANG SHUGS KYIS BAG LA ZHA, RTOGS PA MTHO POR GYUR NAS MNGON

PAR SHES PA RGYA CHEN PO MNGA', KHONG GIS RLUNG BZUNG STE BA SBU
YANG

MI 'GUL BAR ZHAG GSUM TZAM BZHUGS PAS SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS 'DAS

ZIN SNYAM PA LA KOG GIS BZHENGS TE, KHO BO KHAMS CUNG ZHIG MA
BDE

BAS RLUNG BZUNG BA YIN GSUNGS, MNGON PAR SHES PA YANG BRDZU

BAR MI MDZAD PAR GZHAN LA GSAL POR GSUNGS PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SA PHO RTA LO
STE SPYI LO

1078 LOR RVA SGRENG DGON PA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS SHING LO NGO LNGA'I

@1423 DZA

RING DU DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, DE NAS BSTAN

'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB CING DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA BDUN
PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA

NI SNE'U ZUR BA YE SHES 'BAR DANG, ZHANG KA MA BA, GNYAN SNA

MO BA, 'BRE KO DE LUNG BA, KHA RAG SGOM CHUNG, STON PA YON

TAN 'BAR, SGOM PA RIN CHEN BLA MA, AA MES SMAN RGAN BCAS

YIN, KHONG NI RVA SGRENG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

@1424

/WA/

(WANG KUN DGA' LEGS PA,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG NI WANG

GRAGS PA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI YAB YUM GCIG PA'I GCUNG PO YIN, KHONG

GSUNG RAB LA SBYANGS PA MA SMAD PA MDZAD DE RTZED THANG GI GDAN
SAR

PHEBS, RTOGS PA'I YON TAN PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I GRUB PA'I DBANG

PHYUG CHEN PO ZHIG YIN YANG GNAS SKABS SU SKYE BO RNAMS KYI
SNANG NGOR

MDZAD SGO LEGS PA MA BYUNG, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO GLANG
LO

STE SPYI LO 1445 LOR PHO BRANG SNE'U GDONG GI GSER KHRIR PHEBS,

T'A MING GONG MA CHEN PO MING SHA'AN CUNG GIS HRAN HVA WANG ZHES
PA'I CHO

LO 'JA' SA GNANG, DE NAS KHONG GIS PHYOGS RE BA'I GTAM LA

GSAN NAS YAB YUM NANG MTSAMS SU MI MTHUN PA'I 'GAL RKYEN MANG

PO BYUNG, YAR GONG BYA BA BSAM SDE BA SOGS KYIS BDAG MO'I PHYOGS

SU LANGS, SNE'U 'OL DGA' RNAMS KHONG GI PHYOGS SU LANGS NAS

DUS MI BDE BA YANG YANG BYUNG, DE NAS SRID DBANG BZUNG BA STABS
MA

BDE NAS RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1455
LOR SDE

@1425 WA

SRID GI GO GNAS CHOS RJE NGAG GI DBANG PO LA PHUL, CHAB SRID LO
NGO

DGU LA BSKYANGS, KHONG NI PHAG GRU SDE SRID KHRI RABS BDUN PA
YIN, ,

(WANG KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1308
LOR RE

MDA' LA YAB BDAG CHEN BZANG PO DPAL BA DANG, YUM LHA GCIG

NYI MA RIN CHEN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DRUG
PA'I ME

PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1336 LOR SRAD KYI CHA LUNG DU SKU GSHEGS,

SNOD LDAN

GYI GDUL BYA RNAMS LA DAM PA'I PHA CHOS KYIS DGA' STON RGYA CHEN
POR

BSTZAL BAS DAD LDAN BU SLOB MANG DU BYUNG, YON RGYAL RABS KYI
GONG MA

YONGS SU RDZOGS PA GSAN, DE NAS BLA CHEN BSOD NAMS BLO GROS

DANG, RGYAL BA BRAG PHUG PA, MNYAM MED CHEN PO SOGS LA BSTEN

BCAS PA GNANG, GDAN SA CHEN PO DANG STAG TSANG RDZONG KHA SOGS

BCO LNGA PAR BSDUS GRVA'I TSOGS RGYUGS PHUL, BLO RIGS DANG,
RTAGS

RIGS, GRUB MTHA', DON BDUN CU SOGS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD,

DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED

RGYA MTSO LAS DGE TSUL DANG DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA DKYUS GCIG TU
BZHES

TE MTSAN LA BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO ZHES GSOL, DE NAS BZUNG 'DUL BA

LUNG SDE BZHI LA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD DE BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN DU
GYUR,

LO DE'I DGUN CHOS LA TSOGS BSAGS RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN

BTAGS GNANG, DGUNG LO SUM CU PAR THU'U BKVAN MCHOG SPRUL

RIN PO CHE'I YONGS 'DZIN DU PE CIN LA PHEBS, DE NAS YAR PHEBS

TE, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PAR DGON LUNG DU BYON NAS LO GNYIS RING

ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PA NAS LO

BDUN TZAM RING GONG SA SKYABS MGON MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHER MTSAN

NYID GSAN SBYONG GI ZHABS 'DEBS ZHUS, DE NAS SNGON RJES SU DGON

LUNG LA THENGS GSUM DU PHEBS NAS THU'U HO THOG THU BLO BZANG
BSHAD

MTSO,

SUM PA MKHAN CHEN SOGS BLA SPRUL MANG PO'I GTZOS TSOGS YONGS LA
CHOS

KYI SBYIN PA RGYA CHEN BSTZAL, DGUNG LO RE BRGYAD PAR GDAN SAR
PHEBS

SNGAGS

@1451 ZHA

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SRID RTZER BSGRENGS BA'I 'CHAD NYAN
MDZAD,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI RTOGS BRJOD DANG, LAM RIM GYI BSHAD
LUNG,

SA LAM RNAM GZHAG SGRUB THABS, KHRID YIG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR,

BSLAB BYA BCAS CHOS TSAN BDUN CU DON DGU YOD PA PO TI BZHIR

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1149 LOR

RDZOGS CHEN RONG LUGS KYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS LEGS PAR GSAN, DGUNG

@1476 ZHA

LO BCU DRUG PAR BLA CHEN YON TAN GZUNGS KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS TE

KUN BYED MDO BCU DANG, SEMS SDE'I RTZA BA BCO BRGYAD,

RNAL 'BYOR RIG PA'I NYI MA, BSAM GTAN MIG GI SGRON MA, GDAR

SHA DANG GZER BU, RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I ZHUS LAN LA SOGS SGOM YIG
PHAL

CHER, SNYAN BRGYUD SKOR LUGS RONG LUGS KHAMS LUGS LA SOGS

PA BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA GSAN TE THOS BSAM GYI SGRO 'DOGS CHOD
PAR

MDZAD, DE NAS 'UG SKAD DGON PA DANG, SE SBRAG CHOS BCAS

BZUNG STE SKU BSOD SHIN TU RGYAS SHING THUGS DGONGS NAM MKHA'
LTA BU

LA THUGS RJE'I NYI ZLA LTA BUR SHAR NAS SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PAS
PHYOGS

MTSAMS THAMS CAD DU KHYAB CING, GDUL BYA'I TSOGS BSAM GYIS

MI KHYAB PA 'DUS TE BLA MA'I ZHABS TOG DANG 'GRO BA'I DON RGYA
CHEN LA

DPAG TU MED PA MDZAD, SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD PAS RDZOGS CHEN

RANG SNANG RIS MED KYI DGONGS PA SHAR NAS SA RDO RI BRAG THAMS
CAD LA

THOGS MED DU BYON NUS PA BYUNG, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN SOGS SHIN

TU MANG PO BZHENGS PA MDZAD CING SEMS CAD DBUL ZHING PHONGS PA

TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE MDO SNGAGS

LU

(ZHVA LU BA LEGS PA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1375

PHO RTA

MDO

SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA MI DMAN PAS DBU MDZAD

YUN RING DU MDZAD, DE NAS RJE RTZO NGA KHA CHEN PO'I ZHABS LA
BSTEN

TE DGA' LDAN DGON PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD PA NAS BZUNG DBU MDZAD

GNANG, SKABS SHIG LA 'PHYONGS RGYAS PA HOR DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN

PAS GDAN DRANGS TE RGYA KHAB BTZA PA DMAG DPUNG DU MTHONG BA'I
SPRUL

GNANG, SKABS SHIG LA 'PHYONGS RGYAS PA HOR DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN

PAS DGAN DRANGS TE RGYA KHAB RTZAR PA DMAG DPUNG DU MTHONG BA'I
SPRUL

BAS HOR RDO RJE TSE BRTAN 'KHRUNGS TE RI BO BDE CHEN 'DEBS PA
SOGS

@1511 ZA

MTSAN LA DAR MA BSOD NAMS ZHES GSOL, MKHAN PO DE NYID LAS

CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA LEGS PAR BSLABS SHING THUGS SU CHUD PAR

MDZAD, GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA YANG THOS BSAM DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD

CING SDE SNOD GSUM LA MKHAS PAR BSLABS, MKHAN PO DAR YE BA

SOGS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DE NAS

LHA 'GRO BA'I MGON PO BYANG CHUB 'OD (1186-1259) KYI

ZHABS LA GTUGS TE 'DUL BA LUNG SDE BZHI'I TSIG DON THAMS CAD

THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD CING TSUL KHRIMS GA-YAG RNGA BZHIN DU
BSRUNGS

PA MDZAD, DE NAS ZANGS CHEN DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS

TE 'DUL BA'I 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR BSKYANGS, LHA 'GRO BA'I MGON

PO BYANG CHUB 'OD ZANGS CHEN DGON DU GDAN DRANGS TE BYANG CHUB
LAM

GYI RIM PA'I MYONG KHRID DANG DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN
PA MA

CHE PAn CHEN SH'AKYA SHR'I YANG ZANGS CHEN DGON DU GDAN DRANGS

MA'I

NO, ,

(ZANGS TSA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN,)

LOR SKYA'O KHA GDANGS SU YAB DPAL CHEN 'OD PO DANG, YUM MA GCIG

GAR PHU MA NYI KHRI LCAM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB
BYUNG BZHI

PA'I SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1239 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI
GCEN

PO SA PAn KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN YIN, YAB MES KYI CHOS MTHA' DAG

LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, KYE RDO RJE DANG PHUR BA GNYIS LA THUGS DAM

GYI MTHIL MDZAD, CHOS SKYONG LCAM DRAL 'KHOR BCAS BRAN DU 'KHOL

ZHING, MDZAD PA'I 'PHRIN LAS YANG DBU RTZE RNYING MA BZHENGS PA

DANG, DGON PA LA LCAGS RI MDZAD, DE'I DUS SU MON GROG

'BRAL GROG SA DKAR LOGS RNAMS RGYAB YOL DU TSUL PA'I LCAGS RI

MDZAD GSUNG PA LA, BGRES PO KUN GYIS ZHUS PAS, ZHING MO CHE

NAS RGYAB PAS MDA' RGYANG GANG GIS LCAGS RI MDZAD, ZI THANG SOGS

SU TSONG 'DUS DANG MI MANGS KYI GRONG 'DZUGS PA, GROM STOD, GROM

SMAD, STAG THOG MANG MKHAR DRIL CHEN, GTZANG BAR PHUG SHAB

STOD SMAD, RTA NAG SOGS SU GZHIS 'DINGS PA, BYANG GCUNG,

KHAB SO, KOM 'DRE, GAR PHUG SOGS SU 'BROG SDE MANG DU 'CHA'

BA, RA SA SOGS SU RTA KHYU 'CHA' BA, BSTAN 'DZIN DU MA BSTEN

PA, MCHOD PA RGYUN PAR 'BUL BA, BLA MA GONG MA'I DUS MCHOD

BZHAG GO,

@1513 ZA

KHONG NI ZVA RA SKAL LDAN YE SHES SENG GE DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS

DER GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

NYANG

BCAS LA BSTEN NAS BSDUS GZHUNG DANG GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS

RDO BCAL RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, PAn CHEN BLO

BZANG YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS TE MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS

PHEBS

@1514 ZA

TE GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN BCAS PAR BYANG
BAR

MDZAD CING RGYUD KYI MKHAN KHRI DANG SHAR RTZE'I KHRI LA BZHUGS
SHING 'CHAD

NYAN DANG GTONG SGO GANG GI THAD NAS KYANG SNGAR SROL MA NYAMS
PAR

MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1746

LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO BZHI'I RING DU GSER
KHRI

BSKYANGS TE SKU GSUNGS THUGS RTEN MANG DU BZHENGS, DE NAS DVA
LA'I

BA THUR GYIS MNGA' RIS GUNG LA NGAN SBYOR DGOS PA KHRI BA 'DI LA
ZHUS

KYANG ZHAL GYIS MA BZHES STABS GSER KHRI LAS BTZAN PHABS MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU THAM PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

DGONGS RDZOGS KYI PHYIR DU BZHENGS PA'I DNGUL GDUNG BYANG CHUB
MCHOD

RTEN NI THUB PA TSUL KHRIMS PA'I LHA KHANG DU BZHUGS SO, KHONG
GI SLOB

MA GRAGS CHE BA NI YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BRAG
RGYAB

SNGAGS RAMS PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL, MKHAS GRUB DGE 'DUN BDE

CHEN BCAS YIN, KHONG NI DGA' LDAN KHRI RABS LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PA
YIN

NO, ,

(ZAM TSA 'JIGS MED BSAM GRUB RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1833

LOR MDO SMAD KHO TSER YAB BDE LEGS DANG, YUM MGON PO 'TSO

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG GI BYIS
PA'I

DUS KYI MING LA GUNG THANG DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I RGYA MTSOS MGON
PO

SKYABS ZHES GNANG, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR SKU ZHANG RDO RAMS PA
DKON

@1515 ZA

MCHOG LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHO GA CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA LEGS
PAR

SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR SDE KHRI 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI
MAS

GSER BUM DKRUGS TE HU THOG THU SPYI LUGS KYIS KHRI CHEN NAM
MKHA'

BZANG GI SPRUL SKUR THUGS THAG BCAD, KUN MKHYEN BLO BZANG THUB

BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL DKYUS GCIG

TU BSGRUBS, DE NAS GDAN SAR BKOD DE RIGS GRVA'I CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS NAS BSDUS GRVA DANG GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM NAN

TAN DU MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR KUN MKHYEN BLO BZANG
THUB

BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, LO DER PHO
BRANG

CHEN PO PE CIN DU PHEBS TE GONG MA CHEN PO DANG MJAL NAS RIM
GYIS

THAM KA BLA MA CHE CHUNG GI GO GNAS GNANG, DE LTAR GONG MA'I PHO
BRANG

GI THUGS 'GAN THAMS CAD LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD

PAR RANG YUL DU PHEBS SHING HO SHUL SOGS KYI YUL GRU RNAMS LA
BKA'

CHOS CI RIGS GSUNGS, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PAR BLA BRANG DU PHEBS,

DGUNG LO SO BZHI PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I
KHRI LA

BZHUGS NAS CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO GANG YOD YAR LDAN DU

BSKYANGS, KHONG GI SKU TSE'I SMAD KYI RNAM THAR MJAL RGYU MA
BYUNG,

KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN RABS NGA GSUM PA
YIN NO, ,

(ZI NA SKAL BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1803

LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS MI NYAG ZHVA DMAR SDE BA GONG MAR SKU

@1516 ZA

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1866

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN GYI STENG RAB TU BYUNG STE
SKU

'BUM DGON DU PHEBS TE YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG BSLABS SHING CHO GA
THAMS

CAD BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR SKU 'BUM DGON

GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI 'DZIN SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RIN PO CHE'I
MTSAN LAM

NGO MTSAR BA'I LUNG BSTAN BYUNG BA'I RKYEN GYIS LAS SNE RNAMS LA
ZHAL

BKOD GNANG BA LTAR RANG SGAR GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BKOD PA DANG
LHAN

CIG TU DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS, BKA' POD

LNGA'I GZHUNG LA RTOG GE BA'I TSIG 'KHRI TZAM LA 'CHEL BA MA YIN
PAR RGYAL

PA'I DGONGS PA MTHAR THUG JI BZHIN RNYED PA'I GSAN SBYANGS MDZAD

CING, TSOGS LANGS LAN DU MA DANG GZHUNG RGYAS BSDUS GNYIS KYI
DAM

BCA' BZHAG DE NAS DPAL LDAN GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI

CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING GAR THIG DBYANGS GSUM DANG BSKYED RDZOGS
KYI

LAM GYI RIM PA MTHA' DAG LA DMIGS PHUG PA'I SBYANGS PA MTHAR
PHYIN

MDZAD, SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' PAndI TA SOGS LA BSTEN NAS BKA'

CHOS MANG DU GSAN ZHING SGRA RTZIS SMAN DANG SNYAN NGAG SOGS RIG
GNAS

KUN LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS RIM GYIS SMAN PA DPON SLOB

DANG, RGYUD PA'I KHRI LA PHEBS TE GRVA TSANG SO SO'I KUN SPYOD
DANG SLOB

GNYER BCAD LA DAM BZUNG MDZAD, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GSUM PA

RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1855 LOR SKU
'BUM

DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS TE LO NGO DRUG GI RING DU GDAN
SA

@1517 ZA

BSKYANGS, DGON PA'I MDZAD SGO HAMS CAD ZHI DRAG GNYIS KYIS TSAGS

'DZIN GANG LEGS GNANG, KHIR ZUR NAS KYANG BLO GSAL DON GNYER

CAN RNAMS LA SMAN RTZIS LA SOGS RIG GNAS KYI SKOR DPE KHRID LEGS

PAR MDZAD, LANG GRUB SDE BZHI LA SOGS PA'I GRUB GNAS MANG POR

ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE YI DAM RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DANG, N'A RO MKHA'

SPYID MA'I BSNYEN CHEN, ZAB DON SNYAN BRGYUD KYI PHYI MTSAMS
CHEN MO

CHU MIG BRGYA RTZA LAN LNGA MTHAR PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS TU LAN
DGON

DU PHEBS TE THUGS DAM MDZAD MUR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM

DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN NGA BDUN PA YIN, ,

(ZI NA NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1683

RAB

BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1746 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

SGRUB

RNAMS

LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS SHING SER BYES GRVA

TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS THOS BSAM YUN RING DU MDZAD DE DKA' BCU PA'I

@1519 ZA

SPYI LO 1785 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS

KUN SPYOD GANG YOD THAMS CAD RGYUD SMAD PA JI LTA BA BZHIN GTAN

DRUG CU RE BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

(ZI NA SMON RAMS PA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS ZI NA KLU RGYA SDE BA'I HOR TSANG DU
YAB BKRA

SHIS DON GRUB DANG, YUM SKAL BZANG SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU
SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO DGU PAR SKU 'BUM DU PHEBS SHING AA KY'A

YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYI MDUN NAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS,

PHYAG RDO THANG GRU KY'A SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NYI MA
SLOB DPON

DU BSTEN NAS TSOGS 'DON GANG YOD BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO

BCO LNGA PAR DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE
KHA DOG

DKAR DMAR NAS 'DUL BA'I 'DZIN GRVA'I BAR RNAMS THOD BRGAL MA

YIN PAR MAS RIM GYIS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA'I ZUR BKOL DANG BCAS

PA'I TSIG DANG DON GNYIS THOS BSAM GYIS GTAN LA PHAB, BSDUS

GRVA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG CING TSOGS LANGS KYANG LEGS PAR BZHENGS,

DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI
MDUN

NAS DGE TSUL DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS DKYUS GCIG TU BSGRUBS, DGUNG

LO SO BZHI PAR CHO 'PHRUL SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MING BTAGS

'DZIN, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE BZHI PAR GZHUNG GI DAM BCA' RTZE

THON BZHAG DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GSUM PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I
SHING

PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO 1884 LOR SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI

@1523 BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS
LA DO

DAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS KYANG KHA TON DGE SBYOR DANG

SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM

SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PA YIN NO, ,

(ZI NA ZHABS DRUNG CHE BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO

1664 LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS ZI NA'I GDUNG RGYUD DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I SKABS

SU SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE
MTSAN

NYID SOGS LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS SHING SER

BYES GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE THUGS GNYER NAN TAN MDZAD, RGYAL
DBANG

LNGA BA RIN PO CHES KHONG LA AER TI NI T'A LE CHOS RJE ZHES PA'I
CHO LO DANG

BKA' SHOG BSTZAL ZHING GZIGS BSKYANGS TSAD MED GNANG, DE NAS

RANG YUL DU PHEBS SHING DGON SGRUB SDE MANG POR SRI ZHU DANG DAD
LDAN

GDUL BYA MANG POR LEGS GSUNG CHOS KYI DGA' STON RGYA CHER SPEL,
DE

NAS SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS TE THOS BSAM RMAD DU
BYUNG BA

MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO
1694

LOR RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA PHEBS TE LUGS GNYIS KYI LAM SROL
SNGAR

RGYUN BZHIN BSKYANGS PA MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO
STAG

LO STE SPYI LO 1696 LOR 'DU KHANG KA BA ZHE BRGYAD YOD PA STENG
SHOD SGOR

SKYOR 'KHYAMS RA DANG, DBUS KYI RGYA MTHONGS RGYA 'PHUG LTAR GYO
MO

@1524 BRTAD DE GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, DBYAR CHOS CHEN MO'I STENG DU
BDE

MCHOG GI RDUL TSON DKYIL 'KHOR LA BRTEN PA'I SGRUB MCHOD NYIN
BDUN

SPYIN SREG DANG BCAS PA'I RGYUN BTZUGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I

SA MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1709 LOR BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN
SA'I KHRI

LA BZHUGS, RJE'I GSANG BA'I RNAM THAR TSOGS 'DON DU BTZUGS

SHING 'CHAD NYAN YAR RGYAS KYI DO DAM GANG LEGS GNANG, BDE YANGS

DGON PAR BSTAN PA'I BYA BA MDZAD SGANG 'KHRUNGS YUL DU PHEBS NAS

GLO BUR DU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI
KHRI RABS

BCU GCIG PA DANG, BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS

NYER BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

(ZI NA BSOD NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, KHONG RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1793 LOR SKU 'BUM SMAN
PA

DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS
'CHAD

NYAN BCAS LA TSAGS 'DZIN GANG LEGS GNANG, RAB BYUNG BCU

GSUM PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1801 LOR SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA
GRVA

TSANG GI MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO GNYIS KYI RING DU
'CHAD NYAN

BSKYANGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1807

LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO GSUM GYI

RING DU GDAN SA'I 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS

LA DO DAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO

@1525 STE SPYI LO 1809 LOR SKU 'BUM BLA BRANG CHEN MO'I KA BZHI
MAS ME SKYON

BZHES, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS BCU PA

DANG, SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA MKHAN PO'I KHRI RABS SO BZHI PA, SKU

'BUM DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN ZHE GCIG PA YIN NO, ,

(ZI LING 'JIGS MED 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1833

LOR MTSO SNGON ZHING CHEN GYI ZI LING DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BCO LNGA

PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1903 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG

LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS BCAS LA
BYANG

BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR DBANG LDAN RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG

NAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA BZHES, GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG
RGYUD SDE

BZHI LA THOS BSAM DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD DE MKHAS PA CHEN POR
GYUR,

DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR DBANG LDAN RIN PO CHE'I DRUNG NAS BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DE NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GYIS DUS 'DA'

BAR MDZAD CING DGUNG LO DON GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU

GSHEGS, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //SPYOD 'JUG GI 'BRU 'GREL RGYAL

SRAS LAM BZANG GSAL BA'I SGRON ME//DANG, //LAM RIM NYAMS

MGUR GYI 'GREL BA THEG MCHOG LAM BZANG GSAL BA'I TSIG GI ZLA

SHEL//, //RIG PA'I DBANG LNGA'I BSHAD SBYOR NOR BU'I PHRENG
BA//,

//THOB YIG YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA'I ZHAL LUNG BDUD RTZI'I CHU
RGYUN//,

//RTZOD YIG SNYAN BSKUL LHA'I RNGA CHEN//BCAS CHOS TSAN BRGYA
DANG RTZA

@1526 BRGYAD LONGS PA'I POD DRUG BZHUGS SO, ,

(ZING PO RJE KHRI PANGS SUM,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS LNGA PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING SPUR BA'I YU SNA NA RGYAL PHRAN ZHIG GI RJE BOR
MDZAD NAS

BZHUGS KYANG RJES SU RGYAL PO GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN GYIS DBANG DU

BSDUS, KHONG GIS ZING PO RJE STAG SKYA BO LA BLO LOG PA'I BLON
PO GNYAN

'DZI ZUNG NAG PO GTZIGS SU 'DZIN TE ZING PO RJE STAG SKYA BO'I
RGYAL PHRAN

BCOM NAS DBANG DU BSDUS, SNGON GYI BLON PO RNYING PA MYANG TZENG
SKU

DANG DBAS DBYI TSAB SOGS LA BRNYAS BCOS DANG DMA' 'BEBS

MDZAD PAS MYANG DABS GNYIS BLO LOG STE STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS LA

MGO 'BUL MDZAD KYANG STAG RI GNYAN GZIGS DGUNG DU GSHEGS PAS

GNAM RI SRONG BTZAN LA MU MTHUD NAS MGO 'BUL MDZAD, KHONG GI

SPYOD PA YANG PHAL CHER ZING PO RJE STAG SKYA BO DANG 'DRA BAS
MTHA' MAR

RGYAL PHRAN 'THOR ZHIG TU SONG NAS MED PAR GYUR TO, ,

(ZING PO RJE STAG SKYA BO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS LNGA PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU SKU
'KHRUNGS

SHING NYEN KA'I RTING BA NA RGYAL PHRAN ZHIG GI BDAG POR MDZAD
NAS

BZHUGS KYANG RJES SU ZING PO RJE KHRI PANGS SUM GYIS DBANG DU
BSDUS,

KHONG NI BYA BA GANG DANG GANG YANG PHYIN CI LOG PA SHA STAG
MDZAD DE

LEGS PA RNAMS LA NYES PAR BTANG, NYES PA RNAMS LA LEGS PAR

BRTZI, BLO GROS LDAN ZHING BSAM PA RNAM DAG GIS LEGS PA'I GROS

@1527 BTON PA RNAMS LA MI NYAN PA ZHIG YIN TE, BLON PO GNYAN
'DZI ZUNG

NAG POS KHONG LA RANG CAG GI SRID NI SRID DANG MI MTHUN, CHOS NI

CHOS DANG MI MTHUN PAS, YUL GYI MI NI DBUL, SRID KYI NYAMS

NI DMA' STE, PHAL CHER BRLAGS ZIN PAS CI DRAG CES ZHUS PA NA,

DE SKAD ZER BA NYES SO ZHES GNYAN 'DZI ZUNG NAG PO BLON PO'I GO
GNAS

NAS PHUD DO, DE LTAR RJE BO NI GONG NA KHRO ZHING GTUM, BRAN
GA-YOG

NI 'OG NA SKRAG CING 'DAR, RJE BO NI GONG NA SMYO, 'BANGS 'KHOR

NI 'OG NA KHA THOR BAS RGYAL PHRAN NYAMS NAS MED PAR DU GYUR TO,
,

(ZUR MKHAR MNYAM NYID RDO RJE,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1439 LOR

SHAR DVAGS PO'I LA THOG ZUR MKHAR DU YAB RIG 'DZIN PHUN TSOGS

DANG, YUM KUN MKHYEN BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1475
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO BCU BAR GA-YU THOG YON TAN MGON POS

ZHAL GZIGS PAR GRAGS, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI BAR NGAG DBANG GRAGS

PA'I SLOB MAR GYUR PA SHA RA RAB 'BYAMS DANG, SMAN STON DBANG

PHYUG SOGS DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS PAD YUN RING DU BSTEN NAS RIG

GNAS SPYI DANG BYE BRAG GSO BA RIG PA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN
PAR

MDZAD DE, BYANG BA 'TSO BYED MI'I NYI MA MTHONG BA DON LDAN DANG
RTZOD

RGYUGS MDZAD PA LAS BSNGAGS BRJOD KYI ME TOG THOB, GSO BA RIG

PA'I DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI LA MA DAG PA'I BSLAD JI SNYED CIG
ZHUGS

@1528 'DUG PA LA KHONG GIS ZHU DAG LEGS PAR MDZAD NAS PAR DU
BKOD,

KHONG LA GSO RIG MTHAR PHYIN PA'I SLOB MA BZHI DANG, BYIN RLABS

ZHUGS PA'I SLOB MA BRGYAD, SHES RAB CAN GYI SLOB MA BCU DRUG

GRAGS PA THOB PA'I SLOB MA NYI SHU, BLA DVAGS CAN GYI SLOB MA
BCU DRUG

BCAS YOD PA LAS RING LUGS RGYUD 'DZIN GYI SLOB BU CHEN PO NI ZUR

MKHAR BLO GROS RGYAL PO YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI THUN MONG
DANG

THUN MIN KHYON BSDOMS DEB BZHI BRGYA LHAG TZAM YOD, LHAG PAR DU

//MAN NGAG BYE BA 'BYUNG BA'I RING BSREL//BRTZAMS BA NAS BZUNG
SMAN

NAG DRAG SBYOR BCO LNGA, DNGUL CHU BZHI SBYOR, DBYAR RTZVA DGUN

'BU'I SBYOR BA, DNGUL CHU BTZO BKRU SOGS LAG LEN MANG PO ZHIG GI

SROL SNGON MED GSAR DU BTOD PA MDZAD PAS GSO RIG BSTAN PA'I

BDAG POR GYUR, KHONG GI MTSAN GYI RNAM GRANGS NI DRANG SRONG
DHARMA SVA

MI DANG, 'TSO BYED GRUB PA, DKON COG RIN CHEN, GA-YU

THOG 'BANGS, DPA' BOS BSKYANGS, KUN LA BYAMS PA'I BLO

GROS, LHUN GRUB RGYAL MTSAN BCAS YIN, ,

(ZUR MKHAR BLO GROS RGYAL PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1509 LOR

DVAGS PO LA THOG ZUR MKHAR DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL,

KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS DPAL KHANG LO TZ'A BA KARMA
'PHRIN LAS

LA GTZUG PHUD PHUL ZHING MTSAN LA DPAL LDAN DON GRUB RNAM RGYAL
ZHES

GSOL, ZHVA DMAR BA CHOS GRAGS YE SHES DPAL BZANG GIS BLO GROS

@1529 RGYAL PO ZHES GSOL, DE NAS 'TSO SMAD MKHAN CHEN GYI SLOB
MA GLANG

BU CHOS RJE SLOB DPON DU BSTEN TE GSO BA RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA

THOS BSAM RMAD DU BYUNG BA MDZAD CING SMAN PA'I BDAG NYIN CHEN
POR

GYUR, SKYOG LO RIN CHEN BKRA SHIS LAS SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG GI
SKOR GSAN

ZHING THA SNYAD RIG GNAS KUN LA NANG BYAN TSUD PAR MDZAD, KARMA
MI

SKYOD RDO RJE DANG ZHVA DMAR BA CHOS GRAGS YE SHES DPAL BZANG
RNAM PA

GNYIS LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS GSAN PA MDZAD NAS GANGS

CAN MKHAS PA'I MIG RGYAN DU GYUR, NYID KYI GSUNG LAS "RIG GNAS

BCU PHRAG GCIG LA SBYANGS PA'I MTHUS, MKHAS PA'I BYA BA 'CHAD

RTZOD RTZOM PA GSUM, MKHAS PA MANG PO TSOGS PA'I MDUN SAR YANG,

MKHAS RNAM KHREL BA'I GTAM NI SMRA MA MYONG," ZHES GSUNGS SO,

RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I CHU PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1542 LOR//RGYUD
BZHI'I

'GREL BA MES PO'I ZHAL LUNG// LJAGS BRTZAMS MDZAD, RAB BYUNG

DGU PA'I ME PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1546 LOR //RGYUD BZHI//DPAR
SHING

GSAR DU BSKRUN, MDOR NA SKU TSE GANG BOR GSO RIG LAG LEN MDZAD

NAS DUS 'DA' BA'O, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //RGAN PO'I KHA
CHEMS//

DANG, //RANG 'GREL GSER GYI PHRA TSOM//, //BYE BA RING BSREL GYI

DKAR CHAG MKHAS PA'I YID 'PHROG//, //DAD LDAN SNYIM PA'I ME

TOG//, //RGYUD BZHI BKA' DANG BSTAN BCOS RNAM PAR DBYE BA MUN

MTSO//,

DBYAR SKYES RNGA GSANG//, //GA BUR GUR GUM AA GAR TZAN DAN
SOGS

BYA

CHOS TSAN

NYER BZHI BZHUGS SO,,

(ZUR CHUNG SHES RAB GRAGS PA,)

LO 1074 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS

ZUR PO CHE SH'AKYA 'BYUNG GNAS KYIS GSOS TE DPE CHA KHRID PAS
SHES RAB

SHIN TU CHE BA BYUNG YANG 'BYOR BA ZHAN PAS DBANG DANG DPE CHA
MA RNYED

PA'I SKABS DER ZUR PO CHES JO MO GA-YU MO MA SMAD GNYIS DANG
MNYAM DU

BZA' BSGRIGS BYED DU BCUG STE 'DOD DON THAMS CAD LEGS PAR

GRUB, ZUR PO CHE LA BSTEN NAS DGONGS PA JI LTA BA BZHIN DU LON

PA DANG, MKHYEN PA THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU MNGA'
LA,

CHOS KYI DON THAMS CAD LA BLO GROS KYI SPOBS PA MCHOG DANG
LDAN PA

MANG DU BSKYANGS, DE RJES GDAN SA GZHAN LA GTAD CING BRAG RGYA
BO

DGU 'DUS SU BYON TE, LO NGO BCU BZHI'I RING DU SGRUB PA NYAMS
LEN

MDZAD PAS RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I ZHAL GZIGS, RDZOGS PA CHEN PO

@1531 RANG SNANG RIS MED KYI DGONGS PA SHAR TE, SA RDO RI BRAG
THAMS CAD

LA THOGS PA MED PAR 'GRO BA BYUNG STE, MTSAN LA YANG BDE
GSHEGS

RGYA BO BA ZHES ZHU'O, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS NI KA BA BZHI
DANG,

GDUNG MA BRGYAD, PHYAM BCU DRUG DRAL MA SUM CU RTZA GNYIS,
SGOM

CHEN MI GNYIS, YUS PO CHE MI GCIG DKYUS PA MI GNYIS, STA

GUR MI GNYIS, GO MA CHOD MI GSUM LA SOGS PA MANG DU BYON,

SLOB MA DE DAG LAS GRAGS CHE BA KA BA BZHI NI SKYO STON
SH'AKYA YE SHES

DANG, GLAN STON SH'AKYA BZANG PO, YANG KHENG BLA MA, MDA' TI

JO SH'AKYA BCAS DANG, GDUNG MA BRGYAD NI MA THOG BYANG 'BAR
DANG,

SH'AKA RING,

@1532 MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU MYANG YE SHES 'BYUNG GNAS LAS SGYU
'PHRUL DANG

SEMS PHYOGS ZHUS, LCE SH'AKYA MCHOG LAS BDUD RTZI DANG, GNYAN

NAG DBANG GRAGS LAS GSANG DBANG DANG THABS LAM, THO DKAR

NAM MKHA' LDEB LAS MDO DANG BAR KHAB, 'BRE KHRO CHUNG LAS KA
DAG

DANG LHUN GRUB KYI BSHAD PA DANG LAM RIM CHEN MO, ROG SH'AKYA
'BYUNG

GNAS LAS YANG DAG SOGS MANG DU ZHUS, DE NAS RTZA RGYUD DANG
BSHAD

RGYUD DU PHYE, RTZA BA DANG 'GREL BAR SDEBS, RGYUD DANG SGRUB
THABS

SU SDEBS, SGRUB THABS DANG CHOG YIG LA SOGS PAR SDEBS TE
'BANGS

RTZE MO BZHI RTZE LKOG DANG LNGA, SGOM CHEN BRGYA RTZA BRGYAD
LA SOGS PA LA

BSHAD PAR MDZAD, DE NAS 'UG PA LUNG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG LEGS

PAR BZHENGS PA DANG, SHANGS KYI MDA' LA SRAM PA SGRUB KHANG DU
DPAL

CHEN PO LHA DGU LDE GUR BZHENGS PAR MDZAD, SGRO STON GYIS
KHONG LA

SGRO PHUG PHUL TE, DE LA LHA KHANG BZHENGS PAS SGRO PHUG LHA
KHANG DU GRAGS

SO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN NI LHA RJE 'UG PA LUNG PA YANG ZHU,
KHONG

NI SGYU 'PHRUL GTZO BOR MDZAD PA'I GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I
SLOB DPON

CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA 'BANGS RTZE MO
BZHI

NI LTA DGONGS KYI RTZE MOR GYUR PA ZUR CHUNG SHES RAB GRAGS PA
DANG,

SGYU 'PHRUL GYI BSHAD PA PHYOGS GCIG GI RTZE MOR GYUR PA BAN
NAM BRES KYI

MI NYAG 'BYUNG GRAGS, MKHYEN RGYA'I RTZE MO GYUR PA RA ZA'I
ZHANG 'GOS

CHUNG BA, SGOM SGRUB KYI RTZE MOR GYUR PA 'TSO NYA'I BZANG
SGOM SHES RAB

RTZE MO GYUR PA

RABS LNGA PA YIN,,

GYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I CHU PHO
SBREL LO STE SPYI LO

LA

KHU BO

DGE RGYAM PA'I SHAG TU BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR 'DUL 'DZIN
LHA

PAR

STAG SNA RTZOD KYI SGO," BCAS LA MNGA' MDZAD PA ZHES MANG THOS

DANG, BTZUN MO ZHIG KHAB TU BZHES TE RIGS SRAS PHA WA DE SE
DANG,

KHRI LDE, NYAG LDE, KHRI CHUNG RNAMS RIM BZHIN SKU 'KHRUNGS
SHING, DE

DAG GIS GNUBS YUL RONG DANG, GA-YAG SDE, MYANG STOD KONG BU

('OD ZER LDE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU YAB
