(BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I
DUS NAS

BSTAN PA'I CHOS SGOR BZHUGS SHING RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL, DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE 'DUL BA'I CHOS GZHUNG

SOGS LA THOS BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD

@1827 SA

YIG LA PHUL DU PHYIN PA SBYANGS TE BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU

BSGYUR BA MDZAD, KHONG GI BSGYUR RTZOM NI//BSTAN 'GYUR//LAS
//'JIG

RTEN DBANG PHYUG LA BSTOD PA//DANG, //NOR BU GLING GI THUGS RJE

SO, ,

(BSOD NAMS PHYOGS GLANG,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1439 LOR

GTZANG MTSAMS SU (DENG GZHIS KA RTZE RGYAM MDA' CHUS DBEN SA
KHUL)

LHO KHUD BLA MA RNAM RGYAL DBANG PHYUG GI TSA BOR SKU 'KHRUNGS,
RAB BYUNG

BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1504 LOR SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG

BYIS PA'I DUS SU KHYE'U MDOG DANG NYAMS NGAN PA ZHIG YOD PAS, PA

SO CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYI DRUNG DU KHYER, BA SO BA KHONG GIS
BYIS PA'I

DE'I SKABS SU BA SO BA KHONG GIS BE'U RGAS NA GLANG DU 'GRO BA
YIN

GSUNGS NAS MTSAN LA BSOD NAMS PHYOGS GLANG ZHES GSOL, DE NAS

SEMS DPA' BLO GROS SBAS PA SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU MAR BSTEN NAS

@1828 SA

TSAD MA RIGS GTER DANG, BYAMS CHOS SDE LNGA, MNGON BA MDZOD,

DBU MA'I RIGS, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA, GZHI LAM 'BRAS GSUM BCAS

LA GSAN SBYANGS LEGS PAR MDZAD PAS MKHAS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS THOB,

GSANG PHUR GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DE NAS SKABS SHIG LA THUB PA'I LI
SKU ZHIG

GIS LUNG BSTAN BZHIN DBEN RTZA PHUR CHOS 'KHOR DBUS LDING ZHES
PA'I

MO DGON ZHIG 'DEBS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS BZUNG KHONG GIS GBEN

DGON GYI KHRI PA THUGS 'GAN BZHES PA DANG, DGE LUGS PA'I BSTAN

PA RGYAS PAR GSUNG PA'I DBEN SA SNYAN BRGYUD KYI RTZOM SROL BTOD

GNANG YOD LA, 'DAB CHAGS DANG GLENG MOL MDZAD TSUL GYI MGUR

SNYAN BCAS BSTAN BCOS MANG PO MDZAD DO, KHONG NI PAn CHEN AER

TI NI'I SKU PHRENG GNYIS PA YIN, ,

(BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG)

KHONG NI GA-YU RUNG BYIN BRLABS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG

RUS MAL YIN, 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL YANG RTOGS

LDAN MDZES PA SNYING PO'I NU BO YIN, ,KHONG NI RTOGS LDAN MDZES
PA

SNYING PO DANG, MKHAN PO SH'AKYA BKRA SHIS GNYIS LAS RAB TU
BYUNG ZHING

@1829 SA

RABS GNYIS PA YIN, ,

(BSOD NAMS BZANG PO,)

BZHUGS SO, ,

(BSOD NAMS SENG GE)

1773

SGOR ZHUGS

RTZA

SHING GZHUNG

NYER LNGA PAR RANG DGON BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU
NGA DGU

GNYIS

@1831 HA

SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD CING LA MO BDE CHEN DAG TSOGS GLING GI

GDAN SAR BKONG CING DGA' STON RGYAS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN

BAR MA

CHOS SPYOD

POS

GSER GYI 'BRUG RIS BDUN BKRA BA'I GOS CHEN GYIS GA-YOGS PA'I

RANG

CHOS

'CHAD NYAN DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BZHENGS PA BCAS LA 'BAD

'BUNGS MDZAD, RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYAL MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN LA

PHEBS NAS MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI BKA' LUNG MANG PO 'BUL BAR MDZAD,

KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN
DANG,

KHRI CHEN RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE KHRI CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG PO BCAS
YIN,

KHONG NI DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI 'DZIN PA'I KHRI RABS LNGA BCU NGA
GCIG PA

YIN NO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA SHAR RTZE DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA
ZHES

ZHU'O, ,

(HOR RAB BRTAN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO
1697

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL MANG GI NANG TSAN HOR GYI RUS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1763 LOR SKU
GSHEGS, KHONG DPON PO JU NANG GIS DGON PAR THENGS GCIG LA GRVA

RGYUN BRGYA BZHAG PA'I GRAS SU BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
GRVAR

ZHUGS, BSE NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS LA BSTEN NAS BSDUS GZHUNG DANG
@1840 HA

BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD NAS MKHAS PA'I
GO

'PHANG DAM PAR MNGA' BRNYES, DBU MA LUNG RIGS GTER MDZOD

THUGS LA BZUNG NAS SKU MA 'DAS KYI BAR DU ZHAL 'DON MDZAD CING

ZAB MO'I LTA BA YANG THUGS SU 'KHRUNGS, BLA MA DBU MDZAD DANG
RGYUD PA'I

KHRI LA BZHUGS PA'I YUN TSAD NI BSDOMS PAS LO BCU GCIG GI RING
DU

'GOR TE 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS DANG, BSKYED RDZOGS KYI BSHAD PA

SOGS 'CHAD NYAN DMAR BA KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DUS

RGYUN DU THUGS NANG DU PHYOGS PAS SKU MDUN GYI BYA BYED PHAL
CHER MI

GZIGS SHING MJAL MI LA PHYAG DBANG TZAM YANG MI GNANG BA YIN,
KHRI

ZUR NAS SOG YUL DU PHEBS TE CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN BSKOR
NAS

SKAL LDAN GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI 'DOD MOS BSKANGS, DGUNG LO RE DRUG

PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA
SHIS

'KHYIL GYI RGYUD PA'I KHRI RABS BCU BA YIN NO, ,

(LHA KHANG LUNG PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO
1662

LOR MDO SMAD RNGOG RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
PA'I

ME MO SPRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1737 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG MA LHA KHANG LUNG PA NGAG DBANG BYAMS
PA'I SPRUL

SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG ZHING RGYAL MO BSAM GRUB GLING GI GDAN SAR

BKOD, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BSE NGAG DBANG

BKRA SHIS LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, LAM RIM DANG,

@1841 HA

SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO, MKHAS GRUB BRGYUD SDE SPYI RNAM, BDE LAM

RNAMS LA BYANG BAR SBYANGS, DGE 'DUN MCHOG LDAN LAS SGRA RIG PA

DANG, GSO BA RIG PA, RTZIS DKAR NAG SOGS LA SBYANGS PAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR SDE KHRI BLO BZANG DON GRUB LAS

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING BKA' CHOS GSAN, BKA' 'GYUR BA BLO

BZANG NYI MA, YA PHU'I DPON SLOB BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG PO, 'DUL

'DZIN BSOD NAMS BZANG PO SOGS LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS DU

MA DANG, THANG TSANG BLO BZANG SHES RAB LAS BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG,

KHYAD PAR DU STOBS LDAN SNGAGS RAMS PA LAS SNGAGS PHYOGS MANG DU

GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE MCHOD MJAL

MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA PAR KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA

RANG DGON DU GDAN DRANGS TE DPA' GCIG GI DBANG ZHUS SHING THUGS

YID GCIG TU 'DRES, 'CHAD NYAN DANG SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN ZUNG DU

'BREL BAS PHYOGS DE'I BSTAN 'DZIN KUN GYI GTZUG RGYAN DU GYUR,

DGUNG LO DON LNGA PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI

LHA KHANG LUNG PA'I SKU PHRENG GSUM PA YIN NO, ,

ME

PHO 'BRUG LO STE SPYI LO 1736 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO
CHUNG

@1842 HA

NGOS 'DZIN GNANG ZHING RGYAL MO BSAM GRUB GLING GI GDAN SAR
BKOD,

YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS GSO

BA RIG PA DANG, SGRA SNYAN NGAG RTZIS DKAR NAG BCAS LA LEGS PAR

SBYANGS PAS MKHAS PAR GYUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR DBUS SU

PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS
GZHUNG

BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD PAS LHA RAMS PA'I

MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, 'KHON STON DPAL 'BYOR LHUN GRUB DANG RIG

'DZIN 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA RNAM GNYIS LAS THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I

ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, RGYAL DBANG MCHOG NAS HU THOG THU ME RGAN

CHOS RJE'I CHO LO DANG BKA' SHOG BSTZAL, DE NAS RANG YUL DU
PHEBS

TE DGON PA GSAR DU SPOS SHING MCHOD GZHIS DU MA MNGA' 'OG TU

BCUG GRVA TSOGS NYIS STONG DU NYE BA MNYAM TSOGS KYI SROL YANG
'DI

PAR

PA'I

@1851 HA

RNAMS BZHAG STE LO PAn PHYIR LOG, ZHES GSUNGS PA LTAR, RGYAL

POS DE RNAMS DKOR KHANG DU BZHUGS SU GSOL TE, GNYAN PO GSANG

BA ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL TE, DGUNG LO BRGYA DANG NYI SHUR BZHUGS

NAS DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI BANG SO NI RANG

LAS LNGA

PA DE YIN NO, ,

(LHA LDE,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU MNGA'

RIS PU RANGS SU YAB MNGA' BDAG 'KHOR RE'I SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

KHONG SKU NA SON RJES MNGA' RIS GU GE DANG PU RANGS GNYIS KA'I
CHAB

SRID BSKYANGS TE, BTZUN MO ZHIG KHAB TU BZHES PA LA RIGS SRAS
'OD

LDE DANG, PHO BRANG ZHI BA 'OD, BTZUN PA BYANG CHUB 'OD GSUM RIM

PAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS PAndI TA SU BHU TI SHR'I SH'ANTA
MNGA' RIS GU

GER GDAN DRANGS TE SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SKOR GYI
BSTAN

BCOS MANG PO BOD YIG TU BSGYUR BAR MDZAD DU BCUG LO CHEN RIN

CHEN BZANG PO (958-1055) DBU'I MCHOD GNAS SU BKUR BA

DANG, KHONG GI MNGA' ZHABS PU RANGS KHONGS KYI SHER PA LA SOGS

PA'I SA CHA GSUM LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO'I MCHOD GZHIS SU PHUL
BA

BCAS BSNYEN BKUR PHUN SUM TSOGS PAR MDZAD DO, KHONG NI MNGA'

RIS GU GE'I RGYAL RABS GNYIS PA YIN NO, ,

(LHA PHYUG MKHAR BA NYI ZLA 'OD,)

@1852 HA

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1135

LOR DOL GYI ZHUR NA YAB JO BO SANGS RGYAS SKYABS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1215
LOR LHA

PHYUG TU SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I SKABS SU RNGOG MDO SDE

DANG, GAN PA DAR RE, LO RE RAS PA RNAMS LA BSTEN NAS MDO

SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS BLA MA ZHANG GIS

LAS SLOB DANG, SHA MI 'DUL 'DZIN GYIS MKHAN PO MDZAD DE LHA SAR

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING MTSAN LA NYI ZLA 'OD ZHES GSOL, BLA MA
ZHANG

LA LO NGO NYI SHU RTZA GCIG BSTEN TE CHOS THAMS CAD MA LUS PA
ZHUS, BLA

MA'I BYIN RLABS ZHUGS TE RTOGS PA'ANG 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG GSUM

PA'I ME MO LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1187 LOR 'JU PHU BTAB, RAB BYUNG

GSUM PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1193 LOR LHA PHYUG BTAB
NAS

GDAN SA LO NGO BCO BRGYAD BSKYANGS PA'I DUS SU, RAB BYUNG BZHI
PA'I

LCAGS PHO RTAG LO STE SPYI LO 1210 LOR TSAL GUNG THANG GI GDAN
SAR

PHEBS TE LHA PHYUG DANG SBRAGS NAS GDAN SA LO NGO LNGA'I RING DU

BSKYANGS, DE NAS GDAN SA SPRUL SKU SANGS RGYAS 'BUM LA GTAD DE

DGUNG LO BDUN CU RTZA GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU 'THIMS

SO, KHONG NI TSAL GUNG THANG GI BLA RABS BZHI PA YIN, KHONG GI
SLOB

MA GRAGS CHE BA NI BLA MA SPYAN SNGA BA DANG, RIN PO CHE STON
NAM MO,

BLA MA BA LAM PA, RTOGS LDAN BRAG PO, RU THOG PA BCAS YIN, ,

(LHA BU MGO DKAR,)

MO DAR RGYAN

LO STE SPYI

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR

MDZAD PAS MDO SNGAGS BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR GYUR, RAB BYUNG BZHI

MANG DU

@1854 HA

(LHA BLA MA BYANG CHUB 'OD,)

BYANG

CHUB 'OD CES ZHU ZHING, RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I ME MO GLANG LO STE
SPYI

LO 1037 LOR LHA BLA MA YE SHES 'OD KYI ZHAL CHEMS LTAR NAG TSO
LO TZ'A BA

TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL BA LA GSER SRANG SUM CU SO GNYIS DANG, GSER

ZHU

LO STE SPYI

BYANG CHUB

'OD KYI BKA' LTAR JO BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA MNGA' RIS GU GER

DKAR

SUM BRGYA THAM PAS GDUGS DANG RGYAL MTSAN BA DAN LA SOGS PA'I

MCHOD RDZAS THOGS NAS PHEBS BSU GZAB RGYAS ZHUS, KHONG GIS JO BO

RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA LA BSKUL MA ZHUS PA LTAR JO BO RJES
KYANG//BYANG

BKA'

TZ'A BA GYI JO

DE

DGUNG LO

MTSAN LA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN ZHES GSOL, PAn CHEN

BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN GYIS GRUB CHEN RJE DPON LEGS TSOGS LHUN
GRUB KYI

MTSO BLA

SMAN PA KUN DGA' BYANG CHUB LAS GSO RIG DANG, SKAR RTZIS, SOG

DBANG LNGA PA DANG MJAL ZHING 'JIGS BYED SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG
ZHUS,

@1862 HA

MNGA' RIS MANG YUL STOD KYI RGYAL PO'I RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,
KHONG

GZHON NU'I DUS NAS SPE THUB TSOS SDER PHEBS TE RAB TU BYUNG
ZHING DPE

CHAR GZIGS, DE NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BYON TE TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL

DANG, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA, 'DUL BA, MDZOD RNAMS LA THOS

BSAM NAN TAN DU MDZAD DE MKHAS PA'I PHUL DU PHYIN ZHING RTZES
THANG GI

GRVA SKOR MDZAD, GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG SNGAGS RAMS PA DGE 'DUN

BKRA SHIS LAS PHYAG RDOR 'KHOR CHEN GYI DBANG DANG, RGYAL BA
BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO (1543-1588) LAS SNYING PO DON GSUM GYI KHRID,

KHRI CHEN BDE BA CAN PA (1505-1567) LAS BYANG CHUB LAM RIM

SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN NAS SGRUB PA

NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DE NAS SNYAN PA'I GRAGS

PA PHYOGS BCUR KHYAB STE DAD LDAN GYI BU SLOB MANG DU 'DUS PA LA
BYANG

CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID SOGS GANG LA GANG 'TSAM PA'I GDAMS

NGAG 'DOMS PAR MDZAD, KHONG NI BYANG CHUB LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI
BLA

RABS DRUG CU PA YIN, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS GRAGS CHE BA
NI

SHAR PA CHOS RJE SGOM BDE NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG KHRI CHEN
DGE

'DUN RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS YIN NO,,

(LHA BTZUN BSOD NAMS YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN,)

YAB LHA BTZUN BKRA SHIS DPAL BZANG GI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,
KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YAB CHEN LHA BTZUN BKRA SHIS DPAL

@1863 HA

BZANG LAS GSO BA RIG PAR SBYANGS BRTZON GNANG BAS GZHUNG MAN
NGAG

SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR DU DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI'I BKA' GTER CHU BO

GNYIS 'DRES KYI GDAMS NGAG LA ZHAL SHES, BKA' GTAD RGYA'I DBANG,

CHU LHA DANG DRANG SRONG GI SGRUB THABS KYI SKOR, SNYAN BRGYUD
KYI PHYAG LEN,

'GREL BSHAD SOGS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN BZHES MDZAD CING

GSO RIG MAN NGAG GI BDAG POR GYUR, BYANG RONG GI DUS 'KHRUGS

BYUNG RJES RIN SPUNGS PA'I BLA SMAN MDZAD NAS BZHUGS SO, KHONG
GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI//GSO RIG KHOG 'BUGS PAD DKAR RGYAS PA'I NYIN

BYED//DANG//BSHAD RGYUD KYI 'GREL BA BKLAGS PAS DON THAMS CAD

'GRUB PA//BCAS BZHUGS SO, KHONG GI MTSAN GZHAN LA DRANG SRONG

BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN ZHES ZHU'O, ,

(LHA RTZE YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1798

LOR LHA RTZER YAB KHYIM BDAG PHUN TSOGS DANG, YUM BU KHRID GNYIS

KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS MGAR YIN, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA

PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1870 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG LO

LNGA PAR LHA CHOS DGA' LDAN GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS MKHAN
PO YE

SHES CHOS 'PHEL LA GTZUG PHUD PHUL, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR MKHAN PO

'DI BA LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS SHING MTSAN LA YE SHES CHOS 'PHEL
ZHES

GSOL, SLOB DPON THOGS MED GRAGS PA LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG

CHOS SPYOD BCAS LA SBYANGS BA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SLOB

@1864 HA

DPON BLO BZANG MGON PO LAS MDO RGYUD KYI CHOS GZHUNG DBANG LUNG

MAN NGAG MANG DU GSAN NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS

BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR BLA MA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO SO
LNGA PAR

BDE CHEN RI KHROD DU PHEBS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN KHO NA MDZAD
NAS

DUS 'DA' BA'O, DGUNG LO DON GSUM PAR DGONGS PAR CHOS DBYINGS

SU GSHEGS SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI//LAM RIM BLA MA BRGYUD
PA'I RNAM

THAR MDOR BSDUS//DANG, //GRUB THOB BRGYAD CU'I RTOGS BRJOD

BSDUS DON DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD//, //'KHON RIGS BLA MA'I

BRIS THANG 'BRI TSUL DANG 'BREL BA'I RNAM BSHAD MDOR BSDUS//,

//THEG CHEN BLO SBYONG GI ZIN BRIS//, //GSAN YIG RIN CHEN GTER
MDZOD//, 

//LHA RTZE CHOS RDZONG GNYIS KYI DKAR CHAG//BCAS CHOS TSAN

BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA LONGS PA'I POD GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

(LHA ZHI BA 'OD,)

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS THOG MAR BOD NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD CING, DE RJES KHA
CHE

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM
ZHUS

PA DANG, LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD LA YANG BYANG ZHING CHUB PA MDZAD
CING RGYA

CING BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BSDUS

TU BYUNG ZHING BOD KYI CHOS 'BYUNG LO RGYUS THOG TU YONGS SU

NAS MKHAS

DANG,

PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PAR RGYUD SMAD KYI BLA MA
DANG,

DGUNG LO NGA BRGYUD PAR BYANG RTZER BYON NAS 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DON GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU YOS LO STE SPYI

LO 1603 LOR DGA' LDAN GSER KHRIR PHEBS TE LO NGO LNGA'I RING DU

GSER KHRI BSKYANGS SHING MDO SNGAGS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN
BSKOR,

LHA SA SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRAL DBU MDZAD, DGUN GLO DON DRUG PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS KYI PHYIR DU

BZHENGS PA'I DNGUL GDUNG NI DGA' LDAN DU BZHUGS SO, KHONG NI

DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI 'DZIN RABS NYI SHU RTZA BRGYAD PA YIN NO, ,

@1876 HA

(LHA SRAS GTZANG MA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO DUS RABS DGU PA'I DUS MGO RTZAM DU YAB

RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING DANG, YUM 'BRO

BZA' KHRI MO LEGS GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS TE, RGYAL PO
KHRI GTZUG

LDE BTZAN RAL PA CAN (802-841) GYI GCUNG PO YIN, KHONG

DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DAM PA'I CHOS LA
SBYANGS PA

CHE, BOD LUGS LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 841 LO'I GONG ROL TU
BLON

PO DABS RGYAL TO RE STAG RNA SPREL MGO DANG, COG RO LHA LOD,

LEGS SDUG BTZAN SOGS KYIS LKOG GA-YO BSHAMS NAS MO MA DANG LHA
BA

BCAS LA RNGAN PA BYIN TE LHA SRAS GTZANG MA RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG
DU BZHUGS

NA RGYAL KHRIMS 'JIG PA GDA' ZHES KUN TU BSGRAGS PA DANG RGYAL
PO KHRI

GTZUG LDE BTZAN RAL PA CAN GYI SNYAN DU GSOL MON YUL DU SPYUGS,

//RJE 'BANGS RNAMS KYI RIGS RUS 'BYUNG KHUNGS GSAL BA'I SGRON
ME//

LAS" AA MI DON GRUB RGYAL GYI BU MO BSOD NAMS DPAL SBYIN LHA

SRAS GTZANG MA'I MOR BLANGS PAS (RIGS) SRAS KHRI MI LHA'I

DBANG PHYUG DANG, BU MTHONG LEGS CAN GNYIS 'KHRUNGS NAS SKU NAR

SON PA DANG, MI KHYIM YUL GRONG THOR BU YOD PA RNAMS LA DBANG

BSGYUR NAS RGYAL MKHAR BTZIGS PAS BOD CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG RGYUD
CES

GRAGS PA CHER SONG BA'O," ZHES MON YUL GYI LO RGYUS SU 'KHOD
'DUG

GO,

(LHA BSOD NAMS 'OD ZER)

@1877 HA

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO'I TSIGS MI GSAL, RAB BYUNG BDUN

PA'I ME PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1426 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS
MKHAS

GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI BLA MA MANG POR BSTEN TE MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR SLOB GNYER PAR MDZAD CING RAB TU BYUNG ZHING

TSUL KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS BZHIN DU BSRUNGS BAR MDZAD, SA SKYA'I BLA
MA

RIN CHEN DPAL LAS BRAG GNYIS DANG, GDAN BZHI, LAM

'BRAS, SEMS BSKYED, DUS 'KHOR RGYUD 'GREL, KYE RDOR, RDO RJE

PHRENG BA, BDE MCHOG GSANG 'DUS KYI DBANG CHEN, BLO SBYONG DON

BDUN MA, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA BCAS LA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, CHOS RJE

LHA GRAGS PA 'OD PA LAS BKA' GDAMS PA'I LAM RIM DANG, RIM

LNGA'I KHRID, PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO, BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI

BRGYUD, N'A RO CHOS DRUG ZAB MO BLA MA'I RJES GNANG BCAS ZHUS

NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO BYA
LO

STE SPYI LO 1405 LOR GYA' BZANG DGON PA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS,

DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I LHO GOS CHOS GSUM GANG LA GANG 'TSAM GYI

'DOD DON SGRUB PA MDZAD CING, DGON PA'I MNGA' THANG SHIN TU DAR

BAR MDZAD, GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG GSO DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN

BCAS BZHENGS PAR MDZAD, GDAN SA'I 'GAN KHUR LO NGO NYI SHU RTZA

DGON PA'I GDAN RABS BRGYAD PA YIN, ,

(LHUN SDING RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE,)

@1878 HA

GTZANG PHYOGS SU YAB LHUN SDING BDUD RTZI 'GYUR MED KYI SRAS SU
SKU

'KHRUNGS, GDUNG RUS GNYA' YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS

NAS YIG RTZIS DANG THA SNYAD RIG GNAS KYI SKOR LA SLOB GNYER
MDZAD

CING, KHYAD PAR DU YAB CHEN LHUN SDING BDUD RTZI 'GYUR MED LAS

GSO RIG RGYUD BZHI'I RTZA 'GREL DANG, SNYAN BRGYUD MAN NGAG ZHAL
SHES

KYI GDAMS PA MA LUS PA GSAN NAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR, DE

NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE LHA SA'I RDO RING LA //DRI BA RDO RING
RGYAN MCHOG//

CES PA RTZOD YIG GI TSUL DU SBYAR BA DE THOG MAR RGYAL DBANG
LNGA PAS

GZIGS TE THUGS SHIN TU DGYES NAS SLOB MA RNAMS LA SLOB KHRID
DGOS

PA'I GNANG RKYEN BSTZAL, SDE SRID SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSOS KYANG
KHONG GI

ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS YUL THIG SDONG 'GREMS LA SOGS PA'I CHIG

BRGYUD KYI ZHAL SHES MAN NGANG MANG DU GSAN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO

DRUG CUR NYE SKABS KYANG NYIN LTAR SMAN GZHUNG SHO LO KA RE
THUGS 'DZIN

GNANG BA SOGS DAM PA'I NGANG TSUL 'GOG TU MED PAS GSO DPYAD

RGYUD GZHUNG MAN NGAG GANG DANG CI LA'ANG MKHAS PA'I PHUL DU
PHYIN PAS

GANGS CAN GSO RIG GI MING RGYAN DU GYUR TO, ,

(LHUN SDINGS BDUD RTZI 'GYUR MED,)

@1879 HA

SBYANGS PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU YAB CHEN BSOD NAMS CHOS 'PHEL LAS

GSO BA RIG PA'I SNYAN BRGYUD ZHAL SHES MAN NGAG RNAMS BUM PA
GANG

BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN NAS GDAMS NGAG KUN GYI BDAG POR GYUR, DE

NAS JO NANG SPRUL SKU KUN DGA' SNYING PO'I (1576-?) BLA SMAN

MDZAD CING, //RGYUD BZHI// DPAR DU BZHENGS TE ZHUS DAG GNANG BA

LA RGYUD BZHI RTAG BRTAN DPAR MA ZHES SU GRAGS, KHONG GIS RIGS

SRAS RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE LA GSO RIG GI MAN NGAG LAG LEN SKOR RIN
PO CHE

GNYIS KYI SKABS SU GSO DPYAD KYI SKOR LA 'GRAN ZLA DANG BRAL
BA'I

MKHAS PA CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI NAD RTAGS
DANG

SMAN BCOS KYI SKOR SOGS MA TSANG PA MED PA'I SMAN GZHUNG //GSO
DPYAD

KYI LAG LEN DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG// BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(LHUN SDING LEGS GRUB DPAL BA,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO LNGA PA'I DUS STOD RTZAM DU

GTZANG PHYOGS SU YAB DKON MCHOG GZHON NU'I SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS
SHING

GDUNG RUS GNYA' YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YAB CHEN

DKON MCHOG GZHON NU LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG GSANG SNGAGS
RNYING

MA'I 'DON CHOS BCAS LA BSLABS TE LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DE NAS

BYANG BA RNAM RGYAL GRAGS PA BZANG PO'I (1395-1475) ZHABS

LA GTUGS TE GSO BA RIG PA'I RGYUD SDE RNAM BZHI DANG, DE'I 'GREL

BA DANG YANG 'GREL, SLOB DPON GYI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I ZHAL
SHES

PA

LDAN GYI SKYES BU CHEN POR GYUR TO, ,

BCAS

SRAS

MA

DU GSAN, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PAR KHU BO RGYAL SRAS BZANG PO SKU

GSHEGS NAS DGONGS RDZOGS KYI PHYIR DU GSER SKU CHEN PO BZHENGS,

DANG

RIM

'GRO

LHO BRAG LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR SBAL TI JO

SRAS (1129-1215) LAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING 'DUL BA LA SBYANGS

PA MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD, DE NAS 'DUL 'DZIN THAG MA PA LA BSTEN

TE RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB KUN GYI SNYING PO BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM
PA'I KHRID

BKA' GDAMS GZHUNG PA'I BSHAD SROL LTAR GSAN NAS THUGS SU CHUD

PAR MDZAD, THUN MIN GYI LAM GYI RIM PA LA YANG GOMS PAR MDZAD

DON STENG PA LAS SGROL MA'I CHOS SKOR DANG, DAM TSIG GSUM BKOD,

TSOGS BDAG RNAMS ZHUS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN YUN RING DU MDZAD

PAS, RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN POS KYANG BRTZON PAS SGRUB PA LHUR

DGON PA'I

NAS

MO

LUG LO STE SPYI LO 1583 LOR RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO BYA
KHYUNG DU

CHIBS BSGYUR MDZAD SKABS KHONG NI MKHAN PO LAS THOG PA YIN TE,

RGYAL BA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LA RTZOM BSKUL ZHUS PA LTAR //CHOS
RJE DON

ZHABS PAD SPYI BOS MCHOD, TSOGS GNYIS CHU GTER CHEN PO'I DPAL

LAS 'KHRUNGS, YON TAN RIN CHEN NOR BU'I BA GAM MTHO, GDUL

BYA GLING BZHI'I DBUS NA MNGON PAR BRJID, BSHES GNYEN LHUN PO'I

BZANG PO

SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU MA'I ZHABS PAD BSTEN TE MAN NGAG GI BDUD RTZI

MANG DU MNOS PA SOGS KYIS LHO BA SNGAGS RAMS PA ZHES GSANG

BCU

DUS

@1888 GDAMS GZHUNG PA DANG BKA' GDAMS GDAMS NGAG PA'I BSHAD SROL

GNYIS KA MNGA' BAS BRGYUD PA'I CHU BO GNYIS 'DRES ZHES BSNGAGS

BRJOD MDZAD DO, DE NAS LHO MON PHYOGS SU LAM RIM GYI GYI 'CHAD
NYAN

MDZAD PAS 'PHRIN LAS SHIN TU RGYAS SHING SLOB MA MANG DU
BSKYANGS, PHYI

RABS GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI DON DU BSTAN BCOS KYANG MANG DU MDZAD
DO,

BRAG

SENG GE BZANG PO YIN, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA RABS
NYI SHU

RTZA BDUN PA YIN NO, ,

(LHO BRAG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI GSER KHANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO DANG MI GCIG YIN PAS DE

LA GZIGS PAR ZHU'O, ,

(LHO BRAG SENG GE BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GSUM PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

LHO BRAG SHUD PU'I RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN PAR
YI

GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS RNAMS LA BYANG BAR SBYANGS, DGUNG
LO

NYI SHU RTZA BRGYAD PAR MKHAN CHEN NAM MKHA' RGYAL PO'I DRUNG
NAS RAB TU

BYUNG STE 'DUL BA'I KUN SPYOD RNAMS LA LEGS PAR BSLABS, ZHANG YE

SHES MDZES LAS 'DUL BA MDO RTZA BCAS LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN
PAR

RGYAL PO LAS BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I KHRID RNAMS GSAN ZHING
THUGS

@1889 RGYAL PO SKU GSHEGS RJES GDAN SAR PHEBS TE GZHI GSUM GYI
PHYAG LEN

SOGS 'DUL BA'I BSLAB BYA PHRA RAGS THAMS CAD LA DAG THER MDZAD,

GLA BO DGON GSAR GYI CHOS SDE GSAR DU BTZUGS SHING KUN MKHYEN
MTSO

SNA BA SHES RAB BZANG PO SPYAN DRANGS TE DGE 'DUN MANG DU TSOGS
PA LA

CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA SOGS BSTAN PA'I BYA BA RGYA CHER MDZAD, 'DOD

YON LONGS SPYOD THAMS CAD LA CHAGS ZHEN SPANGS TE DKA' SPYAD KYI
SGO

NAS SGRUB PA RGYUN RING DU MDZAD PAS NYAMS RTOGS KHYAD PAR CAN

BRNYES PAS RJE TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL
GYIS KYANG

'JIG RTEN CHOS BRGYAD SPANGS PA'I SENG GE BZANG ZHES BSNGAGS
BRJOD

MDZAD, KHONG GI SLOB MA'I TSOGS LAS PHUL DU BYUNG BA NI MKHAN
CHEN

RGYAL SRAS BZANG PO YIN, KHONG NI LAM RIM BLA BRGYUD KYI BLA
RABS NYI

SHU RTZA BRGYAD PA YIN NO, ,

(LHO BLON KHRI BZANG GA-YU BTZAN,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BRGYAD PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS SHING, RGYAL PO KHRI LDE SRONG BTZAN SAD NA LEGS MJING
YON

GYI DPANG PO DANG, DMAG DPON, PHYIS BLON BKA' LA GTOGS PA

ZHIG YIN TE, BLON 'BANGS THAMS CAD LA DAM PA'I CHOS MI GZHIG

CING DKON MCHOG GSUM DBANG BTZAN PAR BYA BA'I BKA' KHRIMS

BSGRAGS SHING MNA' BOR DU BCUG PA'I //BKA' GTZIGS// LAS GSAL

BA DANG, //BKA' GTZIGS// KYI MA YIG CHA TSANG NI //CHOS 'BYUNG
MKHAS

PA'I DGA' STON// DU 'KHOD 'DUG GO,@1890 (LHA SMON YE SHES TSUL KHRIMS,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO
1913 LOR

BOD RANG SKYONG LJONGS GZHIS KA RTZE'I LHA RTZE RDZONG KHONGS SU
SKU 'KHRUNGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I ME MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1977 LOR SKU
GSHEGS,

KHONG CHUNG DUS NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS TE YI
GE'I 'BRI

KLOG BCAS LA LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE SE RA

THEG CHEN GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA DANG
RIG

GNAS MTHA' DAG LA SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN PA MDZAD NAS MKHAS PA'I

YANG RTZER SON, KHONG NI PAn CHEN SKU PHRENG DGU BA BLO BZANG
THUB

BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA'I NANG SGANG GI DZA SAG DANG, MGRON GNYER,

DRUNG YIG CHEN MO SOGS KYI THUGS 'GAN BZHES MYONG BA DANG, BOD

BCINGS 'GROL THOB RJES BOD RANG SKYONG LJONGS KYI CHAB SRID GROS
MOL

TSOGS 'DU'I AU YON LHAN KHANG GI KRU'U ZHI GZHON PA'I 'GAN KHUR

BZHES MYONG BA RED, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //SKYA SENG BU
LNGA'I RTOGS

BRJOD// DANG, //RJE BTZUN MI LA'I RNAM THAR SNYAN NGAG TSIGS
BCAD

PA//, //NAGS LHA SGEG MO'I GTAM RGYUD// BSLAB BYA, CHAB SHOG

BCAS BZHUGS SO, ,

(LHO LA YAG BYANG CHUB DNGOS GRUB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GNYIS PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU

LHO LA YAG TU YAB STAR KA DPAL SKYID DANG, YUM STAG LO ZLA SGRON

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BYIS PA'I MING LA CHOS
KYI

@1891 DNGOS GRUB ZHU, DGUNG LO GSUM PAR YAB LAS YI GE'I 'BRI
KLOG

LEGS PAR MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BCU PAR DGE BSHES SMON MDA' BA LAS

SGYU 'PHRUL ZHI KHRO DANG YANG DAG GSAN NAS SGRUB PA YANG BAG RE
MDZAD,

KHU BO LAS BYAMS CHOS DANG, MNGON PA, SPYOD PHYOGS PHRAN DANG

BCAS PA GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR GTZANG DU BYON NAS DGE

BSHES LCANG RA BA LDUM STON LAS BYAMS CHOS DANG SPYOD PHYOGS
TSAR RE

GSAN, DE NAS LA STOD DU PHEBS TE DGE BSHES DKON MCHOG MKHAR

LAS PHAR PHYIN DKA' 'GREL GSAN, DE NAS RJE SGAM PO BA'I MDUN DU

PHEBS TE RGYUD KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM LEGS PAR ZHUS TE NYAMS

RTOGS KHYAD PAR CAN 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR BYANG CHUB

SEMS DPA' ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA MNOS,

DE NAS GRO BO LUNG DANG, GRUB PA'I GNAS BDUN, PHO MA LHA KHAB LA

SOGS PAR SGRUB PA YUN RING DU MDZAD, BLA MA DO BA'I MDUN NAS

BDE MCHOG GI DBANG DANG RGYUD RNAMS RDZOGS PAR GSAN, KHONG GIS

YI DAM GYI LHA GZIGS PA DANG, MTSAN THOS PA TZAM GYIS RTOGS PA
SKYE

BA DANG, SMYO BA BTUL BA LA SOGS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS DPAG TU MED

PA RGYAS SO,

@1892 //AA//

(AA KY'A BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1767

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI
LO 1816

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I SHING MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1785 LOR GONG MA CHIN LUNG
RGYAL POS

MJAL 'PHRAD MDZAD, RIM GYIS GRU'U CANG DBU BLA'I 'JA' SA GNANG,

RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1807 LOR SKU
'BUM

DGON GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS KYANG LO GCIG MA GANG BAR BYANG

PHYOGS KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I YONGS 'DZIN DU GDAN 'DREN
PA'I

MI SNA KHAL RTA BCAS 'BYOR ZHING, ZHU 'BUL NAN TAN CHE BAR BRTEN

DE'I PHYOGS SU CHIBS BSGYUR MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING
PHO

KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1814 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON DU TSUR PHEBS TE, RAB

BYUNG DE'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1816 LO NAS BZUNG RIM GYIS
GSER

SDONG CHEN MO DANG, 'DU KHANG CHEN MO, 'JAM DBYANGS KUN GZIGS

GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG BCAS PA LEGS PAR BZHENGS PA MDZAD, KHONG

@1893 NI AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO NAS RTZIS PA'I AA KY'A'I SKU
PHRENG GSUM PA

YIN LA, SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN RABS KHRI CHEN BCU BZHI PA YIN

NO, ,

(AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1708

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI

LO 1768 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS NAS SKU

'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS

DANG BCAS PAR THOS BSAM MTHIL PHYIN PA MDZAD CING MKHAS PA CHEN

POR GYUR, KHONG GI RNAM THAR ZHIB TU MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN
TU

PHANGS SO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //CHA TSAD KYI BSTAN BCOS
MKHAS

PA'I 'JUG NGOGS// DANG, //LHA SKU'I CHA TSAD BDE LAG TU RTOGS
PAR

BYED PA'I MAN NGAG THIG GI RNAM GZHAG//, //SNYAN NGAG ME LONG GI
LE'U

GNYIS PA DON RGYAN SO LNGA'I DPER BRJOD//, //RANG RGYUD 'GUGS

TSUL GYI BRJED BYANG//, //MA HA TZI NA'I BYANG MTHA' RGYAL KHAB
CHEN PO

GTZO GYUR YUL 'KHOR LA 'OS PA'I DUS SBYOR//, //SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA

GLING GI 'DU KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI DKAR CHAG// BCAS POD CHUNG

GCIG BZHUGS SO, ,

(AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO
1870

LOR SGO ME HOR KY'A SDE BAR YAB DGE BSNYEN DANG, YUM LCAGS MO
SKYID

@1894 GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME
MO LUG LO STE

SPYI LO 1909 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GSER BUM BRTAG BSGRIL

GA-YUGS NAS SKU GONG MA AA KY'A YE SHES MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I
YANG SRID DU

NGOS 'DZIN TE, DGUNG LO DGU PAR RANG SGAR GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA

MNGA' GSOL, SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MDUN NAS RAB

TU BYUNG ZHING YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN TE, DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB
GLING

GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING MANG 'GYED GSOL STON GYI RIM PA GANG
LEGS

BSTABS NAS THOS BSAM GYI SGO 'PHAR 'BYED, DGON PA GZHUNG NAS

KYANG SKU GONG MA'I DUS BZHIN BZHUGS GDAN CHA TSANG PHUL, DGUNG
LO

BCU DGU PAR SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MDUN NAS DGE

TSUL DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES TE GZHUNG BKA' POD
LNGA LA

GSAN SBYANGS DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN BRGYUD KYI
CHU

MIG BRGYA RTZA MTHAR THON, GONG MA CHEN PO'I PHO BRANG DU LAN
KHA SHAS

PHEBS SHING GONG MA CHEN POS BRTZE GZIGS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA

MDZAD, DE NAS BSTAN SRID KYI 'PHRIN LAS DANG THUGS DAM NYAMS

BZHES ZUNG 'BREL MDZAD CING 'GRO DON RGYA CHEN PO MDZAD DO,
KHONG NI

AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO NAS RTZIS PA'I AA KY'A SKU PHRENG LNGA
PA YIN NO, ,

(AA KY'A BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1910

LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I SA MO GLANG LO STE
SPYI LO

1949 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS SKU GONG

@1895 MA AA KY'A BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSO'I YANG

SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN GNANG STE KHRI 'DON MDZAD, DE NAS SKU 'BUM

BYAMS PA GLING DU CHOS ZHUGS MDZAD DE YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG NAS
BZUNG

GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA LA THUGS GNYER MDZAD CING DKA' BCU'I

GRVA SKOR PHEBS, DE NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON TE
RJE 'JIGS

MED 'PHYIN LAS RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI BKA' CHOS
MANG DU

GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR RJE 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO SKU 'BUM

DU GDAN 'DREN ZHUS TE BYANG CHUB LAM RIM CHEN MO SOGS GSAN PA

MDZAD, PAn CHEN THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA'I DRUNG NAS DUS 'KHOR

RDUL TSON DKYIL 'KHOR STENG NAS DBANG CHEN ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER

BDUN PAR LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG ZIN BRIS SKYA RENGS GSAR

BA'I SNANG BA LJAGS RTZOM MDZAD PA NAS MKHAS PA'I BYA BA 'CHAD
RTZOD

RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU THAM PAR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI AA KY'A'I SKU PHRENG
DRUG PA

YIN NO, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI //BSTOD PA AUTPAL DKAR PO'I CHUN
PO//

DANG, //SHING RTA'I SROL 'BYED KYI RNAM GZHAG RAGS BSDUS BLO
GSAL

MGUL RGYAN GSAR PA//, //RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON GYI BSHAD LUNG ZIN

BRIS DNGOS GRUB BDUD RTZI'I ZEGS MA// BCAS CHOS TSAN BCO BRGYAD

LONGS PA'I POD GSUM BZHUGS SO, ,

(AA KY'A YE SHES MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1817

@1896 LOR SGO ME HOR KY'A SDE BAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCO
LNGA PA'I SA MO

SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1869 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG SKU 'BUM CHOS
SKYONG

CHEN MO'I LUNG BSTAN BZHIN SKU GONG MA AA KY'A BLO BZANG 'JAM
DBYANGS

RGYA MTSO'I YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN TE DGUNG LO BDUN PAR RANG
SGAR GYI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA MNGA' GSOL MDZAD, KY'A SMON RAMS PA BLO BZANG

DON GRUB YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI

CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DGON PA GZHUNG NAS KYANG SKU GONG MA BKA' DRIN
CHE

BA'I PHYIR GDONG GRAL 'GOR 'BOL STAN BZHUGS GDAN DANG RGYAB YOL,

CHOS GRVA'I 'DZIN GRVAR KHA GANG MA DANG, YAR TSOGS SAR SHING
KHRI SUG

BZHI MA BCAS PHUL, GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS BSAM LEGS PAR

GNANG, GONG MA'I RGYAL PO'I PHO BRANG DU LAN KHA SHAS PHEBS TE
BSTAN

SRID KYI PHAN BZHED YOL BA MED PA'I 'PHRIN LAS SPEL, DGUNG LO SO

BDUN PAR SKU 'BUM DGON DU PHEBS TE TSOGS CHEN GYI DGE 'DUN RE

RE'I PHYAG TU DONG TZE CHON GSUM RE'I SKU 'GYED GNANG, RAB BYUNG

BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1861 LOR SKYABS RJE
SHING

BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS GTZOS LAS SNE THUN MONG NAS GSER SDONG
CHEN

MO RGYA PHIBS DANG BCAS PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD RGYU'I BKA' DRIN

SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS PA ZHAL GYIS BZHES TE, LO DER SMAD PHYOGS SU

PHEBS NAS SBYIN BDAG RNAMS LA RTING SKUL MDZAD PAS DNGUL SRANG
KHRI

PHRAG DU MA 'DUS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE DRUG PAR SKU 'BUM DU

PHEBS, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1863
LOR RGYA

@1897 SOG GI 'KHRUG CHEN LANGS PAR BRTEN, KHONG GIS LAN DANG
RNAM PAR

SMIN PAR MA LTOS PAR SRID SKYONG DMAG 'BREL GYI LAS NYIN MTSAN
KHOR

MO YUG TU KHUR BZHES LHOD PA MED PAR MDZAD, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I

DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GSUM PAR STONG

'KHOR MKHAR DU DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI AA
KY'A

SHES RAB BZANG PO NAS RTZIS PA'I AA KY'A SKU PHRENG BZHI PA YIN,
,

(AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DON GRUB,)

KHONG NI DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU MDO SMAD

PHYAG RDO THANG GI KY'A SDE BAR (DENG MTSO SNGON MEN HO RDZONG
KHONGS) SKU

'KHRUNGS, KHONG GIS SHING BZA' BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS RGYA MTSO
(1759

-1823) SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI BKA' CHOS

MANG DU GSAN, SGRA RIG PAR LEGS PAR SBYANGS PAS KUN BSHAD KYI

MING LA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS ZHES 'BOD, SKU 'BUM KHRI

CHEN ZHE DGU PA BUM PA NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI NYI MA SKU 'BUM GYI
KHRIR

BZHUGS DUS SPYI LO 1827 LO YIN, DE DUS RJE YAB SRAS GSUM GYI

GSUNG 'BUM DPAR DU 'GOD RGYU LA AA KY'A BAS ZHU DAG LEGS PAR

MDZAD, SKU 'BUM GSO RIG DAR RGYAS GZHAN PHAN NOR BU GLING GI
KHRI

RABS ZHE BZHI PA PHE KY'A ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN
'DZIN

LA RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA GNANG, SKU 'BUM BLA MA AA KY'A
YE

SHES BSKAL BZANG MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I (1817-1869) YONGS

'DZIN MDZAD PAS YONGS GRAGS SU AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN ZHES GSOL,

@1898 MDOR NA SKU TSE GANG BOR DAM CHOS 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD NAS DUS
'DA'

BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI SA LAM RNAM GZHAG LAS RIM

SNGON 'GRO'I CHOS DRUG BLO RIG GI SDOM TSIG BRGYAD STONG 'GREL
CHEN,

'DUL BA'I SDOM TSIG GRUB MTHA'I 'BYUNG KHUNGS, THEG CHEN BLO
SBYONG,

RTAGS 'JUG 'GREL BA, DGE LDAN LEGS BSHAD KYI 'GREL BA, BRDA

DAG SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR BCAS CHOS TSAN LNGA BCU THAM PA BZHUGS

SO, ,

(AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1633

LOR SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS ZI NA KHA YOG GZHUNG LNGA'I NANG TSAN
LI BSHU

SDE BA'I AA TSANG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME
MO PHAG

LO STE SPYI LO 1707 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG SKU 'BUM DGON GYI
RGYUD

PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS MYONG, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA BZHI PA RAB
BYUNG BCU

GCIG PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1686 LOR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI

GDAN SA'I KHRI LA PHEBS TE LO NGO LNGA'I RING DU GDAN SA
BSKYANGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1687 LOR RGYAL BA
RIN PO

CHE'I GZIMS KHANG 'GAB MAR GRAGS PA BLA BRANG CHEN MO SLAR YANG

DBUS 'PHUG LTAR GYI KA BZHI MA LHAS RA GSUM DANG BCAS PA GSAR

GSOS DANG, RGYAL DBANG GSUM PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO BZHUGS

PA'I SA KHRI'I STENG DU KHRI KHANG LDEBS RIS DANG BCAS PA GZHI
NAS GSAR

BZHENGS MDZAD CING DBYAR STON LA CHOS GRVA 'TSOGS RGYUR GZHI RA

@1899 BSKOR, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1689 LOR

DNGUL SRANG STONG PHRAG LNGA LAS BRGAL BA'I RGYU SONG GIS TSOGS
CHEN 'DU

KHANG KA BA BRGYAD CUR RGYA BSKYED DE DBUS 'PHUG LTAR STENG SHOD
KHYAMS

RA DANG RUNG KHANG BCAS PA BZHENGS SHING RAB GNAS KYANG KHONG
GIS

RGYAS PAR MDZAD PA DANG, GNAM RGYAN MCHOD RDZAS SOGS KYI BDAG

RKYEN TSAD MED PAS BSKYANGS SO, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DGON GYI GDAN

SA'I KHRI CHEN BCU DRUG PA YIN NO, ,

(AA KHYUNG NGAG DBANG MKHYEN RAB,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I DUS STOD TZAM DU SKU

'KHRUNGS PA YIN, MDO SMAD KHA GYA TSO DRUG GI AA KHYUNG SGOM
GRVA THAR BA

GLING PHYAG 'DEBS MDZAD MKHAN AA KHYUNG DRUNG RAMS PA MKHAS
MCHOG YE

SHES KYI SPRUL SKU YIN, SKU GZHON DUS NAS GRUB CHEN NGAG DBANG
BLO

BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN (1745-1872) DANG, RNGA RGOD NAM

MKHA' SENG GE (1712-1780), MKHAN CHEN DRUNG YIG BLO

BZANG RGYA MTSO SOGS MKHAS GRUB DAM PA MANG PO SLOB DPON DU
BSTEN

NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR GSAN SBYONG LEGS PAR

MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU SUM RTAGS DAG GSUM DANG, SNYAN NGAG

MNGON BRJOD, SDEB SBYOR SOGS LA MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZER SON, BIS

PA NGAG DBANG MI PHAM ZLA BAS (1767-1807) KHONG LAS SNYAN

NGAG SBYANGS ZHES //MDO SMAD CHOS 'BYUNG// LAS GSUNGS, SKU TSE
GANG

BOR CHOS MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KYIS 'CHAD GNYER MDZAD NAS BSTAN@1900 'GRO'I DON CHEN 'BA' ZHIG BSGRUBS NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM NI//MTSAMS SBYOR LNGA PA'I 'GREL BA// DANG,
//GZHI

LAM 'BRAS GSUM GYI RNAM GZHAG//, //GANG BLO'I 'GREL BA//,

//SDEB SBYOR NGO MTSAR RTOGS BYED//, //SUM CU PA'I DPER BRJOD//,

//SNYAN NGAG DBYANGS CAN PI WANG//, //KHYUNG KHRA'I MNGON RTOGS
LO

RGYUS//BCAS CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO GNYIS YOD PA'I POD GCIG BZHUGS

SO, ,

(AA MCHOG 'JAM DBYANGS PHUN TSOGS,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS LO MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL NI MDO SMAD

YIN, RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO GLANG LO STE SPYI LO 1829 LOR
SKU

GSHEGS, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI
CHOS

SGOR ZHUGS SHING BSDUS GRVA NAS BZUNG GZHUNG CHEN RNAMS LA SLOB
GNYER

NAN TAN DU MDZAD CING TSOGS CHOS KYANG CHAG MED DU 'GRIMS, DE

NAS BRAG DGON PA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD
NYAN

BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS BYANG MJAL PHEBS SHING DE GA NAS MGON

BKA' BCU GSUM DANG RNAM SRAS BKA' BCO LNGA SOGS BKA' CHOS

'GA' ZHIG GSAN, CHU BZANG DANG GSER KHOG DGON LUNG SOGS SU

PHEBS TE PHAR YANG BKA' CHOS CI RIGS GNANG, AA MCHOG LAM RIM

GYI KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING 'GRIG YIG GI SA BON BRIS, GTOR CHEN LA

DAG THER DANG 'JAM DPAL GSANG LDANG GYI DBANG SOGS BKA' CHOS DU

MA GNANG, DE NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI SMAN PA GRVA
TSANG GI KHRI

@1901 LA PHEBS SHING MDZAD SROL BZANG PO YAR LDAN DU BSKYANGS,
KHRI ZUR

NAS KUN SPANGS MDZAD DE THUGS DAM 'PHEL MUR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI SMAN
PA GRVA

TSANG GI KHRI RABS BCU BA YIN NO, ,

(AA GNAM BLO BZANG DON GRUB,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1696

LOR MDO SMAD DBAL MANG GI NANG TSAN AA GNAM ZHES PA'I RUS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1756
LOR

SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS DPON MO RNAM
RGYAL

SGRON MA'I SKU MDUN DU BLANGS TE GCES PAR BSKYANGS, KHONG GI YUM

DPON MO RATNA GSHEGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS SU SRAS GCIG 'JOG RGYU'I

DOD DU DGON PA'I CHOS GRVAR BZHAG STE 'JAM MGON KHRI CHEN LAS

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS

RNAMS KYI DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL
DU

GSAN PA MDZAD, DE NAS TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES,

AAL DAR AA BO DANG, CHING WANG BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG GI PHYAG

MDZOD KYANG BYAS TE BLA DPON GYI CHOS SRID YUN RING DU BZUNG,
SKABS

SHIG TU DPON MO AERGE SHA RA BYA KHYUNG DU PHEBS PA'I ZHABS
PHYIR BYON DUS

DAM BCA' 'JOG PAS MKHAS PA'I TSAD DU SON PAR GRAGS, RGYUD PA'I

BLA MA DBU MDZAD KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES TE CHOS KYI 'CHAD NYAN LEGS

PAR SPEL, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI LO
1752

@1902 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUS
NAS LO

GCIG GI RING DU CHOS KHRIMS BSKYANGS, DPON MO AERGE SHA RA SKU
GSHEGS

PAS BLA DPON SBRAGS MA'I TSUL GYIS AURGE DGON PA'I KHRI LA
BZHUGS

NAS CHOS SRID GNYIS KA YAR LDAN DU MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1755 LOR SLAR YANG BLA BRANG
GI GDAN

SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG GTONG SGO SOGS
SNGAR

LAS MI DMAN PA MDZAD, DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I DON CHEN LEGS PAR

GRUB STE DGUNG LO RE GCIG PAR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS,

KHONG NI BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI RABS DRUG
PA DANG

DGU BA YIN NO, ,

(AA MES NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO 1597 LOR SA

SKYAR YAB SNGAGS 'CHANG GRAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, YUM

BSOD NAMS RGYAL MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI

GSAL, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS DGE BSNYEN DANG, RAB

BYUNG, DGE TSUL, DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RIM GYIS BZHES KYANG SA
SKYA'I

GDUNG RGYUD RIN PO CHE SPEL BA'I PHYIR DU BTZUN MO KHAB TU BZHES
NAS

RIGS SRAS BSKRUN, YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS

LA DAD PA GSUM GYI SGO NAS BSTEN TE SPYIR MDO RGYUD KYI BSTAN
BCOS

RNAMS DANG, SGOS SU DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I GSUNG NGAG LAM 'BRAS

DANG BCAS PA LA SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI
SHU

@1903 RTZA DGU PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO
1621 LOR

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO NGO
SUM CU

LHAG GI RING DU CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS LEGS PAR BSKYANGS SHING
SANGS

RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA SPYI DANG BYE BRAG TU SA SKYA'I BSTAN PA GONG
NAS GONG DU

'PHEL BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO BRGYAD PAR//SA SKYA'I GDUNG

RABS NGO MTSAR BANG MDZOD//DANG, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE LNGA PAR

//DAG YIG MIG DBANG RAB GSAL SNANG BA//, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE

BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO
1641

LOR//MGON PO GUR GYI CHOS 'BYUNG//BCAS BRTZAMS PAR MDZAD,

'DI'I MAN CHAD KYI RNAM THAR MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN TU
PHANGS SO,

KHONG NI SA SKYA'I DUS MCHOD BLA BRANG GI GDUNG RABS BCU PA
DANG, SA

SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN PO'I KHRI RABS NYI SHU RTZA DRUG PA YIN NO,
KHONG GI

YONGS SU GRAGS PA'I MTSAN GZHAN LA BDAG CHEN NGAG DBANG KUN

DGA' BSOD NAMS ZHES ZHU'O, ,

(AA MES BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG MA TSUGS GONG GI SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI

LO 1015 LOR MDO SMAD TZONG KHAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG DANG
PO'I

SA PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1079 LOR RVA SGRENG DU SKU GSHEGS,
KHONG GIS

SPYIR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO LA BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG

GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, SGOS SU JO

BO RJE DPAL LDAN AA TI SHA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS SHING JO BO'I LUGS
KYI

@1904 GDAMS NGAG THAMS CAD RDZOGS PAR ZHUS, DE YANG JO BO RJE'I
CHIBS

PA SKYONG BA DANG NANG LAS RNAMS KYANG LEGS PAR MDZAD CING ZHABS

TOG BZANG PO BSGRUBS, DE NAS SLOB DPON NYAN TSOR MJAL ZHING JO

BO'I CHOS RNAMS ZHIB TU GSAN SKABS SGOM PA NYAMS LEN GTZO BOR

MDZAD PAS RNAL 'BYOR PA CHEN PO ZHES GSOL, LHAG PAR DU JO BO'I

BZHED PA'I BDEN PA GNYIS KYI CHOS LA 'BROM STON PA RGYAL BA'I
'BYUNG

GNAS LAS KYANG KHONG MKHAS PAR GRAGS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU THAM PA

RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I SHING MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1065 LOR RVA
SGRENG DGON

PA'I GDAN SAR PHEBS SHING LO NGO BCU BZHI'I RING DU DGE 'DUN
MANG

PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, 'BROM STON GYIS MDZAD PA'I RVA SGRENG GI

KHYAMS SMAD LA SOGS PA'I BZHENGS 'PHRO RNAMS BSGRUB PA'I PHYIR
'BAD

'BUNGS MDZAD PA LA, DANG POR DKA' NGAL CUNG BYUNG YANG DUS PHYIS

SU SKU BSOD SHIN TU RGYAS TE LEGS PAR GRUB, DE NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I
DON

CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB CING DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA GSUM PAR DGONGS PA

CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI STOD
LUNG

PA RIN CHEN SNYING PO DANG, LHAB MI CHEN PO, DGE BSHES MANG RA
LA

SOGS PA YIN, KHONG NI RVA SGRENG DGON PA'I GDAN RABS GNYIS PA

YIN NO, ,

(AA MES ZHU GCIG)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU GTZANG

PHYOGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS SU DBUS

@1905 GTZANG GI MKHAS PA MI BCU'I NANG TSAN MKHAS GRUB GNYIS
LDAN GYI SLOB

DPON LO STON RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG LAS RAB BYUNG DANG, DGE TSUL,
DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES SHING 'DUL BA'I CHOS
GZHUNG

MANG DU GSAN, DE NAS KHONG GIS MAS PHRENG DANG, BRAG DMAR, LA

BRIS KYI KHA CHAD, SAD KYI LA STENG BCAS BZUNG STE 'DUL BA'I
BSTAN

PA SPEL ZHING DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS, KHONG GI
SLOB MA

GRAGS CHE BA NI KHRI STON BRTZON 'BAR DANG, SA RBA BTZUN CHUNG,
RGYA

STON A'ARYA DE BA, 'DAR SH'AKYA GZHON NU BCAS YIN LA, DE DAG LAS

KHRI TSO DANG, BRA TSO, RGYA TSO, SAR TSO ZHES BYUNG BA LA SKYI
TSO STOD PAR

GRAGS SO, KHONG NI LO STON RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG GI GRAGS CHE BA'I
'DUL

'DZIN GYI SLOB MA YIN NO, ,

(AA MO BLO BZANG SMON LAM,)

LOR MDO SMAD AA MO SDER SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I
SHING

MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1735 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN

PAR GCEN PO LAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS BCAS LA BYANG

BAR BSLABS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR CHOS RGYAL NGAG DBANG

BZANG PO LAS RAB TU BYUNG, DE NAS LO BZHI'I RING DU CO NE DGON

NYER GCIG PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE SER SMAD CHOS GRVAR BKA' POD

YONGS RDZOGS LA SBYANGS, RGYUD CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL LAS DGE

@1906 TSUL BSGRUBS SHING ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER

GTZANG DU PHEBS TE PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES LAS BSNYEN PAR

SHING GLING BSRE'I DKA' BCU GNANG, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS PAR SE RA

RTZE'I SGRUB KHANG DANG MKHAR RDO BSAM GTAN GLING GI KHRI LA
BZHUGS NAS

LAM KHRID MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PAR MDO SMAD DU PHEBS TE RI

KHROD GRA SGRIG MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO DGU PA RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS
PA'I

LCAGS PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1710 LOR RGYAL LUNG RI KHROD RNAM
RGYAL BYANG

CHUB GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD CING GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG SKU GSUNG

THUGS RTEN GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE BZHI PAR DGONGS

PA CHOS DBYINGS SU SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI

TSANG ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN DANG YER PA ZHABS DRUNG

BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN BCAS MANG DU BYON NO, ,

(AA TZAR YE SHES DBYANGS,)

'KHRUNGS SHING, RTEN RAB BYUNG YIN, YI GE 'BRI BA LA SHIN TU
MKHAS

PAS YIG MKHAN BRGYAD KYI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN TE, JI SKAD DU, GSAL

LA DAG PA LDAN MA RTZE MANG YIN, AA TZAR YE SHES SBAM RAGS BDE
BA

STE, KLOG KHAR BDE BA SHEL DKAR MGON SKYID YIN, ZHES GSUNGS

SPYOD KYI

LNGA'I NANG

GI YA GYAL ZHIG YIN NO, ,

(AA RIG BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS,)

CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS SPYOD BCAS
LEGS

PAR MKHYEN, PHU BO SE RA'I DGE BSHES LAS RAB TU BYUNG STE BLA
BRANG

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, BSE NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS

DANG, SDE KHRI BLO BZANG DON GRUB, KHRI BA BLO BZANG DON GRUB,

NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN, GUNG THANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN SOGS

BZANG DON GRUB LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I

GRVA TSANG

DU ZHUGS NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA SKYAR SBYONG MDZAD CING DAM

BCA' PHUL DU BYUNG BA BZHUGS, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE

SHES DANG, LCANG SKYA ROL BA'I RDO RJE, RJE NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA,

DPON SLOB NGAG DBANG DON GRUB SOGS KYI DRUNG NAS ZAB CHOS MANG
DU

GSAN PAS MDO DANG SNGAGS KYI GDAMS PA'I GTER MDZOD DU GYUR,

@1908 RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1759 LOR

GNANG, DE NAS RGYUD DU PHEBS TE BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM GYI

RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE SPYI LO 1761 LOR BLA

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI GDAN SA'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS LO BDUN GYI
RING DU

GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN

GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS PAS RIGS PA SMRA BA'I

GRAGS KYI DBYANGS SNYAN MNGON PAR MTHO BAS RDO BCAL RAB BYAMS

@1909 PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DE NAS TSOGS CHEN ZHAL NGO DANG,

BA YIN NO, ,

BZHI BA YIN

NO, ,

(AO ROD ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1819

LOR MDO SMAD KHUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG

DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI

SGOR ZHUGS TE HOR SPRUL BLO BZANG RAB BRTAN RGYA MTSO DANG,

CHEN BLO BZANG 'JAM DBYANGS, KHRI CHEN BLO BZANG LHUN GRUB,
RGYAL

BA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO SOGS LA BSTEN NAS GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD

LNGAR GSAN BZHES MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR PAn CHEN BSTAN

PA'I NYI MA MCHOG LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO NYER

PAR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MO'I GRVA SKOR MDZAD CING LHA RAMS
PA'I

@1911 MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO GSUM PAR GZHIS

DGON DU PHYIR PHEBS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE GNYIS PAR DBUS SHOG

BA YAN SHATNAN BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING DGON GYI KHRI PA MDZAD, LO
SHAS KYI

RING DU CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GSUM MAN

CHOS KYI RNAM THAR MJAL RGYU MA RNYED PAS SHIN TU PHANGS SO,
KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI //RMI LAM 'KHRUL SNANG DBYANGS CAN ZHAL LUNG//
DANG,

//SHIS BRJOD SPEL BA'I TSIGS BCAD//, //CHOS SDE BDE CHEN CHOS

'KHOR GLING GI BCA' YIG// BCAS CHOS TSAN BDUN CU DON BZHI LONGS

PA'I POD GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,

(AA ROL GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I LCAGS PHO SPREL LO STE SPYI

LO 1740 LOR MDO SMAD REB SKONG DOR NYIN AA ROL TSANG DU SKU

'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO
1804

LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS SU GA-YER GSHONG
DGE

SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA LAS RAB TU BYUNG, RONG BO THOS BSAM

GLING DU ZHUGS TE 'JA' MO'I DBU MDZAD BDE LEGS SOGS LA BSTEN

NAS SLOB GNYER NAN TAN DU MDZAD, DE NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE

DGA' LDAN BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS SHING MKHAN CHEN BLO
BZANG 'PHRIN

LAS SOGS LA BSTEN NAS GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA SBYANGS PA MDZAD

CING GRVA TSANG GI CHOS MDZAD GNANG BAR BLA MA ZHABS DRUNG BA
ZHES

GRAGS, GLING BSE DANG LHA RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS AANG DANG PO

@1912 BLANGS, SMAD RGYUD DU PHEBS SHING RGYA MA RIN CHEN GRAGS
SGANG GI MKHAN

POR BSKOS PAS DGON SDE LUGS GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS
LHO

BRAG DON GNYIS GLING GI MKHAN POR PHEBS TE LO 'GA' LA 'CHAD NYAN

MDZAD, DE NAS RANG YUL DU BYON TE DGE RING DPON POS ZHUS PA

LTAR RDZONG DMAR DGON PA'I KHRIR BZHUGS, KHRI ZUR NAS BSE TSANG

GONG MA'I BKA' LTAR MGAR RTZE GRVA TSANG GI KHRI LA PHEBS TE LO
BZHIR

BSKYANGS SHING BKA' CHOS MANG DU GSUNGS, DE LTAR BSTAN 'GRO'I

DON CHEN LEGS PAR GRUB STE DGUNG LO RE BZHI PAR DGONGS PA CHOS

DBYINGS SU GSHEGS, KHONG NI AA ROL SKU PHRENG DANG PO YIN NO, ,

(AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RTOGS BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1888
LOR

MDO SMAD DU MGAR GYI RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG
PA'I

SA MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1959 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG GIS THOG
MAR KHRI

RGAN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA BSTEN NAS SKYABS MGON SKU PHRENG SNGA
PHYI

RNAMS KYI GSUNG 'BUM GYI LJAGS LUNG THOG MA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON
DU

BZHES, DA DUNG SHAR SKAL LDAN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN

DANG, RDO SBIS SHES RAB RGYA MTSO, YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DPAL

LDAN SOGS BLA MA MANG PO'I ZHABS LA YUN RING DU BSTEN TE THUN
MONG

BA'I RIG GNAS NAS BZUNG STE DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RIM GNYIS

KYI BAR LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I GO 'PHANG MNGON PAR THOB,

DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA GRANGS NAS 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAM MKHA' LA
TSAD

@1913 GYIS RGYAS TE DRANG SRONG GSER GYI LHUN PO LTA BU'I MDZAD
BZANG 'JIG

RTEN NA GSAL BAR MDZAD, GDAN SA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS

NAS BRTZE BAS BSKYANGS PA DANG, CHOS 'BREL YOD PA'I DGON SDE
KHAG

LA GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN BRTEN PA SOGS BZHENGS BKOD MANG PO MDZAD

PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DUS 'KHOR GRVA TSANG DU DUS 'KHOR BLOS
BSLANGS

CHEN PO SNGAR MA BYUNG BA NGO MTSAR BA BZHENGS PA DANG, BRAG
DKAR

SPREL RDZONG DGON GSAR GTZO BYAS PA'I CHOS SDE GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD
PA

SOGS LAS KYI 'KHOR LO'I MDZAD BZANG SPEL, SKABS DER MDO DBUS

KHAMS GSUM GYI GTZUG TU BKUR BA'I BLA CHEN ZHIG YIN, KHONG GI
SLOB

MA GRAGS CHE BA NI SHAR SKAL LDAN BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS LUNG
RTOGS RGYA

MTSO DANG, BSE TSANG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN CHOS KYI RDO RJE, CHU
BZANG

BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG BCAS YIN, KHONG NI RONG BO THOS

BSAM RNAM RGYAL GLING GI GDAN SA'I MKHAN RABS DRUG CU THAM PA BA

YIN NO, ,

(AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1806

LOR MDO SMAD REB SKONG SPYANG LUNG DU YAB BOD SHUL CHOS 'BUM
RGYAL

DANG, YUM KLU MO RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, RAB BYUNG
BCO

LNGA PA'I ME PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO 1886 LOR SKU GSHEGS, KHONG
DGUNG LO

DRUG PAR SKU GONG MA AA ROL GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO'I SKU SKYES SU
NGOS 'DZIN

GNANG ZHING GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL, RONG RGAN DGE 'DUN MKHYEN

@1914 RAB DANG, SHING BZA' PAndI TA, KHRI BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN
SENG GE

GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG, BSOD GRAGS DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO, AA

KHU SHES RAB RGYA MTSO SOGS SKYES CHEN DAM PA MANG PO'I ZHABS
ZUNG YUN

RING DU BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA

DPYIS PHYIN MDZAD, MKHAR GONG BSAM GRUB BDE LDAN DANG, STAG

LUNG DPAL GYI RI BO, BDE YANGS BKRA SHIS NYAMS DGA', RAB

DGA' RGYAL MTSAN BRTAN PO, BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG SOGS DBEN

GNAS BRGYA PHRAG MANG POR SGRUB BRGYUD BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN
'DZUGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1855 LOR
SPYANG

(LCANG) LUNG SGAR GSAR DGA' CHOS 'PHEL GLING GSAR 'DEBS MDZAD

CING RTEN DANG BRTEN PA BZHENGS TE DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA

BSKYANGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS CHE BA NI SKYABS MGON SKAL LDAN
BLO

BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DANG, MKHAN CHEN DPAL LDAN RGYA

MTSO, RONG RGAN MKHYEN RAB BSTAN 'DZIN DAR RGYAS, MTSAN SGROGS

BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR RGYAS, RGYAL MKHAN CHEN DGE LEGS THUB

BSTAN RGYA MTSO, BYANG RTZE MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG DGE LEGS RGYA
MTSO,

STAG GE 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO, KHRI SPRUL 'JAM
DBYANGS

THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO BCAS YIN, KHONG NI AA ROL SKU PHRENG GNYIS
PA

YIN NO, ,

(AA LAG SHA NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR LHA RAMS PA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1759

@1915 LOR MDO SMAD AA LAG SHAR SOG PO'I RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS,
'DAS LO

MI GSAL, KHONG GZHON NU'I DUS NAS RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS SBYONG BA

LA DON GNYER LHAG PAR CHE BAS DKA' NGAL BRGYA PHRAG KHYAD DU
BSAD

NAS DBUS SU PHEBS TE 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS,
DBU

PHAR 'DUL MDZOD TSAD MA BCAS KYI GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGAR GSAN

BSAM NAN SMIN MDZAD, LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN MOR DAM BCA'

BZHAG NAS DGE BSHES LHA RAMS PA'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, KLONG

RDOL BLA MA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DANG, DKA' CHEN YE SHES RGYAL

MTSAN SOGS LAS DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG DU ZHUS SHING, KHYAD PAR

DU KLONG RDOL BLA MA LAS THA SNYAD RIG GNAS SKOR LA GSAN SBYONG
DPYIS

PHYIN PA MDZAD, DE NAS RANG YUL AA LAG SHA'I GA-YON DGON MI PHAM

CHOS GLING DU PHEBS NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS DUS 'DA' BAR

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA GCIG TU PHEBS SKABS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL

DU BYON TE RDO RAMS PA LHA ZHE LAS KHAMS SDE DGE DPAL SPUNGS KYI
KHRID

RGYUN LTAR SNYAN NGAG LE'U GSUM PO RDZOGS PAR GSAN CING RTZOM
RGYUGS

KYANG LEGS PAR PHUL, DE NAS PE CIN YUNG DGON DU BYON NAS DAD

LDAN SLOB MA RNAMS LA CHOS KYI SBYIN PA CI 'DOD BSTZAL, DGUNG LO
GYA

GCIG PAR //BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I GTAM THEG MCHOG NYE LAM//

BRTZAMS, KHONG NI SOG PO'I RIGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS KYANG BOD YUL DU

THOS BSAM MDZAD CING BOD KYI RIG GNAS KUN LA THUGS DPYAD YUN

RING MDZAD PA'I RKYEN GYIS BOD KYI BRDA SPROD RIG PA DANG SNYAN
NGAG

@1916 SOGS SA MKHAS DBANG GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RTZOM LA ZHIB
BSDUR

DANG DGAG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS TSIG NYUNG LA DON 'DUS PA MANG PO
BRTZAMS

YOD PAS PHYI RABS BOD LA MDZAD RJES CHEN PO BZHAG YOD, KHONG GI

GSUNG RTZOM NI SUM RTAGS 'GREL BA DANG, YI GE'I BSHAD BA, BOD

KYI BRDA GSAR RNYING GI KHYAD PA, DAG YIG GCES BSDUS, SNYAN NGAG

ME LONG GI DPER BRJOD BCAS CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO BDUN MDZAD YOD

PA DE PO TI GNYIS SU BSDUS TE SKU 'BUM DGON DU SHING PAR BRKOS

YOD, ,

(AAN 'JA' SU ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN 'DZIN NYI MA,)

KHONG GI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL, 'KHRUNGS YUL

NI SKU 'BUM MCHOD GZHIS GA-YER MO THANG GI GLANG CHEN RA SDE BA
YIN,

KHONG RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS RJES SKU 'BUM RANG SGAR
GYI

GDAN SAR BKOD CING DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR

ZHUGS TE GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA THOS SBYONG BRDAR SHA CHOD 'BUM
RGYUD PA

BSDUS GRVA DANG GZHUNG GI DAM BCA' LEGS PAR BZLCAGS MO GLANG L
STE SPYI

LO 1841 LOR SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS, RAB

BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1843 LOR SKU 'BUM
RGYUD PA

MKHAN PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS BCA' YIG GI DGONGS DON BZHIN

'GRIG LAM GANG YOD THAMS CAD NYAMS GSO DANG DAG THER PHRA ZHIB

MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I GDAN SA'I KHRI LA
BZHUGS

@1917 NAS 'GRIG LAM KUN SPYOD DANG CHOS 'CHAD NYAN BCAS LA DO
DAM GANG

LEGS GNANG, DE NAS BYANG PHYOGS KHAL KHA'I YUL DU BYON TE BSTAN
PA

DANG 'GRO BA YONGS LA SMAN PA'I 'PHRIN LAS YOL BA MED PA MDZAD,
DE

RJES CHOS SRID ZUNG GI SGO NAS SKU 'BUM CHOS SDE CHEN PO 'DI
NYID LA BYA

BA RGYA CHER MDZAD PA MA ZAD DUS ZING GI SKABS SU YANG LEGS NYES
GANG

BYUNG THAMS CAD LA ZHAL BKOD LHAD MED PA MDZAD DO, KHONG NI SKU

'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS SO GSUM PA DANG, RGYUD PA

MKHAN PO'I KHRI RABS ZHE DGU PA, BYA KHYUNG DGON PA'I MKHAN RABS
RE

BRGYAD PA BCAS YIN NO, ,

(AAN 'JA' SU ZHABS DRUNG BLO BZANG DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RIN CHEN,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO KHYI LO STE SPYI LO
1874 LOR

BYA KHYUNG GI STOD NYIN THUB BCU'I NANG TSAN RDO SPUNGS SDE BAR
YAB TSE

BRTAN RDO RJE DANG, YUM GNAM MTSO SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU

'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI GSAL, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR SKU 'BUM RANG

SGAR DU GDAN SAR BKOD CING KHAL KHA RAB 'BYAMS PA YE SHES DPAL
LDAN SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG 'DON CHOS
SPYOD

BCAS LA BYANG BAR MDZAD, SKYABS RJE THAR SHUL DGE 'DUN CHOS
SKYONG

RGYA MTSO'I MDUN NAS DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO

BCU PAR KLU 'BUM RAB 'BYAMS PA YE SHES DGE LEGS SLOB DPON DU

BSTEN NAS DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE TSAD
MA

RNAM 'GREL DANG, DBU MA, PHAR PHYIN SOGS LA THOS BSAM YANG

@1918 DAG PAR MDZAD, SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG GI
DRUNG NAS DGE

TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO NYI SHU THAM PAR SKYABS RJE
ZHVA DMAR

RDO RJE 'CHANG GI MDUN NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS MDZAD CING, RGYUD PA
GRVA

TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS NAS GSANG CHEN RGYUD SDE RNAMS LA
SBYANGS PA

DPYIS PHYIN PA MDZAD, GSER TOG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO
LAS

ZUR BKA'I DBANG CHEN RJES GNANG DANG, MDO SNGAGS KYI BSHAD

LUNG, NYAMS KHRID ZAB KHRID KYI SKOR, BKA' 'GYUR GYI BKLAG LUNG

SOGS CHOS RGYUN GANG 'DOD THAMS CAD GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG

PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SHING PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1894 LOR
SKU 'BUM

SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS NAS CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG
'GRIG

LAM KUN SPYOD BCAS KYI SKOR LA TSAGS 'DZIN DO DAM GANG LEGS

BSKYANGS, KHRI ZUR NAS SNGA PHYI DU MAR KHAL KHA'I PHYOGS SU
PHEBS TE

MDO SNGAGS ZAB RGYAS CHOS RGYUN GYIS RIS MED GDUL BYA'I RE 'DOD

SMIN PAR MDZAD, DE NAS SKU 'BUM DU BZHUGS TE SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

DANG SKAL LDAN GDUL BYA RNAMS LA 'DOD MOS LTAR DBANG LUNG RJES
GSUM GYIS MTSON PA'I LEGS GSUNG CHOS RGYUN GYI SGO 'PHAR 'BYED
NAS

DUS 'DA' BA'O, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM SMAN PA DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS

DRUG CU THAM PA YIN NO, ,

(AAR BYANG CHUB YE SHES,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS MJUG TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, KHONG GIS 'BRE SHES
RAB

@1919 'BAR LA SOGS PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO'I ZHABS LA

GTUGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PAR SBYANGS PA DPYIS

PHYIN PAR MDZAD CING MKHAS PO CHEN POR GYUR, RAB BYUNG GNYIS
PA'I

SHING PHO STAG LO STE SPYI LO 1134 LOR BYA 'DUL 'DZIN GYIS MKHAN
PO,

RGYA DMAR GYIS LAS SLOB, AAR BYANG CHUB YE SHES KYIS GSANG STON

MDZAD NAS PHAG MO GRU BA BSNYER PAR RDZOGS, RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I

SHING PHO BYI LO STE SPYI LO 1144 LOR RGYAL LHA KHANG GI GDAN
SAR PHEBS

SHING DBYAR THOG GCIG GI RING DU GDAN SA BSKYANGS, DE NAS SNAR

THANG GI BKA' 'GYUR DANG BSTAN 'GYUR THOG MAR GSAR BSGRIGS BYED

SKABS BCOM LDAN RIGS PA'I RAL GRI DANG RGYANG RO SANGS RGYAS
'BUM

DANG MNYAM GCIG TU ZHUS DAG MDZAD, DE'I SKABS SU KHONG GI MTSAN

LA DBUS PA BLO GSAL BYANG CHUB YE SHES ZHES ZHU, DE NAS LHA SA'I
NYE

'DABS STOD LUNG PHU LA PHEBS TE GNAM RTZED LDING GI DGON PA GSAR

'DEBS MDZAD CING DGE 'DUN MANG PO'I TSOGS PA BSKYANGS SHING,

SLOB DPON 'BRE SHES RAB 'BAR GYI SHER PHYIN BSHAD RGYUN GTZO BOR

BZUNG NAS 'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER MDZAD, PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MDO

BSTAN BCOS KYI RNAM PAR BSHAD PA YANG MANG DU MDZAD, BOD KYI PHA

ROL TU PHYIN PA'I GZHUNG 'CHAD SKABS GTZO BO 'BRE AAR DGE SLOB

GNYIS KYI BSHAD RGYUN LA BRTEN PAR GRAGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA GRAGS
CHE

BA NI SKAR CHUNG RING MO GZHON NU TSUL KHRIMS YIN TE, DES //MDON

RTOGS RGYAN GYI 'GREL BA// DANG, //SDUD PA// LA SOGS PA'I 'GREL
BA@1920 MANG DU MDZAD DO,,

(YI SHO LEGS,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I SNGON GYI DUS RABS DANG PO'I NANG DU YAB
RGYAL

PO THI SHO LEGS DANG, YUM SA SMAN BU MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU SKU
'KHRUNGS,

KHONG GI SKU BON AA LA DUN CUG GIS MDZAD, SKU MKHAR KHRI
BRTZIGS

'BUM GDUGS BZHENGS SHING BTZUN MO DMU LCAM RMANG LEGS KHAB TU

BZHES TE RIGS SRAS ZVA NAM ZIN LDE SKU 'KHRUNGS, KHONG GI BANG
SO

GA-YA' SPANG MTSAMS SU BTAB, KHONG NI BAR GYI LEGS DRUG NANG GI

DRUG PA YIN, DE YANG //LUNG GI SNYING PO// LAS "SA LA LEGS DRUG
GI

RING LA, BON GYI RGYUD GZHUNG DU MA DANG, RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA
RNAMS

DAR ZHING, RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA NI, NAD KYIS GDUNG BA SMAN GYIS

RTZIS KYIS BTUL, PHAS KYI RGOL BA SGRAS TSAR GCOD," CES 'KHOD PA

'DI YANG MTSAMS 'DIR DRANGS NAS BAR GYI LEGS DRUG GI SKU RING LA

(AU SHI BRAG ZHABS DRUNG BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I LCAGS MO BYA LO STE SPYI LO

LOR PHYAG RDO THANG BO'U KY'A SDE BAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'DAS LO MI

@1921 KHONG SKU 'BUM DGON DU PHEBS NAS SKE KY'A MKHAN CHEN BSOD
NAMS

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I MDUN LAS RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, DUS ZING GI

DBANG GIS THABS GZHAN MA BYUNG BAR BYA KHYUNG DGON PAR BZHUGS
NAS

BLO 'DZIN GSHAR SBYANGS DANG 'BREL BA'I SLOB GNYER MDZAD, KHRI
KA'I

AA LAGS RKANG TSA TSANG GI MDUN NAS DGE TSUL DANG PHYIS SU

RDZOGS KYANG BSGRUBS, DE NAS SKU 'BUM DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB
GLING

GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE RNAM 'GREL DANG PHAR PHYIN BCAS LA THOS
BSAM

LEGS PAR GNANG, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO STE
SPYI

LO 1881 LOR SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI LA BZHUGS,

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO STE SPYI LO 1882 LOR SKU
'BUM SMAN PA

SGOR ZHUGS TE

TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL DANG, DBU MA, PHAR PHYIN, MDZOD, 'DUL

BA RNAMS KYI RTZA 'GREL DANG THAL PHRENG SBYAR BA'I GSAN SBYONG
LEGS PAR

MDZAD, DE NAS RANG YUL DU PHEBS SHING SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA 'BAD

BRTZON MDZAD CING, BYANG PHYOGS HOR GYI YUL GRUR BYON ZHING

'GRO'I DON CHEN LA BRTZON PA LHUR LEN MDZAD DO, KHONG NI SKU

ZHUGS

CHUNG BA, GZHUNG CHEN BKA' POD LNGA DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI BCAS LA
RIM

PA BZHIN DU BSLABS TE MKHAS GRUB CHEN POR GYUR, ZHVA SER BSTAN
PA

NO,,

(AONG PO,)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I DUS SMAD TZAM DU

@1924 RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SGRUB THABS//, //RJE BTZUN
MA 'PHAGS MA

//'JAM

DPAL KHRO BOR SGRUB PA// BCAS BZHUGS SO,,

(AOR TU SU ZHABS DRUNG NGAG DBANG MKHAS GRUB NYI MA,)

KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO YOS LO STE SPYI LO 1843

LOR SMAD PHYOGS AOR TU SU JA SAG HO SHU CHA GOL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS,

'DAS LO MI GSAL, KHONG SKU 'BUM RANG SGAR DU GDAN SAR BKOD DE

DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS TE BKA' BOD
LNGA'I

GZHUNG DON GTAN LA 'BEBS PA'I GSAN SBYONG RDO RUS THUB PAR GNANG

ZHING TSOGS LANGS KYANG KHA YAR BZHENGS, DE NAS DPAL LDAN GSANG

SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS SHING GSANG CHEN
RDO RJE THEG

PA'I GZHUNG LA SBYANGS PA PHUL DU PHYIN PA MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCO

LNGA PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO STE SPYI LO 1875 LOR DUS 'KHOR DPON
SLOB KYI

KHRI LA BZHUGS, LO DER CHE SHOS SGAR BA NAS DONG TZE CHON BRGYA
LHAG

GIS GZHIR BYAS STENG, PHYOGS KYI DKAR THIG YONG BA KHYON BSDOMS

DNGUL SRANG BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CU LHAG DANG, DONG TZE CHON CHIG
STONG

DGU BRGYA DRUG CU LHAG PA'I RGU SONG GIS 'DU KHANG GYAN GRANGS
NYER LNGA KA

RING MED PA'I RIM PA GCIG PA KHYAMS RA DANG BCAS PA GSAR BSKRUN

DANG, MCHOD CHA GRAL GDAN SOGS LEGS PAR BSGRIGS NAS GRVA TSANG

RANG GI 'DU KHANG NANG DU RGYUN 'TSOGS MDZAD, DE NAS RGYUD PA
MKHAN

PO'I KHRI LA BZHUGS SHING CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI SGO NAS GRVA TSANG
LEGS PAR

@1925 BSKYANGS, SKYABS RJE SHING BZA' RDO RJE 'CHANG LAS DBANG
DANG RJES

GNANG SOGS KYI RGYUN MANG DU GSAN ZHING THOS DON RANG RGYUD LA
BSKOR

BA'I BSAM BYUNG LA BRTEN PA'I NYAMS LEN MDZAD, KHRI ZUR NAS RANG

YUL DU BYON TE DGON SGRUB SDE RNAMS LA 'DZIN SKYONG DANG DAD
LDAN

GDUL BYA YONGS LA ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI RIS MED DU BSTZAL
BAR

MDZAD, KHONG NI SKU 'BUM DUS 'KHOR DPON SLOB KYI KHRI RABS NYER

GNYIS PA DANG, RGYUD PA'I MKHAN PO'I KHRI RABS DRUG CU RE GCIG
PA

YIN NO,,

(A'A TZ'ARYA RIN CHEN MCHOG)

KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS DKYIL TZAM DU

SKU 'KHRUNGS PA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG LO CHUNG
NGU'I DUS

DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM GYIS BZHES TE 'DUL BA'I CHOS
GZHUNG

@1926 (MJUG BYANG,)

DE YANG //GANGS CAN LO RGYUS MI SNA'I MING MDZOD SHEL DKAR ME

LONG// 'DI NI BOD RIGS KYI RIG GNAS LA ZHIB 'JUG DANG SLOB KHRID

KYI DGOS MKHO LTAR RTZOM SGRIG BYAS PA'I DKYUS MA'I MING MDZOD
CIG

YIN, RANG RGYAL BOD RIGS MI DMANGS RNAMS KYIS RANG BYUNG KHAMS

LA 'THAB RTZOD DANG MA 'ONGS PA'I 'TSO BA LA YID CHES BRTAN PO
YOD

PHYIR SNYING STOBS DGU 'GYUR GYIS MI'I RIGS LO RGYUS 'PHEL RGYAS
'GRO

BA'I SHOG DKAR GYI STENG DU GSAR GTOD DANG GSAR BSKRUN GYI RANG

BZHIN LDAN PA'I DPE RIS NGO MTSAR ZHING BRJID CHAGS PA ZHIG BRIS

YOD PA RED, KHYAD PAR DU BOD RIGS KYI SPYI TSOGS RIG GNAS LA

SHUGS RKYEN THEBS PA'I CHAB SRID PA DANG, DPAL 'BYOR BA, RIG

GNAS PA, SLOB GSO BA, TSAN RIG PA, GSO RIG PA, DMAG

DON PA, MTSAN NYID PA, CHOS LUGS PA BCAS MI SNA NYIS STONG LHAG

GI MING MDZOD 'DI'I KHONGS SU BSDUS YOD, LO RGYUS KYI DUS RIM
LTAR

NA SPYI LO SNGON GYI LO BZHI BRGYA BCU BDUN PAR BOD RIGS KYI
RGYAL PO SNGA

SHOS SU GRAGS PA'I GNYA' KHRI BTZAN PO NAS GNAM GYI KHRI BDUN
DANG,

STOD KYI STENG GNYIS, BAR GYI LEGS DRUG CHU'I LDE BRGYAD, 'OG GI

@1927 BTZAN LNGA, SRONG BTZAN SGAM PO NAS 'U DUM BTZAN PO, RGYAL
PHRAN

SIL MA'I SKABS KYI MNGA' RIS RGYAL RGYUD DANG, YA RTZE'I RGYAL
RGYUD,

YAR LUNG RGYAL RGYUD, LHA SA'I RGYAL RGYUD, TZONG KHA'I RGYAL
RGYUD, SA

SKYA PA'I SKABS, PHAG GRU'I SKABS, RIN SPUNGS PA'I SKABS,

GTZANG PA SDE SRID KYI SKABS, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG GI SKABS, BKA'

SHAG SRID GZHUNG GI SKABS, BOD ZHI BAS BCINGS 'GROL BTANG STE

BOD RANG SKYONG LJONGS KYI MI DMANGS SRID GZHUNG BTZUGS PA'I BAR
DU

YIN LA, CHOS LUGS KYI GRUB MTHA'I DBANG DU BTANG NA BOD PO DANG,

RNYING MA BA, SA SKYA BA, BKA' GDAMS PA, BKA' BRGYUD CHE BZHI
CHUNG

BRGYAD, ZHI BYED PA, JO NANG PA, DGE LUGS PA BCAS YOD CING,

BOD RIGS KYI THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I CHOS SRID ZUNG 'BREL GYI LAM

LUGS LTAR NA DGON PA SO SO'I GDAN RABS DANG, GRUB MTHA' SO

SO'I SPRUL SKU, GONG MA SO SO'I DBU BLA, RGYAL KHAMS 'GRIMS PA'I

RNAL 'BYOR BA BCAS YOD, MI SNA SO SO'I 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO
TSIGS

DANG, SKU TSE GANG BO'I MDZAD PA 'PHRIN LAS RNAMS SNGON GYI YIG
TSANG

DAG LA KHUNGS BCOL NAS 'JON THANG TZAM GYIS ZHIB BSDUR BYAS PA

LAS RTOG BZO'I TSIG NI GCIG KYANG MED MOD, 'ON KYANG RANG NYID

KYI YON TSAD SHIN TU ZHAN PAS NOR 'KHRUL DANG CHAD LHAG NI DE
LAS MANG

BAS GANGS CAN MKHAS DGU RNAMS KYIS DAG BCOS DANG KHA SNON MDZAD

PA MKHYEN MKHYEN, 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO TSIGS MI GSAL BA RNAMS NI

SPYI LO'I DUS MGO DANG, DUS STOD, DUS DKYIL, DUS SMAD,

@1928 DUS MJUG BCAS KHAG LNGA LA BGOS NAS BKOD PA DANG, KHA SHAS
NI

SLOB DPON GYI 'KHRUNGS 'DAS LO TSIGS GSAL ZHING SLOB MA'I LO
TSIGS

MI GSAL BA RNAMS LA SLOB DPON GYI LO TSIGS DE SLOB MA'I GSHAM DU

BKOD PA LAS SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BKOD MED, MING MDZOD 'DI'I

DKAR CHAG NI KA MAD SUM CU'I RIM PA LTAR BSGRIGS YOD, MING

MDZOD 'DI LA MI 'DANG BA'I CHA SHAS NI LO RGYUS MI SNA SO SO'I
'KHRUNGS

YUL RNAMS DENG SANG GI YUL MING DANG SA MING LA SBYAR NAS ZHIB
BSDUR

BYED MA THUB PA YIN, MING MDZOD 'DI BRTZAMS BSGRIGS BYED PA'I
SKABS

SU SLOB DPON CHEN PO DOR ZHI GDONG DRUG SNYEMS BLO DANG, 'TSO
BYED

BYAMS PA 'PHRIN LAS, RGAN BSOD NAMS DPAL 'BYOR, RGAN RGYAL

TSANG SNYING BO RGYAL SOGS KYIS THOG MTHA' BAR GSUM DU THUGS
KHUR

CHEN PO MDZAD PA DANG, BRTZAMS BSGRIGS TSAR RJES MDZES MDA'

THUGS BSTAN PHUN TSOGS, SMON SKYID BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN,

MGAR STAG MO LEGS PA GSUM GYIS MA YIG CHA TSANG LA ZHUS DAG
MDZAD

PAS BKA' DRIN CHED DU ZHU BA YIN, DA DUNG KRUNG DBYANG MI RIGS
SLOB

GRVA CHEN MO'I TSAN RIG ZHIB 'JUG KHRU'U DANG, KRUNG DBYANG MI
RIGS

SLOB GRVA CHEN MO'I BOD RIG PA ZHIB 'JUG KHANG SOGS 'BREL YOD
LAS

KHUNGS RNAMS KYIS RGYAB SKYOR DANG ROGS RAM MDZAD PAR BKA' DRIN
CHE

ZHU'O,

SMRAS PA, RNAM MANG LO RGYUS MI SNA'I RNAM GZHAG 'DIR,,

RNAM DAG SEMS PA DKAR PO'I RNAM DPYOD KYIS,,

@1929 RNAM 'DREN STONG GI RNAM RTOG GA-YO BA ZHIG, RNAM DKAR
DGE BA'I RNAM PAR SMIN GYUR CIG,

SGRIG PA POS SPYI LO'I ZLA BA TSES NYIN PE CIN NAS SBYAR, SGRIG
PA POS SPYI LO'I ZLA BA TSES NYIN PE CIN NAS SBYAR, 1992 1992
